analyzed: vālmīki rāmāyaṇa
tatas rāvaṇa nītāyāḥ sītāyāḥ śatru karśanaḥ
iyeṣa padam anveṣṭum cāraṇa ācarite pathi
atha vaidūrya varṇeṣu śādvaleṣu mahā balaḥ
dhīraḥ salila kalpeṣu vicacāra yathāsukham

original: 5.001.003a dvijān vitrāsayan dhīmān urasā pādapān haran
analyzed: dvijān vitrāsayan dhīmān urasā pādapān haran

original: 5.001.003c mṛgāṃś ca subahūn nighnan pravṛddha iva kesarī
analyzed: mṛgān ca su bahūn nighnan pravṛddhaḥ iva kesarī
nīlalohita māñjiṣṭha padma varṇaiḥ sita asitaiḥ
svabhāva vihitaiḥ citraiḥ dhātubhiḥ samalaṃkṛtam
kāmarūpibhiḥ āviṣṭam abhīkṣṇam sa paricchadaiḥ
yakṣa kiṃnara gandharvaiḥ deva kalpaiḥ ca pannagaiḥ
sa tasya giri varyasya tale nāga vara āyute

original: 5.001.006c tiṣṭhan kapivaras tatra hrade nāga ivābabhau
analyzed: tiṣṭhan kapi varaḥ tatra hrade nāgaḥ iva ābabhau
sa sūryāya mahā indrāya pavanāya svayambhuve

original: 5.001.007c bhūtebhyaś cāñjaliṃ kṛtvā cakāra gamane matim
analyzed: bhūtebhyaḥ ca añjalim kṛtvā cakāra gamane matim
añjalim prāc mukhaḥ kurvan pavanāya ātmayonaye

original: 5.001.008c tato hi vavṛdhe gantuṃ dakṣiṇo dakṣiṇāṃ diśam
analyzed: tatas hi vavṛdhe gantum dakṣiṇaḥ dakṣiṇām diśam
plavaṃga pravaraiḥ dṛṣṭaḥ plavane kṛta niścayaḥ
vavṛdhe rāma vṛddhi artham samudraḥ iva parvasu
niṣpramāṇa śarīraḥ san lilaṅghayiṣuḥ arṇavam

original: 5.001.010c bāhubhyāṃ pīḍayām āsa caraṇābhyāṃ ca parvatam
analyzed: bāhubhyām pīḍayām āsa caraṇābhyām ca parvatam
sa cacāla acalāḥ cāru muhūrtam kapi pīḍitaḥ
tarūṇām puṣpita agrāṇām sarvam puṣpam aśātayat
tena pādapa muktena puṣpa ogheṇa sugandhinā

original: 5.001.012c sarvataḥ saṃvṛtaḥ śailo babhau puṣpamayo yathā
analyzed: sarvatas saṃvṛtaḥ śailaḥ babhau puṣpa mayaḥ yathā
tena ca uttama vīryeṇa pīḍyamānaḥ sa parvataḥ

original: 5.001.013c salilaṃ saṃprasusrāva madaṃ matta iva dvipaḥ
analyzed: salilam saṃprasusrāva madam mattaḥ iva dvipaḥ

original: 5.001.014a pīḍyamānas tu balinā mahendras tena parvataḥ
analyzed: pīḍyamānaḥ tu balinā mahendraḥ tena parvataḥ
rītiḥ nirvartayām āsa kāñcana añjana rājatīḥ

original: 5.001.014e mumoca ca śilāḥ śailo viśālāḥ samanaḥśilāḥ
analyzed: mumoca ca śilāḥ śailaḥ viśālāḥ samanaḥśilāḥ
giriṇā pīḍyamānena pīḍyamānāni sarvaśas
guhā āviṣṭāni bhūtāni vineduḥ vikṛtaiḥ svaraiḥ
sa mahā sattva saṃnādaḥ śaila pīḍā nimitta jaḥ

original: 5.001.016c pṛthivīṃ pūrayām āsa diśaś copavanāni ca
analyzed: pṛthivīm pūrayām āsa diśaḥ ca upavanāni ca
śirobhiḥ pṛthubhiḥ sarpāḥ vyakta svastika lakṣaṇaiḥ

original: 5.001.017c vamantaḥ pāvakaṃ ghoraṃ dadaṃśur daśanaiḥ śilāḥ
analyzed: vamantaḥ pāvakam ghoram dadaṃśuḥ daśanaiḥ śilāḥ

original: 5.001.018a tās tadā saviṣair daṣṭāḥ kupitais tair mahāśilāḥ
analyzed: tāḥ tadā saviṣaiḥ daṣṭāḥ kupitaiḥ taiḥ mahā śilāḥ
jajvaluḥ pāvaka uddīptāḥ vibhiduḥ ca sahasradhā
yāni ca auṣadha jālāni tasmin jātāni parvate

original: 5.001.019c viṣaghnāny api nāgānāṃ na śekuḥ śamituṃ viṣam
analyzed: viṣa ghnāni api nāgānām na śekuḥ śamitum viṣam

original: 5.001.020a bhidyate 'yaṃ girir bhūtair iti matvā tapasvinaḥ
analyzed: bhidyate yam giriḥ bhūtaiḥ iti matvā tapasvinaḥ

original: 5.001.020c trastā vidyādharās tasmād utpetuḥ strīgaṇaiḥ saha
analyzed: trastāḥ vidyādharāḥ tasmāt utpetuḥ strī gaṇaiḥ saha
pāna bhūmi gatam hitvā haimam āsana bhājanam

original: 5.001.021c pātrāṇi ca mahārhāṇi karakāṃś ca hiraṇmayān
analyzed: pātrāṇi ca mahārhāṇi karakān ca hiraṇmayān

original: 5.001.022a lehyān uccāvacān bhakṣyān māṃsāni vividhāni ca
analyzed: lehyān uccāvacān bhakṣyān māṃsāni vividhāni ca

original: 5.001.022c ārṣabhāṇi ca carmāṇi khaḍgāṃś ca kanakatsarūn
analyzed: ārṣabhāṇi ca carmāṇi khaḍgān ca kanaka tsarūn
kṛta kaṇṭha guṇāḥ kṣībāḥ rakta mālya anulepanāḥ
rakta akṣāḥ puṣkara akṣāḥ ca gaganam pratipedire
hāra nūpura keyūra pārihārya dharāḥ striyaḥ

original: 5.001.024c vismitāḥ sasmitās tasthur ākāśe ramaṇaiḥ saha
analyzed: vismitāḥ sa smitāḥ tasthuḥ ākāśe ramaṇaiḥ saha
darśayantaḥ mahā vidyām vidyādhara mahā ṛṣayaḥ

original: 5.001.025c sahitās tasthur ākāśe vīkṣāṃ cakruś ca parvatam
analyzed: sahitāḥ tasthuḥ ākāśe vīkṣām cakruḥ ca parvatam

original: 5.001.026a śuśruvuś ca tadā śabdam ṛṣīṇāṃ bhāvitātmanām
analyzed: śuśruvuḥ ca tadā śabdam ṛṣīṇām bhāvitātmanām
cāraṇānām ca siddhānām sthitānām vimale mbare
eṣa parvata saṃkāśaḥ hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
titīrṣati mahā vegam samudram makara ālayam

original: 5.001.028a rāmārthaṃ vānarārthaṃ ca cikīrṣan karma duṣkaram
analyzed: rāma artham vānara artham ca cikīrṣan karma duṣkaram

original: 5.001.028c samudrasya paraṃ pāraṃ duṣprāpaṃ prāptum icchati
analyzed: samudrasya param pāram duṣprāpam prāptum icchati

original: 5.001.029a dudhuve ca sa romāṇi cakampe cācalopamaḥ
analyzed: dudhuve ca sa romāṇi cakampe ca acala upamaḥ

original: 5.001.029c nanāda ca mahānādaṃ sumahān iva toyadaḥ
analyzed: nanāda ca mahā nādam su mahān iva toyadaḥ

original: 5.001.030a ānupūrvyāc ca vṛttaṃ ca lāṅgūlaṃ romabhiś citam
analyzed: ānupūrvyāt ca vṛttam ca lāṅgūlam romabhiḥ citam
utpatiṣyan vicikṣepa pakṣi rājaḥ iva uragam
tasya lāṅgūlam āviddham ativegasya pṛṣṭhatas
dadṛśe garuḍena iva hriyamāṇaḥ mahā uragaḥ
bāhū saṃstambhayām āsa mahā parigha saṃnibhau

original: 5.001.032c sasāda ca kapiḥ kaṭyāṃ caraṇau saṃcukopa ca
analyzed: sasāda ca kapiḥ kaṭyām caraṇau saṃcukopa ca

original: 5.001.033a saṃhṛtya ca bhujau śrīmāṃs tathaiva ca śirodharām
analyzed: saṃhṛtya ca bhujau śrīmān tathā eva ca śirodharām

original: 5.001.033c tejaḥ sattvaṃ tathā vīryam āviveśa sa vīryavān
analyzed: tejaḥ sattvam tathā vīryam āviveśa sa vīryavān
mārgam ālokayan dūrāt ūrdhva praṇihita īkṣaṇaḥ
rurodha hṛdaye prāṇān ākāśam avalokayan

original: 5.001.035a padbhyāṃ dṛḍham avasthānaṃ kṛtvā sa kapikuñjaraḥ
analyzed: padbhyām dṛḍham avasthānam kṛtvā sa kapi kuñjaraḥ
nikuñcya karṇau hanumān utpatiṣyan mahā balaḥ
vānarān vānara śreṣṭhaḥ idam vacanam abravīt
yathā rāghava nirmuktaḥ śaraḥ śvasana vikramaḥ
gacchet tadvat gamiṣyāmi laṅkām rāvaṇa pālitām

original: 5.001.037a na hi drakṣyāmi yadi tāṃ laṅkāyāṃ janakātmajām
analyzed: na hi drakṣyāmi yadi tām laṅkāyām janakātmajām
anena eva hi vegena gamiṣyāmi surālayam

original: 5.001.038a yadi vā tridive sītāṃ na drakṣyāmi kṛtaśramaḥ
analyzed: yadi vā tridive sītām na drakṣyāmi kṛta śramaḥ
baddhvā rākṣasa rājānam ānayiṣyāmi rāvaṇam
sarvathā kṛta kāryaḥ ham eṣyāmi saha sītayā
ānayiṣyāmi vā laṅkām samutpāṭya sa rāvaṇām

original: 5.001.040a evam uktvā tu hanumān vānarān vānarottamaḥ
analyzed: evam uktvā tu hanumān vānarān vānara uttamaḥ
utpapāta atha vegena vegavān a vicārayan

original: 5.001.041a samutpatati tasmiṃs tu vegāt te nagarohiṇaḥ
analyzed: samutpatati tasmin tu vegāt te naga rohiṇaḥ
saṃhṛtya viṭapān sarvān samutpetuḥ samantataḥ
sa matta koyaṣṭibhakān pādapān puṣpa śālinaḥ
udvahan ūru vegena jagāma vimale mbare
ūru vega uddhatāḥ vṛkṣāḥ muhūrtam kapim anvayuḥ

original: 5.001.043c prasthitaṃ dīrgham adhvānaṃ svabandhum iva bāndhavāḥ
analyzed: prasthitam dīrgham adhvānam sva bandhum iva bāndhavāḥ
tam ūru vega unmathitāḥ sālāḥ ca anye naga uttamāḥ
anujagmuḥ hanūmantam sainyāḥ iva mahīpatim
su puṣpita agraiḥ bahubhiḥ pādapaiḥ anvitaḥ kapiḥ
hanumān parvata ākāraḥ babhūva adbhuta darśanaḥ
sāravantaḥ tha ye vṛkṣāḥ nyamajjan lavaṇāmbhasi
bhayāt iva mahā indrasya parvatāḥ varuṇālaye
sa nānā kusumaiḥ kīrṇaḥ kapiḥ sa aṅkura korakaiḥ
śuśubhe megha saṃkāśaḥ khadyotaiḥ iva parvataḥ

original: 5.001.048a vimuktās tasya vegena muktvā puṣpāṇi te drumāḥ
analyzed: vimuktāḥ tasya vegena muktvā puṣpāṇi te drumāḥ
avaśīryanta salile nivṛttāḥ suhṛdaḥ yathā
laghu tvena upapannam tat vicitram sāgare patat
drumāṇām vividham puṣpam kapi vāyu samīritam
puṣpa ogheṇa anubaddhena nānā varṇena vānaraḥ
babhau meghaḥ iva udyan vai vidyut gaṇa vibhūṣitaḥ
tasya vega samudbhūtaiḥ puṣpaiḥ toyam adṛśyata
tārābhiḥ abhirāmābhiḥ uditābhiḥ iva ambaram
tasya ambara gatau bāhū dadṛśāte prasāritau
parvata agrāt viniṣkrāntau pañca āsyau iva pannagau

original: 5.001.053a pibann iva babhau cāpi sormijālaṃ mahārṇavam
analyzed: piban iva babhau ca api sa ūrmi jālam mahā arṇavam

original: 5.001.053c pipāsur iva cākāśaṃ dadṛśe sa mahākapiḥ
analyzed: pipāsuḥ iva ca ākāśam dadṛśe sa mahā kapiḥ
tasya vidyut prabhā ākāre vāyu mārga anusāriṇaḥ
nayane viprakāśete parvata sthau iva analau
piṅge piṅga akṣa mukhyasya bṛhatī parimaṇḍale
cakṣuṣī saṃprakaśete candra sūryau iva sthitau

original: 5.001.056a mukhaṃ nāsikayā tasya tāmrayā tāmram ābabhau
analyzed: mukham nāsikayā tasya tāmrayā tāmram ābabhau
saṃdhyayā samabhispṛṣṭam yathā sūryasya maṇḍalam
lāṅgalam ca samāviddham plavamānasya śobhate
ambare vāyuputrasya śakra dhvajaḥ iva ucchritaḥ
lāṅgūla cakreṇa mahān śukla daṃṣṭraḥ nilātmajaḥ
vyarocata mahā prājñaḥ pariveṣī iva bhāskaraḥ
sphic deśena abhitāmreṇa rarāja sa mahā kapiḥ
mahatā dāritena iva giriḥ gairika dhātunā
tasya vānara siṃhasya plavamānasya sāgaram
kakṣa antara gataḥ vāyuḥ jīmūtaḥ iva garjati

original: 5.001.061a khe yathā nipataty ulkā uttarāntād viniḥsṛtā
analyzed: khe yathā nipatati ulkā uttara antāt viniḥsṛtā

original: 5.001.061c dṛśyate sānubandhā ca tathā sa kapikuñjaraḥ
analyzed: dṛśyate sānubandhā ca tathā sa kapi kuñjaraḥ
patat pataṃga saṃkāśaḥ vyāyataḥ śuśubhe kapiḥ
pravṛddhaḥ iva mātaṃgaḥ kakṣyayā badhyamānayā
upariṣṭāt śarīreṇa chāyayā ca avagāḍhayā

original: 5.001.063c sāgare mārutāviṣṭā naur ivāsīt tadā kapiḥ
analyzed: sāgare māruta āviṣṭā nauḥ iva āsīt tadā kapiḥ

original: 5.001.064a yaṃ yaṃ deśaṃ samudrasya jagāma sa mahākapiḥ
analyzed: yam yam deśam samudrasya jagāma sa mahā kapiḥ

original: 5.001.064c sa sa tasyāṅgavegena sonmāda iva lakṣyate
analyzed: sa sa tasya aṅga vegena sa unmādaḥ iva lakṣyate
sāgarasya ūrmi jālānām urasā śaila varṣmaṇām

original: 5.001.065c abhighnaṃs tu mahāvegaḥ pupluve sa mahākapiḥ
analyzed: abhighnan tu mahā vegaḥ pupluve sa mahā kapiḥ

original: 5.001.066a kapivātaś ca balavān meghavātaś ca niḥsṛtaḥ
analyzed: kapi vātaḥ ca balavān megha vātaḥ ca niḥsṛtaḥ
sāgaram bhīma nirghoṣam kampayām āsatuḥ bhṛśam
vikarṣan ūrmi jālāni bṛhanti lavaṇāmbhasi
atyakrāmat mahā vegaḥ taraṅgān gaṇayan iva
plavamānam samīkṣya atha bhujaṅgāḥ sāgara ālayāḥ

original: 5.001.068c vyomni taṃ kapiśārdūlaṃ suparṇam iti menire
analyzed: vyomni tam kapi śārdūlam suparṇam iti menire
daśa yojana vistīrṇā triṃśat yojanam āyatā
chāyā vānara siṃhasya jale cārutarā bhavat
śveta abhra ghana rājī iva vāyuputra anugāminī

original: 5.001.070c tasya sā śuśubhe chāyā vitatā lavaṇāmbhasi
analyzed: tasya sā śuśubhe chāyā vitatā lavaṇāmbhasi

original: 5.001.071a plavamānaṃ tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā plavagaṃ tvaritaṃ tadā
analyzed: plavamānam tu tam dṛṣṭvā plavagam tvaritam tadā
vavṛṣuḥ puṣpa varṣāṇi deva gandharva dānavāḥ

original: 5.001.072a tatāpa na hi taṃ sūryaḥ plavantaṃ vānareśvaram
analyzed: tatāpa na hi tam sūryaḥ plavantam vānara īśvaram
siṣeve ca tadā vāyuḥ rāma kārya artha siddhaye
ṛṣayaḥ tuṣṭuvuḥ ca enam plavamānam vihāyasā
jaguḥ ca deva gandharvāḥ praśaṃsantaḥ mahā ojasam

original: 5.001.074a nāgāś ca tuṣṭuvur yakṣā rakṣāṃsi vibudhāḥ khagāḥ
analyzed: nāgāḥ ca tuṣṭuvuḥ yakṣāḥ rakṣāṃsi vibudhāḥ khagāḥ
prekṣya ākāśe kapi varam sahasā vigata klamam
tasmin plavaga śārdūle plavamāne hanūmati
ikṣvāku kula māna arthī cintayām āsa sāgaraḥ
sāhāyyam vānara indrasya yadi na aham hanūmataḥ
kariṣyāmi bhaviṣyāmi sarva vācyaḥ vivakṣatām
aham ikṣvāku nāthena sagareṇa vivardhitaḥ
ikṣvāku sacivaḥ ca ayam na avasīditum arhati

original: 5.001.078a tathā mayā vidhātavyaṃ viśrameta yathā kapiḥ
analyzed: tathā mayā vidhātavyam viśrameta yathā kapiḥ
śeṣam ca mayi viśrāntaḥ sukhena atipatiṣyati

original: 5.001.079a iti kṛtvā matiṃ sādhvīṃ samudraś channam ambhasi
analyzed: iti kṛtvā matim sādhvīm samudraḥ channam ambhasi
hiraṇyanābham mainākam uvāca giri sattamam
tvam iha asura saṃghānām pātāla tala vāsinām
devarājñā giri śreṣṭha parighaḥ saṃniveśitaḥ
tvam eṣām jñāta vīryāṇām punar eva utpatiṣyatām
pātālasya aprameyasya dvāram āvṛtya tiṣṭhasi

original: 5.001.082a tiryag ūrdhvam adhaś caiva śaktis te śailavardhitum
analyzed: tiryak ūrdhvam adhas ca eva śaktiḥ te śaila vardhitum
tasmāt saṃcodayāmi tvām uttiṣṭha naga sattama

original: 5.001.083a sa eṣa kapiśārdūlas tvām uparyeti vīryavān
analyzed: saḥ eṣa kapi śārdūlaḥ tvām upari eti vīryavān
hanūmān rāma kārya artham bhīma karmā kham āplutaḥ
tasya sāhyam mayā kāryam ikṣvāku kula vartinaḥ

original: 5.001.084c mama ikṣvākavaḥ pūjyāḥ paraṃ pūjyatamās tava
analyzed: mama ikṣvākavaḥ pūjyāḥ param pūjyatamāḥ tava

original: 5.001.085a kuru sācivyam asmākaṃ na naḥ kāryam atikramet
analyzed: kuru sācivyam asmākam na naḥ kāryam atikramet

original: 5.001.085c kartavyam akṛtaṃ kāryaṃ satāṃ manyum udīrayet
analyzed: kartavyam akṛtam kāryam satām manyum udīrayet

original: 5.001.086a salilād ūrdhvam uttiṣṭha tiṣṭhatv eṣa kapis tvayi
analyzed: salilāt ūrdhvam uttiṣṭha tiṣṭhatu eṣa kapiḥ tvayi

original: 5.001.086c asmākam atithiś caiva pūjyaś ca plavatāṃ varaḥ
analyzed: asmākam atithiḥ ca eva pūjyaḥ ca plavatām varaḥ
cāmīkara mahānābha deva gandharva sevita

original: 5.001.087c hanūmāṃs tvayi viśrāntas tataḥ śeṣaṃ gamiṣyati
analyzed: hanūmān tvayi viśrāntaḥ tatas śeṣam gamiṣyati
kākutsthasya ānṛśaṃsyam ca maithilyāḥ ca vivāsanam
śramam ca plavaga indrasya samīkṣya utthātum arhasi
hiraṇyanābhaḥ mainākaḥ niśamya lavaṇāmbhasaḥ
utpapāta jalāt tūrṇam mahā druma latā yutaḥ
sa sāgara jalam bhittvā babhūva ati utthitaḥ tadā
yathā jaladharam bhittvā dīpta raśmiḥ divākaraḥ
śātakumbha mayaiḥ śṛṅgaiḥ sa kiṃnara mahā uragaiḥ
āditya udaya saṃkāśaiḥ ālikhadbhiḥ iva ambaram
tasya jāmbūnadaiḥ śṛṅgaiḥ parvatasya samutthitaiḥ
ākāśam śastra saṃkāśam abhavat kāñcana prabham
jātarūpa mayaiḥ śṛṅgaiḥ bhrājamānaiḥ svayam prabhaiḥ
āditya śata saṃkāśaḥ saḥ bhavat giri sattamaḥ

original: 5.001.094a tam utthitam asaṃgena hanūmān agrataḥ sthitam
analyzed: tam utthitam asaṃgena hanūmān agratas sthitam
madhye lavaṇatoyasya vighnaḥ yam iti niścitaḥ

original: 5.001.095a sa tam ucchritam atyarthaṃ mahāvego mahākapiḥ
analyzed: sa tam ucchritam atyartham mahā vegaḥ mahā kapiḥ

original: 5.001.095c urasā pātayām āsa jīmūtam iva mārutaḥ
analyzed: urasā pātayām āsa jīmūtam iva mārutaḥ

original: 5.001.096a sa tadā pātitas tena kapinā parvatottamaḥ
analyzed: sa tadā pātitaḥ tena kapinā parvata uttamaḥ

original: 5.001.096c buddhvā tasya kaper vegaṃ jaharṣa ca nananda ca
analyzed: buddhvā tasya kapeḥ vegam jaharṣa ca nananda ca
tam ākāśa gatam vīram ākāśe samavasthitam

original: 5.001.097c prīto hṛṣṭamanā vākyam abravīt parvataḥ kapim
analyzed: prītaḥ hṛṣṭa manāḥ vākyam abravīt parvataḥ kapim

original: 5.001.097e mānuṣaṃ dharayan rūpam ātmanaḥ śikhare sthitaḥ
analyzed: mānuṣam dharayan rūpam ātmanaḥ śikhare sthitaḥ

original: 5.001.098a duṣkaraṃ kṛtavān karma tvam idaṃ vānarottama
analyzed: duṣkaram kṛtavān karma tvam idam vānara uttama
nipatya mama śṛṅgeṣu viśramasva yathāsukham
rāghāvasya kule jātaiḥ udadhiḥ parivardhitaḥ

original: 5.001.099c sa tvāṃ rāmahite yuktaṃ pratyarcayati sāgaraḥ
analyzed: sa tvām rāma hite yuktam pratyarcayati sāgaraḥ

original: 5.001.100a kṛte ca pratikartavyam eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
analyzed: kṛte ca pratikartavyam eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ

original: 5.001.100c so 'yaṃ tat pratikārārthī tvattaḥ saṃmānam arhati
analyzed: saḥ yam tat pratikāra arthī tvattaḥ saṃmānam arhati
tvad nimittam anena aham bahu mānāt pracoditaḥ

original: 5.001.101c yojanānāṃ śataṃ cāpi kapir eṣa samāplutaḥ
analyzed: yojanānām śatam ca api kapiḥ eṣa samāplutaḥ

original: 5.001.101e tava sānuṣu viśrāntaḥ śeṣaṃ prakramatām iti
analyzed: tava sānuṣu viśrāntaḥ śeṣam prakramatām iti

original: 5.001.102a tiṣṭha tvaṃ hariśārdūla mayi viśramya gamyatām
analyzed: tiṣṭha tvam hari śārdūla mayi viśramya gamyatām

original: 5.001.102c tad idaṃ gandhavat svādu kandamūlaphalaṃ bahu
analyzed: tat idam gandhavat svādu kanda mūla phalam bahu
tat āsvādya hari śreṣṭha viśrāntaḥ nu gamiṣyasi

original: 5.001.103a asmākam api saṃbandhaḥ kapimukhyas tvayāsti vai
analyzed: asmākam api saṃbandhaḥ kapi mukhyaḥ tvayā asti vai
prakhyataḥ triṣu lokeṣu mahā guṇa parigrahaḥ
vegavantaḥ plavantaḥ ye plavagāḥ mārutātmaja

original: 5.001.104c teṣāṃ mukhyatamaṃ manye tvām ahaṃ kapikuñjara
analyzed: teṣām mukhyatamam manye tvām aham kapi kuñjara
atithiḥ kila pūjā arhaḥ vijānatā

original: 5.001.105c dharmaṃ jijñāsamānena kiṃ punar yādṛśo bhavān
analyzed: dharmam jijñāsamānena kim punar yādṛśaḥ bhavān
tvam hi deva variṣṭhasya mārutasya mahātmanaḥ
putraḥ tasya eva vegena sadṛśaḥ kapi kuñjara

original: 5.001.107a pūjite tvayi dharmajña pūjāṃ prāpnoti mārutaḥ
analyzed: pūjite tvayi dharma jña pūjām prāpnoti mārutaḥ

original: 5.001.107c tasmāt tvaṃ pūjanīyo me śṛṇu cāpy atra kāraṇam
analyzed: tasmāt tvam pūjanīyaḥ me śṛṇu ca api atra kāraṇam
pūrvam kṛta yuge tāta parvatāḥ pakṣiṇaḥ bhavan
te pi jagmuḥ diśaḥ sarvāḥ garuḍa anila veginaḥ
tatas teṣu prayāteṣu deva saṃghāḥ saha ṛṣibhiḥ

original: 5.001.109c bhūtāni ca bhayaṃ jagmus teṣāṃ patanaśaṅkayā
analyzed: bhūtāni ca bhayam jagmuḥ teṣām patana śaṅkayā
tatas kruddhaḥ sahasrākṣaḥ parvatānām śatakratuḥ

original: 5.001.110c pakṣāṃś ciccheda vajreṇa tatra tatra sahasraśaḥ
analyzed: pakṣān ciccheda vajreṇa tatra tatra sahasraśas

original: 5.001.111a sa mām upagataḥ kruddho vajram udyamya devarāṭ
analyzed: sa mām upagataḥ kruddhaḥ vajram udyamya
tatas ham sahasā kṣiptaḥ śvasanena mahātmanā
asmin lavaṇatoye ca prakṣiptaḥ plavaga uttama
gupta pakṣaḥ samagraḥ ca tava pitrā abhirakṣitaḥ

original: 5.001.113a tato 'haṃ mānayāmi tvāṃ mānyo hi mama mārutaḥ
analyzed: tatas ham mānayāmi tvām mānyaḥ hi mama mārutaḥ

original: 5.001.113c tvayā me hy eṣa saṃbandhaḥ kapimukhya mahāguṇaḥ
analyzed: tvayā me hi eṣa saṃbandhaḥ kapi mukhya mahā guṇaḥ

original: 5.001.114a asminn evaṃgate kārye sāgarasya mamaiva ca
analyzed: asmin evaṃgate kārye sāgarasya mama eva ca

original: 5.001.114c prītiṃ prītamanā kartuṃ tvam arhasi mahākape
analyzed: prītim prīta manāḥ kartum tvam arhasi mahā kape

original: 5.001.115a śramaṃ mokṣaya pūjāṃ ca gṛhāṇa kapisattama
analyzed: śramam mokṣaya pūjām ca gṛhāṇa kapi sattama

original: 5.001.115c prītiṃ ca bahumanyasva prīto 'smi tava darśanāt
analyzed: prītim ca bahu manyasva smi tava darśanāt

original: 5.001.116a evam uktaḥ kapiśreṣṭhas taṃ nagottamam abravīt
analyzed: evam uktaḥ kapi śreṣṭhaḥ tam naga uttamam abravīt
prītaḥ smi kṛtam ātithyam manyuḥ eṣa u panīyatām

original: 5.001.117a tvarate kāryakālo me ahaś cāpy ativartate
analyzed: tvarate kārya kālaḥ me ahar ca api ativartate

original: 5.001.117c pratijñā ca mayā dattā na sthātavyam ihāntarā
analyzed: pratijñā ca mayā dattā na sthātavyam iha antarā

original: 5.001.118a ity uktvā pāṇinā śailam ālabhya haripuṃgavaḥ
analyzed: iti uktvā pāṇinā śailam ālabhya hari puṃgavaḥ
jagāma ākāśam āviśya vīryavān prahasan iva
sa parvata samudrābhyām bahu mānāt avekṣitaḥ
pūjitaḥ ca upapannābhiḥ āśīrbhiḥ anilātmajaḥ
athā ūrdhvam dūram utpatya hitvā śaila mahā arṇavau
pituḥ panthānam āsthāya jagāma vimale mbare

original: 5.001.121a bhūyaś cordhvagatiṃ prāpya giriṃ tam avalokayan
analyzed: bhūyas ca ūrdhva gatim prāpya girim tam avalokayan
vāyusūnuḥ nirālambe jagāma vimale mbare

original: 5.001.122a tad dvitīyaṃ hanumato dṛṣṭvā karma suduṣkaram
analyzed: tat dvitīyam hanumataḥ dṛṣṭvā karma su duṣkaram

original: 5.001.122c praśaśaṃsuḥ surāḥ sarve siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
analyzed: praśaśaṃsuḥ surāḥ sarve siddhāḥ ca parama ṛṣayaḥ

original: 5.001.123a devatāś cābhavan hṛṣṭās tatrasthās tasya karmaṇā
analyzed: devatāḥ ca abhavan hṛṣṭāḥ tatrasthāḥ tasya karmaṇā
kāñcanasya sunābhasya sahasrākṣaḥ ca vāsavaḥ
uvāca vacanam dhīmān paritoṣāt sa gadgadam
sunābham parvata śreṣṭham svayam eva śacīpatiḥ
hiraṇyanābha śaila indra parituṣṭaḥ smi te bhṛśam

original: 5.001.125c abhayaṃ te prayacchāmi tiṣṭha saumya yathāsukham
analyzed: abhayam te prayacchāmi tiṣṭha saumya yathāsukham

original: 5.001.126a sāhyaṃ kṛtaṃ te sumahad vikrāntasya hanūmataḥ
analyzed: sāhyam kṛtam te su mahat vikrāntasya hanūmataḥ
kramataḥ yojana śatam nirbhayasya bhaye sati

original: 5.001.127a rāmasyaiṣa hi dautyena yāti dāśarather hariḥ
analyzed: rāmasya eṣa hi dautyena yāti dāśaratheḥ hariḥ

original: 5.001.127c satkriyāṃ kurvatā śakyā toṣito 'smi dṛḍhaṃ tvayā
analyzed: satkriyām kurvatā śakyā toṣitaḥ smi dṛḍham tvayā
tatas praharṣam alabhat vipulam parvata uttamaḥ
devatānām patim dṛṣṭvā parituṣṭam śatakratum

original: 5.001.129a sa vai dattavaraḥ śailo babhūvāvasthitas tadā
analyzed: sa vai datta varaḥ śailaḥ babhūva avasthitaḥ tadā
hanūmān ca muhūrtena vyaticakrāma sāgaram

original: 5.001.130a tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
analyzed: tatas devāḥ sa gandharvāḥ siddhāḥ ca parama ṛṣayaḥ
abruvan sūrya saṃkāśām surasām nāga mātaram
ayam vātātmajaḥ śrīmān plavate sāgara upari

original: 5.001.131c hanūmān nāma tasya tvaṃ muhūrtaṃ vighnam ācara
analyzed: hanūmān nāma tasya tvam muhūrtam vighnam ācara
rākṣasam rūpam āsthāya su ghoram parvata upamam
daṃṣṭrā karālam piṅga akṣam vaktram kṛtvā nabhaḥ spṛśam

original: 5.001.133a balam icchāmahe jñātuṃ bhūyaś cāsya parākramam
analyzed: balam icchāmahe jñātum bhūyas ca asya parākramam

original: 5.001.133c tvāṃ vijeṣyaty upāyena viṣadaṃ vā gamiṣyati
analyzed: tvām vijeṣyati upāyena viṣadam vā gamiṣyati

original: 5.001.134a evam uktā tu sā devī daivatair abhisatkṛtā
analyzed: evam uktā tu sā devī daivataiḥ abhisatkṛtā
samudra madhye surasā bibhratī rākṣasam vapuḥ

original: 5.001.135a vikṛtaṃ ca virūpaṃ ca sarvasya ca bhayāvaham
analyzed: vikṛtam ca virūpam ca sarvasya ca bhaya āvaham
plavamānam hanūmantam āvṛtya idam uvāca ha

original: 5.001.136a mama bhakṣaḥ pradiṣṭas tvam īśvarair vānararṣabha
analyzed: mama bhakṣaḥ pradiṣṭaḥ tvam īśvaraiḥ vānara ṛṣabha
aham tvām bhakṣayiṣyāmi praviśa idam mama ānanam
evam uktaḥ surasayā prāñjaliḥ vānara ṛṣabhaḥ
prahṛṣṭa vadanaḥ śrīmān idam vacanam abravīt
rāmaḥ dāśarathiḥ nāma praviṣṭaḥ daṇḍaka vanam

original: 5.001.138c lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā vaidehyā cāpi bhāryayā
analyzed: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā vaidehyā ca api bhāryayā
asya kārya viṣaktasya baddha vairasya rākṣasaiḥ

original: 5.001.139c tasya sītā hṛtā bhāryā rāvaṇena yaśasvinī
analyzed: tasya sītā hṛtā bhāryā rāvaṇena yaśasvinī
tasyāḥ sakāśam dūtaḥ ham gamiṣye rāma śāsanāt
kartum arhasi rāmasya sāhyam viṣaya vāsini

original: 5.001.141a atha vā maithilīṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmaṃ cākliṣṭakāriṇam
analyzed: atha vā maithilīm dṛṣṭvā rāmam ca akliṣṭa kāriṇam

original: 5.001.141c āgamiṣyāmi te vaktraṃ satyaṃ pratiśṛṇomi te
analyzed: āgamiṣyāmi te vaktram satyam pratiśṛṇomi te
evam uktā hanumatā surasā kāmarūpiṇī

original: 5.001.142c abravīn nātivarten māṃ kaś cid eṣa varo mama
analyzed: abravīt na ativartet mām kaḥ cit eṣa varaḥ mama
evam uktaḥ surasayā kruddhaḥ vānara puṃgavaḥ

original: 5.001.143c abravīt kuru vai vaktraṃ yena māṃ viṣahiṣyase
analyzed: abravīt kuru vai vaktram yena mām viṣahiṣyase

original: 5.001.144a ity uktvā surasāṃ kruddho daśayojanam āyataḥ
analyzed: iti uktvā surasām kruddhaḥ daśa yojanam āyataḥ
daśa yojana vistāraḥ babhūva hanumān tadā
tam dṛṣṭvā megha saṃkāśam daśa yojanam āyatam
cakāra surasā api āsyam viṃśat yojanam āyatam

original: 5.001.146a hanumāṃs tu tataḥ kruddhas triṃśadyojanam āyataḥ
analyzed: hanumān tu tatas kruddhaḥ triṃśat yojanam āyataḥ
cakāra surasā vaktram catvāriṃśat tathā ucchritam
babhūva hanumān vīraḥ pañcāśat yojana ucchritaḥ
cakāra surasā vaktram ṣaṣṭi yojanam āyatam
tathā eva hanumān vīraḥ saptatim yojana ucchritaḥ
cakāra surasā vaktram aśītim yojana āyatam
hanūmān acala prakhyaḥ navatim yojana ucchritaḥ
cakāra surasā vaktram śata yojanam āyatam

original: 5.001.150a tad dṛṣṭvā vyāditaṃ tv āsyaṃ vāyuputraḥ sa buddhimān
analyzed: tat dṛṣṭvā vyāditam tu āsyam vāyuputraḥ sa buddhimān
dīrgha jihvam surasayā su ghoram naraka upamam

original: 5.001.151a sa saṃkṣipyātmanaḥ kāyaṃ jīmūta iva mārutiḥ
analyzed: sa saṃkṣipya ātmanaḥ kāyam jīmūtaḥ iva mārutiḥ
tasmin muhūrte hanumān babhūva aṅguṣṭha mātrakaḥ

original: 5.001.152a so 'bhipatyāśu tad vaktraṃ niṣpatya ca mahājavaḥ
analyzed: saḥ bhipatya āśu tat vaktram niṣpatya ca mahā javaḥ

original: 5.001.152c antarikṣe sthitaḥ śrīmān idaṃ vacanam abravīt
analyzed: antarikṣe sthitaḥ śrīmān idam vacanam abravīt

original: 5.001.153a praviṣṭo 'smi hi te vaktraṃ dākṣāyaṇi namo 'stu te
analyzed: praviṣṭaḥ smi hi te vaktram dākṣāyaṇi namaḥ stu te

original: 5.001.153c gamiṣye yatra vaidehī satyaṃ cāstu vacas tava
analyzed: gamiṣye yatra vaidehī satyam ca astu vacaḥ tava

original: 5.001.154a taṃ dṛṣṭvā vadanān muktaṃ candraṃ rāhumukhād iva
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā vadanāt muktam candram rāhu mukhāt iva

original: 5.001.154c abravīt surasā devī svena rūpeṇa vānaram
analyzed: abravīt surasā devī svena rūpeṇa vānaram
artha siddhyai hari śreṣṭha gaccha saumya yathāsukham
samānaya ca vaidehīm rāghaveṇa mahātmanā

original: 5.001.156a tat tṛtīyaṃ hanumato dṛṣṭvā karma suduṣkaram
analyzed: tat tṛtīyam hanumataḥ dṛṣṭvā karma su duṣkaram

original: 5.001.156c sādhu sādhv iti bhūtāni praśaśaṃsus tadā harim
analyzed: sādhu sādhu iti bhūtāni praśaśaṃsuḥ tadā harim
sa sāgaram anādhṛṣyam abhyetya varuṇālayam
jagāma ākāśam āviśya vegena garuṇa upamaḥ
sevite vāri dhāribhiḥ patagaiḥ ca niṣevite
carite kaiśika ācāryaiḥ airāvata niṣevite
siṃha kuñjara śārdūla pataga uraga vāhanaiḥ
vimānaiḥ saṃpatadbhiḥ ca vimalaiḥ samalaṃkṛte
vajra aśani samāghātaiḥ pāvakaiḥ upaśobhite
kṛta puṇyaiḥ mahābhāgaiḥ alaṃkṛte
bahatā havyam atyantam sevite citrabhānunā
graha nakṣatra candra arka tārā gaṇa vibhūṣite
mahā ṛṣi gaṇa gandharva nāga yakṣa samākule
vivikte vimale viśve viśvāvasu niṣevite
devarāja gaja ākrānte candra sūrya pathe śive
vitāne jīva lokasya vitataḥ brahma nirmite
bahuśas sevite vīraiḥ vidyādhara gaṇaiḥ varaiḥ
kapinā kṛṣyamāṇāni mahā abhrāṇi cakāśire

original: 5.001.165a praviśann abhrajālāni niṣpataṃś ca punaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: praviśan abhra jālāni niṣpatan ca punar punar
prāvṛṣi induḥ iva ābhāti niṣpatan praviśan tadā

original: 5.001.166a plavamānaṃ tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā siṃhikā nāma rākṣasī
analyzed: plavamānam tu tam dṛṣṭvā siṃhikā nāma rākṣasī
manasā cintayām āsa pravṛddhā kāmarūpiṇī

original: 5.001.167a adya dīrghasya kālasya bhaviṣyāmy aham āśitā
analyzed: adya dīrghasya kālasya bhaviṣyāmi aham āśitā

original: 5.001.167c idaṃ hi me mahat sattvaṃ cirasya vaśam āgatam
analyzed: idam hi me mahat sattvam cirasya vaśam āgatam

original: 5.001.168a iti saṃcintya manasā chāyām asya samakṣipat
analyzed: iti saṃcintya manasā chāyām asya samakṣipat
chāyāyām saṃgṛhītāyām cintayām āsa vānaraḥ
samākṣiptaḥ smi sahasā paṅgūkṛta parākramaḥ
pratilomena vātena mahā nauḥ iva sāgare

original: 5.001.170a tiryag ūrdhvam adhaś caiva vīkṣamāṇas tataḥ kapiḥ
analyzed: tiryak ūrdhvam adhas ca eva vīkṣamāṇaḥ tatas kapiḥ
dadarśa sa mahā sattvam utthitam lavaṇāmbhasi
kapi rājñā yat ākhyātam sattvam adbhuta darśanam

original: 5.001.171c chāyāgrāhi mahāvīryaṃ tad idaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: chāyā grāhi mahā vīryam tat idam na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: 5.001.172a sa tāṃ buddhvārthatattvena siṃhikāṃ matimān kapiḥ
analyzed: sa tām buddhvā artha tattvena siṃhikām matimān kapiḥ
vyavardhata mahā kāyaḥ prāvṛṣi iva balāhakaḥ

original: 5.001.173a tasya sā kāyam udvīkṣya vardhamānaṃ mahākapeḥ
analyzed: tasya sā kāyam udvīkṣya vardhamānam mahā kapeḥ
vaktram prasārayām āsa pātāla ambara saṃnibham

original: 5.001.174a sa dadarśa tatas tasyā vikṛtaṃ sumahan mukham
analyzed: sa dadarśa tatas tasyāḥ vikṛtam su mahat mukham

original: 5.001.174c kāyamātraṃ ca medhāvī marmāṇi ca mahākapiḥ
analyzed: kāya mātram ca medhāvī marmāṇi ca mahā kapiḥ

original: 5.001.175a sa tasyā vivṛte vaktre vajrasaṃhananaḥ kapiḥ
analyzed: sa tasyāḥ vivṛte vaktre vajra saṃhananaḥ kapiḥ
saṃkṣipya muhur ātmānam niṣpapāta mahā balaḥ
āsye tasyāḥ nimajjantam dadṛśuḥ siddha cāraṇāḥ

original: 5.001.176c grasyamānaṃ yathā candraṃ pūrṇaṃ parvaṇi rāhuṇā
analyzed: grasyamānam yathā candram pūrṇam parvaṇi rāhuṇā

original: 5.001.177a tatas tasya nakhais tīkṣṇair marmāṇy utkṛtya vānaraḥ
analyzed: tatas tasya nakhaiḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ marmāṇi utkṛtya vānaraḥ
utpapāta atha vegena manaḥ saṃpāta vikramaḥ

original: 5.001.178a tāṃ hatāṃ vānareṇāśu patitāṃ vīkṣya siṃhikām
analyzed: tām hatām vānareṇa āśu patitām vīkṣya siṃhikām
bhūtāni ākāśa cārīṇi tam ūcuḥ plavaga ṛṣabham

original: 5.001.179a bhīmam adya kṛtaṃ karma mahat sattvaṃ tvayā hatam
analyzed: bhīmam adya kṛtam karma mahat sattvam tvayā hatam
sādhaya artham abhipretam ariṣṭam plavatām vara

original: 5.001.180a yasya tv etāni catvāri vānarendra yathā tava
analyzed: yasya tu etāni catvāri vānara indra yathā tava

original: 5.001.180c dhṛtir dṛṣṭir matir dākṣyaṃ sa karmasu na sīdati
analyzed: dhṛtiḥ dṛṣṭiḥ matiḥ dākṣyam sa karmasu na sīdati
sa taiḥ saṃbhāvitaḥ pūjyaḥ pratipanna prayojanaḥ
jagāma ākāśam āviśya pannagāśana vat kapiḥ
prāpta bhūyiṣṭha pāraḥ tu sarvatas pratilokayan
yojanānām śatasya ante vana rājim dadarśa saḥ
dadarśa ca patan eva vividha druma bhūṣitam
dvīpam śākhāmṛga śreṣṭhaḥ malaya upavanāni ca
sāgaram sāgara anūpān sāgara anūpa jān drumān

original: 5.001.184c sāgarasya ca patnīnāṃ mukhāny api vilokayan
analyzed: sāgarasya ca patnīnām mukhāni api vilokayan
sa mahā megha saṃkāśam samīkṣya ātmānam ātmanā
nirundhantam iva ākāśam cakāra matimān matim

original: 5.001.186a kāyavṛddhiṃ pravegaṃ ca mama dṛṣṭvaiva rākṣasāḥ
analyzed: kāya vṛddhim pravegam ca mama dṛṣṭvā eva rākṣasāḥ

original: 5.001.186c mayi kautūhalaṃ kuryur iti mene mahākapiḥ
analyzed: mayi kautūhalam kuryuḥ iti mene mahā kapiḥ
tatas śarīram saṃkṣipya tat mahīdhara saṃnibham
punar prakṛtim āpede vīta mohaḥ iva ātmavān
sa cāru nānāvidha rūpa dhārī
param samāsādya samudra tīram
paraiḥ aśakya pratipanna rūpaḥ
samīkṣita ātmā samavekṣita arthaḥ
tatas sa lambasya gireḥ samṛddhe
vicitra kūṭe nipapāta kūṭe
saketaka uddālaka nālikere
mahā adri kūṭa pratimaḥ mahātmā
sa sāgaram dānava pannaga āyutam
balena vikramya mahā ūrmi mālinam
nipatya tīre ca mahā udadheḥ tadā
dadarśa laṅkām amarāvatīm iva
sa sāgaram anādhṛṣyam atikramya mahā balaḥ

original: 5.002.001c trikūṭaśikhare laṅkāṃ sthitāṃ svastho dadarśa ha
analyzed: trikūṭa śikhare laṅkām sthitām svasthaḥ dadarśa ha
tatas pādapa muktena puṣpa varṣeṇa vīryavān

original: 5.002.002c abhivṛṣṭaḥ sthitas tatra babhau puṣpamayo yathā
analyzed: abhivṛṣṭaḥ sthitaḥ tatra babhau puṣpa mayaḥ yathā
yojanānām śatam śrīmān tīrtvā api uttama vikramaḥ

original: 5.002.003c aniśvasan kapis tatra na glānim adhigacchati
analyzed: a niśvasan kapiḥ tatra na glānim adhigacchati

original: 5.002.004a śatāny ahaṃ yojanānāṃ krameyaṃ subahūny api
analyzed: śatāni aham yojanānām krameyam su bahūni api
kim punar sāgarasya antam saṃkhyātam śata yojanam

original: 5.002.005a sa tu vīryavatāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ plavatām api cottamaḥ
analyzed: sa tu vīryavatām śreṣṭhaḥ plavatām api ca uttamaḥ
jagāma vegavān laṅkām laṅghayitvā mahā udadhim

original: 5.002.006a śādvalāni ca nīlāni gandhavanti vanāni ca
analyzed: śādvalāni ca nīlāni gandhavanti vanāni ca

original: 5.002.006c gaṇḍavanti ca madhyena jagāma nagavanti ca
analyzed: gaṇḍavanti ca madhyena jagāma nagavanti ca

original: 5.002.007a śailāṃś ca tarusaṃchannān vanarājīś ca puṣpitāḥ
analyzed: śailān ca taru saṃchannān vana rājīḥ ca puṣpitāḥ
abhicakrāma tejasvī hanumān plavaga ṛṣabhaḥ

original: 5.002.008a sa tasminn acale tiṣṭhan vanāny upavanāni ca
analyzed: sa tasmin acale tiṣṭhan vanāni upavanāni ca

original: 5.002.008c sa nagāgre ca tāṃ laṅkāṃ dadarśa pavanātmajaḥ
analyzed: sa naga agre ca tām laṅkām dadarśa pavanātmajaḥ

original: 5.002.009a saralān karṇikārāṃś ca kharjūrāṃś ca supuṣpitān
analyzed: saralān karṇikārān ca kharjūrān ca su puṣpitān

original: 5.002.009c priyālān muculindāṃś ca kuṭajān ketakān api
analyzed: priyālān muculindān ca kuṭajān ketakān api

original: 5.002.010a priyaṅgūn gandhapūrṇāṃś ca nīpān saptacchadāṃs tathā
analyzed: priyaṅgūn gandha pūrṇān ca nīpān saptacchadān tathā

original: 5.002.010c asanān kovidārāṃś ca karavīrāṃś ca puṣpitān
analyzed: asanān kovidārān ca karavīrān ca puṣpitān
puṣpa bhāra nibaddhān ca tathā mukulitān api
pādapān vihaga ākīrṇān pavana ādhūta mastakān
haṃsa kāraṇḍava ākīrṇāḥ vāpīḥ padma utpala āyutāḥ

original: 5.002.012c ākrīḍān vividhān ramyān vividhāṃś ca jalāśayān
analyzed: ākrīḍān vividhān ramyān vividhān ca jalāśayān
saṃtatān vividhaiḥ vṛkṣaiḥ sarva ṛtu phala puṣpitaiḥ
udyānāni ca ramyāṇi dadarśa kapi kuñjaraḥ
samāsādya ca lakṣmīvān laṅkām rāvaṇa pālitām
parikhābhiḥ sa padmābhiḥ sa utpalābhiḥ alaṃkṛtām
sītā apaharaṇa arthena rāvaṇena su rakṣitām
samantāt vicaradbhiḥ ca rākṣasaiḥ ugra dhanvibhiḥ
kāñcanena āvṛtām ramyām prākāreṇa mahā purīm
aṭṭālaka śata ākīrṇām patākā dhvaja mālinīm
toraṇaiḥ kāñcanaiḥ divyaiḥ latā paṅkti vicitritaiḥ

original: 5.002.017c dadarśa hanumāṃl laṅkāṃ divi devapurīm iva
analyzed: dadarśa hanumān laṅkām divi deva purīm iva

original: 5.002.018a girimūrdhni sthitāṃ laṅkāṃ pāṇḍurair bhavanaiḥ śubhaiḥ
analyzed: giri mūrdhni sthitām laṅkām pāṇḍuraiḥ bhavanaiḥ śubhaiḥ

original: 5.002.018c dadarśa sa kapiḥ śrīmān puram ākāśagaṃ yathā
analyzed: dadarśa sa kapiḥ śrīmān puram ākāśa gam yathā
pālitām rākṣasa indreṇa nirmitām viśvakarmaṇā
plavamānām iva ākāśe dadarśa hanumān purīm

original: 5.002.020a saṃpūrṇāṃ rākṣasair ghorair nāgair bhogavatīm iva
analyzed: saṃpūrṇām rākṣasaiḥ ghoraiḥ nāgaiḥ bhogavatīm iva
acintyām su kṛtām spaṣṭām kubera adhyuṣitām purā
daṃṣṭribhiḥ bahubhiḥ śūraiḥ śūla paṭṭiśa pāṇibhiḥ

original: 5.002.021c rakṣitāṃ rākṣasair ghorair guhām āśīviṣair api
analyzed: rakṣitām rākṣasaiḥ ghoraiḥ guhām āśīviṣaiḥ api
vapra prākāra jaghanām vipula ambu nava ambarām
śataghnī śūla keśa antām aṭṭālaka vataṃsakām

original: 5.002.023a dvāram uttaram āsādya cintayām āsa vānaraḥ
analyzed: dvāram uttaram āsādya cintayām āsa vānaraḥ
kailāsa śikhara prakhyam ālikhantam iva ambaram
dhriyamāṇam iva ākāśam ucchritaiḥ bhavana uttamaiḥ

original: 5.002.024a tasyāś ca mahatīṃ guptiṃ sāgaraṃ ca nirīkṣya saḥ
analyzed: tasyāḥ ca mahatīm guptim sāgaram ca nirīkṣya saḥ

original: 5.002.024c rāvaṇaṃ ca ripuṃ ghoraṃ cintayām āsa vānaraḥ
analyzed: rāvaṇam ca ripum ghoram cintayām āsa vānaraḥ
āgatya api iha harayaḥ bhaviṣyanti nirarthakāḥ

original: 5.002.025c na hi yuddhena vai laṅkā śakyā jetuṃ surair api
analyzed: na hi yuddhena vai laṅkā śakyā jetum suraiḥ api

original: 5.002.026a imāṃ tu viṣamāṃ durgāṃ laṅkāṃ rāvaṇapālitām
analyzed: imām tu viṣamām durgām laṅkām rāvaṇa pālitām

original: 5.002.026c prāpyāpi sa mahābāhuḥ kiṃ kariṣyati rāghavaḥ
analyzed: prāpya api sa mahā bāhuḥ kim kariṣyati rāghavaḥ
avakāśaḥ na sāntvasya rākṣaseṣu abhigamyate

original: 5.002.027c na dānasya na bhedasya naiva yuddhasya dṛśyate
analyzed: na dānasya na bhedasya na eva yuddhasya dṛśyate

original: 5.002.028a caturṇām eva hi gatir vānarāṇāṃ mahātmanām
analyzed: caturṇām eva hi gatiḥ vānarāṇām mahātmanām

original: 5.002.028c vāliputrasya nīlasya mama rājñaś ca dhīmataḥ
analyzed: vāli putrasya nīlasya mama rājñaḥ ca dhīmataḥ

original: 5.002.029a yāvaj jānāmi vaidehīṃ yadi jīvati vā na vā
analyzed: yāvat jānāmi vaidehīm yadi jīvati vā na vā
tatra eva cintayiṣyāmi dṛṣṭvā tām janakātmajām

original: 5.002.030a tataḥ sa cintayām āsa muhūrtaṃ kapikuñjaraḥ
analyzed: tatas sa cintayām āsa muhūrtam kapi kuñjaraḥ
giri śṛṅge sthitaḥ tasmin rāmasya abhyudaye rataḥ

original: 5.002.031a anena rūpeṇa mayā na śakyā rakṣasāṃ purī
analyzed: anena rūpeṇa mayā na śakyā rakṣasām purī
praveṣṭum rākṣasaiḥ guptā krūraiḥ bala samanvitaiḥ
ugra ojasaḥ mahā vīryaḥ balavantaḥ ca rākṣasāḥ
vañcanīyāḥ mayā sarve jānakīm pari mārgitā

original: 5.002.033a lakṣyālakṣyeṇa rūpeṇa rātrau laṅkā purī mayā
analyzed: lakṣyālakṣyeṇa rūpeṇa rātrau laṅkā purī mayā

original: 5.002.033c praveṣṭuṃ prāptakālaṃ me kṛtyaṃ sādhayituṃ mahat
analyzed: praveṣṭum prāpta kālam me kṛtyam sādhayitum mahat

original: 5.002.034a tāṃ purīṃ tādṛśīṃ dṛṣṭvā durādharṣāṃ surāsuraiḥ
analyzed: tām purīm tādṛśīm dṛṣṭvā durādharṣām sura asuraiḥ

original: 5.002.034c hanūmāṃś cintayām āsa viniḥśvasya muhur muhuḥ
analyzed: hanūmān cintayām āsa viniḥśvasya muhur muhur
kena upāyena paśyeyam maithilīm janakātmajām
adṛṣṭaḥ rākṣasa indreṇa rāvaṇena durātmanā

original: 5.002.036a na vinaśyet kathaṃ kāryaṃ rāmasya viditātmanaḥ
analyzed: na vinaśyet katham kāryam rāmasya vidita ātmanaḥ

original: 5.002.036c ekām ekaś ca paśyeyaṃ rahite janakātmajām
analyzed: ekām ekaḥ ca paśyeyam rahite janakātmajām
bhūtāḥ ca arthaḥ vipadyante deśa kāla virodhitāḥ

original: 5.002.037c viklavaṃ dūtam āsādya tamaḥ sūryodaye yathā
analyzed: viklavam dūtam āsādya tamaḥ sūrya udaye yathā
artha anartha antare buddhiḥ niścitā api na śobhate
ghātayanti hi kāryāṇi dūtāḥ paṇḍita māninaḥ

original: 5.002.039a na vinaśyet kathaṃ kāryaṃ vaiklavyaṃ na kathaṃ bhavet
analyzed: na vinaśyet katham kāryam vaiklavyam na katham bhavet

original: 5.002.039c laṅghanaṃ ca samudrasya kathaṃ nu na vṛthā bhavet
analyzed: laṅghanam ca samudrasya katham nu na vṛthā bhavet

original: 5.002.040a mayi dṛṣṭe tu rakṣobhī rāmasya viditātmanaḥ
analyzed: mayi dṛṣṭe tu rakṣobhiḥ rāmasya vidita ātmanaḥ

original: 5.002.040c bhaved vyartham idaṃ kāryaṃ rāvaṇānartham icchataḥ
analyzed: bhavet vyartham idam kāryam rāvaṇa anartham icchataḥ

original: 5.002.041a na hi śakyaṃ kva cit sthātum avijñātena rākṣasaiḥ
analyzed: na hi śakyam kva cit sthātum a vijñātena rākṣasaiḥ

original: 5.002.041c api rākṣasarūpeṇa kim utānyena kena cit
analyzed: api rākṣasa rūpeṇa kim uta anyena kena cit

original: 5.002.042a vāyur apy atra nājñātaś cared iti matir mama
analyzed: vāyuḥ api atra na ajñātaḥ caret iti matiḥ mama

original: 5.002.042c na hy asty aviditaṃ kiṃ cid rākṣasānāṃ balīyasām
analyzed: na hi asti aviditam kim cit rākṣasānām balīyasām

original: 5.002.043a ihāhaṃ yadi tiṣṭhāmi svena rūpeṇa saṃvṛtaḥ
analyzed: iha aham yadi tiṣṭhāmi svena rūpeṇa saṃvṛtaḥ

original: 5.002.043c vināśam upayāsyāmi bhartur arthaś ca hīyate
analyzed: vināśam upayāsyāmi bhartuḥ arthaḥ ca hīyate

original: 5.002.044a tad ahaṃ svena rūpeṇa rajanyāṃ hrasvatāṃ gataḥ
analyzed: tat aham svena rūpeṇa rajanyām hrasvatām gataḥ
laṅkām abhipatiṣyāmi rāghavasya artha siddhaye
rāvaṇasya purīm rātrau praviśya su durāsadām
vicinvan bhavanam sarvam drakṣyāmi janakātmajām
iti saṃcintya hanumān sūryasya astamayam kapiḥ
ācakāṅkṣe tadā vīrāḥ vaidehyāḥ darśana utsukaḥ
pṛṣat aṃśaka mātraḥ san babhūva adbhuta darśanaḥ
pradoṣa kāle hanumān tūrṇam utpatya vīryavān
praviveśa purīm ramyām suvibhakta mahāpatham
prāsāda mālā vitatām stambhaiḥ kāñcana rājataiḥ
śātakumbha mayaiḥ jālaiḥ gandharvanagara upamām
sapta bhauma aṣṭa bhaumaiḥ ca sa dadarśa mahā purīm
talaiḥ sphāṭika saṃpūrṇaiḥ kārtasvara vibhūṣitaiḥ
vaidūrya maṇi citraiḥ ca muktā jāla vibhūṣitaiḥ

original: 5.002.050c talaiḥ śuśubhire tāni bhavanāny atra rakṣasām
analyzed: talaiḥ śuśubhire tāni bhavanāni atra rakṣasām
kāñcanāni vicitrāṇi toraṇāni ca rakṣasām
laṅkām uddyotayām āsuḥ sarvatas samalaṃkṛtām
acintyām adbhuta ākārām dṛṣṭvā laṅkām mahā kapiḥ

original: 5.002.052c āsīd viṣaṇṇo hṛṣṭaś ca vaidehyā darśanotsukaḥ
analyzed: āsīt viṣaṇṇaḥ hṛṣṭaḥ ca vaidehyāḥ darśana utsukaḥ
sa pāṇḍura udviddha vimāna mālinīm
mahārha jāmbūnada jāla toraṇām
yaśasvinām rāvaṇa bāhu pālitām
kṣapācaraiḥ bhīma balaiḥ samāvṛtām
candraḥ pi sācivyam iva asya kurvan
tārā gaṇaiḥ madhya gataḥ virājan
jyotsnā vitānena vitatya lokam
uttiṣṭhate na eka sahasra raśmiḥ
śaṅkha prabham kṣīra mṛṇāla varṇam
udgacchamānam vyavabhāsamānam
dadarśa candram sa kapi pravīraḥ
poplūyamānam sarasi iva haṃsam
sa lamba śikhare lambe lamba toyada saṃnibhe
sattvam āsthāya medhāvī hanumān mārutātmajaḥ
niśi laṅkām mahāsattvaḥ viveśa kapi kuñjaraḥ
ramya kānana toya āḍhyām purīm rāvaṇa pālitām
śārada ambudhara prakhyaiḥ bhavanaiḥ upaśobhitām
sāgara upama nirghoṣām sāgara anila sevitām
su puṣṭa bala saṃguptām yathā eva viṭapāvatīm
cāru toraṇa niryūhām pāṇḍura dvāra toraṇām
bhujaga ācaritām guptām śubhām bhogavatīm iva
tām sa vidyut ghana ākīrṇām jyotiḥ mārga niṣevitām
caṇḍa māruta nirhrādām yathā indrasya amarāvatīm
śātakumbhena mahatā prākāreṇa abhisaṃvṛtām
kiṅkiṇī jāla ghoṣābhiḥ patākābhiḥ alaṃkṛtām
āsādya sahasā hṛṣṭaḥ prākāram abhipedivān
vismaya āviṣṭa hṛdayaḥ purīm ālokya sarvatas
jāmbūnada mayaiḥ dvāraiḥ vaidūrya kṛta vedikaiḥ
maṇi sphaṭika muktābhiḥ maṇi kuṭṭima bhūṣitaiḥ
vaidūrya tala sopānaiḥ sphāṭika antara pāṃsubhiḥ
cāru saṃjavana upetaiḥ kham iva utpatitaiḥ śubhaiḥ
krauñca barhiṇa saṃghuṣṭe rājahaṃsa niṣevitaiḥ
tūrya ābharaṇa nirghoṣaiḥ sarvatas pratināditām
vasvokasārā pratimām samīkṣya nagarīm tatas

original: 5.003.012c kham ivotpatitāṃ laṅkāṃ jaharṣa hanumān kapiḥ
analyzed: kham iva utpatitām laṅkām jaharṣa hanumān kapiḥ

original: 5.003.013a tāṃ samīkṣya purīṃ laṅkāṃ rākṣasādhipateḥ śubhām
analyzed: tām samīkṣya purīm laṅkām rākṣasa adhipateḥ śubhām
anuttamām ṛddhi yutām cintayām āsa vīryavān

original: 5.003.014a neyam anyena nagarī śakyā dharṣayituṃ balāt
analyzed: na iyam anyena nagarī śakyā dharṣayitum balāt
rakṣitā rāvaṇa balaiḥ udyata āyudha dhāribhiḥ
kumuda aṅgadayoḥ vā api suṣeṇasya mahā kapeḥ
prasiddhā iyam bhavet bhūmiḥ mainda dvividayoḥ api
vivasvataḥ tanūjasya hareḥ ca kuśa parvaṇaḥ

original: 5.003.016c ṛkṣasya ketumālasya mama caiva gatir bhavet
analyzed: ṛkṣasya ketumālasya mama ca eva gatiḥ bhavet
samīkṣya tu mahā bāho rāghavasya parākramam

original: 5.003.017c lakṣmaṇasya ca vikrāntam abhavat prītimān kapiḥ
analyzed: lakṣmaṇasya ca vikrāntam abhavat prītimān kapiḥ
tām ratna vasana upetām koṣṭhāgāra avataṃsakām
yantra āgāra stanīm ṛddhām pramadām iva bhūṣitām

original: 5.003.019a tāṃ naṣṭatimirāṃ dīpair bhāsvaraiś ca mahāgṛhaiḥ
analyzed: tām naṣṭa timirām dīpaiḥ bhāsvaraiḥ ca mahā gṛhaiḥ
nagarīm rākṣasa indrasya dadarśa sa mahā kapiḥ
praviṣṭaḥ sattva saṃpannaḥ niśāyām mārutātmajaḥ
sa mahāpatham āsthāya muktā puṣpa virājitam
hasita udghuṣṭa ninadaiḥ tūrya ghoṣa puras saraiḥ
vajrāṅkuśa nikāśaiḥ ca vajra jāla vibhūṣitaiḥ

original: 5.003.021e gṛhamedhaiḥ purī ramyā babhāse dyaur ivāmbudaiḥ
analyzed: gṛhamedhaiḥ purī ramyā babhāse dyauḥ iva ambudaiḥ
prajajvāla tadā laṅkā rakṣaḥ gaṇa gṛhaiḥ śubhaiḥ
sita abhra sadṛśaiḥ citraiḥ padma svastika saṃsthitaiḥ
vardhamāna gṛhaiḥ ca api sarvatas su vibhāṣitaiḥ
tām citra mālya ābharaṇām kapi rāja hitaṃkaraḥ

original: 5.003.023c rāghavārthaṃ carañ śrīmān dadarśa ca nananda ca
analyzed: rāghava artham caram śrīmān dadarśa ca nananda ca
śuśrāva madhuram gītam tri sthāna svara bhūṣitam
strīṇām mada samṛddhānām divi ca apsarasām iva
śuśrāva kāñcī ninādam nūpurāṇām ca niḥsvanam
sopāna ninadān ca eva bhavaneṣu mahātmanam

original: 5.003.025e āsphoṭitaninādāṃś ca kṣveḍitāṃś ca tatas tataḥ
analyzed: āsphoṭita ninādān ca kṣveḍitān ca tatas tatas

original: 5.003.026a svādhyāya niratāṃś caiva yātudhānān dadarśa saḥ
analyzed: svādhyāya niratān ca eva yātudhānān dadarśa saḥ
rāvaṇa stava saṃyuktān garjataḥ rākṣasān api
rājamārgam samāvṛtya sthitam rakṣaḥ balam mahat

original: 5.003.027c dadarśa madhyame gulme rākṣasasya carān bahūn
analyzed: dadarśa madhyame gulme rākṣasasya carān bahūn
dīkṣitām jaṭilān muṇḍān go jina ambara vāsasaḥ
darbha muṣṭi praharaṇān agnikuṇḍa āyudhān tathā
kūṭamudgara pāṇīn ca daṇḍa āyudha dharān api
eka akṣa aneka karṇān ca calat lamba payodharān

original: 5.003.030a karālān bhugnavaktrāṃś ca vikaṭān vāmanāṃs tathā
analyzed: karālān bhugna vaktrān ca vikaṭān vāmanān tathā
dhanvinaḥ khaḍginaḥ ca eva śataghnī musala āyudhān
parigha uttama hastān ca vicitra kavaca ujjvalān
na ati sthūlān na ati kṛśān na ati dīrgha ati hrasvakān

original: 5.003.031c virūpān bahurūpāṃś ca surūpāṃś ca suvarcasaḥ
analyzed: virūpān bahu rūpān ca surūpān ca suvarcasaḥ
śakti vṛkṣa āyudhān ca eva paṭṭiśa aśani dhāriṇaḥ
kṣepaṇī pāśa hastān ca dadarśa sa mahā kapiḥ
sragviṇaḥ tu anuliptān ca vara ābharaṇa bhūṣitān
tīkṣṇa śūla dharān ca eva vajriṇaḥ ca mahā balān
śata sāhasram avyagram ārakṣam madhyamam kapiḥ
prākāra āvṛtam atyantam dadarśa sa mahā kapiḥ
triviṣṭapa nibham divyam divya nāda vināditam
vāji heṣita saṃghuṣṭam nāditam bhūṣaṇaiḥ tathā

original: 5.003.036a rathair yānair vimānaiś ca tathā gajahayaiḥ śubhaiḥ
analyzed: rathaiḥ yānaiḥ vimānaiḥ ca tathā gaja hayaiḥ śubhaiḥ
vāraṇaiḥ ca catur dantaiḥ śveta abhra nicaya upamaiḥ
bhūṣitam rucira dvāram mattaiḥ ca mṛga pakṣibhiḥ
rākṣasa adhipateḥ guptam āviveśa gṛham kapiḥ
tatas sa madhyam gatam aṃśumantam
jyotsnā vitānam mahat udvamantam
dadarśa dhīmān divi bhānumantam
goṣṭhe vṛṣam mattam iva bhramantam
lokasya pāpāni vināśayantam
mahā udadhim ca api samedhayantam
bhūtāni sarvāṇi virājayantam
dadarśa śītāṃśum atha abhiyāntam
yā bhāti lakṣmīḥ bhuvi mandara sthā
tathā pradoṣeṣu ca sāgara sthā
tathā eva toyeṣu ca puṣkara sthā
rarāja sā cāru niśākara sthā
haṃsaḥ yathā rājata pañjura sthaḥ
siṃhaḥ yathā mandara kandara sthaḥ
vīraḥ yathā garvita kuñjara sthaḥ
candraḥ pi babhrāja tathā ambara sthaḥ
sthitaḥ kakudmān iva tīkṣṇa śṛṅgaḥ
mahā acalaḥ śvetaḥ iva ucca śṛṅgaḥ
hastī iva jāmbūnada baddha śṛṅgaḥ
vibhāti candraḥ paripūrṇa śṛṅgaḥ
pravṛddha rakṣaḥ piśitāśa doṣaḥ
svarga prakāśaḥ bhagavān pradoṣaḥ
tantrī svanāḥ karṇa sukhāḥ pravṛttāḥ
svapanti nāryaḥ patibhiḥ su vṛttāḥ
naktaṃcarāḥ ca api tathā pravṛttā
vihartum ati adbhuta raudra vṛttāḥ
matta pramattāni samākulāni
ratha aśva bhadrāsana saṃkulāni
vīra śriyā ca api samākulāni
dadarśa dhīmān sa kapiḥ kulāni
parasparam ca adhikam ākṣipanti
bhujān ca pīnān adhivikṣipanti
matta pralāpān adhivikṣipanti
mattāni ca anyonyam adhikṣipanti
rakṣāṃsi vakṣāṃsi ca vikṣipanti
gātrāṇi kāntāsu ca vikṣipanti
dadarśa kāntāḥ ca samālapanti
tathā aparāḥ tatra punar svapanti
mahā gajaiḥ ca api tathā nadadbhiḥ
sūpūjitaiḥ ca api tathā su sadbhiḥ
rarāja vīraiḥ ca viniḥśvasadbhiḥ
hradaḥ bhujaṅgaiḥ iva niḥśvasadbhiḥ
buddhi pradhānān rucira abhidhānān
saṃśraddadhānām jagataḥ pradhānān
nānā vidhānān rucira abhidhānān
dadarśa tasyām puri yātudhānān

original: 5.004.013a nananda dṛṣṭvā sa ca tān surūpān;
analyzed: nananda dṛṣṭvā sa ca tān surūpān
nānā guṇān ātma guṇa anurūpān
vidyotamānān sa ca tān surūpān

original: dadarśa kāṃś cic ca punar virūpān
analyzed: dadarśa kān cit ca punar virūpān
tatas vara arhāḥ su viśuddha bhāvāḥ
teṣām striyaḥ tatra mahā anubhāvāḥ
priyeṣu pāneṣu ca sakta bhāvā
dadarśa tārāḥ iva su prabhāvāḥ
śriyā jvalantīḥ trapayā upagūḍhā
niśītha kāle ramaṇa upagūḍhāḥ
dadarśa kāḥ cit pramadā upagūḍhā
yathā vihaṃgāḥ kusuma upagūḍāḥ
anyāḥ punar harmya tala upaviṣṭāḥ
tatra priya aṅkeṣu sukha upaviṣṭāḥ
bhartuḥ priyā dharma parā niviṣṭā
dadarśa dhīmān manadā abhiviṣṭāḥ
a prāvṛtāḥ kāñcana rāji varṇāḥ
kāḥ cit parārdhyāḥ tapanīya varṇāḥ
punar ca kāḥ cit śaśalakṣma varṇāḥ
kānta prahīṇāḥ rucira aṅga varṇāḥ
tatas priyān prāpya manobhirāmān
su prīti yuktāḥ prasamīkṣya rāmāḥ
gṛheṣu hṛṣṭāḥ parama abhirāmā
hari pravīraḥ sa dadarśa rāmāḥ
candra prakāśāḥ ca hi vaktra mālā
vakra akṣi pakṣmāḥ ca sunetra mālāḥ
vibhūṣaṇānām ca dadarśa mālāḥ
śatahradānām iva cāru mālāḥ
na tu eva sītām parama abhijātām
pathi sthite rāja kule prajātām
latām praphullām iva sādhu jātām
dadarśa tanvīm manasā abhijātām
sanātane vartmani saṃniviṣṭām
rāma īkṣaṇīm tām madana abhiviṣṭām
bhartuḥ manaḥ śrīmat anupraviṣṭām
strībhyaḥ varābhyaḥ ca sadā viśiṣṭām
uṣṇa arditām sa anusṛta asra kaṇṭhīm
purā varārha uttama niṣka kaṇṭhīm
sujāta pakṣmām abhirakta kaṇṭhīm
vane pravṛttām iva nīlakaṇṭhīm
avyakta lekhām iva candralekhām
pāṃsu pradigdhām iva hema lekhām
kṣata prarūḍhām iva bāṇa lekhām
vāyu prabhinnām iva megha lekhām
sītām apaśyat manuja īśvarasya
rāmasya patnīm vadatām varasya
babhūva duḥkha abhihataḥ cirasya
plavaṃgamaḥ mandaḥ iva acirasya
sa nikāmam vināmeṣu vicaran kāma rūpa dhṛk
vicacāra kapiḥ laṅkām lāghavena samanvitaḥ
āsasāda atha lakṣmīvān rākṣasa indra niveśanam
prākāreṇa arka varṇena bhāsvareṇa abhisaṃvṛtam

original: 5.005.003a rakṣitaṃ rākṣasair bhīmaiḥ siṃhair iva mahad vanam
analyzed: rakṣitam rākṣasaiḥ bhīmaiḥ siṃhaiḥ iva mahat vanam
samīkṣamāṇaḥ bhavanam cakāśe kapi kuñjaraḥ
rūpyaka upahitaiḥ citraiḥ toraṇaiḥ hema bhūṣitaiḥ

original: 5.005.004c vicitrābhiś ca kakṣyābhir dvāraiś ca rucirair vṛtam
analyzed: vicitrābhiḥ ca kakṣyābhiḥ dvāraiḥ ca ruciraiḥ vṛtam
gaja āsthitaiḥ mahāmātraiḥ śūraiḥ ca vigata śramaiḥ
upasthitam asaṃhāryaiḥ hayaiḥ syandana yāyibhiḥ

original: 5.005.006c ghoṣavadbhir vicitraiś ca sadā vicaritaṃ rathaiḥ
analyzed: ghoṣavadbhiḥ vicitraiḥ ca sadā vicaritam rathaiḥ
bahu ratna samākīrṇam parārdhya āsana bhājanam
mahā ratha samāvāsam mahā ratha mahā āsanam

original: 5.005.008a dṛśyaiś ca paramodārais tais taiś ca mṛgapakṣibhiḥ
analyzed: dṛśyaiḥ ca parama udāraiḥ taiḥ taiḥ ca mṛga pakṣibhiḥ
vividhaiḥ bahu sāhasraiḥ paripūrṇam samantataḥ

original: 5.005.009a vinītair antapālaiś ca rakṣobhiś ca surakṣitam
analyzed: vinītaiḥ antapālaiḥ ca rakṣobhiḥ ca su rakṣitam
mukhyābhiḥ ca vara strībhiḥ paripūrṇam samantataḥ
mudita pramadā ratnam rākṣasa indra niveśanam
vara ābharaṇa nirhrādaiḥ samudra svana niḥsvanam
tat rāja guṇa saṃpannam mukhyaiḥ ca varacandanaiḥ
bherī mṛdaṅga abhirutam śaṅkha ghoṣa vināditam
nitya arcitam parva hutam pūjitam rākṣasaiḥ sadā

original: 5.005.012c samudram iva gambhīraṃ samudram iva niḥsvanam
analyzed: samudram iva gambhīram samudram iva niḥsvanam
mahātmānaḥ mahat veśma mahā ratna paricchadam
mahājana samākīrṇam dadarśa sa mahā kapiḥ
virājamānam vapuṣā gaja aśva ratha saṃkulam
laṅkā ābharaṇam iti eva saḥ manyata mahā kapiḥ

original: 5.005.015a gṛhād gṛhaṃ rākṣasānām udyānāni ca vānaraḥ
analyzed: gṛhāt gṛham rākṣasānām udyānāni ca vānaraḥ

original: 5.005.015c vīkṣamāṇo hy asaṃtrastaḥ prāsādāṃś ca cacāra saḥ
analyzed: vīkṣamāṇaḥ hi asaṃtrastaḥ prāsādān ca cacāra saḥ
avaplutya mahā vegaḥ prahastasya niveśanam
tatas pupluve veśma mahāpārśvasya vīryavān
atha megha pratīkāśam kumbhakarṇa niveśanam

original: 5.005.017c vibhīṣaṇasya ca tathā pupluve sa mahākapiḥ
analyzed: vibhīṣaṇasya ca tathā pupluve sa mahā kapiḥ

original: 5.005.018a mahodarasya ca tathā virūpākṣasya caiva hi
analyzed: mahodarasya ca tathā virūpākṣasya ca eva hi
vidyujjihvasya bhavanam vidyunmāleḥ tathā eva ca

original: 5.005.018e vajradaṃṣṭrasya ca tathā pupluve sa mahākapiḥ
analyzed: vajradaṃṣṭrasya ca tathā pupluve sa mahā kapiḥ

original: 5.005.019a śukasya ca mahāvegaḥ sāraṇasya ca dhīmataḥ
analyzed: śukasya ca mahā vegaḥ sāraṇasya ca dhīmataḥ
tathā ca indrajitaḥ veśma jagāma hari yūthapaḥ
jambumāleḥ sumāleḥ ca jagāma hari yūthapaḥ

original: 5.005.020c raśmiketoś ca bhavanaṃ sūryaśatros tathaiva ca
analyzed: raśmiketoḥ ca bhavanam sūryaśatroḥ tathā eva ca
dhūmrākṣasya ca saṃpāteḥ bhavanam mārutātmajaḥ
vidyut rūpasya bhīmasya ghanasya vighanasya ca
śukanābhasya vakrasya śaṭhasya vikaṭasya ca
hrasvakarṇasya daṃṣṭrasya romaśasya ca rakṣasaḥ
yuddha unmattasya mattasya dhvajagrīvasya nādinaḥ
vidyujjihva indrajihvānām tathā hastimukhasya ca
karālasya piśācasya śoṇitākṣasya ca eva hi
kramamāṇaḥ krameṇa eva hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
teṣu teṣu mahārheṣu bhavaneṣu mahā yaśāḥ

original: 5.005.025c teṣām ṛddhimatām ṛddhiṃ dadarśa sa mahākapiḥ
analyzed: teṣām ṛddhimatām ṛddhim dadarśa sa mahā kapiḥ
sarveṣām samatikramya bhavanāni samantataḥ
āsasāda atha lakṣmīvān rākṣasa indra niveśanam
rāvaṇasya upaśāyinyaḥ dadarśa hari sattamaḥ
vicaran hari śārdūlaḥ rākṣasīḥ vikṛta īkṣaṇāḥ
śūla mudgara hastāḥ ca śakto tomara dhāriṇīḥ

original: 5.005.028a dadarśa vividhān gulmāṃs tasya rakṣaḥpater gṛhe
analyzed: dadarśa vividhān gulmān tasya rakṣaḥpateḥ gṛhe

original: 5.005.029a raktāñ śvetān sitāṃś caiva harīṃś caiva mahājavān
analyzed: raktān śvetān sitān ca eva harīn ca eva mahā javān
kulīnān rūpa saṃpannān gajān para gaja ārujān
niṣṭhitān gaja śikhāyām airāvata samān yudhi

original: 5.005.030c nihantṝn parasainyānāṃ gṛhe tasmin dadarśa saḥ
analyzed: nihantṝn para sainyānām gṛhe tasmin dadarśa saḥ

original: 5.005.031a kṣarataś ca yathā meghān sravataś ca yathā girīn
analyzed: kṣarataḥ ca yathā meghān sravataḥ ca yathā girīn
megha stanita nirghoṣān durdharṣān samare paraiḥ
sahasram vāhinīḥ tatra jāmbūnada pariṣkṛtāḥ
hema jālaiḥ avicchinnāḥ taruṇa āditya saṃnibhāḥ
dadarśa rākṣasa indrasya rāvaṇasya niveśane
śibikāḥ vividha ākārāḥ sa kapiḥ mārutātmajaḥ
latā gṛhāṇi citrāṇi citraśālā gṛhāṇi ca
krīḍā gṛhāṇi ca anyāni dāru parvatakān api

original: 5.005.035a kāmasya gṛhakaṃ ramyaṃ divāgṛhakam eva ca
analyzed: kāmasya gṛhakam ramyam divāgṛhakam eva ca
dadarśa rākṣasa indrasya rāvaṇasya niveśane
sa mandara tala prakhyam mayūra sthāna saṃkulam
dhvaja yaṣṭibhiḥ ākīrṇam dadarśa bhavana uttamam
ananta ratna nicayam nidhi jālam samantataḥ
dhīra niṣṭhita karmāntam gṛham bhūtapateḥ iva

original: 5.005.038a arcirbhiś cāpi ratnānāṃ tejasā rāvaṇasya ca
analyzed: arcirbhiḥ ca api ratnānām tejasā rāvaṇasya ca

original: 5.005.038c virarājātha tad veśma raśmimān iva raśmibhiḥ
analyzed: virarāja atha tat veśma raśmimān iva raśmibhiḥ
jāmbūnada mayāni eva śayanāni āsanāni ca
bhājanāni ca śubhrāṇi dadarśa hari yūthapaḥ
madhvāsava kṛta kledam maṇi bhājana saṃkulam
manoramam asaṃbādham kubera bhavanam yathā

original: 5.005.041a nūpurāṇāṃ ca ghoṣeṇa kāñcīnāṃ ninadena ca
analyzed: nūpurāṇām ca ghoṣeṇa kāñcīnām ninadena ca
mṛdaṅga tala ghoṣaiḥ ca ghoṣavadbhiḥ vināditam
prāsāda saṃghāta yutam strī ratna śata saṃkulam
su vyūḍha kakṣyam hanumān praviveśa mahā gṛham
sa veśma jālam balavān dadarśa
vyāsakta vaidūrya suvarṇa jālam
yathā mahat prāvṛṣi megha jālam
vidyut pinaddham sa vihaṃga jālam
niveśanānām vividhāḥ ca śālāḥ
pradhāna śaṅkha āyudha cāpa śālāḥ
manoharāḥ ca api punar viśālā
dadarśa veśma adriṣu candraśālāḥ
gṛhāṇi nānā vasu rājitāni
deva asuraiḥ ca api su pūjitāni
sarvaiḥ ca doṣaiḥ parivarjitāni
kapiḥ dadarśa sva bala arjitāni
tāni prayatna abhisamāhitāni
mayena sākṣāt iva nirmitāni
mahī tale sarva guṇa uttarāṇi
dadarśa laṅkā adhipateḥ gṛhāṇi
tatas dadarśa ucchrita megha rūpam
manoharam kāñcana cāru rūpam
rakṣaḥ adhipasya ātma bala anurūpam
gṛha uttamam hi apratirūpa rūpam
mahī tale svargam iva prakīrṇam
śriyā jvalantam bahu ratna kīrṇam
nānā tarūṇām kusuma avakīrṇam
gireḥ iva agram rajasā avakīrṇam
nārī pravekaiḥ iva dīpyamānam
taḍidbhiḥ ambhoda vat arcyamānam
haṃsa pravekaiḥ iva vāhyamānam
śriyā yutam khe su kṛtām vimānam
yathā naga agram bahu dhātu citram
yathā nabhaḥ ca graha candra citram
dadarśa yuktīkṛta megha citram
vimāna ratnam bahu ratna citram
mahī kṛtā parvata rāji pūrṇā
śailāḥ kṛtāḥ vṛkṣa vitāna pūrṇāḥ
vṛkṣāḥ kṛtāḥ puṣpa vitāna pūrṇāḥ
puṣpam kṛtam kesara patra pūrṇam
kṛtāni veśmāni ca pāṇḍurāṇi
tathā su puṣpāḥ api puṣkariṇyaḥ
punar ca padmāni sa kesarāṇi
dhanyāni citrāṇi tathā vanāni
puṣpāhvayam nāma virājamānam
ratna prabhābhiḥ ca vivardhamānam
veśma uttamānām api ca ucca mānam
mahā kapiḥ tatra mahā vimānam
kṛtāḥ ca vaidūrya mayāḥ vihaṃgā
rūpya pravālaiḥ ca tathā vihaṃgāḥ
citrāḥ ca nānā vasubhiḥ bhujaṃgā
jātya anurūpāḥ turagāḥ śubha aṅgāḥ
pravāla jāmbūnada puṣpa pakṣāḥ
sa līlam āvarjita jihma pakṣāḥ
kāmasya sākṣāt iva bhānti pakṣāḥ
kṛtāḥ vihaṃgāḥ su mukhāḥ su pakṣāḥ
niyujyamānāḥ ca gajāḥ su hastāḥ
sa kesarāḥ ca utpala patra hastāḥ
babhūva devī ca kṛtā suhastā
lakṣmīḥ tathā padmini padma hastā
iti iva tat gṛham abhigamya śobhanam
sa vismayaḥ nagam iva cāru śobhanam
punar ca tat parama sugandhi sundaram
hima atyaye nagam iva cāru kandaram

original: 5.006.016a tataḥ sa tāṃ kapir abhipatya pūjitāṃ;
analyzed: tatas sa tām kapiḥ abhipatya pūjitām
caran purīm daśamukha bāhu pālitām
a dṛśya tām janakasutām su pūjitām
su duḥkhitām pati guṇa vega nirjitām
tatas tadā bahuvidha bhāvitātmanaḥ
kṛtātmanaḥ janakasutām suvartmanaḥ
a paśyataḥ bhavat ati duḥkhitam manaḥ
su cakṣuṣaḥ pravicarataḥ mahātmanaḥ
tasya ālaya variṣṭhasya madhye vipulam āyatam
dadarśa bhavana śreṣṭham hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
ardha yojana vistīrṇam āyatam yojanam hi tat
bhavanam rākṣasa indrasya bahu prāsāda saṃkulam
mārgamāṇaḥ tu vaidehīm sītām āyata locanām
sarvatas paricakrāma hanūmān ari sūdanaḥ
catur viṣāṇaiḥ dviradaiḥ tri viṣāṇaiḥ tathā eva ca
parikṣiptam asaṃbādham rakṣyamāṇam udāyudhaiḥ
rākṣasībhiḥ ca patnībhiḥ rāvaṇasya niveśanam
āhṛtābhiḥ ca vikramya rāja kanyābhiḥ āvṛtam
tat nakra makara ākīrṇam timiṃgila jhaṣa ākulam
vāyu vega samādhūtam pannagaiḥ iva sāgaram

original: 5.007.007a yā hi vaiśvaraṇe lakṣmīr yā cendre harivāhane
analyzed: yā hi vaiśvaraṇe lakṣmīḥ yā ca indre hari vāhane
sā rāvaṇa gṛhe sarvā nityam eva anapāyinī

original: 5.007.008a yā ca rājñaḥ kuberasya yamasya varuṇasya ca
analyzed: yā ca rājñaḥ kuberasya yamasya varuṇasya ca

original: 5.007.008c tādṛśī tad viśiṣṭā vā ṛddhī rakṣo gṛheṣv iha
analyzed: tādṛśī tat viśiṣṭā vai ṛddhī rakṣaḥ gṛheṣu iha

original: 5.007.009a tasya harmyasya madhyasthaṃ veśma cānyat sunirmitam
analyzed: tasya harmyasya madhya stham veśma ca anyat su nirmitam
bahu niryūha saṃkīrṇam dadarśa pavanātmajaḥ

original: 5.007.010a brahmaṇo 'rthe kṛtaṃ divyaṃ divi yad viśvakarmaṇā
analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ rthe kṛtam divyam divi yat viśvakarmaṇā
vimānam puṣpakam nāma sarva ratna vibhūṣitam

original: 5.007.011a pareṇa tapasā lebhe yat kuberaḥ pitāmahāt
analyzed: pareṇa tapasā lebhe yat kuberaḥ pitāmahāt

original: 5.007.011c kuberam ojasā jitvā lebhe tad rākṣaseśvaraḥ
analyzed: kuberam ojasā jitvā lebhe tat rākṣaseśvaraḥ
īhā mṛga samāyuktaiḥ kārya svara hiraṇmayaiḥ

original: 5.007.012c sukṛtair ācitaṃ stambhaiḥ pradīptam iva ca śriyā
analyzed: su kṛtaiḥ ācitam stambhaiḥ pradīptam iva ca śriyā
meru mandara saṃkāśaiḥ ullikhadbhiḥ iva ambaram
kūṭāgāraiḥ śubha ākāraiḥ sarvatas samalaṃkṛtam
jvalana arka pratīkāśam su kṛtam viśvakarmaṇā
hema sopāna saṃyuktam cāru pravara vedikam
jālavātāyanaiḥ yuktam kāñcanaiḥ sthāṭikaiḥ api
vimānam puṣpakam divyam āruroha mahā kapiḥ
tatrasthaḥ sa tadā gandham pāna bhakṣya anna saṃbhavam
divyam saṃmūrchitam jighran rūpavantam iva anilam

original: 5.007.017a sa gandhas taṃ mahāsattvaṃ bandhur bandhum ivottamam
analyzed: sa gandhaḥ tam mahāsattvam bandhuḥ bandhum iva uttamam

original: 5.007.017c ita ehīty uvāceva tatra yatra sa rāvaṇaḥ
analyzed: itas ehi iti uvāca iva tatra yatra sa rāvaṇaḥ

original: 5.007.018a tatas tāṃ prasthitaḥ śālāṃ dadarśa mahatīṃ śubhām
analyzed: tatas tām prasthitaḥ śālām dadarśa mahatīm śubhām
rāvaṇasya manaḥ kāntām kāntām iva vara striyam
maṇi sopāna vikṛtām hema jāla virājitām
sphāṭikaiḥ āvṛta talām danta antarita rūpikām

original: 5.007.020a muktābhiś ca pravālaiś ca rūpyacāmīkarair api
analyzed: muktābhiḥ ca pravālaiḥ ca rūpya cāmīkaraiḥ api
vibhūṣitām maṇi stambhaiḥ su bahu stambha bhūṣitām
samaiḥ ṛjubhiḥ atyuccaiḥ samantāt su vibhūṣitaiḥ

original: 5.007.021c stambhaiḥ pakṣair ivātyuccair divaṃ saṃprasthitām iva
analyzed: stambhaiḥ pakṣaiḥ iva ati uccais divam saṃprasthitām iva
mahatyā pṛthivī lakṣaṇa aṅkayā
pṛthivīm iva vistīrṇām sarāṣṭra gṛha mālinīm
nāditām matta vihagaiḥ divya gandha adhivāsitām
parārdhya āstaraṇa upetām rakṣaḥ dhipa niṣevitām
dhūmrām agaru dhūpena vimalām haṃsa pāṇḍurām
citrām puṣpa upahāreṇa kalmāṣīm iva su prabhām

original: 5.007.025c tāṃ śokanāśinīṃ divyāṃ śriyaḥ saṃjananīm iva
analyzed: tām śoka nāśinīm divyām śriyaḥ saṃjananīm iva
indriyāṇi indriya arthaiḥ tu pañca pañcabhiḥ uttamaiḥ
tarpayām āsa mātā iva tadā rāvaṇa pālitā
svargaḥ yam deva lokaḥ yam indrasya iyam purī bhavet

original: 5.007.027c siddhir veyaṃ parā hi syād ity amanyata mārutiḥ
analyzed: siddhiḥ vā iyam parā hi syāt iti amanyata mārutiḥ
pradhyāyataḥ iva apaśyat pradīpān tatra kāñcanān
dhūrtān iva mahā dhūrtaiḥ devanena parājitān

original: 5.007.029a dīpānāṃ ca prakāśena tejasā rāvaṇasya ca
analyzed: dīpānām ca prakāśena tejasā rāvaṇasya ca
arcirbhiḥ bhūṣaṇānām ca pradīptā iti abhyamanyata
paśyat kutha āsīnam nānā varṇa ambara srajam
sahasram vara nārīṇām nānā veṣa vibhūṣitam
parivṛtte ṛdharātre tu pāna nidrā vaśam gatam
krīḍitvā uparatam rātrau suṣvāpa bala vat tadā
tat prasuptam viruruce niḥśabda antara bhūṣaṇam
niḥśabda haṃsa bhramaram yathā padma vanam mahat
tāsām saṃvṛta dantāni mīlita akṣāṇi mārutiḥ
apaśyat padma gandhīni vadanāni su yoṣitām
prabuddhāni iva padmāni tāsām bhūtvā kṣapā kṣaye
punar saṃvṛta patrāṇi rātrau iva babhuḥ tadā
imāni mukha padmāni niyatam matta ṣaṭpadāḥ
ambujāni iva phullāni prārthayanti punar punar
iti vā amanyata śrīmān upapattyā mahā kapiḥ

original: 5.007.036c mene hi guṇatas tāni samāni salilodbhavaiḥ
analyzed: mene hi guṇataḥ tāni samāni salilodbhavaiḥ

original: 5.007.037a sā tasya śuśubhe śālā tābhiḥ strībhir virājitā
analyzed: sā tasya śuśubhe śālā tābhiḥ strībhiḥ virājitā
śāradī iva prasannā dyauḥ tārābhiḥ abhiśobhitā

original: 5.007.038a sa ca tābhiḥ parivṛtaḥ śuśubhe rākṣasādhipaḥ
analyzed: sa ca tābhiḥ parivṛtaḥ śuśubhe rākṣasa adhipaḥ

original: 5.007.038c yathā hy uḍupatiḥ śrīmāṃs tārābhir abhisaṃvṛtaḥ
analyzed: yathā hi uḍupatiḥ śrīmān tārābhiḥ abhisaṃvṛtaḥ
yāḥ cyavante mbarāt tārāḥ puṇya śeṣa samāvṛtāḥ

original: 5.007.039c imās tāḥ saṃgatāḥ kṛtsnā iti mene haris tadā
analyzed: imāḥ tāḥ saṃgatāḥ kṛtsnāḥ iti mene hariḥ tadā
tārāṇām iva su vyaktam mahatīnām śubha arciṣām
prabhā varṇa prasādāḥ ca virejuḥ tatra yoṣitām
vyāvṛtta guru pīna sraj prakīrṇa vara bhūṣaṇāḥ
pāna vyāyāma kāleṣu nidrā apahṛta cetasaḥ

original: 5.007.042a vyāvṛttatilakāḥ kāś cit kāś cid udbhrāntanūpurāḥ
analyzed: vyāvṛtta tilakāḥ kāḥ cit kāḥ cit udbhrānta nūpurāḥ

original: 5.007.042c pārśve galitahārāś ca kāś cit paramayoṣitaḥ
analyzed: pārśve galita hārāḥ ca kāḥ cit parama yoṣitaḥ

original: 5.007.043a mukhā hāravṛtāś cānyāḥ kāś cit prasrastavāsasaḥ
analyzed: mukhāḥ hāra vṛtāḥ ca anyāḥ kāḥ cit prasrasta vāsasaḥ
vyāviddha raśanāḥ dāmāḥ kiśoryaḥ iva vāhitāḥ
su kuṇḍala dharāḥ ca anyāḥ vicchinna mṛdita srajaḥ
gaja indra mṛditāḥ phullāḥ latāḥ iva mahā vane

original: 5.007.045a candrāṃśukiraṇābhāś ca hārāḥ kāsāṃ cid utkaṭāḥ
analyzed: candra aṃśu kiraṇa ābhāḥ ca hārāḥ kāsām cit utkaṭāḥ

original: 5.007.045c haṃsā iva babhuḥ suptāḥ stanamadhyeṣu yoṣitām
analyzed: haṃsāḥ iva babhuḥ suptāḥ stana madhyeṣu yoṣitām

original: 5.007.046a aparāsāṃ ca vaidūryāḥ kādambā iva pakṣiṇaḥ
analyzed: aparāsām ca vaidūryāḥ kādambāḥ iva pakṣiṇaḥ
hemasūtrāṇi ca anyāsām cakravākāḥ iva abhavan
haṃsa kāraṇḍava ākīrṇāḥ cakravāka upaśobhitāḥ

original: 5.007.047c āpagā iva tā rejur jaghanaiḥ pulinair iva
analyzed: āpagāḥ iva tāḥ rejuḥ jaghanaiḥ pulinaiḥ iva
kiṅkiṇī jāla saṃkāśāḥ tāḥ hema vipula ambujāḥ
bhāva grāhāḥ yaśaḥ tīrāḥ suptāḥ nadyaḥ iva ābabhuḥ

original: 5.007.049a mṛduṣv aṅgeṣu kāsāṃ cit kucāgreṣu ca saṃsthitāḥ
analyzed: mṛduṣu aṅgeṣu kāsām cit kuca agreṣu ca saṃsthitāḥ
babhūvuḥ bhūṣaṇāni iva śubhāḥ bhūṣaṇa rājayaḥ
aṃśu kāntāḥ ca kāsām cit mukha māruta kampitāḥ

original: 5.007.050c upary upari vaktrāṇāṃ vyādhūyante punaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: upari upari vaktrāṇām vyādhūyante punar punar
tāḥ pātākāḥ iva uddhūtāḥ patnīnām rucira prabhāḥ
nānā varṇa suvarṇānām vaktra mūleṣu rejire

original: 5.007.052a vavalguś cātra kāsāṃ cit kuṇḍalāni śubhārciṣām
analyzed: vavalguḥ ca atra kāsām cit kuṇḍalāni śubha arciṣām
mukha māruta saṃsargān mandam mandam su yoṣitām
śarkarā āsava gandhaḥ sa prakṛtyā surabhiḥ sukhaḥ
tāsām vadana niḥśvāsaḥ siṣeve rāvaṇam tadā
rāvaṇa ānana śaṅkāḥ ca kāḥ cit rāvaṇa yoṣitaḥ

original: 5.007.054c mukhāni sma sapatnīnām upājighran punaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: mukhāni sma sapatnīnām upājighran punar punar
atyartham sakta manasaḥ rāvaṇe tāḥ vara striyaḥ
asvatantrāḥ sapatnīnām priyam eva acaran tadā
bāhūn upanidhāya anyāḥ pārihārya vibhūṣitāḥ

original: 5.007.056c aṃśukāni ca ramyāṇi pramadās tatra śiśyire
analyzed: aṃśukāni ca ramyāṇi pramadāḥ tatra śiśyire

original: 5.007.057a anyā vakṣasi cānyasyās tasyāḥ kā cit punar bhujam
analyzed: anyā vakṣasi ca anyasyāḥ tasyāḥ kā cit punar bhujam

original: 5.007.057c aparā tv aṅkam anyasyās tasyāś cāpy aparā bhujau
analyzed: aparā tu aṅkam anyasyāḥ tasyāḥ ca api aparā bhujau
ūru pārśva kaṭī pṛṣṭham anyonyasya samāśritāḥ
paraspara niviṣṭa aṅgyaḥ mada sneha vaśa anugāḥ
anyonyasya aṅga saṃsparśāt prīyamāṇāḥ sumadhyamāḥ
ekīkṛta bhujāḥ sarvāḥ suṣupuḥ tatra yoṣitaḥ
anyonya bhuja sūtreṇa strī mālā grathitā hi sā
mālā iva grathitā sūtre śuśubhe matta ṣaṭpadā
latānām mādhave māsi phullānām vāyu sevanāt
anyonya mālā grathitam saṃsakta kusuma uccayam
vyativeṣṭita su skantham anyonya bhramara ākulam

original: 5.007.062c āsīd vanam ivoddhūtaṃ strīvanaṃ rāvaṇasya tat
analyzed: āsīt vanam iva uddhūtam strī vanam rāvaṇasya tat

original: 5.007.063a uciteṣv api suvyaktaṃ na tāsāṃ yoṣitāṃ tadā
analyzed: uciteṣu api su vyaktam na tāsām yoṣitām tadā
vivekaḥ śakyaḥ ādhātum bhūṣaṇa aṅga ambara srajām
rāvaṇe sukha saṃviṣṭe tāḥ striyaḥ vividha prabhāḥ
jvalantaḥ kāñcanāḥ dīpāḥ iva
rājarṣi pitṛ daityānām gandharvāṇām ca yoṣitaḥ

original: 5.007.065c rakṣasāṃ cābhavan kanyās tasya kāmavaśaṃ gatāḥ
analyzed: rakṣasām ca abhavan kanyāḥ tasya kāma vaśam gatāḥ

original: 5.007.066a na tatra kā cit pramadā prasahya;
analyzed: na tatra kā cit pramadā prasahya
vīrya upapannena guṇena labdhā
na ca anya kāmā api na ca anya pūrvā
vinā varārhām janakātmajām tu
na ca akulīnā na ca hīna rūpā
na a dakṣiṇā na an upacāra yuktā
bhāryā bhavat tasya na hīna sattvā
na ca api kāntasya na kāmanīyā
babhūva buddhiḥ tu hari īśvarasya
yat īdṛśī rāghava dharmapatnī
imāḥ yathā rākṣasa rāja bhāryāḥ
sujātam asya iti hi sādhu buddheḥ
punar ca saḥ cintayat ārta rūpaḥ
dhruvam viśiṣṭā guṇataḥ hi sītā
atha ayam asyām kṛtavān mahātmā
laṅkeśvaraḥ kaṣṭam anārya karma
tatra divya upamam mukhyam sphāṭikam ratna bhūṣitam
avekṣamāṇaḥ hanumān dadarśa śayana āsanam
tasya ca ekatame deśe saḥ grya mālya vibhūṣitam
dadarśa pāṇḍuram chatram tārādhipati saṃnibham
bāla vyajana hastābhiḥ vījyamānam samantataḥ

original: 5.008.003c gandhaiś ca vividhair juṣṭaṃ varadhūpena dhūpitam
analyzed: gandhaiḥ ca vividhaiḥ juṣṭam vara dhūpena dhūpitam
parama āstaraṇa āstīrṇam āvika ajina saṃvṛtam
dāmabhiḥ vara mālyānām samantāt upaśobhitam
tasmin jīmūta saṃkāśam pradīpta uttama kuṇḍalam
lohita akṣam mahā bāhum mahārajata vāsasam
lohitena anulipta aṅgam candanena sugandhinā
saṃdhyā raktam iva ākāśe toyadam sa taḍit guṇam
vṛtam ābharaṇaiḥ divyaiḥ surūpam kāmarūpiṇam
sa vṛkṣa vana gulma āḍhyam prasuptam iva mandaram
krīḍitvā uparatam rātrau vara ābharaṇa bhūṣitam
priyam rākṣasa kanyānām rākṣasānām sukha āvaham

original: 5.008.009a pītvāpy uparataṃ cāpi dadarśa sa mahākapiḥ
analyzed: pītvā api uparatam ca api dadarśa sa mahā kapiḥ
bhāskare śayane vīram prasuptam rākṣasa adhipam
niḥśvasantam yathā nāgam rāvaṇam vānara uttamaḥ
āsādya parama udvignaḥ saḥ u pāsarpat subhīta vat
atha ārohaṇam āsādya vedikā antaram āśritaḥ
suptam rākṣasa śārdūlam prekṣate sma mahā kapiḥ
śuśubhe rākṣasa indrasya svapataḥ śayana uttamam
gandhahastini saṃviṣṭe yathāprasravaṇam mahat
kāñcana aṅgada naddhau ca dadarśa sa mahātmanaḥ
vikṣiptau rākṣasa indrasya bhujau indra dhvaja upamau
airāvata viṣāṇa agraiḥ āpīḍita kṛta vraṇau
vajra ullikhita pīna aṃsau viṣṇu cakra parikṣitau
pīnau sama sujāta aṃsau saṃgatau bala saṃyutau
saṃhatau parigha ākārau vṛttau kari kara upamau
vikṣiptau śayane śubhre pañca śīrṣau iva uragau
śaśa kṣataja kalpena su śītena sugandhinā
candanena parārdhyena su anuliptau su alaṃkṛtau
uttama strī vimṛditau gandha uttama niṣevitau
yakṣa pannaga gandharva deva dānava rāviṇau

original: 5.008.019a dadarśa sa kapis tasya bāhū śayanasaṃsthitau
analyzed: dadarśa sa kapiḥ tasya bāhū śayana saṃsthitau
mandarasya antare suptau mahārhī ruṣitau iva
tābhyām sa paripūrṇābhyām bhujābhyām rākṣasa adhipaḥ
śuśubhe cala saṃkāśaḥ śṛṅgābhyām iva mandaraḥ
tasya rākṣasa siṃhasya niścakrāma mukhāt mahān

original: 5.008.022c śayānasya viniḥśvāsaḥ pūrayann iva tad gṛham
analyzed: śayānasya viniḥśvāsaḥ pūrayan iva tat gṛham
muktāmaṇi vicitreṇa kāñcanena virājatā
mukuṭena apavṛttena kuṇḍala ujjvalita ānanam
raktacandana digdhena tathā hāreṇa śobhitā
pīna āyata viśālena vakṣasā abhivirājitam
pāṇḍureṇa apaviddhena kṣaumeṇa kṣataja īkṣaṇam
mahārheṇa su saṃvītam pītena uttama vāsasā
māṣa rāśi pratīkāśam niḥśvasantam bhujaṅga vat
gāṅge mahati toya ante prasutam iva kuñjaram
caturbhiḥ kāñcanaiḥ dīpaiḥ dīpyamānaiḥ caturdiśam
prakāśīkṛta sarva aṅgam megham vidyut gaṇaiḥ iva
pāda mūla gatāḥ ca api dadarśa su mahātmanaḥ

original: 5.008.028c patnīḥ sa priyabhāryasya tasya rakṣaḥpater gṛhe
analyzed: patnīḥ sa priya bhāryasya tasya rakṣaḥpateḥ gṛhe
śaśi prakāśa vadanāḥ vara kuṇḍala bhūṣitāḥ
amlāna mālya ābharaṇāḥ dadarśa hari yūthapaḥ
nṛtta vāditra kuśalāḥ rākṣasa indra bhuja aṅka gāḥ
vara ābharaṇa dhāriṇyaḥ niṣannāḥ dadṛśe kapiḥ
vajra vaidūrya garbhāṇi śravaṇa anteṣu yoṣitām
dadarśa tāpanīyāni kuṇḍalāni aṅgadāni ca
tāsām candra upamaiḥ vaktraiḥ śubhaiḥ lalita kuṇḍalaiḥ

original: 5.008.032c virarāja vimānaṃ tan nabhas tārāgaṇair iva
analyzed: virarāja vimānam tat nabhaḥ tārā gaṇaiḥ iva
mada vyāyāma khinnāḥ tāḥ rākṣasa indrasya yoṣitaḥ
teṣu teṣu avakāśeṣu prasuptāḥ tanu madhyamāḥ

original: 5.008.034a kā cid vīṇāṃ pariṣvajya prasuptā saṃprakāśate
analyzed: kā cit vīṇām pariṣvajya prasuptā saṃprakāśate
mahā nadī prakīrṇā iva nalinī potam āśritā
anyā kakṣa gatena eva maḍḍukena asita īkṣaṇā
prasuptā bhāminī bhāti bāla putrā iva vatsalā
paṭaham cāru sarva aṅgī pīḍya śete śubha stanī
cirasya ramaṇam labdhvā pariṣvajya iva kāminī

original: 5.008.037a kā cid aṃśaṃ pariṣvajya suptā kamalalocanā
analyzed: kā cit aṃśam pariṣvajya suptā kamala locanā
nidrā vaśam anuprāptā saha kāntā iva bhāminī
anyā kanaka saṃkāśaiḥ mṛdu pīnaiḥ manoramaiḥ
mṛdaṅgam paripīḍya aṅgaiḥ prasuptā matta locanā
bhuja pārśva antara sthena kakṣa geṇa kṛśa udarī
paṇavena saha anindyā suptā mada kṛta śramā
ḍiṇḍimam parigṛhya anyā tathā eva āsakta ḍiṇḍimā
prasuptā taruṇam vatsam upagūhya iva bhāminī
kā cit āḍambaram nārī bhuja saṃbhoga pīḍitam
kṛtvā kamala patra akṣī prasuptā mada mohitā
kalaśīm apaviddhya anyā prasuptā bhāti bhāminī
vasante puṣpa śabalā mālā iva parimārjitā

original: 5.008.043a pāṇibhyāṃ ca kucau kā cit suvarṇakalaśopamau
analyzed: pāṇibhyām ca kucau kā cit suvarṇa kalaśa upamau
upagūhya abalā suptā nidrā bala parājitā
anyām āliṅgya suśroṇī prasuptā mada vihvalā
ātodyāni vicitrāṇi pariṣvajya vara striyaḥ

original: 5.008.045c nipīḍya ca kucaiḥ suptāḥ kāminyaḥ kāmukān iva
analyzed: nipīḍya ca kucaiḥ suptāḥ kāminyaḥ kāmukān iva
tāsām ekānta vinyaste śayānām śayane śubhe

original: 5.008.046c dadarśa rūpasaṃpannām aparāṃ sa kapiḥ striyam
analyzed: dadarśa rūpa saṃpannām aparām sa kapiḥ striyam
muktāmaṇi samāyuktaiḥ bhūṣaṇaiḥ su vibhūṣitām
vibhūṣayantīm iva ca sva śriyā bhavana uttamam
gaurīm kanaka varṇa ābhām iṣṭām antaḥpura īśvarīm
kapiḥ mandodarīm tatra śayānām cāru rūpiṇīm

original: 5.008.049a sa tāṃ dṛṣṭvā mahābāhur bhūṣitāṃ mārutātmajaḥ
analyzed: sa tām dṛṣṭvā mahā bāhuḥ bhūṣitām mārutātmajaḥ
tarkayām āsa sītā iti rūpa yauvana saṃpadā
harṣeṇa mahatā yuktaḥ nananda hari yūthapaḥ
āshpoṭayām āsa cucumba puccham
nananda cikrīḍa jagau jagāma
stambhān arohat nipapāta bhūmau
nidarśayan svām prakṛtim kapīnām

original: 5.009.001a avadhūya ca tāṃ buddhiṃ babhūvāvasthitas tadā
analyzed: avadhūya ca tām buddhim babhūva avasthitaḥ tadā

original: 5.009.001c jagāma cāparāṃ cintāṃ sītāṃ prati mahākapiḥ
analyzed: jagāma ca aparām cintām sītām prati mahā kapiḥ

original: 5.009.002a na rāmeṇa viyuktā sā svaptum arhati bhāminī
analyzed: na rāmeṇa viyuktā sā svaptum arhati bhāminī

original: 5.009.002c na bhoktuṃ nāpy alaṃkartuṃ na pānam upasevitum
analyzed: na bhoktum na api alaṃkartum na pānam upasevitum

original: 5.009.003a nānyaṃ naram upasthātuṃ surāṇām api ceśvaram
analyzed: na anyam naram upasthātum surāṇām api ca īśvaram

original: 5.009.003c na hi rāmasamaḥ kaś cid vidyate tridaśeṣv api
analyzed: na hi rāma samaḥ kaḥ cit vidyate tridaśeṣu api

original: 5.009.003e anyeyam iti niścitya pānabhūmau cacāra saḥ
analyzed: anyā iyam iti niścitya pāna bhūmau cacāra saḥ

original: 5.009.004a krīḍitenāparāḥ klāntā gītena ca tathā parāḥ
analyzed: krīḍitena aparāḥ klāntāḥ gītena ca tathā parāḥ
nṛttena ca aparāḥ klāntāḥ pāna viprahatāḥ tathā
murajeṣu mṛdaṅgeṣu pīṭhikāsu ca saṃsthitāḥ
tathā āstaraṇa mukhyyeṣu saṃviṣṭāḥ ca aparāḥ striyaḥ
aṅganānām sahasreṇa bhūṣitena vibhūṣaṇaiḥ
rūpa saṃlāpa śīlena yukta gīta artha bhāṣiṇā
deśa kāla abhiyuktena yukta vākya abhidhāyinā
rata abhirata saṃsuptam dadarśa hari yūthapaḥ
tāsām madhye mahā bāhuḥ śuśubhe rākṣaseśvaraḥ

original: 5.009.008c goṣṭhe mahati mukhyānāṃ gavāṃ madhye yathā vṛṣaḥ
analyzed: goṣṭhe mahati mukhyānām gavām madhye yathā vṛṣaḥ

original: 5.009.009a sa rākṣasendraḥ śuśubhe tābhiḥ parivṛtaḥ svayam
analyzed: sa rākṣasa indraḥ śuśubhe tābhiḥ parivṛtaḥ svayam
kareṇubhiḥ yathā araṇyam parikīrṇaḥ mahā dvipaḥ
sarva kāmaiḥ upetām ca pāna bhūmim mahātmanaḥ
dadarśa kapi śārdūlaḥ tasya rakṣaḥpateḥ gṛhe

original: 5.009.011a mṛgāṇāṃ mahiṣāṇāṃ ca varāhāṇāṃ ca bhāgaśaḥ
analyzed: mṛgāṇām mahiṣāṇām ca varāhāṇām ca bhāgaśas

original: 5.009.011c tatra nyastāni māṃsāni pānabhūmau dadarśa saḥ
analyzed: tatra nyastāni māṃsāni pāna bhūmau dadarśa saḥ
raukmeṣu ca viśaleṣu bhājaneṣu ardha bhakṣitān
dadarśa kapi śārdūla mayūrān kukkuṭān tathā
varāha vārdhrāṇasakān dadhi sauvarcala āyutān
śalyān mṛga mayūrān ca hanūmān anvavaikṣata
kṛkarān vividhān siddhān cakorān ardha bhakṣitān

original: 5.009.014c mahiṣān ekaśalyāṃś ca chāgāṃś ca kṛtaniṣṭhitān
analyzed: mahiṣān eka śalyān ca chāgān ca kṛta niṣṭhitān

original: 5.009.014e lekhyam uccāvacaṃ peyaṃ bhojyāni vividhāni ca
analyzed: lekhyam uccāvacam peyam bhojyāni vividhāni ca
tathā amla lavaṇa uttaṃsaiḥ rāgaṣāḍavaiḥ
hāra nūpura keyūraiḥ apaviddhaiḥ mahādhanaiḥ
pāna bhājana vikṣiptaiḥ phalaiḥ ca vividhaiḥ api
kṛta puṣpa upahārā bhūḥ adhikam puṣyati śriyam

original: 5.009.017a tatra tatra ca vinyastaiḥ suśliṣṭaiḥ śayanāsanaiḥ
analyzed: tatra tatra ca vinyastaiḥ su śliṣṭaiḥ śayana āsanaiḥ
pāna bhūmiḥ vinā vahnim pradīptā iva upalakṣyate
bahu prakāraiḥ vividhaiḥ vara saṃskāra saṃskṛtaiḥ
māṃsaiḥ kuśala saṃyuktaiḥ pāna bhūmi gataiḥ pṛthak

original: 5.009.019a divyāḥ prasannā vividhāḥ surāḥ kṛtasurā api
analyzed: divyāḥ prasannāḥ vividhāḥ surāḥ kṛta surāḥ api
śarkarā āsava mādhvīkāḥ puṣpa āsava phala āsavāḥ

original: 5.009.019e vāsacūrṇaiś ca vividhair mṛṣṭās tais taiḥ pṛthakpṛthak
analyzed: vāsa cūrṇaiḥ ca vividhaiḥ mṛṣṭāḥ taiḥ taiḥ pṛthak pṛthak

original: 5.009.020a saṃtatā śuśubhe bhūmir mālyaiś ca bahusaṃsthitaiḥ
analyzed: saṃtatā śuśubhe bhūmiḥ mālyaiḥ ca bahu saṃsthitaiḥ

original: 5.009.020c hiraṇmayaiś ca karakair bhājanaiḥ sphāṭikair api
analyzed: hiraṇmayaiḥ ca karakaiḥ bhājanaiḥ sphāṭikaiḥ api
jāmbūnada mayaiḥ ca anyaiḥ karakaiḥ abhisaṃvṛtā
rājateṣu ca kumbheṣu jāmbūnada mayeṣu ca

original: 5.009.021c pānaśreṣṭhaṃ tadā bhūri kapis tatra dadarśa ha
analyzed: pāna śreṣṭham tadā bhūri kapiḥ tatra dadarśa ha
saḥ paśyat śātakumbhāni śīdhoḥ maṇi mayāni ca
rājatāni ca pūrṇāni bhājanāni mahā kapiḥ

original: 5.009.023a kva cid ardhāvaśeṣāṇi kva cit pītāni sarvaśaḥ
analyzed: kva cit ardha avaśeṣāṇi kva cit pītāni sarvaśas

original: 5.009.023c kva cin naiva prapītāni pānāni sa dadarśa ha
analyzed: kva cit nā eva prapītāni pānāni sa dadarśa ha

original: 5.009.024a kva cid bhakṣyāṃś ca vividhān kva cit pānāni bhāgaśaḥ
analyzed: kva cit bhakṣyān ca vividhān kva cit pānāni bhāgaśas

original: 5.009.024c kva cid annāvaśeṣāṇi paśyan vai vicacāra ha
analyzed: kva cit anna avaśeṣāṇi paśyan vai vicacāra ha

original: 5.009.025a kva cit prabhinnaiḥ karakaiḥ kva cid āloḍitair ghaṭaiḥ
analyzed: kva cit prabhinnaiḥ karakaiḥ kva cit āloḍitaiḥ ghaṭaiḥ

original: 5.009.025c kva cit saṃpṛktamālyāni jalāni ca phalāni ca
analyzed: kva cit saṃpṛkta mālyāni jalāni ca phalāni ca

original: 5.009.026a śayanāny atra nārīṇāṃ śūnyāni bahudhā punaḥ
analyzed: śayanāni atra nārīṇām śūnyāni bahudhā punar

original: 5.009.026c parasparaṃ samāśliṣya kāś cit suptā varāṅganāḥ
analyzed: parasparam samāśliṣya kāḥ cit suptāḥ vara aṅganāḥ

original: 5.009.027a kā cic ca vastram anyasyā apahṛtyopaguhya ca
analyzed: kā cit ca vastram anyasyāḥ apahṛtya upaguhya ca
upagamya abalā suptā nidrā bala parājitā

original: 5.009.028a tāsām ucchvāsavātena vastraṃ mālyaṃ ca gātrajam
analyzed: tāsām ucchvāsa vātena vastram mālyam ca gātra jam

original: 5.009.028c nātyarthaṃ spandate citraṃ prāpya mandam ivānilam
analyzed: na atyartham spandate citram prāpya mandam iva anilam

original: 5.009.029a candanasya ca śītasya śīdhor madhurasasya ca
analyzed: candanasya ca śītasya śīdhoḥ madhu rasasya ca

original: 5.009.029c vividhasya ca mālyasya puṣpasya vividhasya ca
analyzed: vividhasya ca mālyasya puṣpasya vividhasya ca

original: 5.009.030a bahudhā mārutas tatra gandhaṃ vividham udvahan
analyzed: bahudhā mārutaḥ tatra gandham vividham udvahan

original: 5.009.030c snānānāṃ candanānāṃ ca dhūpānāṃ caiva mūrchitaḥ
analyzed: snānānām candanānām ca dhūpānām ca eva mūrchitaḥ

original: 5.009.030e pravavau surabhir gandho vimāne puṣpake tadā
analyzed: pravavau surabhiḥ gandhaḥ vimāne puṣpake tadā

original: 5.009.031a śyāmāvadātās tatrānyāḥ kāś cit kṛṣṇā varāṅganāḥ
analyzed: śyāma avadātāḥ tatra anyāḥ kāḥ cit kṛṣṇāḥ vara aṅganāḥ
kāḥ cit kāñcana varṇa aṅgyaḥ pramadāḥ rākṣasa ālaye
tāsām nidrā vaśa tvāt ca madanena vimūrchitam

original: 5.009.032c padminīnāṃ prasuptānāṃ rūpam āsīd yathaiva hi
analyzed: padminīnām prasuptānām rūpam āsīt yathā eva hi
evam sarvam aśeṣeṇa rāvaṇa antaḥpuram kapiḥ

original: 5.009.033c dadarśa sumahātejā na dadarśa ca jānakīm
analyzed: dadarśa su mahā tejāḥ na dadarśa ca jānakīm

original: 5.009.034a nirīkṣamāṇaś ca tatas tāḥ striyaḥ sa mahākapiḥ
analyzed: nirīkṣamāṇaḥ ca tatas tāḥ striyaḥ sa mahā kapiḥ
jagāma mahatīm cintām dharma sādhvasa śaṅkitaḥ
para dāra avarodhasya prasuptasya nirīkṣaṇam
idam khalu mama atyartham dharma lopam kariṣyati

original: 5.009.036a na hi me paradārāṇāṃ dṛṣṭir viṣayavartinī
analyzed: na hi me para dārāṇām dṛṣṭiḥ viṣaya vartinī
ayam ca atra mayā dṛṣṭaḥ para dāra parigrahaḥ
tasya prādurabhūt cintā punar anyā manasvinaḥ
niścita ekānta cittasya kārya niścaya darśinī

original: 5.009.038a kāmaṃ dṛṣṭvā mayā sarvā viśvastā rāvaṇastriyaḥ
analyzed: kāmam dṛṣṭvā mayā sarvāḥ viśvastāḥ rāvaṇa striyaḥ

original: 5.009.038c na tu me manasaḥ kiṃ cid vaikṛtyam upapadyate
analyzed: na tu me manasaḥ kim cit vaikṛtyam upapadyate

original: 5.009.039a mano hi hetuḥ sarveṣām indriyāṇāṃ pravartate
analyzed: manaḥ hi hetuḥ sarveṣām indriyāṇām pravartate

original: 5.009.039c śubhāśubhāsv avasthāsu tac ca me suvyavasthitam
analyzed: śubha aśubhāsu avasthāsu tat ca me su vyavasthitam

original: 5.009.040a nānyatra hi mayā śakyā vaidehī parimārgitum
analyzed: na anyatra hi mayā śakyā vaidehī parimārgitum

original: 5.009.040c striyo hi strīṣu dṛśyante sadā saṃparimārgaṇe
analyzed: striyaḥ hi strīṣu dṛśyante sadā saṃparimārgaṇe

original: 5.009.041a yasya sattvasya yā yonis tasyāṃ tat parimārgyate
analyzed: yasya sattvasya yā yoniḥ tasyām tat parimārgyate

original: 5.009.041c na śakyaṃ pramadā naṣṭā mṛgīṣu parimārgitum
analyzed: na śakyam pramadāḥ naṣṭāḥ mṛgīṣu parimārgitum

original: 5.009.042a tad idaṃ mārgitaṃ tāvac chuddhena manasā mayā
analyzed: tat idam mārgitam tāvat śuddhena manasā mayā

original: 5.009.042c rāvaṇāntaḥpuraṃ saraṃ dṛśyate na ca jānakī
analyzed: rāvaṇa antaḥpuram saram dṛśyate na ca jānakī
deva gandharva kanyāḥ ca nāga kanyāḥ ca vīryavān
avekṣamāṇaḥ hanumān na eva apaśyata jānakīm

original: 5.009.044a tām apaśyan kapis tatra paśyaṃś cānyā varastriyaḥ
analyzed: tām a paśyan kapiḥ tatra paśyan ca anyāḥ vara striyaḥ
apakramya tadā vīraḥ pradhyātum upacakrame
sa tasya madhye bhavanasya vānaraḥ
latāgṛhān citragṛhān niśāgṛhān
jagāma sītām prati darśana utsukaḥ
na ca eva tām paśyati cāru darśanām
sa cintayām āsa tatas mahā kapiḥ
priyām apaśyan raghunandanasya tām

original: 5.010.002c dhruvaṃ nu sītā mriyate yathā na me;
analyzed: dhruvam nu sītā mriyate yathā na me
vicinvataḥ darśanam eti maithilī
sā rākṣasānām pravareṇa bālā
tat parā satī
anena nūnam pratiduṣṭa karmaṇā
hatā bhavet ārya pathe pare sthitā
virūpa rūpāḥ vikṛtāḥ vivarcasaḥ
mahā ānanāḥ dīrgha virūpa darśanāḥ
samīkṣya sā
bhayāt vinaṣṭā janaka īśvara ātmajā
sītām a dṛṣṭvā hi an avāpya pauruṣam
vihṛtya kālam saha vānaraiḥ ciram
na me sti sugrīva samīpa gā gatiḥ
su tīkṣṇa daṇḍaḥ balavān ca vānaraḥ
dṛṣṭam antaḥpuram sarvam dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇa yoṣitaḥ

original: 5.010.006c na sītā dṛśyate sādhvī vṛthā jāto mama śramaḥ
analyzed: na sītā dṛśyate sādhvī vṛthā jātaḥ mama śramaḥ

original: 5.010.007a kiṃ nu māṃ vānarāḥ sarve gataṃ vakṣyanti saṃgatāḥ
analyzed: kim nu mām vānarāḥ sarve gatam vakṣyanti saṃgatāḥ

original: 5.010.007c gatvā tatra tvayā vīra kiṃ kṛtaṃ tad vadasva naḥ
analyzed: gatvā tatra tvayā vīra kim kṛtam tat vadasva naḥ

original: 5.010.008a adṛṣṭvā kiṃ pravakṣyāmi tām ahaṃ janakātmajām
analyzed: a dṛṣṭvā kim pravakṣyāmi tām aham janakātmajām
dhruvam prāyam upeṣyanti kālasya vyativartane

original: 5.010.009a kiṃ vā vakṣyati vṛddhaś ca jāmbavān aṅgadaś ca saḥ
analyzed: kim vā vakṣyati vṛddhaḥ ca jāmbavān aṅgadaḥ ca saḥ

original: 5.010.009c gataṃ pāraṃ samudrasya vānarāś ca samāgatāḥ
