analyzed: gatam pāram samudrasya vānarāḥ ca samāgatāḥ

original: 5.010.010a anirvedaḥ śriyo mūlam anirvedaḥ paraṃ sukham
analyzed: anirvedaḥ śriyaḥ mūlam anirvedaḥ param sukham

original: 5.010.010c bhūyas tāvad viceṣyāmi na yatra vicayaḥ kṛtaḥ
analyzed: bhūyas tāvat viceṣyāmi na yatra vicayaḥ kṛtaḥ
anirvedaḥ hi satatam sarva artheṣu pravartakaḥ

original: 5.010.011c karoti saphalaṃ jantoḥ karma yac ca karoti saḥ
analyzed: karoti saphalam jantoḥ karma yat ca karoti saḥ

original: 5.010.012a tasmād anirveda kṛtaṃ yatnaṃ ceṣṭe 'ham uttamam
analyzed: tasmāt anirveda kṛtam yatnam ceṣṭe ham uttamam
adṛṣṭān ca viceṣyāmi deśān rāvaṇa pālitān
āpānaśālā vicitāḥ tathā puṣpa gṛhāṇi ca

original: 5.010.013c citraśālāś ca vicitā bhūyaḥ krīḍāgṛhāṇi ca
analyzed: citra śālāḥ ca vicitāḥ bhūyas krīḍā gṛhāṇi ca
niṣkuṭa antara rathyāḥ ca vimānāni ca sarvaśas
iti saṃcintya bhūyas vicetum upacakrame
bhūmīgṛhān caitya gṛhān gṛha atigṛhakān api

original: 5.010.015c utpatan nipataṃś cāpi tiṣṭhan gacchan punaḥ kva cit
analyzed: utpatan nipatan ca api tiṣṭhan gacchan punar kva cit
apāvṛṇvan ca dvārāṇi kapāṭāni avaghaṭṭayan

original: 5.010.016c praviśan niṣpataṃś cāpi prapatann utpatann api
analyzed: praviśan niṣpatan ca api prapatan utpatan api

original: 5.010.016e sarvam apy avakāśaṃ sa vicacāra mahākapiḥ
analyzed: sarvam api avakāśam sa vicacāra mahā kapiḥ
catur aṅgula mātraḥ na avakāśaḥ sa vidyate

original: 5.010.017c rāvaṇāntaḥpure tasmin yaṃ kapir na jagāma saḥ
analyzed: rāvaṇa antaḥpure tasmin yam kapiḥ na jagāma saḥ
prākara antara rathyāḥ ca vedikaḥ caitya saṃśrayāḥ

original: 5.010.018c śvabhrāś ca puṣkariṇyaś ca sarvaṃ tenāvalokitam
analyzed: śvabhrāḥ ca puṣkariṇyaḥ ca sarvam tena avalokitam
rākṣasyaḥ vividha ākārāḥ virūpāḥ vikṛtāḥ tathā

original: 5.010.019c dṛṣṭā hanūmatā tatra na tu sā janakātmajā
analyzed: dṛṣṭāḥ hanūmatā tatra na tu sā janakātmajā
rūpeṇa apratimāḥ loke varāḥ vidyādhara striyaḥ

original: 5.010.020c dṛṭā hanūmatā tatra na tu rāghavanandinī
analyzed: dṛṭā hanūmatā tatra na tu rāghava nandinī
nāga kanyāḥ vara ārohāḥ pūrṇa candra nibha ānanāḥ

original: 5.010.021c dṛṣṭā hanūmatā tatra na tu sītā sumadhyamā
analyzed: dṛṣṭāḥ hanūmatā tatra na tu sītā sumadhyamā
pramathya rākṣasa indreṇa nāga kanyāḥ balāt dhṛtāḥ

original: 5.010.022c dṛṣṭā hanūmatā tatra na sā janakanandinī
analyzed: dṛṣṭāḥ hanūmatā tatra na sā janakanandinī

original: 5.010.023a so 'paśyaṃs tāṃ mahābāhuḥ paśyaṃś cānyā varastriyaḥ
analyzed: saḥ paśyan tām mahā bāhuḥ paśyan ca anyāḥ vara striyaḥ
viṣasāda mahā bāhuḥ hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
udyogam vānara indrāṇam plavanam sāgarasya ca
vyartham vīkṣya anilasutaḥ cintām punar upāgamat
avatīrya vimānāt ca hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
cintām upajagāma atha śoka upahata cetanaḥ
vimānāt tu su saṃkramya prākāram hari yūthapaḥ
hanūmān vegavān āsīt yathā vidyut ghana antare
saṃparikramya hanumān rāvaṇasya

original: 5.011.002c adṛṣṭvā jānakīṃ sītām abravīd vacanaṃ kapiḥ
analyzed: a dṛṣṭvā jānakīm sītām abravīt vacanam kapiḥ

original: 5.011.003a bhūyiṣṭhaṃ loḍitā laṅkā rāmasya caratā priyam
analyzed: bhūyiṣṭham loḍitā laṅkā rāmasya caratā priyam

original: 5.011.003c na hi paśyāmi vaidehīṃ sītāṃ sarvāṅgaśobhanām
analyzed: na hi paśyāmi vaidehīm sītām sarva aṅga śobhanām
palvalāni taṭākāni sarāṃsi saritaḥ tathā
nadyaḥ nūpa vana antāḥ ca durgāḥ ca dharaṇīdharāḥ

original: 5.011.004e loḍitā vasudhā sarvā na ca paśyāmi jānakīm
analyzed: loḍitā vasudhā sarvā na ca paśyāmi jānakīm
iha saṃpātinā sītā rāvaṇasya niveśane

original: 5.011.005c ākhyātā gṛdhrarājena na ca paśyāmi tām aham
analyzed: ākhyātā gṛdhra rājena na ca paśyāmi tām aham

original: 5.011.006a kiṃ nu sītātha vaidehī maithilī janakātmajā
analyzed: kim nu sītā atha vaidehī maithilī janakātmajā
upatiṣṭheta vivaśā rāvaṇam duṣṭa cāriṇam

original: 5.011.007a kṣipram utpatato manye sītām ādāya rakṣasaḥ
analyzed: kṣipram utpatataḥ manye sītām ādāya rakṣasaḥ
bibhyataḥ rāma bāṇānām antarā patitā bhavet
atha vā hriyamāṇāyāḥ pathi siddha niṣevite

original: 5.011.008c manye patitam āryāyā hṛdayaṃ prekṣya sāgaram
analyzed: manye patitam āryāyāḥ hṛdayam prekṣya sāgaram
rāvaṇasya ūru vegena bhujābhyām pīḍitena ca

original: 5.011.009c tayā manye viśālākṣyā tyaktaṃ jīvitam āryayā
analyzed: tayā manye viśāla akṣyā tyaktam jīvitam āryayā

original: 5.011.010a upary upari vā nūnaṃ sāgaraṃ kramatas tadā
analyzed: upari upari vā nūnam sāgaram kramataḥ tadā
viveṣṭamānā patitā samudre janakātmajā

original: 5.011.011a āho kṣudreṇa cānena rakṣantī śīlam ātmanaḥ
analyzed: āho kṣudreṇa ca anena rakṣantī śīlam ātmanaḥ
abandhuḥ bhakṣitā sītā rāvaṇena tapasvinī
atha vā rākṣasa indrasya patnībhiḥ asita īkṣaṇā
aduṣṭā duṣṭa bhāvābhiḥ bhakṣitā sā bhaviṣyati
saṃpūrṇa candra pratimam padma patra nibha īkṣaṇam

original: 5.011.013c rāmasya dhyāyatī vaktraṃ pañcatvaṃ kṛpaṇā gatā
analyzed: rāmasya dhyāyatī vaktram pañcatvam kṛpaṇā gatā

original: 5.011.014a hā rāma lakṣmaṇety eva hāyodhyeti ca maithilī
analyzed: hā rāma lakṣmaṇa iti eva ha ayodhyā iti ca maithilī
vilapya bahu vaidehī nyasta dehā bhaviṣyati

original: 5.011.015a atha vā nihitā manye rāvaṇasya niveśane
analyzed: atha vā nihitā manye rāvaṇasya niveśane
nūnam lālapyate mandam pañjara sthā iva śārikā
janakasya kule jātā rāma patnī sumadhyamā
katham utpala patra akṣī rāvaṇasya vaśam vrajet

original: 5.011.017a vinaṣṭā vā pranaṣṭā vā mṛtā vā janakātmajā
analyzed: vinaṣṭā vā pranaṣṭā vā mṛtā vā janakātmajā
rāmasya priya bhāryasya na nivedayitum kṣamam

original: 5.011.018a nivedyamāne doṣaḥ syād doṣaḥ syād anivedane
analyzed: nivedyamāne doṣaḥ syāt doṣaḥ syāt a nivedane

original: 5.011.018c kathaṃ nu khalu kartavyaṃ viṣamaṃ pratibhāti me
analyzed: katham nu khalu kartavyam viṣamam pratibhāti me

original: 5.011.019a asminn evaṃgate karye prāptakālaṃ kṣamaṃ ca kim
analyzed: asmin evaṃgate karye prāpta kālam kṣamam ca kim

original: 5.011.019c bhaved iti matiṃ bhūyo hanumān pravicārayan
analyzed: bhavet iti matim bhūyas hanumān pravicārayan
yadi sītām a dṛṣṭvā aham vānara indra purīm itas

original: 5.011.020c gamiṣyāmi tataḥ ko me puruṣārtho bhaviṣyati
analyzed: gamiṣyāmi tatas kaḥ me puruṣa arthaḥ bhaviṣyati
mama idam laṅghanam vyartham sāgarasya bhaviṣyati

original: 5.011.021c praveśaś civa laṅkāyā rākṣasānāṃ ca darśanam
analyzed: praveśaḥ laṅkāyāḥ rākṣasānām ca darśanam

original: 5.011.022a kiṃ vā vakṣyati sugrīvo harayo va samāgatāḥ
analyzed: kim vā vakṣyati sugrīvaḥ harayaḥ samāgatāḥ
kiṣkindhām samanuprāptau tau vā daśaratha ātmajau

original: 5.011.023a gatvā tu yadi kākutsthaṃ vakṣyāmi param apriyam
analyzed: gatvā tu yadi kākutstham vakṣyāmi param apriyam

original: 5.011.023c na dṛṣṭeti mayā sītā tatas tyakṣyanti jīvitam
analyzed: na dṛṣṭā iti mayā sītā tatas tyakṣyanti jīvitam
paruṣam dāruṇam krūram tīkṣṇam indriya tāpanam

original: 5.011.024c sītānimittaṃ durvākyaṃ śrutvā sa na bhaviṣyati
analyzed: sītā nimittam durvākyam śrutvā sa na bhaviṣyati
tam tu kṛcchra gatam dṛṣṭvā pañcatva gata mānasam
bhṛśa anuraktaḥ medhāvī na bhaviṣyati lakṣmaṇaḥ
vinaṣṭau bhrātarau śrutvā bharataḥ pi mariṣyati

original: 5.011.026c bharataṃ ca mṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā śatrughno na bhaviṣyati
analyzed: bharatam ca mṛtam dṛṣṭvā śatrughnaḥ na bhaviṣyati

original: 5.011.027a putrān mṛtān samīkṣyātha na bhaviṣyanti mātaraḥ
analyzed: putrān mṛtān samīkṣya atha na bhaviṣyanti mātaraḥ

original: 5.011.027c kausalyā ca sumitrā ca kaikeyī ca na saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: kausalyā ca sumitrā ca kaikeyī ca na saṃśayaḥ
kṛtajñaḥ satya saṃdhaḥ ca sugrīvaḥ plavaga adhipaḥ

original: 5.011.028c rāmaṃ tathā gataṃ dṛṣṭvā tatas tyakṣyanti jīvitam
analyzed: rāmam tathā gatam dṛṣṭvā tatas tyakṣyanti jīvitam
durmanāḥ vyathitā dīnā nirānandā tapasvinī
pīḍitā bhartṛ śokena rumā tyakṣyati jīvitam
vāli jena tu duḥkhena pīḍitā śoka karśitā
pañcatva gamane rājñaḥ tārā api na bhaviṣyati
mātā pitroḥ vināśena sugrīva vyasanena ca
kumāraḥ pi aṅgadaḥ kasmāt dhārayiṣyati jīvitam
bhartṛ jena tu śokena abhibhūtāḥ vanaukasaḥ

original: 5.011.032c śirāṃsy abhihaniṣyanti talair muṣṭibhir eva ca
analyzed: śirāṃsi abhihaniṣyanti talaiḥ muṣṭibhiḥ eva ca
sāntvena anupradānena mānena ca yaśasvinā
lālitāḥ kapi rājena prāṇān tyakṣyanti vānarāḥ

original: 5.011.034a na vaneṣu na śaileṣu na nirodheṣu vā punaḥ
analyzed: na vaneṣu na śaileṣu na nirodheṣu vā punar
krīḍām anubhaviṣyanti sametya kapi kuñjarāḥ
sa putra dārāḥ sa amātyāḥ bhartṛ vyasana pīḍitāḥ
śaila agrebhyaḥ patiṣyanti sametya viṣameṣu ca

original: 5.011.036a viṣam udbandhanaṃ vāpi praveśaṃ jvalanasya vā
analyzed: viṣam udbandhanam vā api praveśam jvalanasya vā
upavāsam atho śastram pracariṣyanti vānarāḥ

original: 5.011.037a ghoram ārodanaṃ manye gate mayi bhaviṣyati
analyzed: ghoram ārodanam manye gate mayi bhaviṣyati
ikṣvāku kula nāśaḥ ca nāśaḥ ca eva vanaukasām

original: 5.011.038a so 'haṃ naiva gamiṣyāmi kiṣkindhāṃ nagarīm itaḥ
analyzed: saḥ ham nā eva gamiṣyāmi kiṣkindhām nagarīm itas

original: 5.011.038c na hi śakṣyāmy ahaṃ draṣṭuṃ sugrīvaṃ maithilīṃ vinā
analyzed: na hi śakṣyāmi aham draṣṭum sugrīvam maithilīm vinā
mayi agacchati ca ihasthe dharma ātmānau mahā rathau

original: 5.011.039c āśayā tau dhariṣyete vanarāś ca manasvinaḥ
analyzed: āśayā tau dhariṣyete vanarāḥ ca manasvinaḥ
vānaprasthaḥ bhaviṣyāmi a dṛṣṭvā janakātmajām
sāgara anūpa je deśe bahu mūla phala udake
citām kṛtvā pravekṣyāmi samiddham araṇī sutam
upaviṣṭasya vā samyak liṅginam sādhayiṣyataḥ
śarīram bhakṣayiṣyanti vāyasāḥ śvāpadāni ca

original: 5.011.043a idam apy ṛṣibhir dṛṣṭaṃ niryāṇam iti me matiḥ
analyzed: idam api ṛṣibhiḥ dṛṣṭam niryāṇam iti me matiḥ

original: 5.011.043c samyag āpaḥ pravekṣyāmi na cet paśyāmi jānakīm
analyzed: samyak āpaḥ pravekṣyāmi na ced paśyāmi jānakīm
prabhagnā cira rātrī iyam mama sītām a paśyataḥ
tāpasaḥ vā bhaviṣyāmi niyataḥ vṛkṣamūlikaḥ
na itas pratigamiṣyāmi tām a dṛṣṭvā asita īkṣaṇām
yadi itas pratigacchāmi sītām an adhigamya tām

original: 5.011.046c aṅgadaḥ sahitaiḥ sarvair vānarair na bhaviṣyati
analyzed: aṅgadaḥ sahitaiḥ sarvaiḥ vānaraiḥ na bhaviṣyati

original: 5.011.047a vināśe bahavo doṣā jīvan prāpnoti bhadrakam
analyzed: vināśe bahavaḥ doṣāḥ jīvan prāpnoti bhadrakam

original: 5.011.047c tasmāt prāṇān dhariṣyāmi dhruvo jīvati saṃgamaḥ
analyzed: tasmāt prāṇān dhariṣyāmi dhruvaḥ jīvati saṃgamaḥ

original: 5.011.048a evaṃ bahuvidhaṃ duḥkhaṃ manasā dhārayan muhuḥ
analyzed: evam bahuvidham duḥkham manasā dhārayan muhur
na adhyagacchat tadā pāram śokasya kapi kuñjaraḥ
rāvaṇam vā vadhiṣyāmi daśagrīvam mahā balam

original: 5.011.049c kāmam astu hṛtā sītā pratyācīrṇaṃ bhaviṣyati
analyzed: kāmam astu hṛtā sītā pratyācīrṇam bhaviṣyati
athavā enam samutkṣipya upari upari sāgaram
rāmāya upahariṣyāmi paśum paśupateḥ iva

original: 5.011.051a iti cintā samāpannaḥ sītām anadhigamya tām
analyzed: iti cintā samāpannaḥ sītām an adhigamya tām
dhyāna śokā parīta ātmā cintayām āsa vānaraḥ

original: 5.011.052a yāvat sītāṃ na paśyāmi rāmapatnīṃ yaśasvinīm
analyzed: yāvat sītām na paśyāmi rāma patnīm yaśasvinīm

original: 5.011.052c tāvad etāṃ purīṃ laṅkāṃ vicinomi punaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: tāvat etām purīm laṅkām vicinomi punar punar

original: 5.011.053a saṃpāti vacanāc cāpi rāmaṃ yady ānayāmy aham
analyzed: saṃpāti vacanāt ca api rāmam yadi ānayāmi aham
apaśyān rāghavaḥ bhāryām nirdahet sarva vānarān
iha eva niyata āhāraḥ vatsyāmi niyata indriyaḥ

original: 5.011.054c na matkṛte vinaśyeyuḥ sarve te naravānarāḥ
analyzed: na mad kṛte vinaśyeyuḥ sarve te nara vānarāḥ
aśoka vanikā ca api mahatī iyam mahā drumā

original: 5.011.055c imām abhigamiṣyāmi na hīyaṃ vicitā mayā
analyzed: imām abhigamiṣyāmi na hi iyam vicitā mayā

original: 5.011.056a vasūn rudrāṃs tathādityān aśvinau maruto 'pi ca
analyzed: vasūn rudrān tathā ādityān aśvinau marutaḥ ca
namaskṛtvā gamiṣyāmi rakṣasām śoka vardhanaḥ
jitvā tu rākṣasān devīm ikṣvāku kula nandinīm
saṃpradāsyāmi rāmāyāḥ yathā siddhim tapasvine
sa muhūrtam iva dhyātvā cintā vigrathita indriyaḥ
udatiṣṭhat mahā bāhuḥ hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
namaḥ stu rāmāya sa lakṣmaṇāya
devyai ca tasyai janakātmajāyai
namaḥ stu rudra indra yama anilebhyaḥ
namaḥ stu candra arka marut gaṇebhyaḥ

original: 5.011.060a sa tebhyas tu namaskṛtvā sugrīvāya ca mārutiḥ
analyzed: sa tebhyaḥ tu namaskṛtvā sugrīvāya ca mārutiḥ
diśaḥ sarvāḥ samālokya aśoka vanikām prati

original: 5.011.061a sa gatvā manasā pūrvam aśokavanikāṃ śubhām
analyzed: sa gatvā manasā pūrvam aśoka vanikām śubhām
uttaram cintayām āsa vānaraḥ mārutātmajaḥ
dhruvam tu rakṣaḥ bahulā bhaviṣyati vana ākulā
aśoka vanikā cintyā sarva saṃskāra saṃskṛtā

original: 5.011.063a rakṣiṇaś cātra vihitā nūnaṃ rakṣanti pādapān
analyzed: rakṣiṇaḥ ca atra vihitāḥ nūnam rakṣanti pādapān
bhagavān api sarva ātmā na atikṣobham pravāyati

original: 5.011.064a saṃkṣipto 'yaṃ mayātmā ca rāmārthe rāvaṇasya ca
analyzed: saṃkṣiptaḥ yam mayā ātmā ca rāma arthe rāvaṇasya ca

original: 5.011.064c siddhiṃ me saṃvidhāsyanti devāḥ sarṣigaṇās tv iha
analyzed: siddhim me saṃvidhāsyanti devāḥ sa ṛṣi gaṇāḥ tu iha

original: 5.011.065a brahmā svayambhūr bhagavān devāś caiva diśantu me
analyzed: brahmā svayambhūḥ bhagavān devāḥ ca eva diśantu me

original: 5.011.065c siddhim agniś ca vāyuś ca puruhūtaś ca vajradhṛt
analyzed: siddhim agniḥ ca vāyuḥ ca puruhūtaḥ ca vajra dhṛt

original: 5.011.066a varuṇaḥ pāśahastaś ca somādityai tathaiva ca
analyzed: varuṇaḥ pāśa hastaḥ ca soma adityai tathā eva ca

original: 5.011.066c aśvinau ca mahātmānau marutaḥ sarva eva ca
analyzed: aśvinau ca mahātmānau marutaḥ sarve eva ca

original: 5.011.067a siddhiṃ sarvāṇi bhūtāni bhūtānāṃ caiva yaḥ prabhuḥ
analyzed: siddhim sarvāṇi bhūtāni bhūtānām ca eva yaḥ prabhuḥ

original: 5.011.067c dāsyanti mama ye cānye adṛṣṭāḥ pathi gocarāḥ
analyzed: dāsyanti mama ye ca anye adṛṣṭāḥ pathi gocarāḥ
tat unnasam pāṇḍura dantam avraṇam
śuci smitam padma palāśa locanam

original: 5.011.068c drakṣye tad āryāvadanaṃ kadā nv ahaṃ;
analyzed: drakṣye tat āryā vadanam kadā nu aham
prasanna tārādhipa tulya darśanam
kṣudreṇa pāpena nṛśaṃsa karmaṇā
su dāruṇa alāṃkṛta veṣa dhāriṇā
bala abhibhūtā abalā tapasvinī

original: kathaṃ nu me dṛṣṭapathe 'dya sā bhavet
analyzed: katham nu me dṛṣṭa pathe sā bhavet

original: 5.012.001a sa muhūrtam iva dhyatvā manasā cādhigamya tām
analyzed: sa muhūrtam iva dhya tvā manasā ca adhigamya tām
avaplutaḥ mahā tejāḥ prākāram tasya veśmanaḥ
sa tu saṃhṛṣṭa sarva aṅgaḥ prākāra sthaḥ mahā kapiḥ
puṣpita agrān vasanta ādau dadarśa vividhān drumān

original: 5.012.003a sālān aśokān bhavyāṃś ca campakāṃś ca supuṣpitān
analyzed: sālān aśokān bhavyān ca campakān ca su puṣpitān
uddālakān nāgavṛkṣān cūtān kapi mukhān api
atha āmravaṇa saṃchannām latā śata samāvṛtām
jyā muktaḥ iva nārācaḥ pupluve vṛkṣa vāṭikām

original: 5.012.005a sa praviṣya vicitrāṃ tāṃ vihagair abhināditām
analyzed: sa praviṣya vicitrām tām vihagaiḥ abhināditām
rājataiḥ kāñcanaiḥ ca eva pādapaiḥ sarvatas vṛtām
vihagaiḥ mṛga saṃghaiḥ ca vicitrām citra kānanām
udita āditya saṃkāśām dadarśa hanumān kapiḥ
vṛtām nānāvidhaiḥ vṛkṣaiḥ puṣpa upaga phala upagaiḥ
kokilaiḥ bhṛṅgarājaiḥ ca mattaiḥ nitya niṣevitām
prahṛṣṭa manuje kale mṛga pakṣi samākule
matta barhiṇa saṃghuṣṭām nānā dvija gaṇa āyutām
mārgamāṇaḥ varārohām rāja putrīm aninditām
sukha prasuptān vihagān bodhayām āsa vānaraḥ
utpatadbhiḥ dvija gaṇaiḥ pakṣaiḥ sālāḥ samāhatāḥ
aneka varṇāḥ vividhāḥ mumucuḥ puṣpa vṛṣṭayaḥ
puṣpa avakīrṇaḥ śuśubhe hanumān mārutātmajaḥ
aśoka vanikā madhye yathā puṣpa mayaḥ giriḥ
diśaḥ vṛkṣa ṣaṇḍa gatam kapim

original: 5.012.012c dṛṣṭvā sarvāṇi bhūtāni vasanta iti menire
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā sarvāṇi bhūtāni vasantaḥ iti menire
vṛkṣebhyaḥ patitaiḥ puṣpaiḥ avakīrṇā pṛthagvidhaiḥ
rarāja vasudhā tatra pramadā iva vibhūṣitā
tarasvinā te taravaḥ tarasā abhiprakampitāḥ
kusumāni vicitrāṇi sasṛjuḥ kapinā tadā
nirdhūta patra śikharāḥ śīrṇa puṣpa phala drumāḥ
nikṣipta vastra ābharaṇāḥ dhūrtāḥ iva parājitāḥ
hanūmatā vegavatā kampitāḥ te naga uttamāḥ
puṣpa parṇa phalāni āśu mumucuḥ puṣpa śālinaḥ
vihaṃga saṃghaiḥ hīnāḥ te skandha mātra āśrayāḥ drumāḥ
babhūvuḥ agamāḥ sarve mārutena iva nirdhutāḥ
vidhūta keśī yuvatiḥ yathā mṛdita varṇikā
niṣpīta śubha danta oṣṭhī nakhaiḥ dantaiḥ ca vikṣatā

original: 5.012.019a tathā lāṅgūlahastaiś ca caraṇābhyāṃ ca marditā
analyzed: tathā lāṅgūla hastaiḥ ca caraṇābhyām ca marditā
babhūva aśoka vanikā prabhagna vara pādapā
mahā latānām dāmāni vyadhamat tarasā kapiḥ
yathā prāvṛṣi vindhyasya megha jālāni mārutaḥ

original: 5.012.021a sa tatra maṇibhūmīś ca rājatīś ca manoramāḥ
analyzed: sa tatra maṇi bhūmīḥ ca rājatīḥ ca manoramāḥ

original: 5.012.021c tathā kāñcanabhūmīś ca vicaran dadṛśe kapiḥ
analyzed: tathā kāñcana bhūmīḥ ca vicaran dadṛśe kapiḥ
vāpīḥ ca vividha ākārāḥ pūrṇāḥ parama vāriṇā
mahārhaiḥ maṇi sopānaiḥ upapannāḥ tatas tatas
kāñcanaiḥ tarubhiḥ citraiḥ tīrajaiḥ upaśobhitāḥ
phulla padma utpala vanāḥ cakravāka upakūjitāḥ
natyūha ruta saṃghuṣṭāḥ haṃsa sārasa nāditāḥ
dīrghābhiḥ druma yuktābhiḥ saridbhiḥ ca samantataḥ
amṛta upama toyābhiḥ śivābhiḥ upasaṃskṛtāḥ
latā śataiḥ avatatāḥ santānaka samāvṛtāḥ
nānā gulma āvṛta vanāḥ karavīra kṛta āntarāḥ
tatas mbudhara saṃkāśam pravṛddha śikharam girim
vicitra kūṭam kūṭaiḥ ca sarvatas parivāritam
śilāgṛhaiḥ avatatam nānā vṛkṣaiḥ samāvṛtam
dadarśa kapi śārdūlaḥ ramyam jagati parvatam

original: 5.012.029a dadarśa ca nagāt tasmān nadīṃ nipatitāṃ kapiḥ
analyzed: dadarśa ca nagāt tasmāt nadīm nipatitām kapiḥ

original: 5.012.029c aṅkād iva samutpatya priyasya patitāṃ priyām
analyzed: aṅkāt iva samutpatya priyasya patitām priyām
jale nipatita agraiḥ ca pādapaiḥ upaśobhitām
vāryamāṇām iva kruddhām pramadām priya bandhubhiḥ

original: 5.012.031a punar āvṛttatoyāṃ ca dadarśa sa mahākapiḥ
analyzed: punar āvṛtta toyām ca dadarśa sa mahā kapiḥ

original: 5.012.031c prasannām iva kāntasya kāntāṃ punar upasthitām
analyzed: prasannām iva kāntasya kāntām punar upasthitām
tasya adūrāt sa padminyaḥ nānā dvija gaṇa āyutāḥ
dadarśa kapi śārdūlaḥ hanumān mārutātmajaḥ

original: 5.012.033a kṛtrimāṃ dīrghikāṃ cāpi pūrṇāṃ śītena vāriṇā
analyzed: kṛtrimām dīrghikām ca api pūrṇām śītena vāriṇā
maṇi pravara sopānām muktā sikatā śobhitām
vividhaiḥ mṛga saṃghaiḥ ca vicitrām citra kānanām
prāsādaiḥ su mahadbhiḥ ca nirmitaiḥ viśvakarmaṇā
kānanaiḥ kṛtrimaiḥ ca api sarvatas samalaṃkṛtām

original: 5.012.035a ye ke cit pādapās tatra puṣpopagaphalopagāḥ
analyzed: ye ke cit pādapāḥ tatra puṣpa upaga phala upagāḥ
sa chatrāḥ savitardīkāḥ sarve sauvarṇa vedikāḥ

original: 5.012.036a latāpratānair bahubhiḥ parṇaiś ca bahubhir vṛtām
analyzed: latā pratānaiḥ bahubhiḥ parṇaiḥ ca bahubhiḥ vṛtām

original: 5.012.036c kāñcanīṃ śiṃśupām ekāṃ dadarśa sa mahākapiḥ
analyzed: kāñcanīm śiṃśupām ekām dadarśa sa mahā kapiḥ
saḥ paśyat bhūmi bhāgān ca garta prasravaṇāni ca
suvarṇa vṛkṣān aparān dadarśa śikhi saṃnibhān

original: 5.012.038a teṣāṃ drumāṇāṃ prabhayā meror iva mahākapiḥ
analyzed: teṣām drumāṇām prabhayā meroḥ iva mahā kapiḥ
amanyata tadā vīraḥ kāñcanaḥ smi iti vānaraḥ

original: 5.012.039a tāṃ kāñcanais tarugaṇair mārutena ca vījitām
analyzed: tām kāñcanaiḥ taru gaṇaiḥ mārutena ca vījitām
kiṅkiṇī śata nirghoṣām dṛṣṭvā vismayam āgamat
su puṣpita agrām rucirām taruṇa aṅkura pallavām
tām āruhya mahā vegaḥ śiṃśapām parṇa saṃvṛtām
itas drakṣyāmi vaidehīm rāma darśana lālasām

original: 5.012.041c itaś cetaś ca duḥkhārtāṃ saṃpatantīṃ yadṛcchayā
analyzed: itas ca itas ca duḥkha ārtām saṃpatantīm yadṛcchayā
aśoka vanikā ca iyam dṛḍham ramyā durātmanaḥ

original: 5.012.042c campakaiś candanaiś cāpi bakulaiś ca vibhūṣitā
analyzed: campakaiḥ candanaiḥ ca api bakulaiḥ ca vibhūṣitā
iyam ca nalinī ramyā dvija saṃgha niṣevitā

original: 5.012.043c imāṃ sā rāmamahiṣī nūnam eṣyati jānakī
analyzed: imām sā rāma mahiṣī nūnam eṣyati jānakī

original: 5.012.044a sā rāma rāmamahiṣī rāghavasya priyā sadā
analyzed: sā rāma rāma mahiṣī rāghavasya priyā sadā
vana saṃcāra kuśalā nūnam eṣyati jānakī
atha vā mṛgaśāvākṣī vanasya asya vicakṣaṇā
vanam eṣyati sā ca iha rāma cintā anukarśitā
rāma śoka abhisaṃtaptā sā devī vāma locanā
vana vāsa ratā nityam eṣyate vana cāriṇī
vanecarāṇām satatam nūnam spṛhayate purā

original: 5.012.047c rāmasya dayitā bhāryā janakasya sutā satī
analyzed: rāmasya dayitā bhāryā janakasya sutā satī
saṃdhyā kāla manāḥ śyāmā dhruvam eṣyati jānakī
nadīm ca imām śiva jalām saṃdhyā arthe varavarṇinī
tasyāḥ ca api anurūpā iyam aśoka vanikā śubhā

original: 5.012.049c śubhā yā pārthivendrasya patnī rāmasya saṃmitā
analyzed: śubhā yā pārthiva indrasya patnī rāmasya saṃmitā
yadi jivati sā devī tārādhipa nibha ānanā
āgamiṣyati sā avaśyam imām śiva jalām nadīm
evam tu matvā hanumān mahātmā
pratīkṣamāṇaḥ manuja indra patnīm
avekṣamāṇaḥ ca dadarśa sarvam
su puṣpite parṇa ghane nilīnaḥ

original: 5.013.001a sa vīkṣamāṇas tatrastho mārgamāṇaś ca maithilīm
analyzed: sa vīkṣamāṇaḥ tatrasthaḥ mārgamāṇaḥ ca maithilīm

original: 5.013.001c avekṣamāṇaś ca mahīṃ sarvāṃ tām anvavaikṣata
analyzed: avekṣamāṇaḥ ca mahīm sarvām tām anvavaikṣata
ca pādapaiḥ upaśobhitām
divya gandha rasa upetām sarvatas samalaṃkṛtām
tām sa nandana saṃkāśām mṛga pakṣibhiḥ āvṛtām
harmya prāsāda saṃbādhām kokila ākula niḥsvanām
kāñcana utpala padmābhiḥ vāpībhiḥ upaśobhitām
bahu āsana kutha upetām bahu bhūmi gṛha āyutām
sarva ṛtu kusumaiḥ ramyaiḥ phalavadbhiḥ ca pādapaiḥ
puṣpitānām aśokānām śriyā sūrya udaya prabhām
pradīptām iva tatrasthaḥ mārutiḥ samudaikṣata
niṣpatra śākhām vihagaiḥ kriyamāṇām iva asakṛt
viniṣpatadbhiḥ śataśas citraiḥ puṣpa avataṃsakaiḥ
ā mūla puṣpa nicitaiḥ aśokaiḥ śoka nāśanaiḥ
puṣpa bhāra ati bhāraiḥ ca spṛśadbhiḥ iva medinīm
karṇikāraiḥ kusumitaiḥ kiṃśukaiḥ ca su puṣpitaiḥ

original: 5.013.008c sa deśaḥ prabhayā teṣāṃ pradīpta iva sarvataḥ
analyzed: sa deśaḥ prabhayā teṣām pradīptaḥ iva sarvatas
puṃnāgāḥ saptaparṇāḥ ca campaka uddālakāḥ tathā
vivṛddha mūlāḥ bahavaḥ śobhante sma su puṣpitāḥ

original: 5.013.010a śātakumbhanibhāḥ ke cit ke cid agniśikhopamāḥ
analyzed: śātakumbha nibhāḥ ke cit ke cit agni śikhā upamāḥ
nīlāñjana nibhāḥ ke cid tatra aśokāḥ sahasraśas
nandanam vividha udyānam citram caitraratham yathā

original: 5.013.011c ativṛttam ivācintyaṃ divyaṃ ramyaṃ śriyā vṛtam
analyzed: ativṛttam iva acintyam divyam ramyam śriyā vṛtam
dvitīyam iva ca ākāśam puṣpa jyotiḥ gaṇa āyutam
puṣpa ratna śataiḥ citram pañcamam sāgaram yathā
sarva ṛtu puṣpaiḥ nicitam pādapaiḥ madhu gandhibhiḥ
nānā ninādaiḥ udyānam ramyam mṛga gaṇaiḥ dvijaiḥ
aneka gandha pravaham puṇya gandham manoramam
śaila indram iva gandha āḍhyam dvitīyam gandhamādanam
aśoka vanikāyām tu tasyām vānara puṃgavaḥ
sa dadarśa avidūra stham caitya prāsādam ūrjitam
madhye stambha sahasreṇa sthitam kailāsa pāṇḍuram
pravāla kṛta sopānam tapta kāñcana vedikam

original: 5.013.017a muṣṇantam iva cakṣūṃṣi dyotamānam iva śriyā
analyzed: muṣṇantam iva cakṣūṃṣi dyotamānam iva śriyā
vimalam prāṃśu bhāva tvāt ullikhantam iva ambaram
tatas malina saṃvītām rākṣasībhiḥ samāvṛtām
upavāsa kṛśām dīnām niḥśvasāntīm punar punar
dadarśa śukla pakṣa ādau candra rekhām iva amalām
manda prakhyāyamānena rūpeṇa rucira prabhām
pinaddhām dhūma jālena śikhām iva vibhāvasoḥ
pītena ekena saṃvītām kliṣṭena uttama vāsasā
sa paṅkām analaṃkārām vipadmām iva padminīm
vrīḍitām duḥkha saṃtaptām parimlānām tapasvinīm
graheṇa aṅgārakeṇa eva pīḍitām iva rohiṇīm
aśru pūrṇa mukhīm dīnām kṛśām ananaśena ca
śoka dhyāna parām dīnām nityam duḥkha parāyaṇām
priyam janam a paśyantīm paśyantīm rākṣasī gaṇam
sva gaṇena mṛgīm hīnām śva gaṇa abhivṛtām iva
nīla nāga ābhayā veṇyā jaghanam gatayā ekayā
sukha arhām duḥkha saṃtaptām vyasanānām a kodivām

original: 5.013.025a tāṃ samīkṣya viśālākṣīm adhikaṃ malināṃ kṛśām
analyzed: tām samīkṣya viśāla akṣīm adhikam malinām kṛśām
tarkayām āsa sītā iti kāraṇaiḥ upapādibhiḥ
hriyamāṇā tadā tena rakṣasā kāmarūpiṇā

original: 5.013.026c yathārūpā hi dṛṣṭā vai tathārūpeyam aṅganā
analyzed: yathārūpā hi dṛṣṭā vai tathārūpā iyam aṅganā
pūrṇa candra ānanām su bhrūm cāru vṛtta payodharām

original: 5.013.027c kurvantīṃ prabhayā devīṃ sarvā vitimirā diśaḥ
analyzed: kurvantīm prabhayā devīm sarvāḥ vitimirāḥ diśaḥ
tām nīla keśīm bimba oṣṭhīm su madhyām su pratiṣṭhitām
sītām padma palāśa akṣīm manmathasya ratim yathā
iṣṭām sarvasya jagataḥ pūrṇa candra prabhām iva

original: 5.013.029c bhūmau sutanum āsīnāṃ niyatām iva tāpasīm
analyzed: bhūmau su tanum āsīnām niyatām iva tāpasīm
niḥśvāsa bahulām bhīrum bhujaga indra vadhūm iva
śoka jālena mahatā vitatena na rājatīm
saṃsaktām dhūma jālena śikhām iva vibhāvasoḥ

original: 5.013.031c tāṃ smṛtīm iva saṃdighdām ṛddhiṃ nipatitām iva
analyzed: tām smṛtīm iva saṃdighdām ṛddhim nipatitām iva

original: 5.013.032a vihatām iva ca śraddhām āśāṃ pratihatām iva
analyzed: vihatām iva ca śraddhām āśām pratihatām iva

original: 5.013.032c sopasargāṃ yathā siddhiṃ buddhiṃ sakaluṣām iva
analyzed: sa upasargām yathā siddhim buddhim sa kaluṣām iva
abhūtena apavādena kīrtim nipatitām iva
rāma uparodha vyathitām rakṣaḥ haraṇa karśitām
abalām mṛgaśāvākṣīm vīkṣamāṇām tatas tatas
vadanena aprasannena niḥśvasantīm punar punar
mala paṅka dharām dīnām maṇḍana arhām amaṇḍitām
prabhām nakṣatrarājasya kāla meghaiḥ iva āvṛtām

original: 5.013.036a tasya saṃdidihe buddhir muhuḥ sītāṃ nirīkṣya tu
analyzed: tasya saṃdidihe buddhiḥ muhur sītām nirīkṣya tu
āmnāyānām ayogena vidyām praśithilām iva
duḥkhena bubudhe sītām hanumān analaṃkṛtām
saṃskāreṇa yathā ahīnām vācam artha antaram gatām
tām samīkṣya viśāla akṣīm rāja putrīm aninditām
tarkayām āsa sītā iti kāraṇaiḥ upapādayan
vaidehyāḥ yāni ca aṅgeṣu tadā rāmaḥ nu akīrtayat
tāni ābharaṇa jālāni gātra śobhīni alakṣayat

original: 5.013.040a sukṛtau karṇaveṣṭau ca śvadaṃṣṭrau ca susaṃsthitau
analyzed: su kṛtau karṇa veṣṭau ca śva daṃṣṭrau ca su saṃsthitau
maṇi vidruma citrāṇi hasteṣu ābharaṇāni ca
śyāmāni cira yukta tvāt tathā saṃsthānavanti ca
tāni eva etāni manye ham yāni rāmaḥ

original: 5.013.042a tatra yāny avahīnāni tāny ahaṃ nopalakṣaye
analyzed: tatra yāni avahīnāni tāni aham na upalakṣaye

original: 5.013.042c yāny asyā nāvahīnāni tānīmāni na saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: yāni asyāḥ na avahīnāni tāni imāni na saṃśayaḥ

original: 5.013.043a pītaṃ kanakapaṭṭābhaṃ srastaṃ tad vasanaṃ śubham
analyzed: pītam kanaka paṭṭa ābham srastam tat vasanam śubham
uttarīyam naga āsaktam tadā dṛṣṭam plavaṃgamaiḥ
bhūṣaṇāni ca mukhyāni dṛṣṭāni dharaṇī tale
anayā eva apaviddhāni svanavanti mahānti ca
idam cira gṛhīta tvāt vasanam kliṣṭavattaram

original: 5.013.045c tathā hi nūnaṃ tad varṇaṃ tathā śrīmad yathetarat
analyzed: tathā hi nūnam tat varṇam tathā śrīmat yathā itarat
iyam kanaka varṇa aṅgī rāmasya mahiṣī priyā

original: 5.013.046c pranaṣṭāpi satī yasya manaso na praṇaśyati
analyzed: pranaṣṭā api satī yasya manasaḥ na praṇaśyati

original: 5.013.047a iyaṃ sā yat kṛte rāmaś caturbhiḥ paritapyate
analyzed: iyam sā yat kṛte rāmaḥ caturbhiḥ paritapyate
kāruṇyena ānṛśaṃsyena śokena madanena ca
strī pranaṣṭā iti kāruṇyāt āśritā iti ānṛśaṃsyataḥ

original: 5.013.048c patnī naṣṭeti śokena priyeti madanena ca
analyzed: patnī naṣṭā iti śokena priyā iti madanena ca
asyāḥ devyāḥ yathā rūpam aṅga pratyaṅga sauṣṭhavam
rāmasya ca yathārūpam tasya iyam asita īkṣaṇā

original: 5.013.050a asyā devyā manas tasmiṃs tasya cāsyāṃ pratiṣṭhitam
analyzed: asyāḥ devyāḥ manaḥ tasmin tasya ca asyām pratiṣṭhitam

original: 5.013.050c teneyaṃ sa ca dharmātmā muhūrtam api jīvati
analyzed: tena iyam sa ca dharma ātmā muhūrtam api jīvati

original: 5.013.051a duṣkaraṃ kurute rāmo ya imāṃ mattakāśinīm
analyzed: duṣkaram kurute rāmaḥ yaḥ imām mattakāśinīm

original: 5.013.051c sītāṃ vinā mahābāhur muhūrtam api jīvati
analyzed: sītām vinā mahā bāhuḥ muhūrtam api jīvati

original: 5.013.052a evaṃ sītāṃ tadā dṛṣṭvā hṛṣṭaḥ pavanasaṃbhavaḥ
analyzed: evam sītām tadā dṛṣṭvā hṛṣṭaḥ pavanasaṃbhavaḥ

original: 5.013.052c jagāma manasā rāmaṃ praśaśaṃsa ca taṃ prabhum
analyzed: jagāma manasā rāmam praśaśaṃsa ca tam prabhum

original: 5.014.001a praśasya tu praśastavyāṃ sītāṃ tāṃ haripuṃgavaḥ
analyzed: praśasya tu praśastavyām sītām tām hari puṃgavaḥ
guṇa abhirāmam rāmam ca punar cintā paraḥ bhavat
sa muhūrtam iva dhyātvā bāṣpa paryākula īkṣaṇaḥ

original: 5.014.002c sītām āśritya tejasvī hanumān vilalāpa ha
analyzed: sītām āśritya tejasvī hanumān vilalāpa ha
mānyā guru vinītasya lakṣmaṇasya guru priyā

original: 5.014.003c yadi sītāpi duḥkhārtā kālo hi duratikramaḥ
analyzed: yadi sītā api duḥkha ārtā kālaḥ hi duratikramaḥ
rāmasya vyavasāya jñāḥ lakṣmaṇasya ca dhīmataḥ
na atyartham kṣubhyate devī gaṅgā iva jaladāgame
tulya śīla vayaḥ vṛttām tulya abhijana lakṣaṇām
rāghavaḥ rhati vaidehīm tam ca iyam asita īkṣaṇā

original: 5.014.006a tāṃ dṛṣṭvā navahemābhāṃ lokakāntām iva śriyam
analyzed: tām dṛṣṭvā nava hema ābhām loka kāntām iva śriyam

original: 5.014.006c jagāma manasā rāmaṃ vacanaṃ cedam abravīt
analyzed: jagāma manasā rāmam vacanam ca idam abravīt

original: 5.014.007a asyā hetor viśālākṣyā hato vālī mahābalaḥ
analyzed: asyāḥ hetoḥ viśāla akṣyāḥ hataḥ vālī mahā balaḥ
rāvaṇa pratimaḥ vīrye kabandhaḥ ca nipātitaḥ

original: 5.014.008a virādhaś ca hataḥ saṃkhye rākṣaso bhīmavikramaḥ
analyzed: virādhaḥ ca hataḥ saṃkhye rākṣasaḥ bhīma vikramaḥ
vane rāmeṇa vikramya mahā indreṇa iva śambaraḥ
caturdaśa sahasrāṇi rakṣasām bhīma karmaṇām
nihatāni janasthāne śaraiḥ agni śikhā upamaiḥ

original: 5.014.010a kharaś ca nihataḥ saṃkhye triśirāś ca nipātitaḥ
analyzed: kharaḥ ca nihataḥ saṃkhye triśirāḥ ca nipātitaḥ
dūṣaṇaḥ ca mahā tejāḥ rāmeṇa vidita ātmanā
aiśvaryam vānarāṇām ca durlabham vāli pālitam
asyāḥ nimitte sugrīvaḥ prāptavān loka satkṛtam

original: 5.014.012a sāgaraś ca mayā krāntaḥ śrīmān nadanadīpatiḥ
analyzed: sāgaraḥ ca mayā krāntaḥ śrīmān nadanadīpatiḥ

original: 5.014.012c asyā hetor viśālākṣyāḥ purī ceyaṃ nirīkṣitā
analyzed: asyāḥ hetoḥ viśāla akṣyāḥ purī ca iyam nirīkṣitā
yadi rāmaḥ samudra antām medinīm parivartayet

original: 5.014.013c asyāḥ kṛte jagac cāpi yuktam ity eva me matiḥ
analyzed: asyāḥ kṛte jagat ca api yuktam iti eva me matiḥ

original: 5.014.014a rājyaṃ vā triṣu lokeṣu sītā vā janakātmajā
analyzed: rājyam vā triṣu lokeṣu sītā vā janakātmajā
trailokya rājyam sakalam sītāyāḥ na āpnuyāt kalām
iyam sā dharma śīlasya maithilasya mahātmanaḥ
sutā janaka rājasya sītā bhartṛ dṛḍha vratā
utthitāḥ medinīm bhittvā kṣetre halamukha kṣate
padma reṇu nibhaiḥ kīrṇā śubhaiḥ kedāra pāṃsubhiḥ
vikrāntasya ārya śīlasya saṃyugeṣu anivartinaḥ
snuṣā daśarathasya eṣā jyeṣṭhā rājñaḥ yaśasvinī
dharma jñasya kṛtajñasya rāmasya vidita ātmanaḥ

original: 5.014.018c iyaṃ sā dayitā bhāryā rākṣasī vaśam āgatā
analyzed: iyam sā dayitā bhāryā rākṣasī vaśam āgatā
sarvān bhogān parityajya bhartṛ sneha balāt kṛtā
a cintayitvā duḥkhāni praviṣṭāḥ nirjanam vanam
saṃtuṣṭā phala mūlena bhartṛ śuśrūṣaṇe ratā

original: 5.014.020c yā parāṃ bhajate prītiṃ vane 'pi bhavane yathā
analyzed: yā parām bhajate prītim vane bhavane yathā
sā iyam kanaka varṇa aṅgī nityam su smita bhāṣiṇī
sahate yātanām etām anarthānām a bhāginī

original: 5.014.022a imāṃ tu śīlasaṃpannāṃ draṣṭum icchati rāghavaḥ
analyzed: imām tu śīla saṃpannām draṣṭum icchati rāghavaḥ
rāvaṇena pramathitām prapām iva pipāsitaḥ

original: 5.014.023a asyā nūnaṃ punar lābhād rāghavaḥ prītim eṣyati
analyzed: asyāḥ nūnam punar lābhāt rāghavaḥ prītim eṣyati
rājā rājya paribhraṣṭaḥ punar prāpya iva medinīm
kāma bhogaiḥ parityaktāḥ hīnāḥ bandhu janena ca
dhārayati ātmanaḥ deham tad samāgama kāṅkṣiṇī
na eṣā paśyati rākṣasyaḥ na imān puṣpa phala drumān
ekastha hṛdayā nūnam rāmam eva anupaśyati

original: 5.014.026a bhartā nāma paraṃ nāryā bhūṣaṇaṃ bhūṣaṇād api
analyzed: bhartā nāma param nāryāḥ bhūṣaṇam bhūṣaṇāt api

original: 5.014.026c eṣā hi rahitā tena śobhanārhā na śobhate
analyzed: eṣā hi rahitā tena śobhana arhā na śobhate

original: 5.014.027a duṣkaraṃ kurute rāmo hīno yad anayā prabhuḥ
analyzed: duṣkaram kurute rāmaḥ hīnaḥ yat anayā prabhuḥ
dhārayati ātmanaḥ deham na duḥkhena avasīdati
imām asita keśāntām śatapatra nibha īkṣaṇām

original: 5.014.028c sukhārhāṃ duḥkhitāṃ dṛṣṭvā mamāpi vyathitaṃ manaḥ
analyzed: sukha arhām duḥkhitām dṛṣṭvā mama api vyathitam manaḥ
yā rakṣitā rāghava lakṣmaṇābhyām
sā rākṣasībhiḥ vikṛta īkṣaṇābhiḥ
saṃrakṣyate saṃprati vṛkṣa mūle
hima hata nalinī iva naṣṭa śobhā
vyasana paramparayā nipīḍyamānā
sahacara rahitā iva cakravākī
janakasutā kṛpaṇām daśām prapannā
asyāḥ hi puṣpa avanata agra śākhāḥ
śokam dṛḍham vai janayati aśokāḥ
hima vyapāyena ca mandaraśmiḥ
abhyutthitaḥ na eka sahasra raśmiḥ
iti evam artham kapiḥ anvavekṣya
sītā iyam iti eva niviṣṭa buddhiḥ
saṃśritya tasmin niṣasāda vṛkṣe
balī harīṇām ṛṣabhaḥ tarasvī
tatas kumuda ṣaṇḍa ābhaḥ nirmalam nirmalaḥ svayam

original: 5.015.001c prajagāma nabhaś candro haṃso nīlam ivodakam
analyzed: prajagāma nabhaḥ candraḥ haṃsaḥ nīlam iva udakam

original: 5.015.002a sācivyam iva kurvan sa prabhayā nirmalaprabhaḥ
analyzed: sācivyam iva kurvan sa prabhayā nirmala prabhaḥ
candramāḥ raśmibhiḥ śītaiḥ siṣeve pavanātmajam
sa dadarśa tatas sītām pūrṇa candra nibha ānanām

original: 5.015.003c śokabhārair iva nyastāṃ bhārair nāvam ivāmbhasi
analyzed: śoka bhāraiḥ iva nyastām bhāraiḥ nāvam iva ambhasi
didṛkṣamāṇaḥ vaidehīm hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
sa dadarśa avidūra sthāḥ rākṣasīḥ ghora darśanāḥ
eka akṣīm eka karṇām ca karṇa prāvaraṇām tathā
akarṇām śaṅku karṇām ca mastaka ucchvāsa nāsikām
atikāya uttama aṅgīm ca tanu dīrgha śirodharām
dhvasta keśīm tathā akeśīm keśa kambala dhāriṇīm
lamba karṇa lalāṭām ca lamba udara payodharām
lamba oṣṭhīm cibuka oṣṭhīm ca lamba āsyām lamba jānukām

original: 5.015.008a hrasvāṃ dīrghāṃ ca kubjāṃ ca vikaṭāṃ vāmanāṃ tathā
analyzed: hrasvām dīrghām ca kubjām ca vikaṭām vāmanām tathā
karālām bhugna vastrām ca piṅga akṣīm vikṛta ānanām
vikṛtāḥ piṅgalāḥ krodhanāḥ kalaha priyāḥ
kālāyasa mahā śūla kūṭamudgara dhāriṇīḥ
varāha mṛga śārdūla mahiṣa aja śivāḥ mukhāḥ
gaja uṣṭra haya pādāḥ ca parāḥ
eka hasta eka pādāḥ ca kharakarṇi aśva karṇikāḥ
gokarṇīḥ hastikarṇīḥ ca harikarṇīḥ tathā aparāḥ

original: 5.015.012a anāsā atināsāś ca tiryan nāsā vināsikāḥ
analyzed: anāsāḥ atināsāḥ ca tiryat nāsāḥ vināsikāḥ
gaja saṃnibha nāsāḥ ca lalāṭa ucchvāsa nāsikāḥ
hasti pādāḥ mahā pādāḥ go pādāḥ pāda cūlikāḥ
atimātra śiraḥ grīvāḥ atimātra kuca udarīḥ
atimātra asya netrāḥ ca dīrgha jihvā nakhāḥ tathā
ajā mukhīḥ hasti mukhīḥ go mukhīḥ sūkarī mukhīḥ
haya uṣṭra khara vaktrāḥ ca rākṣasīḥ ghora darśanāḥ
śūla mudgara hastāḥ ca krodhanāḥ kalaha priyāḥ
karālāḥ dhūmra keśīḥ ca rakṣasīḥ vikṛta ānanāḥ
pibantīḥ satatam pānam sadā māṃsa surā priyāḥ
māṃsa śoṇita digdha aṅgīḥ māṃsa śoṇita bhojanāḥ
tāḥ dadarśa kapi śreṣṭhaḥ roma harṣaṇa darśanāḥ
skandhavantam upāsīnāḥ parivārya vanaspatim

original: 5.015.018c tasyādhastāc ca tāṃ devīṃ rājaputrīm aninditām
analyzed: tasya adhastāt ca tām devīm rāja putrīm aninditām
āsa lakṣmīvān hanūmām janakātmajām
niṣprabhām śoka saṃtaptām mala saṃkula mūrdhajām

original: 5.015.020a kṣīṇapuṇyāṃ cyutāṃ bhūmau tārāṃ nipatitām iva
analyzed: kṣīṇa puṇyām cyutām bhūmau tārām nipatitām iva
cāritrya vyapadeśa āḍhyām bhartṛ darśana durgatām
bhūṣaṇaiḥ uttamaiḥ hīnām bhartṛ vātsalya bhūṣitām
rākṣasa adhipa saṃruddhām bandhubhiḥ ca vinākṛtām
viyūthām siṃha saṃruddhām baddhām gaja vadhūm iva
candralekhām payoda ante śārada abhraiḥ iva āvṛtām
kliṣṭa rūpām asaṃsparśāt ayuktām iva vallakīm

original: 5.015.023c sītāṃ bhartṛhite yuktām ayuktāṃ rakṣasāṃ vaśe
analyzed: sītām bhartṛ hite yuktām a yuktām rakṣasām vaśe
aśoka vanikā madhye śoka sāgaram āplutām

original: 5.015.024c tābhiḥ parivṛtāṃ tatra sagrahām iva rohiṇīm
analyzed: tābhiḥ parivṛtām tatra sa grahām iva rohiṇīm

original: 5.015.025a dadarśa hanumān devīṃ latām akusumām iva
analyzed: dadarśa hanumān devīm latām akusumām iva

original: 5.015.025c sā malena ca digdhāṅgī vapuṣā cāpy alaṃkṛtā
analyzed: sā malena ca digdha aṅgī vapuṣā ca api alaṃkṛtā

original: 5.015.026a mṛṇālī paṅkadighdeva vibhāti ca na bhāti ca
analyzed: mṛṇālī paṅka dighdā iva vibhāti ca na bhāti ca
malinena tu vastreṇa parikliṣṭena bhāminīm
saṃvṛtām mṛgaśāvākṣīm dadarśa hanumān kapiḥ
tām devīm dīna vadanām adīnām bhartṛ tejasā
rakṣitām svena śīlena sītām asita locanām
tām dṛṣṭvā hanumān sītām mṛga śāva nibha īkṣaṇām
mṛga kanyām iva trastām vīkṣamāṇām samantataḥ
dahantīm iva niḥśvāsaiḥ vṛkṣān pallava dhāriṇaḥ
saṃghātam iva śokānām duḥkhasya ūrmim iva utthitām
tām kṣāmām suvibhakta aṅgīm vinā ābharaṇa śobhinīm

original: 5.015.031a praharṣam atulaṃ lebhe mārutiḥ prekṣya maithilīm
analyzed: praharṣam atulam lebhe mārutiḥ prekṣya maithilīm

original: 5.015.031c harṣajāni ca so 'śrūṇi tāṃ dṛṣṭvā madirekṣaṇām
analyzed: harṣa jāni ca tām dṛṣṭvā madirā īkṣaṇām

original: 5.015.032a mumoca hanumāṃs tatra namaś cakre ca rāghavam
analyzed: mumoca hanumān tatra namaḥ cakre ca rāghavam

original: 5.015.032c namaskṛtvā ca rāmāya lakṣmaṇāya ca vīryavān
analyzed: namaskṛtvā ca rāmāya lakṣmaṇāya ca vīryavān
sītā darśana saṃhṛṣṭaḥ hanūmān saṃvṛtaḥ bhavat
tathā viprekṣamāṇasya vanam puṣpita pādapam

original: 5.016.001c vicinvataś ca vaidehīṃ kiṃ cic cheṣā niśābhavat
analyzed: vicinvataḥ ca vaidehīm kim cit śeṣā niśā abhavat
ṣaṣ aṅga veda viduṣām kratu pravara yājinām
śuśrāva brahmaghoṣān ca virātre brahmarakṣasām
atha maṅgala vāditraiḥ śabdaiḥ śrotra manoharaiḥ
prābodhyata mahā bāhuḥ daśagrīvaḥ mahā balaḥ
vibudhya tu yathākālam rākṣasa indraḥ pratāvapān
srasta mālya ambara dharaḥ vaidehīm anvacintayat

original: 5.016.005a bhṛśaṃ niyuktas tasyāṃ ca madanena madotkaṭaḥ
analyzed: bhṛśam niyuktaḥ tasyām ca madanena mada utkaṭaḥ

original: 5.016.005c na sa taṃ rākṣasaḥ kāmaṃ śaśākātmani gūhitum
analyzed: na sa tam rākṣasaḥ kāmam śaśāka ātmani gūhitum

original: 5.016.006a sa sarvābharaṇair yukto bibhrac chriyam anuttamām
analyzed: sa sarva ābharaṇaiḥ yuktaḥ bibhrat śriyam anuttamām
tām nagaiḥ vividhaiḥ juṣṭām sarva puṣpa phala upagaiḥ
vṛtām puṣkariṇībhiḥ ca nānā puṣpa upaśobhitām
sadāmadaiḥ ca vihagaiḥ vicitrām parama adbhutām
īhāmṛgaiḥ ca vividhaiḥ vṛtām dṛṣṭi manoharaiḥ
vīthīḥ saṃprekṣamāṇaḥ ca maṇi kāñcana toraṇāḥ
nānā mṛga gaṇa ākīrṇām phalaiḥ prapatitaiḥ vṛtām
aśoka vanikām eva prāviśat saṃtata drumām
aṅganā śata mātram tu tam vrajantam anuvrajat
mahā indram iva paulastyam devagandharva yoṣitaḥ

original: 5.016.011a dīpikāḥ kāñcanīḥ kāś cij jagṛhus tatra yoṣitaḥ
analyzed: dīpikāḥ kāñcanīḥ kāḥ cit jagṛhuḥ tatra yoṣitaḥ
bāla vyajana hastāḥ ca tālavṛntāni ca aparāḥ

original: 5.016.012a kāñcanair api bhṛṅgārair jahruḥ salilam agrataḥ
analyzed: kāñcanaiḥ api bhṛṅgāraiḥ jahruḥ salilam agratas

original: 5.016.012c maṇḍalāgrān asīṃś caiva gṛhyānyāḥ pṛṣṭhato yayuḥ
analyzed: maṇḍala agrān asīn ca eva gṛhya anyāḥ pṛṣṭhatas yayuḥ

original: 5.016.013a kā cid ratnamayīṃ pātrīṃ pūrṇāṃ pānasya bhāminī
analyzed: kā cit ratna mayīm pātrīm pūrṇām pānasya bhāminī
dakṣiṇā dakṣiṇena eva tadā jagrāha pāṇinā
rājahaṃsa pratīkāśam chatram pūrṇa śaśi prabham
sauvarṇa daṇḍam aparā gṛhītvā pṛṣṭhatas yayau
nidrā mada parīta akṣyaḥ rāvaṇasya uttama striyaḥ

original: 5.016.015c anujagmuḥ patiṃ vīraṃ ghanaṃ vidyullatā iva
analyzed: anujagmuḥ patim vīram ghanam vidyut latāḥ iva

original: 5.016.016a tataḥ kāñcīninādaṃ ca nūpurāṇāṃ ca niḥsvanam
analyzed: tatas kāñcī ninādam ca nūpurāṇām ca niḥsvanam
śuśrāva parama strīṇām sa kapiḥ mārutātmajaḥ
tam ca apratima karmāṇam acintya bala pauruṣam
dvāra deśam anuprāptam dadarśa hanumān kapiḥ
dīpikābhiḥ anekābhiḥ samantāt avabhāsitam
gandha taila avasiktābhiḥ dhriyamāṇābhiḥ agratas
kāma darpa madaiḥ yuktam jihma tāmra āyata īkṣaṇam
samakṣam iva kandarpam apaviddha śarāsanam
mathita amṛta phena ābham arajaḥ vastram uttamam
sa līlam anukarṣantam vimuktam saktam aṅgade
tam patra viṭape līnaḥ patra puṣpa ghana āvṛtaḥ
samīpam upasaṃkrāntam nidhyātum upacakrame
avekṣamāṇaḥ ca tatas dadarśa kapi kuñjaraḥ
rūpa yauvana saṃpannāḥ rāvaṇasya vara striyaḥ
tābhiḥ parivṛtaḥ rājā surūpābhiḥ mahā yaśāḥ
tat mṛga dvija saṃghuṣṭam praviṣṭaḥ pramadā vanam

original: 5.016.024c tena viśravasaḥ putraḥ sa dṛṣṭo rākṣasādhipaḥ
analyzed: tena viśravasaḥ putraḥ sa dṛṣṭaḥ rākṣasa adhipaḥ
vṛtaḥ parama nārībhiḥ tārābhiḥ iva candramāḥ
tam dadarśa mahā tejāḥ tejovantam mahā kapiḥ
rāvaṇaḥ yam mahā bāhuḥ iti saṃcintya vānaraḥ
avaplutaḥ mahā tejāḥ hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ

original: 5.016.027a sa tathāpy ugratejāḥ san nirdhūtas tasya tejasā
analyzed: sa tathā api ugra tejāḥ san nirdhūtaḥ tasya tejasā
patra guhya antare saktaḥ hanūmān saṃvṛtaḥ bhavat
sa tām asita keśāntām su śroṇīm saṃhata stanīm
didṛkṣuḥ asitāpāṅgīm upāvartata rāvaṇaḥ

original: 5.017.001a tasminn eva tataḥ kāle rājaputrī tv aninditā
analyzed: tasmin eva tatas kāle rāja putrī tu aninditā
rūpa yauvana saṃpannam bhūṣaṇa uttama bhūṣitam
tatas dṛṣṭvā eva vaidehī rāvaṇam rākṣasa adhipam
prāvepata varārohā pravāte kadalī yathā

original: 5.017.003a ūrubhyām udaraṃ chādya bāhubhyāṃ ca payodharau
analyzed: ūrubhyām udaram chādya bāhubhyām ca payodharau
upaviṣṭā viśāla akṣī rudantī varavarṇinī
daśagrīvaḥ tu vaidehīm rakṣitām rākṣasī gaṇaiḥ

original: 5.017.004c dadarśa dīnāṃ duḥkhārtaṃ nāvaṃ sannām ivārṇave
analyzed: dadarśa dīnām duḥkha ārtam nāvam sannām iva arṇave
asaṃvṛtāyām āsīnām dharaṇyām saṃśita vratām

original: 5.017.005c chinnāṃ prapatitāṃ bhūmau śākhām iva vanaspateḥ
analyzed: chinnām prapatitām bhūmau śākhām iva vanaspateḥ
mala maṇḍana digdha aṅgīm maṇḍana arhām amaṇḍitām
samīpam rāja siṃhasya rāmasya vidita ātmanaḥ
saṃkalpa haya saṃyuktaiḥ yāntīm iva manorathaiḥ
śuṣyantīm rudatīm ekām dhyāna śoka parāyaṇām
duḥkhasya antam a paśyantīm rāmām rāmam anuvratām
veṣṭamānām atha āviṣṭām pannaga indra vadhūm iva
dhūpyamānām graheṇa iva rohiṇīm dhūmaketunā
vṛtta śīle kule jātām ācāravati dhārmike

original: 5.017.009c punaḥ saṃskāram āpannāṃ jātam iva ca duṣkule
analyzed: punar saṃskāram āpannām jātam iva ca duṣkule

original: 5.017.010a sannām iva mahākīrtiṃ śraddhām iva vimānitām
analyzed: sannām iva mahā kīrtim śraddhām iva vimānitām

original: 5.017.010c prajñām iva parikṣīṇām āśāṃ pratihatām iva
analyzed: prajñām iva parikṣīṇām āśām pratihatām iva

original: 5.017.011a āyatīm iva vidhvastām ājñāṃ pratihatām iva
analyzed: āyatīm iva vidhvastām ājñām pratihatām iva

original: 5.017.011c dīptām iva diśaṃ kāle pūjām apahṛtām iva
analyzed: dīptām iva diśam kāle pūjām apahṛtām iva

original: 5.017.012a padminīm iva vidhvastāṃ hataśūrāṃ camūm iva
analyzed: padminīm iva vidhvastām hata śūrām camūm iva
prabhām iva tapaḥ dhvastām upakṣīṇām iva āpagām

original: 5.017.013a vedīm iva parāmṛṣṭāṃ śāntām agniśikhām iva
analyzed: vedīm iva parāmṛṣṭām śāntām agni śikhām iva
paurṇamāsīm iva niśām rāhu grasta indu maṇḍalām
utkṛṣṭa parṇa kamalām vitrāsita vihaṃgamām
hasti hasta parāmṛṣṭām ākulām padminīm iva
pati śoka āturām śuṣkām nadīm visrāvitām iva

original: 5.017.015c parayā mṛjayā hīnāṃ kṛṣṇapakṣe niśām iva
analyzed: parayā mṛjayā hīnām kṛṣṇa pakṣe niśām iva
sukumārīm sujāta aṅgīm ratna garbhagṛha ucitām
tapyamānām iva uṣṇena mṛṇālīm acira uddhṛtām
stambhe yūthapena vinākṛtām
niḥśvasantīm su duḥkha ārtām gaja rāja vadhūm iva
ekayā dīrghayā veṇyā śobhamānām ayatnataḥ
nīlayā nīrada apāye vana rājyā mahīm iva

original: 5.017.019a upavāsena śokena dhyānena ca bhayena ca
analyzed: upavāsena śokena dhyānena ca bhayena ca
parikṣīṇām kṛśām dīnām alpa āhārām tapodhanām
āyācamānām duḥkha ārtām prāñjalim devatām iva
bhāvena raghu mukhyasya daśagrīva parābhavam
samīkṣamāṇām rudatīm aninditām
supakṣma tāmra āyata śukla locanām
anuvratām rāmam atīva maithilīm
pralobhayām āsa vadhāya rāvaṇaḥ

original: 5.018.001a sa tāṃ parivṛtāṃ dīnāṃ nirānandāṃ tapasvinīm
analyzed: sa tām parivṛtām dīnām nirānandām tapasvinīm
sa ākāraiḥ madhuraiḥ vākyaiḥ nyadarśayata rāvaṇaḥ
mām dṛṣṭvā nāga nāsā ūru gūhamānā stana udaram

original: 5.018.002c adarśanam ivātmānaṃ bhayān netuṃ tvam icchasi
analyzed: adarśanam iva ātmānam bhayāt netum tvam icchasi

original: 5.018.003a kāmaye tvāṃ viśālākṣi bahumanyasva māṃ priye
analyzed: kāmaye tvām viśāla akṣi bahu manyasva mām priye
sarva aṅga guṇa saṃpanne sarva loka manohare

original: 5.018.004a neha ke cin manuṣyā vā rākṣasāḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ
analyzed: na iha ke cit manuṣyāḥ vā rākṣasāḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ

original: 5.018.004c vyapasarpatu te sīte bhayaṃ mattaḥ samutthitam
analyzed: vyapasarpatu te sīte bhayam mattaḥ samutthitam

original: 5.018.005a svadharme rakṣasāṃ bhīru sarvathaiṣa na saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: svadharme rakṣasām bhīru sarvathā eṣa na saṃśayaḥ

original: 5.018.005c gamanaṃ vā parastrīṇāṃ haraṇaṃ saṃpramathya vā
analyzed: gamanam vā para strīṇām haraṇam saṃpramathya vā

original: 5.018.006a evaṃ caitad akāmāṃ ca na tvāṃ sprakṣyāmi maithili
analyzed: evam ca etat akāmām ca na tvām sprakṣyāmi maithili

original: 5.018.006c kāmaṃ kāmaḥ śarīre me yathākāmaṃ pravartatām
analyzed: kāmam kāmaḥ śarīre me yathākāmam pravartatām

original: 5.018.007a devi neha bhayaṃ kāryaṃ mayi viśvasihi priye
analyzed: devi na iha bhayam kāryam mayi viśvasihi priye

original: 5.018.007c praṇayasva ca tattvena maivaṃ bhūḥ śokalālasā
analyzed: praṇayasva ca tattvena mā evam bhūḥ śoka lālasā
eka veṇī dharā śayyā dhyānam malinam ambaram

original: 5.018.008c asthāne 'py upavāsaś ca naitāny aupayikāni te
analyzed: asthāne pi upavāsaḥ ca na etāni aupayikāni te

original: 5.018.009a vicitrāṇi ca mālyāni candanāny agarūṇi ca
analyzed: vicitrāṇi ca mālyāni candanāni agarūṇi ca

original: 5.018.009c vividhāni ca vāsāṃsi divyāny ābharaṇāni ca
analyzed: vividhāni ca vāsāṃsi divyāni ābharaṇāni ca

original: 5.018.010a mahārhāṇi ca pānāni yānāni śayanāni ca
analyzed: mahārhāṇi ca pānāni yānāni śayanāni ca

original: 5.018.010c gītaṃ nṛttaṃ ca vādyaṃ ca labha māṃ prāpya maithili
analyzed: gītam nṛttam ca vādyam ca labha mām prāpya maithili

original: 5.018.011a strīratnam asi maivaṃ bhūḥ kuru gātreṣu bhūṣaṇam
analyzed: strī ratnam asi mā evam bhūḥ kuru gātreṣu bhūṣaṇam

original: 5.018.011c māṃ prāpya tu kathaṃ hi syās tvam anarhā suvigrahe
analyzed: mām prāpya tu katham hi syāḥ tvam anarhā su vigrahe
idam te cāru saṃjātam yauvanam vyativartate

original: 5.018.012c yad atītaṃ punar naiti srotaḥ śīghram apām iva
analyzed: yat atītam punar na eti srotaḥ śīghram apām iva

original: 5.018.013a tvāṃ kṛtvoparato manye rūpakartā sa viśvakṛt
analyzed: tvām kṛtvā uparataḥ manye rūpa kartā sa viśva kṛt

original: 5.018.013c na hi rūpopamā tv anyā tavāsti śubhadarśane
analyzed: na hi rūpa upamā tu anyā tava asti śubha darśane
tvām samāsādya vaidehi rūpa yauvana śālinīm

original: 5.018.014c kaḥ pumān ativarteta sākṣād api pitāmahaḥ
analyzed: kaḥ pumān ativarteta sākṣāt api pitāmahaḥ

original: 5.018.015a yad yat paśyāmi te gātraṃ śītāṃśusadṛśānane
analyzed: yat yat paśyāmi te gātram śītāṃśu sadṛśa ānane

original: 5.018.015c tasmiṃs tasmin pṛthuśroṇi cakṣur mama nibadhyate
analyzed: tasmin tasmin pṛthu śroṇi cakṣuḥ mama nibadhyate

original: 5.018.016a bhava maithili bhāryā me moham enaṃ visarjaya
analyzed: bhava maithili bhāryā me moham enam visarjaya
bahvīnām uttama strīṇām mama agramahiṣī bhava
lokebhyaḥ yāni ratnāni saṃpramathya āhṛtāni me

original: 5.018.017c tāni te bhīru sarvāṇi rājyaṃ caitad ahaṃ ca te
analyzed: tāni te bhīru sarvāṇi rājyam ca etat aham ca te
vijitya pṛthivīm sarvām nānā nagara mālinīm
janakāya pradāsyāmi tava hetoḥ vilāsini

original: 5.018.019a neha paśyāmi loke 'nyaṃ yo me pratibalo bhavet
analyzed: na iha paśyāmi loke yaḥ me pratibalaḥ bhavet

original: 5.018.019c paśya me sumahad vīryam apratidvandvam āhave
analyzed: paśya me su mahat vīryam apratidvandvam āhave
asakṛt saṃyuge bhagnāḥ mayā vimṛdita dhvajāḥ
aśaktāḥ pratyanīkeṣu sthātum mama sura asurāḥ

original: 5.018.021a iccha māṃ kriyatām adya pratikarma tavottamam
analyzed: iccha mām kriyatām adya pratikarma tava uttamam
sa prabhāṇi avasajjantām tava aṅge bhūṣaṇāni ca

original: 5.018.021e sādhu paśyāmi te rūpaṃ saṃyuktaṃ pratikarmaṇā
analyzed: sādhu paśyāmi te rūpam saṃyuktam pratikarmaṇā
pratikarma abhisaṃyuktā dākṣiṇyena varānane

original: 5.018.022c bhuṅkṣva bhogān yathākāmaṃ piba bhīru ramasva ca
analyzed: bhuṅkṣva bhogān yathākāmam piba bhīru ramasva ca

original: 5.018.022e yatheṣṭaṃ ca prayaccha tvaṃ pṛthivīṃ vā dhanāni ca
analyzed: yathā iṣṭam ca prayaccha tvam pṛthivīm vā dhanāni ca

original: 5.018.023a lalasva mayi visrabdhā dhṛṣṭam ājñāpayasva ca
analyzed: lalasva mayi visrabdhā dhṛṣṭam ājñāpayasva ca

original: 5.018.023c matprabhāvāl lalantyāś ca lalantāṃ bāndhavās tava
analyzed: mad prabhāvāt lalantyāḥ ca lalantām bāndhavāḥ tava

original: 5.018.024a ṛddhiṃ mamānupaśya tvaṃ śriyaṃ bhadre yaśaś ca me
analyzed: ṛddhim mama anupaśya tvam śriyam bhadre yaśaḥ ca me
kim kariṣyasi rāmeṇa subhage cīra vāsasā
nikṣipta vijayaḥ rāmaḥ gata śrīḥ vana gocaraḥ

original: 5.018.025c vratī sthaṇḍilaśāyī ca śaṅke jīvati vā na vā
analyzed: vratī sthaṇḍilaśāyī ca śaṅke jīvati vā na vā

original: 5.018.026a na hi vaidehi rāmas tvāṃ draṣṭuṃ vāpy upalapsyate
analyzed: na hi vaidehi rāmaḥ tvām draṣṭum vā api upalapsyate

original: 5.018.026c puro balākair asitair meghair jyotsnām ivāvṛtām
analyzed: puras balākaiḥ asitaiḥ meghaiḥ jyotsnām iva āvṛtām

original: 5.018.027a na cāpi mama hastāt tvāṃ prāptum arhati rāghavaḥ
analyzed: na ca api mama hastāt tvām prāptum arhati rāghavaḥ
hiraṇyakaśipuḥ kīrtim indra hasta gatām iva
cāru smite cāru netre vilāsini

original: 5.018.028c mano harasi me bhīru suparṇaḥ pannagaṃ yathā
analyzed: manaḥ harasi me bhīru suparṇaḥ pannagam yathā
kliṣṭa kauśeya vasanām tanvīm api analaṃkṛtām

original: 5.018.029c tāṃ dṛṣṭvā sveṣu dāreṣu ratiṃ nopalabhāmy aham
analyzed: tām dṛṣṭvā sveṣu dāreṣu ratim na upalabhāmi aham
antaḥpura nivāsinyaḥ striyaḥ sarva guṇa anvitāḥ

original: 5.018.030c yāvantyo mama sarvāsām aiśvaryaṃ kuru jānaki
analyzed: yāvantyaḥ mama sarvāsām aiśvaryam kuru jānaki
mama hi asita keśānte trailokya pravarāḥ striyaḥ

original: 5.018.031c tās tvāṃ paricariṣyanti śriyam apsaraso yathā
analyzed: tāḥ tvām paricariṣyanti śriyam apsarasaḥ yathā

original: 5.018.032a yāni vaiśravaṇe subhru ratnāni ca dhanāni ca
analyzed: yāni vaiśravaṇe subhru ratnāni ca dhanāni ca

original: 5.018.032c tāni lokāṃś ca suśroṇi māṃ ca bhuṅkṣva yathāsukham
analyzed: tāni lokān ca su śroṇi mām ca bhuṅkṣva yathāsukham

original: 5.018.033a na rāmas tapasā devi na balena na vikramaiḥ
analyzed: na rāmaḥ tapasā devi na balena na vikramaiḥ

original: 5.018.033c na dhanena mayā tulyas tejasā yaśasāpi vā
analyzed: na dhanena mayā tulyaḥ tejasā yaśasā api vā
piba vihara ramasva bhuṅkṣva bhogān
dhana nicayam pradiśāmi medinīm ca
mayi lala lalane yathāsukham tvam

original: tvayi ca sametya lalantu bāndhavās te
analyzed: tvayi ca sametya lalantu bāndhavāḥ te
kusumita taru jāla saṃtatāni
bhramara yutāni samudra tīra jāni
kanaka vimala hāra bhūṣita aṅgī
vihara mayā saha bhīru kānanāni

original: 5.019.001a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā sītā raudrasya rakṣasaḥ
analyzed: tasya tat vacanam śrutvā sītā raudrasya rakṣasaḥ

original: 5.019.001c ārtā dīnasvarā dīnaṃ pratyuvāca śanair vacaḥ
analyzed: ārtā dīna svarā dīnam pratyuvāca śanais vacaḥ
duḥkha ārtā rudatī sītā vepamānā tapasvinī
cintayantī varārohā patim eva pativratā
tṛṇam antarataḥ kṛtvā pratyuvāca śuci smitā

original: 5.019.003c nivartaya mano mattaḥ svajane kriyatāṃ manaḥ
analyzed: nivartaya manaḥ mattaḥ sva jane kriyatām manaḥ

original: 5.019.004a na māṃ prārthayituṃ yuktas tvaṃ siddhim iva pāpakṛt
analyzed: na mām prārthayitum yuktaḥ tvam siddhim iva pāpa kṛt

original: 5.019.004c akāryaṃ na mayā kāryam ekapatnyā vigarhitam
analyzed: akāryam na mayā kāryam ekapatnyā vigarhitam

original: 5.019.004e kulaṃ saṃprāptayā puṇyaṃ kule mahati jātayā
analyzed: kulam saṃprāptayā puṇyam kule mahati jātayā

original: 5.019.005a evam uktvā tu vaidehī rāvaṇaṃ taṃ yaśasvinī
analyzed: evam uktvā tu vaidehī rāvaṇam tam yaśasvinī

original: 5.019.005c rākṣasaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtvā bhūyo vacanam abravīt
analyzed: rākṣasam pṛṣṭhatas kṛtvā bhūyas vacanam abravīt

original: 5.019.006a nāham aupayikī bhāryā parabhāryā satī tava
analyzed: na aham aupayikī bhāryā para bhāryā satī tava

original: 5.019.006c sādhu dharmam avekṣasva sādhu sādhuvrataṃ cara
analyzed: sādhu dharmam avekṣasva sādhu sādhu vratam cara

original: 5.019.007a yathā tava tathānyeṣāṃ rakṣyā dārā niśācara
analyzed: yathā tava tathā anyeṣām rakṣyāḥ dārāḥ niśācara

original: 5.019.007c ātmānam upamāṃ kṛtvā sveṣu dāreṣu ramyatām
analyzed: ātmānam upamām kṛtvā sveṣu dāreṣu ramyatām
atuṣṭam sveṣu dāreṣu capalam calita indriyam
nayanti nikṛti prajñām para dārāḥ parābhavam

original: 5.019.009a iha santo na vā santi sato vā nānuvartase
analyzed: iha santaḥ na vā santi sataḥ vā na anuvartase

original: 5.019.009c vaco mithyā praṇītātmā pathyam uktaṃ vicakṣaṇaiḥ
analyzed: vacaḥ mithyā praṇīta ātmā pathyam uktam vicakṣaṇaiḥ
akṛtātmānam āsādya rājānam anaye ratam
samṛddhāni vinaśyanti rāṣṭrāṇi nagarāṇi ca

original: 5.019.011a tatheyaṃ tvāṃ samāsādya laṅkā ratnaugha saṃkulā
analyzed: tathā iyam tvām samāsādya laṅkā ratna ogha saṃkulā
aparādhāt tava ekasya nacirāt vinaśiṣyati
sva kṛtaiḥ hanyamānasya rāvaṇa adīrgha darśinaḥ
abhinandanti bhūtāni vināśe pāpa karmaṇaḥ

original: 5.019.013a evaṃ tvāṃ pāpakarmāṇaṃ vakṣyanti nikṛtā janāḥ
analyzed: evam tvām pāpa karmāṇam vakṣyanti nikṛtāḥ janāḥ

original: 5.019.013c diṣṭyaitad vyasanaṃ prāpto raudra ity eva harṣitāḥ
analyzed: diṣṭyā etat vyasanam prāptaḥ raudraḥ iti eva harṣitāḥ

original: 5.019.014a śakyā lobhayituṃ nāham aiśvaryeṇa dhanena vā
analyzed: śakyā lobhayitum na aham aiśvaryeṇa dhanena vā
ananyā rāghaveṇa aham bhāskareṇa prabhā yathā
upadhāya bhujam tasya loka nāthasya satkṛtam

original: 5.019.015c kathaṃ nāmopadhāsyāmi bhujam anyasya kasya cit
analyzed: katham nāma upadhāsyāmi bhujam anyasya kasya cit
aham aupayikī bhāryā tasya eva vasudhā pateḥ
vrata snātasya viprasya vidyā iva vidita ātmanaḥ

original: 5.019.017a sādhu rāvaṇa rāmeṇa māṃ samānaya duḥkhitām
analyzed: sādhu rāvaṇa rāmeṇa mām samānaya duḥkhitām
vane vāśitayā sārdham kareṇvā iva gaja adhipam

original: 5.019.018a mitram aupayikaṃ kartuṃ rāmaḥ sthānaṃ parīpsatā
analyzed: mitram aupayikam kartum rāmaḥ sthānam parīpsatā
vadham ca an icchatā ghoram tvayā asau puruṣa ṛṣabhaḥ

original: 5.019.019a varjayed vajram utsṛṣṭaṃ varjayed antakaś ciram
analyzed: varjayet vajram utsṛṣṭam varjayet antakaḥ ciram

original: 5.019.019c tvadvidhaṃ na tu saṃkruddho lokanāthaḥ sa rāghavaḥ
analyzed: tvadvidham na tu saṃkruddhaḥ loka nāthaḥ sa rāghavaḥ

original: 5.019.020a rāmasya dhanuṣaḥ śabdaṃ śroṣyasi tvaṃ mahāsvanam
analyzed: rāmasya dhanuṣaḥ śabdam śroṣyasi tvam mahā svanam
śatakratu visṛṣṭasya nirghoṣam aśaneḥ iva
iha śīghram su parvāṇaḥ jvalita āsyāḥ iva uragāḥ
iṣavaḥ nipatiṣyanti rāma lakṣmaṇa lakṣaṇāḥ
rakṣāṃsi parinighnantaḥ puryām asyām samantataḥ
asaṃpātam kariṣyanti patantaḥ kaṅka vāsasaḥ
rākṣasa indra mahā sarpān sa rāma garuḍaḥ mahān
uddhariṣyati vegena vainateyaḥ iva uragān

original: 5.019.024a apaneṣyati māṃ bhartā tvattaḥ śīghram ariṃdamaḥ
analyzed: apaneṣyati mām bhartā tvattaḥ śīghram ariṃdamaḥ

original: 5.019.024c asurebhyaḥ śriyaṃ dīptāṃ viṣṇus tribhir iva kramaiḥ
analyzed: asurebhyaḥ śriyam dīptām viṣṇuḥ tribhiḥ iva kramaiḥ
janasthāne hata sthāne nihate rakṣasām bale

original: 5.019.025c aśaktena tvayā rakṣaḥ kṛtam etad asādhu vai
analyzed: aśaktena tvayā rakṣaḥ kṛtam etat asādhu vai

original: 5.019.026a āśramaṃ tu tayoḥ śūnyaṃ praviśya narasiṃhayoḥ
analyzed: āśramam tu tayoḥ śūnyam praviśya nara siṃhayoḥ
gocaram gatayoḥ bhrātroḥ apanītā tvayā adhama

original: 5.019.027a na hi gandham upāghrāya rāmalakṣmaṇayos tvayā
analyzed: na hi gandham upāghrāya rāma lakṣmaṇayoḥ tvayā

original: 5.019.027c śakyaṃ saṃdarśane sthātuṃ śunā śārdūlayor iva
analyzed: śakyam saṃdarśane sthātum śunā śārdūlayoḥ iva

original: 5.019.028a tasya te vigrahe tābhyāṃ yugagrahaṇam asthiram
analyzed: tasya te vigrahe tābhyām yuga grahaṇam asthiram
vṛtrasya iva indra bāhubhyām bāhoḥ ekasya nigrahaḥ

original: 5.019.029a kṣipraṃ tava sa nātho me rāmaḥ saumitriṇā saha
analyzed: kṣipram tava sa nāthaḥ me rāmaḥ saumitriṇā saha

original: 5.019.029c toyam alpam ivādityaḥ prāṇān ādāsyate śaraiḥ
analyzed: toyam alpam iva ādityaḥ prāṇān ādāsyate śaraiḥ
girim kuberasya thava ālayam
sabhām gataḥ vā varuṇasya rājñaḥ
asaṃśayam dāśaratheḥ na mokṣyase
mahā drumaḥ kāla hataḥ śaneḥ iva
sītāyāḥ vacanam śrutvā paruṣam rākṣasa adhipaḥ
pratyuvāca tatas sītām vipriyam priya darśanām

original: 5.020.002a yathā yathā sāntvayitā vaśyaḥ strīṇāṃ tathā tathā
analyzed: yathā yathā sāntvayitā vaśyaḥ strīṇām tathā tathā

original: 5.020.002c yathā yathā priyaṃ vaktā paribhūtas tathā tathā
analyzed: yathā yathā priyam vaktā paribhūtaḥ tathā tathā

original: 5.020.003a saṃniyacchati me krodhaṃ tvayi kāmaḥ samutthitaḥ
analyzed: saṃniyacchati me krodham tvayi kāmaḥ samutthitaḥ

original: 5.020.003c dravato mārgam āsādya hayān iva susārathiḥ
analyzed: dravataḥ mārgam āsādya hayān iva susārathiḥ

original: 5.020.004a vāmaḥ kāmo manuṣyāṇāṃ yasmin kila nibadhyate
analyzed: vāmaḥ kāmaḥ manuṣyāṇām yasmin kila nibadhyate

original: 5.020.004c jane tasmiṃs tv anukrośaḥ snehaś ca kila jāyate
analyzed: jane tasmin tu anukrośaḥ snehaḥ ca kila jāyate

original: 5.020.005a etasmāt kāraṇān na tāṃ ghatayāmi varānane
analyzed: etasmāt kāraṇāt na tām varānane
vadha arhām avamāna arhām mithyāpravrajite ratām

original: 5.020.006a paruṣāṇi hi vākyāni yāni yāni bravīṣi mām
analyzed: paruṣāṇi hi vākyāni yāni yāni bravīṣi mām

original: 5.020.006c teṣu teṣu vadho yuktas tava maithili dāruṇaḥ
analyzed: teṣu teṣu vadhaḥ yuktaḥ tava maithili dāruṇaḥ

original: 5.020.007a evam uktvā tu vaidehīṃ rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ
analyzed: evam uktvā tu vaidehīm rāvaṇaḥ rākṣasa adhipaḥ
krodha saṃrambha saṃyuktaḥ sītām uttaram abravīt

original: 5.020.008a dvau māsau rakṣitavyau me yo 'vadhis te mayā kṛtaḥ
analyzed: dvau māsau rakṣitavyau me yaḥ vadhiḥ te mayā kṛtaḥ

original: 5.020.008c tataḥ śayanam āroha mama tvaṃ varavarṇini
analyzed: tatas śayanam āroha mama tvam varavarṇini

original: 5.020.009a dvābhyām ūrdhvaṃ tu māsābhyāṃ bhartāraṃ mām anicchatīm
analyzed: dvābhyām ūrdhvam tu māsābhyām bhartāram mām an icchatīm
mama tvām prātarāśa artham ārabhante mahānase
tām tarjyamānām saṃprekṣya rākṣasa indreṇa jānakīm
deva gandharva kanyāḥ tāḥ viṣeduḥ vipula īkṣaṇāḥ
oṣṭha prakāraiḥ aparāḥ netra vaktraiḥ tathā aparāḥ

original: 5.020.011c sītām āśvāsayām āsus tarjitāṃ tena rakṣasā
analyzed: sītām āśvāsayām āsuḥ tarjitām tena rakṣasā
tābhiḥ āśvāsitā sītā rāvaṇam rākṣasa adhipam
uvāca ātma hitam vākyam vṛtta śauṇḍīrya garvitam

original: 5.020.013a nūnaṃ na te janaḥ kaś cid asin niḥśreyase sthitaḥ
analyzed: nūnam na te janaḥ kaḥ cit asit niḥśreyase sthitaḥ

original: 5.020.013c nivārayati yo na tvāṃ karmaṇo 'smād vigarhitāt
analyzed: nivārayati yaḥ na tvām karmaṇaḥ smāt vigarhitāt

original: 5.020.014a māṃ hi dharmātmanaḥ patnīṃ śacīm iva śacīpateḥ
analyzed: mām hi dharma ātmanaḥ patnīm śacīm iva śacīpateḥ

original: 5.020.014c tvadanyas triṣu lokeṣu prārthayen manasāpi kaḥ
analyzed: tvad anyaḥ triṣu lokeṣu prārthayet manasā api kaḥ
rākṣasa adhama rāmasya bhāryām amita tejasaḥ

original: 5.020.015c uktavān asi yat pāpaṃ kva gatas tasya mokṣyase
analyzed: uktavān asi yat pāpam kva gataḥ tasya mokṣyase

original: 5.020.016a yathā dṛptaś ca mātaṅgaḥ śaśaś ca sahitau vane
analyzed: yathā dṛptaḥ ca mātaṅgaḥ śaśaḥ ca sahitau vane

original: 5.020.016c tathā dviradavad rāmas tvaṃ nīca śaśavat smṛtaḥ
analyzed: tathā dvirada vat rāmaḥ tvam nīca śaśa vat smṛtaḥ

original: 5.020.017a sa tvam ikṣvākunāthaṃ vai kṣipann iha na lajjase
analyzed: sa tvam ikṣvāku nātham vai kṣipan iha na lajjase

original: 5.020.017c cakṣuṣo viṣayaṃ tasya na tāvad upagacchasi
analyzed: cakṣuṣaḥ viṣayam tasya na tāvat upagacchasi

original: 5.020.018a ime te nayane krūre virūpe kṛṣṇapiṅgale
analyzed: ime te nayane krūre virūpe kṛṣṇa piṅgale

original: 5.020.018c kṣitau na patite kasmān mām anāryanirīkṣitaḥ
analyzed: kṣitau na patite kasmāt mām an ārya nirīkṣitaḥ

original: 5.020.019a tasya dharmātmanaḥ patnīṃ snuṣāṃ daśarathasya ca
analyzed: tasya dharma ātmanaḥ patnīm snuṣām daśarathasya ca

original: 5.020.019c kathaṃ vyāharato māṃ te na jihvā pāpa śīryate
analyzed: katham vyāharataḥ mām te na jihvā pāpa śīryate
asaṃdeśāt tu rāmasya tapasaḥ ca anupālanāt

original: 5.020.020c na tvāṃ kurmi daśagrīva bhasma bhasmārhatejasā
analyzed: na tvām kurmi daśagrīva bhasma bhasma arha tejasā

original: 5.020.021a nāpahartum ahaṃ śakyā tasya rāmasya dhīmataḥ
analyzed: na apahartum aham śakyā tasya rāmasya dhīmataḥ

original: 5.020.021c vidhis tava vadhārthāya vihito nātra saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: vidhiḥ tava vadha arthāya vihitaḥ na atra saṃśayaḥ
śūreṇa dhanada bhrātā balaiḥ samuditena ca

original: 5.020.022c apohya rāmaṃ kasmād dhi dāracāuryaṃ tvayā kṛtam
analyzed: apohya rāmam kasmāt hi dāra cāuryam tvayā kṛtam
sītāyāḥ vacanam śrutvā rāvaṇaḥ rākṣasa adhipaḥ
vivṛtya nayane krūre jānakīm anvavaikṣata
śroṇī sūtreṇa mahatā mekakena su saṃvṛtaḥ
amṛta utpāda naddhena bhujaṃgena iva mandaraḥ
taruṇa āditya varṇābhyām kuṇḍalābhyām vibhūṣitaḥ
rakta pallava puṣpābhyām aśokābhyām iva acalaḥ
avekṣamāṇaḥ vaidehīm kopa saṃrakta locanaḥ

original: 5.020.028c uvāca rāvaṇaḥ sītāṃ bhujaṃga iva niḥśvasan
analyzed: uvāca rāvaṇaḥ sītām bhujaṃgaḥ iva niḥśvasan
anayena abhisaṃpannam artha hīnam anuvrate

original: 5.020.029c nāśayāmy aham adya tvāṃ sūryaḥ saṃdhyām ivaujasā
analyzed: nāśayāmi aham adya tvām sūryaḥ saṃdhyām iva ojasā

original: 5.020.030a ity uktvā maithilīṃ rājā rāvaṇaḥ śatrurāvaṇaḥ
analyzed: iti uktvā maithilīm rājā rāvaṇaḥ śatru rāvaṇaḥ
saṃdideśa tatas sarvāḥ rākṣasīḥ ghora darśanāḥ
eka akṣīm eka karṇām ca karṇa prāvaraṇām tathā
gokarṇīm hastikarṇīm ca lambakarṇīm akarṇikām
śva padyau ca gopadīm pāda cūlikām
eka akṣīm ekapādīm ca pṛthupādīm a pādikām
atimātra śiraḥ grīvām atimātra kuca udarīm
atimātra āsya netrām ca dīrghajihvām ajihvikām
a nāsikām siṃha mukhīm go mukhīm sūkarī mukhīm

original: 5.020.034a yathā madvaśagā sītā kṣipraṃ bhavati jānakī
analyzed: yathā mad vaśa gā sītā kṣipram bhavati jānakī

original: 5.020.034c tathā kuruta rākṣasyaḥ sarvāḥ kṣipraṃ sametya ca
analyzed: tathā kuruta rākṣasyaḥ sarvāḥ kṣipram sametya ca
pratiloma anulomaiḥ ca sāma dāna ādi bhedanaiḥ
āvartayata vaidehīm daṇḍasya udyamanena ca
iti pratisamādiśya rākṣasa indraḥ punar punar
kāma manyu parīta ātmā jānakīm paryatarjayat
upagamya tatas kṣipram rākṣasī dhānya mālinī
pariṣvajya daśagrīvam idam vacanam abravīt
mayā krīḍa mahā rāja sītayā kim tava anayā
akāmām kāmayānasya śarīram upatapyate
icchantīm kāmayānasya prītiḥ bhavati śobhanā

original: 5.020.039a evam uktas tu rākṣasyā samutkṣiptas tato balī
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu rākṣasyā samutkṣiptaḥ tatas balī
jvalat bhāskara varṇa ābham praviveśa niveśanam

original: 5.020.040a devagandharvakanyāś ca nāgakanyāś ca tās tataḥ
analyzed: deva gandharva kanyāḥ ca nāga kanyāḥ ca tāḥ tatas
parivārya daśagrīvam viviśuḥ tat gṛha uttamam
sa maithilīm dharma parām avasthitām
pravepamānām paribhartsya rāvaṇaḥ
vihāya sītām madanena mohitaḥ
svam eva veśma praviveśa bhāsvaram

original: 5.021.001a ity uktvā maithilīṃ rājā rāvaṇaḥ śatrurāvaṇaḥ
analyzed: iti uktvā maithilīm rājā rāvaṇaḥ śatru rāvaṇaḥ

original: 5.021.001c saṃdiśya ca tataḥ sarvā rākṣasīr nirjagāma ha
analyzed: saṃdiśya ca tatas sarvāḥ rākṣasīḥ nirjagāma ha

original: 5.021.002a niṣkrānte rākṣasendre tu punar antaḥpuraṃ gate
analyzed: niṣkrānte rākṣasa indre tu punar antaḥpuram gate
rākṣasyaḥ bhīma rūpāḥ tāḥ sītām samabhidudruvuḥ
tatas sītām upāgamya rākṣasyaḥ krodha mūrchitāḥ

original: 5.021.003c paraṃ paruṣayā vācā vaidehīm idam abruvan
analyzed: param paruṣayā vācā vaidehīm idam abruvan
paulastyasya variṣṭhasya rāvaṇasya mahātmanaḥ

original: 5.021.004c daśagrīvasya bhāryātvaṃ sīte na bahu manyase
analyzed: daśagrīvasya bhāryā tvam sīte na bahu manyase

original: 5.021.005a tatas tv ekajaṭā nāma rākṣasī vākyam abravīt
analyzed: tatas tu ekajaṭā nāma rākṣasī vākyam abravīt
āmantrya krodha tāmra akṣī sītām kara tala udarīm

original: 5.021.006a prajāpatīnāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ tu caturtho yaḥ prajāpatiḥ
analyzed: prajāpatīnām ṣaṇṇām tu caturthaḥ yaḥ prajāpatiḥ

original: 5.021.006c mānaso brahmaṇaḥ putraḥ pulastya iti viśrutaḥ
analyzed: mānasaḥ brahmaṇaḥ putraḥ pulastyaḥ iti viśrutaḥ

original: 5.021.007a pulastyasya tu tejasvī maharṣir mānasaḥ sutaḥ
analyzed: pulastyasya tu tejasvī mahā ṛṣiḥ mānasaḥ sutaḥ
nāmnā sa viśravāḥ nāma prajāpati sama prabhaḥ
tasya putraḥ viśāla akṣi rāvaṇaḥ śatru rāvaṇaḥ

original: 5.021.008c tasya tvaṃ rākṣasendrasya bhāryā bhavitum arhasi
analyzed: tasya tvam rākṣasa indrasya bhāryā bhavitum arhasi
mayā uktam cāru sarva aṅgi vākyam kim na anumanyase

original: 5.021.009a tato harijaṭā nāma rākṣasī vākyam abravīt
analyzed: tatas harijaṭā nāma rākṣasī vākyam abravīt
vivṛtya nayane kopāt mārjāra sadṛśa īkṣaṇā

original: 5.021.010a yena devās trayastriṃśad devarājaś ca nirjitaḥ
analyzed: yena devāḥ trayastriṃśat devarājaḥ ca nirjitaḥ

original: 5.021.010c tasya tvaṃ rākṣasendrasya bhāryā bhavitum arhasi
analyzed: tasya tvam rākṣasa indrasya bhāryā bhavitum arhasi
vīrya utsiktasya śūrasya saṃgrāmeṣu anivartinaḥ

original: 5.021.011c balino vīryayuktasyā bhāryātvaṃ kiṃ na lapsyase
analyzed: balinaḥ vīrya yuktasyāḥ bhāryā tvam kim na lapsyase

original: 5.021.012a priyāṃ bahumatāṃ bhāryāṃ tyaktvā rājā mahābalaḥ
analyzed: priyām bahu matām bhāryām tyaktvā rājā mahā balaḥ

original: 5.021.012c sarvāsāṃ ca mahābhāgāṃ tvām upaiṣyati rāvaṇaḥ
analyzed: sarvāsām ca mahābhāgām tvām upaiṣyati rāvaṇaḥ
samṛddham strī sahasreṇa nānā ratna upaśobhitam
antaḥpuram samutsṛjya tvām upaiṣyati rāvaṇaḥ
asakṛt devatāḥ yuddhe nāga gandharva dānavāḥ

original: 5.021.014c nirjitāḥ samare yena sa te pārśvam upāgataḥ
analyzed: nirjitāḥ samare yena sa te pārśvam upāgataḥ
tasya sarva samṛddhasya rāvaṇasya mahātmanaḥ
kimartham rākṣasa indrasya bhāryā tvam na icchase dhame

original: 5.021.016a yasya sūryo na tapati bhīto yasya ca mārutaḥ
analyzed: yasya sūryaḥ na tapati bhītaḥ yasya ca mārutaḥ

original: 5.021.016c na vāti smāyatāpāṅge kiṃ tvaṃ tasya na tiṣṭhasi
analyzed: na vāti sma āyata apāṅge kim tvam tasya na tiṣṭhasi

original: 5.021.017a puṣpavṛṣṭiṃ ca taravo mumucur yasya vai bhayāt
analyzed: puṣpa vṛṣṭim ca taravaḥ mumucuḥ yasya vai bhayāt

original: 5.021.017c śailāś ca subhru pānīyaṃ jaladāś ca yadecchati
analyzed: śailāḥ ca subhru pānīyam jaladāḥ ca yadā icchati
tasya nairṛta rājasya rāja rājasya bhāmini

original: 5.021.018c kiṃ tvaṃ na kuruṣe buddhiṃ bhāryārthe rāvaṇasya hi
analyzed: kim tvam na kuruṣe buddhim bhāryā arthe rāvaṇasya hi

original: 5.021.019a sādhu te tattvato devi kathitaṃ sādhu bhāmini
analyzed: sādhu te tattvataḥ devi kathitam sādhu bhāmini

original: 5.021.019c gṛhāṇa susmite vākyam anyathā na bhaviṣyasi
analyzed: gṛhāṇa susmite vākyam anyathā na bhaviṣyasi
tatas sītām upāgamya rākṣasyaḥ vikṛta ānanāḥ

original: 5.022.001c paruṣaṃ paruṣā nārya ūcus tā vākyam apriyam
analyzed: paruṣam paruṣāḥ nāryaḥ ūcuḥ tāḥ vākyam apriyam
kim tvam antaḥpure sīte sarva bhūta manohare
mahārha śayana upete na vāsam anumanyase
mānuṣī mānuṣasya eva bhāryā tvam bahu manyase

original: 5.022.003c pratyāhara mano rāmān na tvaṃ jātu bhaviṣyasi
analyzed: pratyāhara manaḥ rāmāt na tvam jātu bhaviṣyasi

original: 5.022.004a mānuṣī mānuṣaṃ taṃ tu rāmam icchasi śobhane
analyzed: mānuṣī mānuṣam tam tu rāmam icchasi śobhane

original: 5.022.004c rājyād bhraṣṭam asiddhārthaṃ viklavaṃ tam anindite
analyzed: rājyāt bhraṣṭam a siddhārtham viklavam tam anindite
rākṣasīnām vacaḥ śrutvā sītā padma nibha īkṣaṇā
netrābhyām aśru pūrṇābhyām idam vacanam abravīt
yat idam loka vidviṣṭam udāharatha saṃgatāḥ

original: 5.022.006c naitan manasi vākyaṃ me kilbiṣaṃ pratitiṣṭhati
analyzed: na etat manasi vākyam me kilbiṣam pratitiṣṭhati

original: 5.022.007a na mānuṣī rākṣasasya bhāryā bhavitum arhati
analyzed: na mānuṣī rākṣasasya bhāryā bhavitum arhati

original: 5.022.007c kāmaṃ khādata māṃ sarvā na kariṣyāmi vo vacaḥ
analyzed: kāmam khādata mām sarvāḥ na kariṣyāmi vaḥ vacaḥ

original: 5.022.007e dīno vā rājyahīno vā yo me bhartā sa me guruḥ
analyzed: dīnaḥ vā rājya hīnaḥ vā yaḥ me bhartā sa me guruḥ
sītāyāḥ vacanam śrutvā rākṣasyaḥ krodha mūrchitāḥ
bhartsayanti sma paruṣaiḥ vākyaiḥ rāvaṇa coditāḥ
avalīnaḥ sa nirvākyaḥ hanumām śiṃśapā drume

original: 5.022.009c sītāṃ saṃtarjayantīs tā rākṣasīr aśṛṇot kapiḥ
analyzed: sītām saṃtarjayantīḥ tāḥ rākṣasīḥ aśṛṇot kapiḥ
tām abhikramya saṃrabdhāḥ vepamānām samantataḥ
bhṛśam saṃlilihuḥ dīptān pralamba daśanacchadān
ūcuḥ ca parama kruddhāḥ pragṛhya āśu paraśvadhān
na iyam arhati bhartāram rāvaṇam rākṣasa adhipam
sā bhartsyamānā bhīmābhiḥ rākṣasībhiḥ varānanā

original: 5.022.012c sā bāṣpam apamārjantī śiṃśapāṃ tām upāgamat
analyzed: sā bāṣpam apamārjantī śiṃśapām tām upāgamat

original: 5.022.013a tatas tāṃ śiṃśapāṃ sītā rākṣasībhiḥ samāvṛtā
analyzed: tatas tām śiṃśapām sītā rākṣasībhiḥ samāvṛtā
abhigamya viśāla akṣī tasthau śoka pariplutā
tām kṛśām dīna vadanām malina ambara dhāriṇīm

original: 5.022.014c bhartsayāṃ cakrire bhīmā rākṣasyas tāḥ samantataḥ
analyzed: bhartsayām cakrire bhīmāḥ rākṣasyaḥ tāḥ samantataḥ

original: 5.022.015a tatas tāṃ vinatā nāma rākṣasī bhīmadarśanā
analyzed: tatas tām vinatā nāma rākṣasī bhīma darśanā
abravīt kupita ākārā karālā nirṇata udarī
sīte paryāptam etāvat bhartṛ snehaḥ nidarśitaḥ
sarvatra atikṛtam bhadre vyasanāya upakalpate

original: 5.022.017a parituṣṭāsmi bhadraṃ te mānuṣas te kṛto vidhiḥ
analyzed: parituṣṭā asmi bhadram te mānuṣaḥ te kṛtaḥ vidhiḥ

original: 5.022.017c mamāpi tu vacaḥ pathyaṃ bruvantyāḥ kuru maithili
analyzed: mama api tu vacaḥ pathyam bruvantyāḥ kuru maithili
rāvaṇam bhaja bhartāram bhartāram sarva rakṣasām

original: 5.022.018c vikrāntaṃ rūpavantaṃ ca sureśam iva vāsavam
analyzed: vikrāntam rūpavantam ca sureśam iva vāsavam
dakṣiṇam tyāga śīlam ca sarvasya priya vādinam

original: 5.022.019c mānuṣaṃ kṛpaṇaṃ rāmaṃ tyaktvā rāvaṇam āśraya
analyzed: mānuṣam kṛpaṇam rāmam tyaktvā rāvaṇam āśraya
divya aṅga rāgā vaidehi divya ābharaṇa bhūṣitā

original: 5.022.020c adya prabhṛti sarveṣāṃ lokānām īśvarī bhava
analyzed: adya prabhṛti sarveṣām lokānām īśvarī bhava

original: 5.022.020e agneḥ svāhā yathā devī śacīvendrasya śobhane
analyzed: agneḥ svāhā yathā devī śacī iva indrasya śobhane

original: 5.022.021a kiṃ te rāmeṇa vaidehi kṛpaṇena gatāyuṣā
analyzed: kim te rāmeṇa vaidehi kṛpaṇena gata āyuṣā

original: 5.022.022a etad uktaṃ ca me vākyaṃ yadi tvaṃ na kariṣyasi
analyzed: etat uktam ca me vākyam yadi tvam na kariṣyasi

original: 5.022.022c asmin muhūrte sarvās tvāṃ bhakṣayiṣyāmahe vayam
analyzed: asmin muhūrte sarvāḥ tvām bhakṣayiṣyāmahe vayam
anyā tu vikaṭā nāma lambamāna payodharā

original: 5.022.023c abravīt kupitā sītāṃ muṣṭim udyamya garjatī
analyzed: abravīt kupitā sītām muṣṭim udyamya garjatī
bahūni apratirūpāṇi vacanāni su durmate

original: 5.022.024c anukrośān mṛdutvāc ca soḍhāni tava maithili
analyzed: anukrośāt mṛdu tvāt ca soḍhāni tava maithili

original: 5.022.024e na ca naḥ kuruṣe vākyaṃ hitaṃ kālapuraskṛtam
analyzed: na ca naḥ kuruṣe vākyam hitam kāla puraskṛtam
ānītā asi samudrasya pāram anyaiḥ durāsadam
rāvaṇa antaḥpuram ghoram praviṣṭā ca asi maithili

original: 5.022.026a rāvaṇasya gṛhe rudhā asmābhis tu surakṣitā
analyzed: rāvaṇasya gṛhe asmābhiḥ tu su rakṣitā

original: 5.022.026c na tvāṃ śaktaḥ paritrātum api sākṣāt puraṃdaraḥ
analyzed: na tvām śaktaḥ paritrātum api sākṣāt puraṃdaraḥ
kuruṣva hita vādinyāḥ vacanam mama maithili
alam aśru prapātena tyaja śokam anarthakam

original: 5.022.028a bhaja prītiṃ praharṣaṃ ca tyajaitāṃ nityadainyatām
analyzed: bhaja prītim praharṣam ca tyaja etām nitya dainyatām
sīte rākṣasa rājena saha krīḍa yathāsukham

original: 5.022.029a jānāsi hi yathā bhīru strīṇāṃ yauvanam adhruvam
analyzed: jānāsi hi yathā bhīru strīṇām yauvanam adhruvam

original: 5.022.029c yāvan na te vyatikrāmet tāvat sukham avāpnuhi
analyzed: yāvat na te vyatikrāmet tāvat sukham avāpnuhi
udyānāni ca ramyāṇi parvata upavanāni ca
saha rākṣasa rājena cara tvam madirā īkṣaṇe

original: 5.022.031a strīsahasrāṇi te sapta vaśe sthāsyanti sundari
analyzed: strī sahasrāṇi te sapta vaśe sthāsyanti sundari
rāvaṇam bhaja bhartāram bhartāram sarva rakṣasām

original: 5.022.032a utpāṭya vā te hṛdayaṃ bhakṣayiṣyāmi maithili
analyzed: utpāṭya vā te hṛdayam bhakṣayiṣyāmi maithili

original: 5.022.032c yadi me vyāhṛtaṃ vākyaṃ na yathāvat kariṣyasi
analyzed: yadi me vyāhṛtam vākyam na yathāvat kariṣyasi
tatas caṇḍodarī nāma rākṣasī krūra darśanā

original: 5.022.033c bhrāmayantī mahac chūlam idaṃ vacanam abravīt
analyzed: bhrāmayantī mahat śūlam idam vacanam abravīt
imām hariṇa loka akṣīm trāsa utkampa payodharām

original: 5.022.034c rāvaṇena hṛtāṃ dṛṣṭvā daurhṛdo me mahān abhūt
analyzed: rāvaṇena hṛtām dṛṣṭvā daurhṛdaḥ me mahān abhūt
yakṛt plīham atha utpīḍam hṛdayam ca sa bandhanam

original: 5.022.035c antrāṇy api tathā śīrṣaṃ khādeyam iti me matiḥ
analyzed: antrāṇi api tathā śīrṣam khādeyam iti me matiḥ

original: 5.022.036a tatas tu praghasā nāma rākṣasī vākyam abravīt
analyzed: tatas tu praghasā nāma rākṣasī vākyam abravīt

original: 5.022.036c kaṇṭham asyā nṛśaṃsāyāḥ pīḍayāmaḥ kim āsyate
analyzed: kaṇṭham asyāḥ nṛśaṃsāyāḥ pīḍayāmaḥ kim āsyate

original: 5.022.037a nivedyatāṃ tato rājñe mānuṣī sā mṛteti ha
analyzed: nivedyatām tatas rājñe mānuṣī sā mṛtā iti ha

original: 5.022.037c nātra kaś cana saṃdehaḥ khādateti sa vakṣyati
analyzed: na atra kaḥ cana saṃdehaḥ khādata iti sa vakṣyati

original: 5.022.038a tatas tv ajāmukhī nāma rākṣasī vākyam abravīt
analyzed: tatas tu ajāmukhī nāma rākṣasī vākyam abravīt

original: 5.022.038c viśasyemāṃ tataḥ sarvān samān kuruta pīlukān
analyzed: viśasya imām tatas sarvān samān kuruta pīlukān

original: 5.022.039a vibhajāma tataḥ sarvā vivādo me na rocate
analyzed: vibhajāma tatas sarvāḥ vivādaḥ me na rocate

original: 5.022.039c peyam ānīyatāṃ kṣipraṃ mālyaṃ ca vividhaṃ bahu
analyzed: peyam ānīyatām kṣipram mālyam ca vividham bahu

original: 5.022.040a tataḥ śūrpaṇakhā nāma rākṣasī vākyam abravīt
analyzed: tatas śūrpaṇakhā nāma rākṣasī vākyam abravīt

original: 5.022.040c ajāmukhā yad uktaṃ hi tad eva mama rocate
analyzed: ajāmukhāḥ yat uktam hi tat eva mama rocate
surā ca ānīyatām kṣipram sarva śoka vināśinī
mānuṣam māṃsam āsādya nṛtyāmaḥ nikumbhilām
evam saṃbhartsyamānā sā sītā sura sutā upamā
rākṣasībhiḥ su ghorābhiḥ dhairyam utsṛjya roditi

original: 5.023.001a tathā tāsāṃ vadantīnāṃ paruṣaṃ dāruṇaṃ bahu
analyzed: tathā tāsām vadantīnām paruṣam dāruṇam bahu
rākṣasīnām asaumyānām ruroda janakātmajā

original: 5.023.002a evam uktā tu vaidehī rākṣasībhir manasvinī
analyzed: evam uktā tu vaidehī rākṣasībhiḥ manasvinī
uvāca parama trastā bāṣpa gadgadayā girā

original: 5.023.003a na mānuṣī rākṣasasya bhāryā bhavitum arhati
analyzed: na mānuṣī rākṣasasya bhāryā bhavitum arhati

original: 5.023.003c kāmaṃ khādata māṃ sarvā na kariṣyāmi vo vacaḥ
analyzed: kāmam khādata mām sarvāḥ na kariṣyāmi vaḥ vacaḥ
sā rākṣasī madhya gatā sītā sura sutā upamā

original: 5.023.004c na śarma lebhe duḥkhārtā rāvaṇena ca tarjitā
analyzed: na śarma lebhe duḥkha ārtā rāvaṇena ca tarjitā
vepate sma adhikam sītā viśantī iva aṅgam ātmanaḥ
vane yūtha paribhraṣṭā mṛgī kokaiḥ iva arditā

original: 5.023.006a sā tv aśokasya vipulāṃ śākhām ālambya puṣpitām
analyzed: sā tu aśokasya vipulām śākhām ālambya puṣpitām
cintayām āsa śokena bhartāram bhagna mānasā
sā snāpayantī vipulau stanau netra jala sravaiḥ
cintayantī na śokasya tadā antam adhigacchati

original: 5.023.008a sā vepamānā patitā pravāte kadalī yathā
analyzed: sā vepamānā patitā pravāte kadalī yathā
rākṣasīnām bhaya trastā vivarṇa vadanā abhavat

original: 5.023.009a tasyā sā dīrghavipulā vepantyāḥ sītayā tadā
analyzed: sā dīrgha vipulā vepantyāḥ sītayā tadā
dadṛśe kampinī veṇī vyālī iva parisarpatī
sā niḥśvasantī duḥkha ārtā śoka upahata cetanā

original: 5.023.010c ārtā vyasṛjad aśrūṇi maithilī vilalāpa ha
analyzed: ārtā vyasṛjat aśrūṇi maithilī vilalāpa ha

original: 5.023.011a hā rāmeti ca duḥkhārtā punar hā lakṣmaṇeti ca
analyzed: hā rāma iti ca duḥkha ārtā punar hā lakṣmaṇa iti ca

original: 5.023.011c hā śvaśru mama kausalye hā sumitreti bhāvini
analyzed: hā śvaśru mama kausalye hā sumitrā iti bhāvini
loka pravādaḥ satyaḥ yam paṇḍitaiḥ samudāhṛtaḥ

original: 5.023.012c akāle durlabho mṛtyuḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā
analyzed: akāle durlabhaḥ mṛtyuḥ striyāḥ vā puruṣasya vā
yatra aham ābhiḥ krūrābhiḥ rākṣasībhiḥ iha arditā

original: 5.023.013c jīvāmi hīnā rāmeṇa muhūrtam api duḥkhitā
analyzed: jīvāmi hīnā rāmeṇa muhūrtam api duḥkhitā
eṣā alpa puṇyā kṛpaṇā vinaśiṣyāmi anātha vat
samudra madhye nau pūrṇā vāyu vegaiḥ iva āhatā
bhartāram tam a paśyantī rākṣasī vaśam āgatā

original: 5.023.015c sīdāmi khalu śokena kūlaṃ toyahataṃ yathā
analyzed: sīdāmi khalu śokena kūlam toya hatam yathā
tam padma dala pattra akṣam siṃha vikrānta gāminam

original: 5.023.016c dhanyāḥ paśyanti me nāthaṃ kṛtajñaṃ priyavādinam
analyzed: dhanyāḥ paśyanti me nātham kṛtajñam priya vādinam
sarvathā tena hīnāyāḥ rāmeṇa vidita ātmanā

original: 5.023.017c tīṣkṇaṃ viṣam ivāsvādya durlabhaṃ mama jīvitam
analyzed: tīṣkṇam viṣam iva āsvādya durlabham mama jīvitam

original: 5.023.018a kīdṛśaṃ tu mayā pāpaṃ purā dehāntare kṛtam
analyzed: kīdṛśam tu mayā pāpam purā deha antare kṛtam

original: 5.023.018c yenedaṃ prāpyate duḥkhaṃ mayā ghoraṃ sudāruṇam
analyzed: yena idam prāpyate duḥkham mayā ghoram su dāruṇam

original: 5.023.019a jīvitaṃ tyaktum icchāmi śokena mahatā vṛtā
analyzed: jīvitam tyaktum icchāmi śokena mahatā vṛtā

original: 5.023.019c rākṣasībhiś ca rakṣantyā rāmo nāsādyate mayā
analyzed: rākṣasībhiḥ ca rakṣantyāḥ rāmaḥ na āsādyate mayā

original: 5.023.020a dhig astu khalu mānuṣyaṃ dhig astu paravaśyatām
analyzed: dhik astu khalu mānuṣyam dhik astu para vaśya tām

original: 5.023.020c na śakyaṃ yat parityaktum ātmacchandena jīvitam
analyzed: na śakyam yat parityaktum ātma chandena jīvitam
prasakta aśru mukhī iti evam bruvantī janakātmajā
adhomukha mukhī bālā vilaptum upacakrame
unmattā iva pramattā iva bhrānta cittā iva śocatī
upāvṛttā kiśorī iva viveṣṭantī mahī tale
rāghavasya apramattasya rakṣasā kāmarūpiṇā
rāvaṇena pramathya aham ānītā krośatī balāt
rākṣasī vaśam āpannā bhartyamānā su dāruṇam
cintayantī su duḥkha ārtā na aham jīvitum utsahe

original: 5.024.005a na hi me jīvitenārtho naivārthair na ca bhūṣaṇaiḥ
analyzed: na hi me jīvitena arthaḥ na eva arthaiḥ na ca bhūṣaṇaiḥ

original: 5.024.005c vasantyā rākṣasī madhye vinā rāmaṃ mahāratham
analyzed: vasantyāḥ rākṣasī madhye vinā rāmam mahā ratham

original: 5.024.006a dhiṅ mām anāryām asatīṃ yāhaṃ tena vinā kṛtā
analyzed: dhik mām anāryām asatīm yā aham tena vinā kṛtā
muhūrtam api rakṣāmi jīvitam pāpa jīvitā

original: 5.024.007a kā ca me jīvite śraddhā sukhe vā taṃ priyaṃ vinā
analyzed: kā ca me jīvite śraddhā sukhe vā tam priyam vinā
bhartāram sāgara antāyāḥ vasudhāyāḥ priyam vadam

original: 5.024.008a bhidyatāṃ bhakṣyatāṃ vāpi śarīraṃ visṛjāmy aham
analyzed: bhidyatām bhakṣyatām vā api śarīram visṛjāmi aham

original: 5.024.008c na cāpy ahaṃ ciraṃ duḥkhaṃ saheyaṃ priyavarjitā
analyzed: na ca api aham ciram duḥkham saheyam priya varjitā
caraṇena api savyena na spṛśeyam niśācaram

original: 5.024.009c rāvaṇaṃ kiṃ punar ahaṃ kāmayeyaṃ vigarhitam
analyzed: rāvaṇam kim punar aham kāmayeyam vigarhitam

original: 5.024.010a pratyākhyātaṃ na jānāti nātmānaṃ nātmanaḥ kulam
analyzed: pratyākhyātam na jānāti na ātmānam na ātmanaḥ kulam

original: 5.024.010c yo nṛśaṃsa svabhāvena māṃ prārthayitum icchati
analyzed: yaḥ nṛśaṃsa svabhāvena mām prārthayitum icchati

original: 5.024.011a chinnā bhinnā vibhaktā vā dīpte vāgnau pradīpitā
analyzed: chinnā bhinnā vibhaktā vā dīpte vā agnau pradīpitā

original: 5.024.011c rāvaṇaṃ nopatiṣṭheyaṃ kiṃ pralāpena vaś ciram
analyzed: rāvaṇam nā upatiṣṭheyam kim pralāpena vaḥ ciram

original: 5.024.012a khyātaḥ prājñaḥ kṛtajñaś ca sānukrośaś ca rāghavaḥ
analyzed: khyātaḥ prājñaḥ kṛtajñaḥ ca sa anukrośaḥ ca rāghavaḥ
sat vṛttaḥ niranukrośaḥ śaṅke mad bhāgya saṃkṣayāt
rākṣasānām janasthāne sahasrāṇi caturdaśa

original: 5.024.013c yenaikena nirastāni sa māṃ kiṃ nābhipadyate
analyzed: yena ekena nirastāni sa mām kim nā abhipadyate
niruddhā rāvaṇena aham alpa vīryeṇa rakṣasā

original: 5.024.014c samarthaḥ khalu me bhartā rāvaṇaṃ hantum āhave
analyzed: samarthaḥ khalu me bhartā rāvaṇam hantum āhave
virādhaḥ daṇḍaka araṇye yena rākṣasa puṃgavaḥ

original: 5.024.015c raṇe rāmeṇa nihataḥ sa māṃ kiṃ nābhipadyate
analyzed: raṇe rāmeṇa nihataḥ sa mām kim nā abhipadyate
kāmam madhye samudrasya laṅkā iyam duṣpradharṣaṇā

original: 5.024.016c na tu rāghavabāṇānāṃ gatirodhī ha vidyate
analyzed: na tu rāghava bāṇānām gati rodhī ha vidyate

original: 5.024.017a kiṃ nu tat kāraṇaṃ yena rāmo dṛḍhaparākramaḥ
