analyzed: kim nu tat kāraṇam yena rāmaḥ dṛḍha parākramaḥ
rakṣasā apahṛtām bhāryām iṣṭām na abhyavapadyate

original: 5.024.018a ihasthāṃ māṃ na jānīte śaṅke lakṣmaṇapūrvajaḥ
analyzed: ihasthām mām na jānīte śaṅke lakṣmaṇa pūrvajaḥ

original: 5.024.018c jānann api hi tejasvī dharṣaṇāṃ marṣayiṣyati
analyzed: jānan api hi tejasvī dharṣaṇām marṣayiṣyati
hṛtā iti yaḥ dhik atvā mām rāghavāya nivedayet
gṛdhra rājaḥ pi sa raṇe rāvaṇena nipātitaḥ

original: 5.024.020a kṛtaṃ karma mahat tena māṃ tadābhyavapadyatā
analyzed: kṛtam karma mahat tena mām tadā abhyavapadyatā
tiṣṭhatā rāvaṇa dvandve vṛddhena api jaṭāyuṣā

original: 5.024.021a yadi mām iha jānīyād vartamānāṃ sa rāghavaḥ
analyzed: yadi mām iha jānīyāt vartamānām sa rāghavaḥ

original: 5.024.021c adya bāṇair abhikruddhaḥ kuryāl lokam arākṣasaṃ
analyzed: adya bāṇaiḥ abhikruddhaḥ kuryāt lokam arākṣasam

original: 5.024.022a vidhamec ca purīṃ laṅkāṃ śoṣayec ca mahodadhim
analyzed: vidhamet ca purīm laṅkām śoṣayet ca mahā udadhim

original: 5.024.022c rāvaṇasya ca nīcasya kīrtiṃ nāma ca nāśayet
analyzed: rāvaṇasya ca nīcasya kīrtim nāma ca nāśayet
tatas nihata nathānām rākṣasīnām gṛhe gṛhe

original: 5.024.023c yathāham evaṃ rudatī tathā bhūyo na saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: yathā aham evam rudatī tathā bhūyas na saṃśayaḥ

original: 5.024.023e anviṣya rakṣasāṃ laṅkāṃ kuryād rāmaḥ salakṣmaṇaḥ
analyzed: anviṣya rakṣasām laṅkām kuryāt rāmaḥ sa lakṣmaṇaḥ

original: 5.024.024a na hi tābhyāṃ ripur dṛṣṭo muhūtam api jīvati
analyzed: na hi tābhyām ripuḥ dṛṣṭaḥ muhūtam api jīvati
citā dhūma ākula pathā gṛdhra maṇḍala saṃkulā
acireṇa tu laṅkā iyam śmaśāna sadṛśī bhavet
acireṇa eva kālena prāpsyāmi eva manoratham
duṣprasthānaḥ yam ākhyāti sarveṣām vaḥ viparyayaḥ

original: 5.024.026a yādṛśāni tu dṛśyante laṅkāyām aśubhāni tu
analyzed: yādṛśāni tu dṛśyante laṅkāyām aśubhāni tu
acireṇa eva kālena bhaviṣyati hata prabhā

original: 5.024.027a nūnaṃ laṅkā hate pāpe rāvaṇe rākṣasādhipe
analyzed: nūnam laṅkā hate pāpe rāvaṇe rākṣasa adhipe

original: 5.024.027c śoṣaṃ yāsyati durdharṣā pramadā vidhavā yathā
analyzed: śoṣam yāsyati durdharṣā pramadā vidhavā yathā
puṣya utsava samṛddhā ca naṣṭa bhartrī sa rākṣasā
bhaviṣyati purī laṅkā naṣṭa bhartrī yathā aṅganā
nūnam rākṣasa kanyānām rudantīnām gṛhe gṛhe

original: 5.024.029c śroṣyāmi nacirād eva duḥkhārtānām iha dhvanim
analyzed: śroṣyāmi nacirāt eva duḥkha ārtānām iha dhvanim
sa andhakārā hata dyotā hata rākṣasa puṃgavā
bhaviṣyati purī laṅkā nirdagdhā rāma sāyakaiḥ

original: 5.024.031a yadi nāma sa śūro māṃ rāmo raktāntalocanaḥ
analyzed: yadi nāma sa śūraḥ mām rāmaḥ rakta anta locanaḥ
jānīyāt vartamānām hi rāvaṇasya niveśane
anena tu nṛśaṃsena rāvaṇena adhamena me

original: 5.024.032c samayo yas tu nirdiṣṭas tasya kālo 'yam āgataḥ
analyzed: samayaḥ yaḥ tu nirdiṣṭaḥ tasya kālaḥ yam āgataḥ

original: 5.024.033a akāryaṃ ye na jānanti nairṛtāḥ pāpakāriṇaḥ
analyzed: akāryam ye na jānanti nairṛtāḥ pāpa kāriṇaḥ

original: 5.024.033c adharmāt tu mahotpāto bhaviṣyati hi sāmpratam
analyzed: adharmāt tu mahā utpātaḥ bhaviṣyati hi sāmpratam
na ete dharmam vijānanti rākṣasāḥ piśita aśanāḥ
dhruvam mām prātarāśa arthe rākṣasaḥ kalpayiṣyati

original: 5.024.035a sāhaṃ kathaṃ kariṣyāmi taṃ vinā priyadarśanam
analyzed: sā aham katham kariṣyāmi tam vinā priyadarśanam
rāmam rakta anta nayanam a paśyantī su duḥkhitā

original: 5.024.036a yadi kaś cit pradātā me viṣasyādya bhaved iha
analyzed: yadi kaḥ cit pradātā me viṣasya adya bhavet iha

original: 5.024.036c kṣipraṃ vaivasvataṃ devaṃ paśyeyaṃ patinā vinā
analyzed: kṣipram vaivasvatam devam paśyeyam patinā vinā

original: 5.024.037a nājānāj jīvatīṃ rāmaḥ sa māṃ lakṣmaṇapūrvajaḥ
analyzed: na ajānāt jīvatīm rāmaḥ sa mām lakṣmaṇa pūrvajaḥ

original: 5.024.037c jānantau tau na kuryātāṃ norvyāṃ hi mama mārgaṇam
analyzed: jānantau tau na kuryātām na urvyām hi mama mārgaṇam

original: 5.024.038a nūnaṃ mamaiva śokena sa vīro lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ
analyzed: nūnam mama eva śokena sa vīraḥ lakṣmaṇa agrajaḥ

original: 5.024.038c devalokam ito yātas tyaktvā dehaṃ mahītale
analyzed: deva lokam itas yātaḥ tyaktvā deham mahī tale

original: 5.024.039a dhanyā devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
analyzed: dhanyāḥ devāḥ sa gandharvāḥ siddhāḥ ca parama ṛṣayaḥ

original: 5.024.039c mama paśyanti ye nāthaṃ rāmaṃ rājīvalocanam
analyzed: mama paśyanti ye nātham rāmam rājīva locanam

original: 5.024.040a atha vā na hi tasyārthe dharmakāmasya dhīmataḥ
analyzed: atha vā na hi tasya arthe dharma kāmasya dhīmataḥ
mayā rāmasya rājarṣeḥ bhāryayā paramātmanaḥ

original: 5.024.041a dṛśyamāne bhavet prītaḥ sauhṛdaṃ nāsty apaśyataḥ
analyzed: dṛśyamāne bhavet prītaḥ sauhṛdam na asti apaśyataḥ

original: 5.024.041c nāśayanti kṛtaghrās tu na rāmo nāśayiṣyati
analyzed: nāśayanti kṛtaghrāḥ tu na rāmaḥ nāśayiṣyati

original: 5.024.042a kiṃ nu me na guṇāḥ ke cit kiṃ vā bhāgya kṣayo hi me
analyzed: kim nu me na guṇāḥ ke cid kim vā bhāgya kṣayaḥ hi me

original: 5.024.042c yāhaṃ sītā varārheṇa hīnā rāmeṇa bhāminī
analyzed: yā aham sītā vara arheṇa hīnā rāmeṇa bhāminī

original: 5.024.043a śreyo me jīvitān martuṃ vihīnā yā mahātmanā
analyzed: śreyaḥ me jīvitāt martum vihīnā yā mahātmanā
rāmāt akliṣṭa cāritrāt śūrāt śatru nibarhaṇāt

original: 5.024.044a atha vā nyastaśastrau tau vane mūlaphalāśanau
analyzed: atha vā nyasta śastrau tau vane mūla phala aśanau

original: 5.024.044c bhrātarau hi nara śreṣṭhau carantau vanagocarau
analyzed: bhrātarau hi nara śreṣṭhau carantau vanagocarau
atha vā rākṣasa indreṇa rāvaṇena durātmanā
chadmanā ghātitau śūrau bhrātarau rāma lakṣmaṇau

original: 5.024.046a sāham evaṃgate kāle martum icchāmi sarvathā
analyzed: sā aham evaṃgate kāle martum icchāmi sarvathā

original: 5.024.046c na ca me vihito mṛtyur asmin duḥkhe 'pi vartati
analyzed: na ca me vihitaḥ mṛtyuḥ asmin duḥkhe vartati
dhanyāḥ khalu mahātmānaḥ munayaḥ satya saṃmatāḥ

original: 5.024.047c jitātmāno mahābhāgā yeṣāṃ na staḥ priyāpriye
analyzed: jita ātmānaḥ mahābhāgāḥ yeṣām na staḥ priya apriye

original: 5.024.048a priyān na saṃbhaved duḥkham apriyād adhikaṃ bhayam
analyzed: priyāt na saṃbhavet duḥkham apriyāt adhikam bhayam

original: 5.024.048c tābhyāṃ hi ye viyujyante namas teṣāṃ mahātmanām
analyzed: tābhyām hi ye viyujyante namaḥ teṣām mahātmanām
sā aham tyaktā priyeṇa iha rāmeṇa vidita ātmanā

original: 5.024.049c prāṇāṃs tyakṣyāmi pāpasya rāvaṇasya gatā vaśam
analyzed: prāṇān tyakṣyāmi pāpasya rāvaṇasya gatā vaśam

original: 5.025.001a ity uktāḥ sītayā ghoraṃ rākṣasyaḥ krodhamūrchitāḥ
analyzed: iti uktāḥ sītayā ghoram rākṣasyaḥ krodha mūrchitāḥ

original: 5.025.001c kāś cij jagmus tad ākhyātuṃ rāvaṇasya tarasvinaḥ
analyzed: kāḥ cit jagmuḥ tat ākhyātum rāvaṇasya tarasvinaḥ
tatas sītām upāgamya rākṣasyaḥ ghora darśanāḥ
punar paruṣam eka artham anartha artham atha abruvan
hanta idānīm tava anārye sīte pāpa viniścaye
rākṣasyaḥ bhakṣayiṣyanti māṃsam etat yathāsukham

original: 5.025.004a sītāṃ tābhir anāryābhir dṛṣṭvā saṃtarjitāṃ tadā
analyzed: sītām tābhiḥ anāryābhiḥ dṛṣṭvā saṃtarjitām tadā
rākṣasī trijaṭā vṛddhā śayānā vākyam abravīt
ātmānam khādata anāryāḥ na sītām bhakṣayiṣyatha

original: 5.025.005c janakasya sutām iṣṭāṃ snuṣāṃ daśarathasya ca
analyzed: janakasya sutām iṣṭām snuṣām daśarathasya ca

original: 5.025.006a svapno hy adya mayā dṛṣṭo dāruṇo romaharṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: svapnaḥ hi adya mayā dṛṣṭaḥ dāruṇaḥ roma harṣaṇaḥ

original: 5.025.006c rākṣasānām abhāvāya bhartur asyā bhavāya ca
analyzed: rākṣasānām abhāvāya bhartuḥ asyāḥ bhavāya ca
evam uktāḥ trijaṭayā rākṣasyaḥ krodha mūrchitāḥ

original: 5.025.007c sarvā evābruvan bhītās trijaṭāṃ tām idaṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: sarvāḥ eva abruvan bhītāḥ trijaṭām tām idam vacaḥ

original: 5.025.008a kathayasva tvayā dṛṣṭaḥ svapne 'yaṃ kīdṛśo niśi
analyzed: kathayasva tvayā dṛṣṭaḥ svapne yam kīdṛśaḥ niśi

original: 5.025.009a tāsāṃ śrutvā tu vacanaṃ rākṣasīnāṃ mukhodgatam
analyzed: tāsām śrutvā tu vacanam rākṣasīnām mukha udgatam
uvāca vacanam kāle trijaṭā svapna saṃśritam
gaja danta mayīm divyām śibikām antarikṣa gām
yuktām vāji sahasreṇa svayam āsthāya rāghavaḥ

original: 5.025.011a svapne cādya mayā dṛṣṭā sītā śuklāmbarāvṛtā
analyzed: svapne ca adya mayā dṛṣṭā sītā śukla ambara āvṛtā
sāgareṇa parikṣiptam śvetaparvatam āsthitā

original: 5.025.011e rāmeṇa saṃgatā sītā bhāskareṇa prabhā yathā
analyzed: rāmeṇa saṃgatā sītā bhāskareṇa prabhā yathā

original: 5.025.012a rāghavaś ca mayā dṛṣṭaś caturdantaṃ mahāgajam
analyzed: rāghavaḥ ca mayā dṛṣṭaḥ catur dantam mahā gajam
ārūḍhaḥ śaila saṃkāśam cacāra sahalakṣmaṇaḥ
tatas tau nara śārdūlau dīpyamānau sva tejasā
śukla mālya ambara dharau jānakīm paryupasthitau
tatas tasya nagasya agre ākāśa sthasya dantinaḥ
bhartrā parigṛhītasya jānakī skandham āśritā
bhartuḥ aṅkāt samutpatya tatas kamala locanā
candra sūryau mayā dṛṣṭā pāṇibhyām parimārjatī

original: 5.025.016a tatas tābhyāṃ kumārābhyām āsthitaḥ sa gajottamaḥ
analyzed: tatas tābhyām kumārābhyām āsthitaḥ sa gaja uttamaḥ

original: 5.025.016c sītayā ca viśālākṣyā laṅkāyā upari sthitaḥ
analyzed: sītayā ca viśāla akṣyā laṅkāyāḥ upari sthitaḥ
pāṇḍura ṛṣabha yuktena rathena aṣṭa yujā svayam
śukla mālya ambara dharaḥ lakṣmaṇena samāgataḥ

original: 5.025.017e lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā sītayā saha bhāryayā
analyzed: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā sītayā saha bhāryayā

original: 5.025.018a vimānāt puṣpakād adya rāvaṇaḥ patito bhuvi
analyzed: vimānāt puṣpakāt adya rāvaṇaḥ patitaḥ bhuvi

original: 5.025.018c kṛṣyapāṇaḥ striyā dṛṣṭo muṇḍaḥ kṛṣṇāmbaraḥ punaḥ
analyzed: kṛṣya pāṇaḥ striyā dṛṣṭaḥ muṇḍaḥ kṛṣṇa ambaraḥ punar
rathena khara yuktena rakta mālya anulepanaḥ

original: 5.025.019c prayāto dakṣiṇām āśāṃ praviṣṭaḥ kardamaṃ hradam
analyzed: prayātaḥ dakṣiṇām āśām praviṣṭaḥ kardamam hradam
kaṇṭhe baddhvā daśagrīvam pramadā rakta vāsinī
kālī kardama lipta aṅgī diśam yāmyām prakarṣati
varāheṇa daśagrīvaḥ śiṃśumāreṇa ca indrajit

original: 5.025.021c uṣṭreṇa kumbhakarṇaś ca prayāto dakṣiṇāṃ diśam
analyzed: uṣṭreṇa kumbhakarṇaḥ ca prayātaḥ dakṣiṇām diśam
samājaḥ ca mahān vṛttaḥ gīta vāditra niḥsvanaḥ
pibatām rakta mālyānām rakṣasām rakta vāsasām
laṅkā ca iyam purī ramyā sa vāji ratha saṃkulā
sāgare patitā dṛṣṭā bhagna gopura toraṇā

original: 5.025.024a pītva tailaṃ pranṛttāś ca prahasantyo mahāsvanāḥ
analyzed: pītvā tailam pranṛttāḥ ca prahasantyaḥ mahā svanāḥ
laṅkāyām bhasma rūkṣāyām sarvāḥ rākṣasa yoṣitaḥ
kumbhakarṇa ādayaḥ ca ime sarve rākṣasa puṃgavāḥ
raktam nivasanam gṛhya praviṣṭāḥ gomaya hrade
apagacchata naśyadhvam sītām āpnoti rāghavaḥ

original: 5.025.026c ghātayet paramāmarṣī sarvaiḥ sārdhaṃ hi rākṣasaiḥ
analyzed: ghātayet parama amarṣī sarvaiḥ sārdham hi rākṣasaiḥ
priyām bahu matām bhāryām vana vāsam anuvratām
bhartsitām tarjitām vā api na anumaṃsyati rāghavaḥ

original: 5.025.028a tad alaṃ krūravākyair vaḥ sāntvam evābhidhīyatām
analyzed: tat alam krūra vākyaiḥ vaḥ sāntvam eva abhidhīyatām

original: 5.025.028c abhiyācāma vaidehīm etad dhi mama rocate
analyzed: abhiyācāma vaidehīm etat hi mama rocate

original: 5.025.029a yasyā hy evaṃ vidhaḥ svapno duḥkhitāyāḥ pradṛśyate
analyzed: yasyāḥ hi evaṃvidhaḥ svapnaḥ duḥkhitāyāḥ pradṛśyate

original: 5.025.029c sā duḥkhair bahubhir muktā priyaṃ prāpnoty anuttamam
analyzed: sā duḥkhaiḥ bahubhiḥ muktā priyam prāpnoti anuttamam

original: 5.025.030a bhartsitām api yācadhvaṃ rākṣasyaḥ kiṃ vivakṣayā
analyzed: bhartsitām api yācadhvam rākṣasyaḥ kim vivakṣayā

original: 5.025.030c rāghavād dhi bhayaṃ ghoraṃ rākṣasānām upasthitam
analyzed: rāghavāt hi bhayam ghoram rākṣasānām upasthitam
praṇipāta prasannā hi maithilī janakātmajā

original: 5.025.031c alam eṣā paritrātuṃ rākṣasyo mahato bhayāt
analyzed: alam eṣā paritrātum rākṣasyaḥ mahataḥ bhayāt

original: 5.025.032a api cāsyā viśālākṣyā na kiṃ cid upalakṣaye
analyzed: api ca asyāḥ viśāla akṣyāḥ na kim cit upalakṣaye

original: 5.025.032c viruddham api cāṅgeṣu susūkṣmam api lakṣmaṇam
analyzed: viruddham api ca aṅgeṣu su sūkṣmam api lakṣmaṇam

original: 5.025.033a chāyā vaiguṇya mātraṃ tu śaṅke duḥkham upasthitam
analyzed: chāyā vaiguṇya mātram tu śaṅke duḥkham upasthitam
aduḥkha arhām imām devīm vaihāyasam upasthitām

original: 5.025.034a arthasiddhiṃ tu vaidehyāḥ paśyāmy aham upasthitām
analyzed: artha siddhim tu vaidehyāḥ paśyāmi aham upasthitām
rākṣasa indra vināśam ca vijayam rāghavasya ca

original: 5.025.035a nimittabhūtam etat tu śrotum asyā mahat priyam
analyzed: nimitta bhūtam etat tu śrotum asyāḥ mahat priyam

original: 5.025.035c dṛśyate ca sphurac cakṣuḥ padmapatram ivāyatam
analyzed: dṛśyate ca sphurat cakṣuḥ padma patram iva āyatam

original: 5.025.036a īṣac ca hṛṣito vāsyā dakṣiṇāyā hy adakṣiṇaḥ
analyzed: īṣat ca hṛṣitaḥ vā asyāḥ dakṣiṇāyāḥ hi a dakṣiṇaḥ

original: 5.025.036c akasmād eva vaidehyā bāhur ekaḥ prakampate
analyzed: akasmāt eva vaidehyāḥ bāhuḥ ekaḥ prakampate
kareṇu hasta pratimaḥ savyaḥ ca ūruḥ anuttamaḥ
vepan sūcayati iva asyāḥ rāghavam puratas sthitam
pakṣī ca śākhāḥ nilayam praviṣṭaḥ
punar punar ca uttama sāntva vādī
sukha āgatām vācam udīrayāṇaḥ
punar punar codayati iva hṛṣṭaḥ
sā rākṣasa indrasya vacaḥ niśamya
tat rāvaṇasya apriyam apriya ārtā
sītā vitatrāsa yathā vanānte
siṃha abhipannā gaja rāja kanyā
sā rākṣasī madhya gatā ca bhīruḥ
vāgbhiḥ bhṛśam rāvaṇa tarjitā ca
kāntāra madhye vijane visṛṣṭā
bālā iva kanyā vilalāpa sītā
satyam bata idam pravadanti loke
na akāla mṛtyuḥ bhavati iti santaḥ
yatra aham evam paribhartsyamānā

original: jīvāmi kiṃ cit kṣaṇam apy apuṇyā
analyzed: jīvāmi kim cit kṣaṇam api apuṇyā
sukhāt vihīnam bahu duḥkha pūrṇam

original: idaṃ tu nūnaṃ hṛdayaṃ sthiraṃ me
analyzed: idam tu nūnam hṛdayam sthiram me
vidīryate yat na sahasradhā adya
vajra āhatam śṛṅgam iva acalasya
na evā asti nūnam mama doṣam atra
vadhyā aham asya apriya darśanasya
bhāvam na ca asya aham anupradātum
alam dvijaḥ mantram iva a dvijāya
nūnam mama aṅgāni acirāt anāryaḥ
śastraiḥ śitaiḥ chetsyati rākṣasa indraḥ
tasmin an āgacchati lokanāthe
garbha stha jantoḥ iva śalya kṛntaḥ
duḥkham bata idam mama duḥkhi tāyāḥ
māsau cirāya abhigamiṣyataḥ dvau
baddhasya vadhyasya yathā niśā ante
rāja aparādhāt iva taskarasya

original: 5.026.008a hā rāma hā lakṣmaṇa hā sumitre;
analyzed: hā rāma hā lakṣmaṇa hā sumitre

original: hā rāma mātaḥ saha me jananyā
analyzed: hā rāma mātar saha me jananyā
eṣā vipadyāmi aham alpabhāgyā
mahā arṇave nauḥ iva mūḍha vātā
tarasvinau dhārayata mṛgasya
sattvena rūpam manuja indra putrau
nūnam viśastau mama kāraṇāt tau
siṃha ṛṣabhau dvau iva vaidyutena
nūnam sa kālaḥ mṛga rūpa dhārī
mām alpabhāgyām lulubhe tadānīm
yatra arya putram visasarja mūḍhā
rāma anujam lakṣmaṇa pūrvakam ca
hā rāma satyavrata dīrghavāho
hā pūrṇa candra pratimāna vaktra
hā jīva lokasya hitaḥ priyaḥ ca

original: vadhyāṃ na māṃ vetsi hi rākṣasānām
analyzed: vadhyām na mām vetsi hi rākṣasānām
an anya deva tvam iyam kṣamā ca

original: bhūmau ca śayyā niyamaś ca dharme
analyzed: bhūmau ca śayyā niyamaḥ ca dharme
pativratā tvam viphalam mama idam
kṛtam kṛtaghneṣu iva mānuṣāṇām
moghaḥ hi dharmaḥ caritaḥ mama ayam
tathā eka patnī tvam idam nirartham

original: 5.026.013c yā tvāṃ na paśyāmi kṛśā vivarṇā;
analyzed: yā tvām na paśyāmi kṛśā vivarṇā
hīnā tvayā saṃgamane nirāśā
pituḥ nirdeśam niyamena kṛtvā
vanāt nivṛttaḥ carita vrataḥ ca
strībhiḥ tu manye vipula īkṣaṇābhiḥ
saṃraṃsyase vīta bhayaḥ kṛtārthaḥ
aham tu rāma tvayi jāta kāmā
ciram vināśāya nibaddha bhāvā
mogham caritvā atha tapaḥ vratam ca
tyakṣyāmi dhik jīvitam alpabhāgyā
sā jīvitam kṣipram aham tyajeyam
viṣeṇa śastreṇa śitena vā api

original: 5.026.016c viṣasya dātā na tu me 'sti kaś cic;
analyzed: viṣasya dātā na tu me sti kaḥ cit
chastrasya vā veśmani rākṣasasya
śoka abhitaptā bahudhā vicintya
sītā atha veṇī udgrathanam gṛhītvā
udbadhya veṇī udgrathanena śīghram
aham gamiṣyāmi yamasya mūlam
iti iva sītā bahudhā vilapya
sarva ātmanā rāmam anusmarantī
pravepamānā pariśuṣka vaktrā
naga uttamam puṣpitam āsasāda
upasthitā sā mṛduḥ sarva gātrī
śākhām gṛhītvā atha nagasya tasya
tasyāḥ tu rāmam pravicintayantyā
rāma anujam svam ca kulam śubha aṅgyāḥ
śoka a nimittāni tadā bahūni
dhairya arjitāni pravarāṇi loke
prādur nimittāni tadā babhūvuḥ
purā api siddhāni upalakṣitāni
tathāgatām tām vyathitām aninditām
vyapeta harṣām paridīna mānasām
śubhām nimittāni śubhāni bhejire
naram śriyā juṣṭam iva upajīvinaḥ
tasyāḥ śubham vāmam arāla pakṣma
prāspandata ekam nayanam su keśyā
mīna āhatam padmam iva abhitāmram
bhujaḥ ca cāru añcita pīna vṛttaḥ
anuttamena adhyuṣitaḥ priyeṇa
cireṇa vāmaḥ samavepata āśu
gaja indra hasta pratimaḥ ca pīnaḥ
tayoḥ dvayoḥ saṃhatayoḥ sujātaḥ
praspandamānaḥ punar ūruḥ asyā
rāmam purastāt sthitam ācacakṣe
śubham punar hema samāna varṇam
īṣat rajaḥ dhvastam iva amala akṣyāḥ
vāsaḥ sthitāyāḥ śikhara agra dantyāḥ
kim cit parisraṃsata cāru gātryāḥ
etaiḥ nimittaiḥ aparaiḥ ca subhrūḥ
saṃbodhitā prāk api sādhu siddhaiḥ
vāta ātapa klāntam iva pranaṣṭam
varṣeṇa bījam pratisaṃjaharṣa
tasyāḥ punar bimba phala upama oṣṭham
su akṣi bhru keśa antam arāla pakṣma
vaktram babhāse sita śukla daṃṣṭram
rāhoḥ mukhāt candraḥ iva pramuktaḥ
sā vīta śokā vyapanīta tandrī
śānta jvarā harṣa vibuddha sattvā
aśobhata āryā vadanena śukle
śīta anśunā rātriḥ iva uditena

original: 5.028.001a hanumān api vikrāntaḥ sarvaṃ śuśrāva tattvataḥ
analyzed: hanumān api vikrāntaḥ sarvam śuśrāva tattvataḥ

original: 5.028.001c sītāyās trijaṭāyāś ca rākṣasīnāṃ ca tarjanam
analyzed: sītāyāḥ trijaṭāyāḥ ca rākṣasīnām ca tarjanam

original: 5.028.002a avekṣamāṇas tāṃ devīṃ devatām iva nandane
analyzed: avekṣamāṇaḥ tām devīm devatām iva nandane

original: 5.028.002c tato bahuvidhāṃ cintāṃ cintayām āsa vānaraḥ
analyzed: tatas bahuvidhām cintām cintayām āsa vānaraḥ

original: 5.028.003a yāṃ kapīnāṃ sahasrāṇi subahūny ayutāni ca
analyzed: yām kapīnām sahasrāṇi su bahūni ayutāni ca

original: 5.028.003c dikṣu sarvāsu mārgante seyam āsāditā mayā
analyzed: dikṣu sarvāsu mārgante sā iyam āsāditā mayā

original: 5.028.004a cāreṇa tu suyuktena śatroḥ śaktim avekṣitā
analyzed: cāreṇa tu su yuktena śatroḥ śaktim avekṣitā

original: 5.028.004c gūḍhena caratā tāvad avekṣitam idaṃ mayā
analyzed: gūḍhena caratā tāvat avekṣitam idam mayā

original: 5.028.005a rākṣasānāṃ viśeṣaś ca purī ceyam avekṣitā
analyzed: rākṣasānām viśeṣaḥ ca purī ca iyam avekṣitā
rākṣasa adhipateḥ asya prabhāvaḥ rāvaṇasya ca
yuktam tasya aprameyasya sarva sattva dayāvataḥ
samāśvāsayitum bhāryām pati darśana kāṅkṣiṇīm
aham āśvāsayāmi enām pūrṇa candra nibha ānanām

original: 5.028.007c adṛṣṭaduḥkhāṃ duḥkhasya na hy antam adhigacchatīm
analyzed: a dṛṣṭa duḥkhām duḥkhasya na hi antam adhigacchatīm

original: 5.028.008a yadi hy aham imāṃ devīṃ śokopahatacetanām
analyzed: yadi hi aham imām devīm śoka upahata cetanām
an āśvāsya gamiṣyāmi doṣa vat gamanam bhavet

original: 5.028.009a gate hi mayi tatreyaṃ rājaputrī yaśasvinī
analyzed: gate hi mayi tatra iyam rāja putrī yaśasvinī
paritrāṇam a vindantī jānakī jīvitam tyajet
mayā ca sa mahā bāhuḥ pūrṇa candra nibha ānanaḥ
samāśvāsayitum nyāyyaḥ sītā darśana lālasaḥ
niśācarīṇām pratyakṣam akṣamam ca abhibhāṣaṇam

original: 5.028.011c kathaṃ nu khalu kartavyam idaṃ kṛcchra gato hy aham
analyzed: katham nu khalu kartavyam idam kṛcchra gataḥ hi aham
anena rātri śeṣeṇa yadi nā āśvāsyate mayā
sarvathā nā asti saṃdehaḥ parityakṣyati jīvitam

original: 5.028.013a rāmaś ca yadi pṛcchen māṃ kiṃ māṃ sītābravīd vacaḥ
analyzed: rāmaḥ ca yadi pṛcchet mām kim mām sītā bravīt vacaḥ

original: 5.028.013c kim ahaṃ taṃ pratibrūyām asaṃbhāṣya sumadhyamām
analyzed: kim aham tam pratibrūyām a saṃbhāṣya sumadhyamām
sītā saṃdeśa rahitam mām itas tvarayā gatam

original: 5.028.014c nirdahed api kākutsthaḥ kruddhas tīvreṇa cakṣuṣā
analyzed: nirdahet api kākutsthaḥ kruddhaḥ tīvreṇa cakṣuṣā
yadi ced yojayiṣyāmi bhartāram rāma kāraṇāt
vyartham āgamanam tasya sa sainyasya bhaviṣyati

original: 5.028.016a antaraṃ tv aham āsādya rākṣasīnām iha sthitaḥ
analyzed: antaram tu aham āsādya rākṣasīnām iha sthitaḥ
śanais āśvāsayiṣyāmi saṃtāpa bahulām imām

original: 5.028.017a ahaṃ hy atitanuś caiva vanaraś ca viśeṣataḥ
analyzed: aham hi atitanuḥ ca eva vanaraḥ ca viśeṣataḥ
vācam ca udāhariṣyāmi mānuṣīm iha saṃskṛtām

original: 5.028.018a yadi vācaṃ pradāsyāmi dvijātir iva saṃskṛtām
analyzed: yadi vācam pradāsyāmi dvijātiḥ iva saṃskṛtām

original: 5.028.018c rāvaṇaṃ manyamānā māṃ sītā bhītā bhaviṣyati
analyzed: rāvaṇam manyamānā mām sītā bhītā bhaviṣyati

original: 5.028.019a avaśyam eva vaktavyaṃ mānuṣaṃ vākyam arthavat
analyzed: avaśyam eva vaktavyam mānuṣam vākyam arthavat
mayā sāntvayitum śakyā na anyathā iyam aninditā

original: 5.028.020a seyam ālokya me rūpaṃ jānakī bhāṣitaṃ tathā
analyzed: sā iyam ālokya me rūpam jānakī bhāṣitam tathā

original: 5.028.020c rakṣobhis trāsitā pūrvaṃ bhūyas trāsaṃ gamiṣyati
analyzed: rakṣobhiḥ trāsitā pūrvam bhūyas trāsam gamiṣyati
tatas jāta paritrāsā śabdam kuryāt manasvinī
jānamānā viśāla akṣī rāvaṇam kāmarūpiṇam

original: 5.028.022a sītayā ca kṛte śabde sahasā rākṣasīgaṇaḥ
analyzed: sītayā ca kṛte śabde sahasā rākṣasī gaṇaḥ
nānā praharaṇaḥ ghoraḥ sameyāt antaka upamaḥ
tatas mām saṃparikṣipya sarvatas vikṛta ānanāḥ

original: 5.028.023c vadhe ca grahaṇe caiva kuryur yatnaṃ yathābalam
analyzed: vadhe ca grahaṇe ca eva kuryuḥ yatnam yathābalam

original: 5.028.024a taṃ māṃ śākhāḥ praśākhāś ca skandhāṃś cottamaśākhinām
analyzed: tam mām śākhāḥ praśākhāḥ ca skandhān ca uttama śākhinām
dṛṣṭvā viparidhāvantam bhaveyuḥ bhaya śaṅkitāḥ

original: 5.028.025a mama rūpaṃ ca saṃprekṣya vanaṃ vicarato mahat
analyzed: mama rūpam ca saṃprekṣya vanam vicarataḥ mahat
rākṣasyaḥ bhaya vitrastāḥ bhaveyuḥ vikṛta ānanāḥ

original: 5.028.026a tataḥ kuryuḥ samāhvānaṃ rākṣasyo rakṣasām api
analyzed: tatas kuryuḥ samāhvānam rākṣasyaḥ rakṣasām api
rākṣasa indra niyuktānām rākṣasa indra niveśane
te vividha āyudha pāṇayaḥ
āpateyuḥ vimarde smin vegena udvigna kāriṇaḥ

original: 5.028.028a saṃkruddhas tais tu parito vidhaman rakṣasāṃ balam
analyzed: saṃkruddhaḥ taiḥ tu paritas vidhaman rakṣasām balam

original: 5.028.028c śaknuyaṃ na tu saṃprāptuṃ paraṃ pāraṃ mahodadheḥ
analyzed: śaknuyam na tu saṃprāptum param pāram mahā udadheḥ

original: 5.028.029a māṃ vā gṛhṇīyur āplutya bahavaḥ śīghrakāriṇaḥ
analyzed: mām vā gṛhṇīyuḥ āplutya bahavaḥ śīghrakāriṇaḥ

original: 5.028.029c syād iyaṃ cāgṛhītārthā mama ca grahaṇaṃ bhavet
analyzed: syāt iyam ca agṛhīta arthā mama ca grahaṇam bhavet
hiṃsā abhirucayaḥ hiṃsyuḥ imām vā janakātmajām

original: 5.028.030c vipannaṃ syāt tataḥ kāryaṃ rāmasugrīvayor idam
analyzed: vipannam syāt tatas kāryam rāma sugrīvayoḥ idam
uddeśe naṣṭa mārge smin rākṣasaiḥ parivārite
sāgareṇa parikṣipte gupte vasati jānakī

original: 5.028.032a viśaste vā gṛhīte vā rakṣobhir mayi saṃyuge
analyzed: viśaste vā gṛhīte vā rakṣobhiḥ mayi saṃyuge
na anyam paśyāmi rāmasya sahāyam kārya sādhane

original: 5.028.033a vimṛśaṃś ca na paśyāmi yo hate mayi vānaraḥ
analyzed: vimṛśan ca na paśyāmi yaḥ hate mayi vānaraḥ
śata yojana vistīrṇam laṅghayeta mahā udadhim

original: 5.028.034a kāmaṃ hantuṃ samartho 'smi sahasrāṇy api rakṣasām
analyzed: kāmam hantum samarthaḥ smi sahasrāṇi api rakṣasām

original: 5.028.034c na tu śakṣyāmi saṃprāptuṃ paraṃ pāraṃ mahodadheḥ
analyzed: na tu śakṣyāmi saṃprāptum param pāram mahā udadheḥ

original: 5.028.035a asatyāni ca yuddhāni saṃśayo me na rocate
analyzed: asatyāni ca yuddhāni saṃśayaḥ me na rocate

original: 5.028.035c kaś ca niḥsaṃśayaṃ kāryaṃ kuryāt prājñaḥ sasaṃśayam
analyzed: kaḥ ca niḥsaṃśayam kāryam kuryāt prājñaḥ sa saṃśayam

original: 5.028.036a eṣa doṣo mahān hi syān mama sītābhibhāṣaṇe
analyzed: eṣa doṣaḥ mahān hi syāt mama sītā abhibhāṣaṇe
prāṇa tyāgaḥ ca vaidehyāḥ bhavet anabhibhāṣaṇe
bhūtāḥ ca arthāḥ vinaśyanti deśa kāla virodhitāḥ

original: 5.028.037c viklavaṃ dūtam āsādya tamaḥ sūryodaye yathā
analyzed: viklavam dūtam āsādya tamaḥ sūrya udaye yathā
artha anartha antare buddhiḥ niścitā api na śobhate
ghātayanti hi kāryāṇi dūtāḥ paṇḍita māninaḥ

original: 5.028.039a na vinaśyet kathaṃ kāryaṃ vaiklavyaṃ na kathaṃ bhavet
analyzed: na vinaśyet katham kāryam vaiklavyam na katham bhavet

original: 5.028.039c laṅghanaṃ ca samudrasya kathaṃ nu na vṛthā bhavet
analyzed: laṅghanam ca samudrasya katham nu na vṛthā bhavet

original: 5.028.040a kathaṃ nu khalu vākyaṃ me śṛṇuyān nodvijeta ca
analyzed: katham nu khalu vākyam me śṛṇuyāt na udvijeta ca

original: 5.028.040c iti saṃcintya hanumāṃś cakāra matimān matim
analyzed: iti saṃcintya hanumān cakāra matimān matim
rāmam akliṣṭa karmāṇam sva bandhum anukīrtayan
na enām udvejayiṣyāmi tat bandhu gata mānasām
ikṣvākūṇām variṣṭhasya rāmasya vidita ātmanaḥ
śubhāni dharma yuktāni vacanāni samarpayan
śrāvayiṣyāmi sarvāṇi madhurām prabruvan giram

original: 5.028.043c śraddhāsyati yathā hīyaṃ tathā sarvaṃ samādadhe
analyzed: śraddhāsyati yathā hi iyam tathā sarvam samādadhe
iti sa bahuvidham mahā anubhāvaḥ
jagatipateḥ pramadām avekṣamāṇaḥ
madhuram avitatham jagāda vākyam
druma viṭapa antaram āsthitaḥ hanūmān
evam bahuvidhām cintām cintayitvā mahā kapiḥ

original: 5.029.001c saṃśrave madhuraṃ vākyaṃ vaidehyā vyājahāra ha
analyzed: saṃśrave madhuram vākyam vaidehyāḥ vyājahāra ha
rājā daśarathaḥ nāma ratha kuñjara vājinām
puṇya śīlaḥ mahā kīrtiḥ ṛjuḥ āsīt mahā yaśāḥ
cakravarti kule jātaḥ puraṃdara samaḥ bale
mukhyaḥ ca ikṣvāku vaṃśasya lakṣmīvān lakṣmi vardhanaḥ
pārthiva vyañjanaiḥ yuktaḥ pṛthu śrīḥ pārthiva ṛṣabhaḥ
pṛthivyām catur antayām viśrutaḥ sukha daḥ sukhī
tasya putraḥ priyaḥ jyeṣṭhaḥ tārādhipa nibha ānanaḥ
rāmaḥ nāma viśeṣa jñaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ sarva dhanuṣmatām
rakṣitā svasya vṛttasya sva janasya api rakṣitā
rakṣitā jīva lokasya dharmasya ca paraṃtapaḥ
tasya satya abhisaṃdhasya vṛddhasya vacanāt pituḥ

original: 5.029.007c sabhāryaḥ saha ca bhrātrā vīraḥ pravrajito vanam
analyzed: sa bhāryaḥ saha ca bhrātrā vīraḥ pravrajitaḥ vanam
tena tatra mahā araṇye mṛgayām paridhāvatā
janasthāna vadham śrutvā hatau ca khara dūṣaṇau

original: 5.029.008e tatas tv amarṣāpahṛtā jānakī rāvaṇena tu
analyzed: tatas tu amarṣa apahṛtā jānakī rāvaṇena tu
yathārūpām yathā varṇām yathā alakṣmīm viniścitām
aśrauṣam rāghavasya aham sā iyam āsāditā mayā
virarāma evam uktvā asau vācam vānara puṃgavaḥ

original: 5.029.010c jānakī cāpi tac chrutvā vismayaṃ paramaṃ gatā
analyzed: jānakī ca api tat śrutvā vismayam paramam gatā
tatas sā vakra keśa antā sukeśī keśa saṃvṛtam
unnamya vadanam bhīruḥ śiṃśapā vṛkṣam aikṣata

original: 5.029.012a sā tiryag ūrdhvaṃ ca tathāpy adhastān;
analyzed: sā tiryak ūrdhvam ca tathā api adhastān
nirīkṣamāṇā tam a cintya buddhim
dadarśa piṅga adhipateḥ amātyam
vātātmajam sūryam iva udaya stham
tatas śākhā antare līnam dṛṣṭvā calita mānasā

original: 5.030.001c sā dadarśa kapiṃ tatra praśritaṃ priyavādinam
analyzed: sā dadarśa kapim tatra praśritam priya vādinam

original: 5.030.002a sā tu dṛṣṭvā hariśreṣṭhaṃ vinītavad upasthitam
analyzed: sā tu dṛṣṭvā hari śreṣṭham vinīta vat upasthitam

original: 5.030.002c maithilī cintayām āsa svapno 'yam iti bhāminī
analyzed: maithilī cintayām āsa svapnaḥ yam iti bhāminī
sā tam samīkṣya eva bhṛśam visaṃjñā
gatāsu kalpā iva babhūva sītā
cireṇa saṃjñām pratilabhya ca eva
vicintayām āsa viśāla netrā
svapnaḥ mayā ayam vikṛtaḥ dya dṛṣṭaḥ
śākhāmṛgaḥ śāstra gaṇaiḥ niṣiddhaḥ
svasti astu rāmāya sa lakṣmaṇāya
tathā pituḥ me janakasya rājñaḥ

original: 5.030.005a svapno 'pi nāyaṃ na hi me 'sti nidrā;
analyzed: svapnaḥ na ayam na hi me sti nidrā
śokena duḥkhena ca pīḍitāyāḥ

original: 5.030.005c sukhaṃ hi me nāsti yato 'smi hīnā;
analyzed: sukham hi me nā asti yatas smi hīnā
tena indu pūrṇa pratimā ānanena
aham hi tasya adya manaḥ bhavena
saṃpīḍitā tat gata sarva bhāvā
vicintayantī satatam tam eva
tathā eva paśyāmi tathā śṛṇomi
manorathaḥ syāt iti cintayāmi
tathā api buddhyā ca vitarkayāmi

original: 5.030.007c kiṃ kāraṇaṃ tasya hi nāsti rūpaṃ;
analyzed: kim kāraṇam tasya hi na asti rūpam
su vyakta rūpaḥ ca vadati ayam mām
namaḥ stu vācaspataye sa vajriṇe
svayambhuve ca eva hutāśanāya
anena ca uktam yat idam mama agratas
vanaukasā tat ca tathā astu na anyathā
tām abravīt mahā tejāḥ hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ

original: 5.031.001c śirasy añjalim ādhāya sītāṃ madhurayā girā
analyzed: śirasi añjalim ādhāya sītām madhurayā girā
kā nu padma palāśa akṣī kliṣṭa kauśeya vāsinī

original: 5.031.002c drumasya śākhām ālambya tiṣṭhasi tvam aninditā
analyzed: drumasya śākhām ālambya tiṣṭhasi tvam aninditā

original: 5.031.003a kimarthaṃ tava netrābhyāṃ vāri sravati śokajam
analyzed: kimartham tava netrābhyām vāri sravati śoka jam
puṇḍarīka palāśābhyām viprakīrṇam iva udakam
surāṇām asurāṇām ca nāga gandharva rakṣasām

original: 5.031.004c yakṣāṇāṃ kiṃnarāṇāṃ ca kā tvaṃ bhavasi śobhane
analyzed: yakṣāṇām kiṃnarāṇām ca kā tvam bhavasi śobhane

original: 5.031.005a kā tvaṃ bhavasi rudrāṇāṃ marutāṃ vā varānane
analyzed: kā tvam bhavasi rudrāṇām marutām vā varānane

original: 5.031.005c vasūnāṃ vā varārohe devatā pratibhāsi me
analyzed: vasūnām vā varārohe devatā pratibhāsi me

original: 5.031.006a kiṃ nu candramasā hīnā patitā vibudhālayāt
analyzed: kim nu candramasā hīnā patitā vibudha ālayāt

original: 5.031.007a kopād vā yadi vā mohād bhartāram asitekṣaṇā
analyzed: kopāt vā yadi vā mohāt bhartāram asita īkṣaṇā

original: 5.031.007c vasiṣṭhaṃ kopayitvā tvaṃ nāsi kalyāṇy arundhatī
analyzed: vasiṣṭham kopayitvā tvam na asi kalyāṇī arundhatī

original: 5.031.008a ko nau putraḥ pitā bhrāta bhartā vā te sumadhyame
analyzed: kaḥ nau putraḥ pitā bhrāta bhartā vā te sumadhyame

original: 5.031.008c asmāl lokād amuṃ lokaṃ gataṃ tvam anuśocasi
analyzed: asmāt lokāt amum lokam gatam tvam anuśocasi

original: 5.031.009a vyañjanāni hi te yāni lakṣaṇāni ca lakṣaye
analyzed: vyañjanāni hi te yāni lakṣaṇāni ca lakṣaye
mahiṣī bhūmipālasya rāja kanyā asi me matā
rāvaṇena janasthānāt balāt apahṛtā yadi

original: 5.031.010c sītā tvam asi bhadraṃ te tan mamācakṣva pṛcchataḥ
analyzed: sītā tvam asi bhadram te tat mama ācakṣva pṛcchataḥ
sā tasya vacanam śrutvā rāma kīrtana harṣitā
uvāca vākyam vaidehī hanūmantam druma āśritam
duhitā janakasya aham vaidehasya mahātmanaḥ

original: 5.031.012c sītā ca nāma nāmnāhaṃ bhāryā rāmasya dhīmataḥ
analyzed: sītā ca nāma nāmnā aham bhāryā rāmasya dhīmataḥ
samāḥ dvādaśa tatra aham rāghavasya niveśane
bhuñjānā mānuṣān bhogān sarva kāma samṛddhinī
tatas trayodaśe varṣe rājyena ikṣvāku nandanam
abhiṣecayitum rājā sa upādhyāyaḥ pracakrame
tasmin saṃbhriyamāṇe tu rāghavasya abhiṣecane

original: 5.031.015c kaikeyī nāma bhartāraṃ devī vacanam abravīt
analyzed: kaikeyī nāma bhartāram devī vacanam abravīt

original: 5.031.016a na pibeyaṃ na khādeyaṃ pratyahaṃ mama bhojanam
analyzed: na pibeyam na khādeyam pratyaham mama bhojanam

original: 5.031.016c eṣa me jīvitasyānto rāmo yady abhiṣicyate
analyzed: eṣa me jīvitasya antaḥ rāmaḥ yadi abhiṣicyate

original: 5.031.017a yat tad uktaṃ tvayā vākyaṃ prītyā nṛpatisattama
analyzed: yat tat uktam tvayā vākyam prītyā nṛpati sattama

original: 5.031.017c tac cen na vitathaṃ kāryaṃ vanaṃ gacchatu rāghavaḥ
analyzed: tat ced na vitatham kāryam vanam gacchatu rāghavaḥ

original: 5.031.018a sa rājā satyavāg devyā varadānam anusmaran
analyzed: sa rājā satya vāc devyāḥ vara dānam anusmaran

original: 5.031.018c mumoha vacanaṃ śrutvā kaikeyyāḥ krūram apriyam
analyzed: mumoha vacanam śrutvā kaikeyyāḥ krūram apriyam

original: 5.031.019a tatas tu sthaviro rājā satyadharme vyavasthitaḥ
analyzed: tatas tu sthaviraḥ rājā satya dharme vyavasthitaḥ

original: 5.031.019c jyeṣṭhaṃ yaśasvinaṃ putraṃ rudan rājyam ayācata
analyzed: jyeṣṭham yaśasvinam putram rudan rājyam ayācata

original: 5.031.020a sa pitur vacanaṃ śrīmān abhiṣekāt paraṃ priyam
analyzed: sa pituḥ vacanam śrīmān abhiṣekāt param priyam
manasā pūrvam āsādya vācā pratigṛhītavān

original: 5.031.021a dadyān na pratigṛhṇīyān na brūyat kiṃ cid apriyam
analyzed: dadyāt na pratigṛhṇīyāt na brūyat kim cit apriyam
api jīvita hetoḥ hi rāmaḥ satya parākramaḥ
sa vihāya uttarīyāṇi mahārhāṇi mahā yaśāḥ

original: 5.031.022c visṛjya manasā rājyaṃ jananyai māṃ samādiśat
analyzed: visṛjya manasā rājyam jananyai mām samādiśat
sā aham tasya agratas tūrṇam prasthitā vana cāriṇī

original: 5.031.023c na hi me tena hīnāyā vāsaḥ svarge 'pi rocate
analyzed: na hi me tena hīnāyāḥ vāsaḥ svarge pi rocate

original: 5.031.024a prāg eva tu mahābhāgaḥ saumitrir mitranandanaḥ
analyzed: prāk eva tu mahābhāgaḥ saumitriḥ mitra nandanaḥ
pūrvajasya anuyātra arthe druma cīraiḥ alaṃkṛtaḥ

original: 5.031.025a te vayaṃ bhartur ādeśaṃ bahu mānyadṛḍhavratāḥ
analyzed: te vayam bhartuḥ ādeśam bahu mānya dṛḍha vratāḥ

original: 5.031.025c praviṣṭāḥ sma purād dṛṣṭaṃ vanaṃ gambhīradarśanam
analyzed: praviṣṭāḥ sma purāt dṛṣṭam vanam gambhīra darśanam
vasataḥ daṇḍaka araṇye tasya aham amita ojasaḥ
rakṣasā apahṛtā bhāryā rāvaṇena durātmanā

original: 5.031.027a dvau māsau tena me kālo jīvitānugrahaḥ kṛtaḥ
analyzed: dvau māsau tena me kālaḥ jīvita anugrahaḥ kṛtaḥ

original: 5.031.027c ūrdhvaṃ dvābhyāṃ tu māsābhyāṃ tatas tyakṣyāmi jīvitam
analyzed: ūrdhvam dvābhyām tu māsābhyām tatas tyakṣyāmi jīvitam
tasyāḥ tat vacanam śrutvā hanūmān hari yūthapaḥ
duḥkhāt duḥkha abhibhūtāyāḥ sa antam uttaram abravīt

original: 5.032.002a ahaṃ rāmasya saṃdeśād devi dūtas tavāgataḥ
analyzed: aham rāmasya saṃdeśāt devi dūtaḥ tava āgataḥ

original: 5.032.002c vaidehi kuśalī rāmas tvāṃ ca kauśalam abravīt
analyzed: vaidehi kuśalī rāmaḥ tvām ca kauśalam abravīt

original: 5.032.003a yo brāhmam astraṃ vedāṃś ca veda vedavidāṃ varaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ brāhmam astram vedān ca veda veda vidām varaḥ

original: 5.032.003c sa tvāṃ dāśarathī rāmo devi kauśalam abravīt
analyzed: sa tvām dāśarathiḥ rāmaḥ devi kauśalam abravīt

original: 5.032.004a lakṣmaṇaś ca mahātejā bhartus te 'nucaraḥ priyaḥ
analyzed: lakṣmaṇaḥ ca mahā tejāḥ bhartuḥ te nucaraḥ priyaḥ
kṛtavām śoka saṃtaptaḥ śirasā te bhivādanam

original: 5.032.005a sā tayoḥ kuśalaṃ devī niśamya narasiṃhayoḥ
analyzed: sā tayoḥ kuśalam devī niśamya nara siṃhayoḥ
prīti saṃhṛṣṭa sarva aṅgī hanumantam atha abravīt

original: 5.032.006a kalyāṇī bata gatheyaṃ laukikī pratibhāti me
analyzed: kalyāṇī bata gathā iyam laukikī pratibhāti me

original: 5.032.006c ehi jīvantam ānado naraṃ varṣaśatād api
analyzed: ehi jīvantam ānadaḥ naram varṣa śatāt api
tayoḥ samāgame tasmin prītiḥ utpāditā adbhutā
paraspareṇa ca ālāpam viśvastau tau pracakratuḥ
tasyāḥ tat vacanam śrutvā hanūmān hari yūthapaḥ
sītāyāḥ śoka dīnāyāḥ samīpam upacakrame

original: 5.032.009a yathā yathā samīpaṃ sa hanūmān upasarpati
analyzed: yathā yathā samīpam sa hanūmān upasarpati

original: 5.032.009c tathā tathā rāvaṇaṃ sā taṃ sītā pariśaṅkate
analyzed: tathā tathā rāvaṇam sā tam sītā pariśaṅkate

original: 5.032.010a aho dhig dhik kṛtam idaṃ kathitaṃ hi yad asya me
analyzed: aho dhik dhik kṛtam idam kathitam hi yat asya me

original: 5.032.010c rūpāntaram upāgamya sa evāyaṃ hi rāvaṇaḥ
analyzed: rūpa antaram upāgamya saḥ eva ayam hi rāvaṇaḥ

original: 5.032.011a tām aśokasya śākhāṃ sā vimuktvā śokakarśitā
analyzed: tām aśokasya śākhām sā vimuktvā śoka karśitā
tasyām eva anavadya aṅgī dharaṇyām samupāviśat
avandata mahā bāhuḥ tatas tām janakātmajām
sā ca enam bhaya vitrastā bhūyas na eva abhyudaikṣata

original: 5.032.013a taṃ dṛṣṭvā vandamānaṃ tu sītā śaśinibhānanā
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā vandamānam tu sītā śaśi nibha ānanā
abravīt dīrgham ucchvasya vānaram madhura svarā

original: 5.032.014a māyāṃ praviṣṭo māyāvī yadi tvaṃ rāvaṇaḥ svayam
analyzed: māyām praviṣṭaḥ māyāvī yadi tvam rāvaṇaḥ svayam

original: 5.032.014c utpādayasi me bhūyaḥ saṃtāpaṃ tan na śobhanam
analyzed: utpādayasi me bhūyas saṃtāpam tat na śobhanam
svam parityajya rūpam yaḥ parivrājaka rūpa dhṛt

original: 5.032.015c janasthāne mayā dṛṣṭas tvaṃ sa evāsi rāvaṇaḥ
analyzed: janasthāne mayā dṛṣṭaḥ tvam saḥ eva asi rāvaṇaḥ
upavāsa kṛśām dīnām kāmarūpa niśācara

original: 5.032.016c saṃtāpayasi māṃ bhūyaḥ saṃtāpaṃ tan na śobhanam
analyzed: saṃtāpayasi mām bhūyas saṃtāpam tat na śobhanam

original: 5.032.017a yadi rāmasya dūtas tvam āgato bhadram astu te
analyzed: yadi rāmasya dūtaḥ tvam āgataḥ bhadram astu te

original: 5.032.017c pṛcchāmi tvāṃ hariśreṣṭha priyā rāma kathā hi me
analyzed: pṛcchāmi tvām hari śreṣṭha priyā rāma kathā hi me

original: 5.032.018a guṇān rāmasya kathaya priyasya mama vānara
analyzed: guṇān rāmasya kathaya priyasya mama vānara

original: 5.032.018c cittaṃ harasi me saumya nadīkūlaṃ yathā rayaḥ
analyzed: cittam harasi me saumya nadī kūlam yathā rayaḥ

original: 5.032.019a aho svapnasya sukhatā yāham evaṃ cirāhṛtā
analyzed: aho svapnasya sukha tā yā aham evam cira āhṛtā
preṣitam nāma paśyāmi rāghaveṇa vanaukasam

original: 5.032.020a svapne 'pi yady ahaṃ vīraṃ rāghavaṃ sahalakṣmaṇam
analyzed: svapne yadi aham vīram rāghavam sahalakṣmaṇam
paśyeyam na avasīdeyam svapnaḥ mama matsarī

original: 5.032.021a nāhaṃ svapnam imaṃ manye svapne dṛṣṭvā hi vānaram
analyzed: na aham svapnam imam manye svapne dṛṣṭvā hi vānaram

original: 5.032.021c na śakyo 'bhyudayaḥ prāptuṃ prāptaś cābhyudayo mama
analyzed: na śakyaḥ bhyudayaḥ prāptum prāptaḥ ca abhyudayaḥ mama

original: 5.032.022a kiṃ nu syāc cittamoho 'yaṃ bhaved vātagatis tv iyam
analyzed: kim nu syāt citta mohaḥ yam bhavet vāta gatiḥ tu iyam

original: 5.032.022c unmādajo vikāro vā syād iyaṃ mṛgatṛṣṇikā
analyzed: unmāda jaḥ vikāraḥ vā syāt iyam mṛgatṛṣṇikā

original: 5.032.023a atha vā nāyam unmādo moho 'py unmādalakṣmaṇaḥ
analyzed: atha vā na ayam unmādaḥ unmāda lakṣmaṇaḥ

original: 5.032.023c saṃbudhye cāham ātmānam imaṃ cāpi vanaukasaṃ
analyzed: saṃbudhye ca aham ātmānam imam ca api vanaukasam

original: 5.032.024a ity evaṃ bahudhā sītā saṃpradhārya balābalam
analyzed: iti evam bahudhā sītā saṃpradhārya balābalam
rakṣasām kāmarūpa tvāt mene tam rākṣasa adhipam

original: 5.032.025a etāṃ buddhiṃ tadā kṛtvā sītā sā tanumadhyamā
analyzed: etām buddhim tadā kṛtvā sītā sā tanu madhyamā
na prativyājahāra atha vānaram janakātmajā
sītāyāḥ cintitam buddhvā hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
śrotra anukūlaiḥ vacanaiḥ tadā tām saṃpraharṣayat

original: 5.032.027a āditya iva tejasvī lokakāntaḥ śaśī yathā
analyzed: ādityaḥ iva tejasvī loka kāntaḥ śaśī yathā

original: 5.032.027c rājā sarvasya lokasya devo vaiśravaṇo yathā
analyzed: rājā sarvasya lokasya devaḥ vaiśravaṇaḥ yathā
vikrameṇa upapannaḥ ca yathā viṣṇuḥ mahā yaśāḥ
satya vādī madhura vāc devaḥ vācaspatiḥ yathā

original: 5.032.029a rūpavān subhagaḥ śrīmān kandarpa iva mūrtimān
analyzed: rūpavān subhagaḥ śrīmān kandarpaḥ iva mūrtimān
sthāna krodha prahartā ca śreṣṭhaḥ loke mahā rathaḥ
bāhu chāyām avaṣṭabdhaḥ yasya lokaḥ mahātmanaḥ
apakṛṣya āśrama padāt mṛga rūpeṇa rāghavam

original: 5.032.030c śūnye yenāpanītāsi tasya drakṣyasi yat phalam
analyzed: śūnye yena apanītā asi tasya drakṣyasi yat phalam

original: 5.032.031a nacirād rāvaṇaṃ saṃkhye yo vadhiṣyati vīryavān
analyzed: nacirāt rāvaṇam saṃkhye yaḥ vadhiṣyati vīryavān
roṣa pramuktaiḥ iṣubhiḥ jvaladbhiḥ iva pāvakaiḥ
tena aham preṣitaḥ dūtaḥ tvad sakāśam iha āgataḥ

original: 5.032.032c tvadviyogena duḥkhārtaḥ sa tvāṃ kauśalam abravīt
analyzed: tvad viyogena duḥkha ārtaḥ sa tvām kauśalam abravīt
lakṣmaṇaḥ ca mahā tejāḥ sumitrā ānanda vardhanaḥ
abhivādya mahā bāhuḥ saḥ pi kauśalam abravīt

original: 5.032.034a rāmasya ca sakhā devi sugrīvo nāma vānaraḥ
analyzed: rāmasya ca sakhā devi sugrīvaḥ nāma vānaraḥ

original: 5.032.034c rājā vānaramukhyānāṃ sa tvāṃ kauśalam abravīt
analyzed: rājā vānara mukhyānām sa tvām kauśalam abravīt

original: 5.032.035a nityaṃ smarati rāmas tvāṃ sasugrīvaḥ salakṣmaṇaḥ
analyzed: nityam smarati rāmaḥ tvām sa sugrīvaḥ sa lakṣmaṇaḥ

original: 5.032.035c diṣṭyā jīvasi vaidehi rākṣasī vaśam āgatā
analyzed: diṣṭyā jīvasi vaidehi rākṣasī vaśam āgatā

original: 5.032.036a nacirād drakṣyase rāmaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahāratham
analyzed: nacirāt drakṣyase rāmam lakṣmaṇam ca mahā ratham
madhye vānara koṭīnām sugrīvam ca amita ojasam
aham sugrīva sacivaḥ hanūmān nāma vānaraḥ
praviṣṭaḥ nagarīm laṅkām laṅghayitvā mahā udadhim
kṛtvā mūrdhni padanyāsam rāvaṇasya durātmanaḥ
tvām draṣṭum upayātaḥ ham samāśritya parākramam

original: 5.032.039a nāham asmi tathā devi yathā mām avagacchasi
analyzed: na aham asmi tathā devi yathā mām avagacchasi

original: 5.032.039c viśaṅkā tyajyatām eṣā śraddhatsva vadato mama
analyzed: viśaṅkā tyajyatām eṣā śraddhatsva vadataḥ mama

original: 5.033.001a tāṃ tu rāma kathāṃ śrutvā vaidehī vānararṣabhāt
analyzed: tām tu rāma kathām śrutvā vaidehī vānara ṛṣabhāt

original: 5.033.001c uvāca vacanaṃ sāntvam idaṃ madhurayā girā
analyzed: uvāca vacanam sāntvam idam madhurayā girā

original: 5.033.002a kva te rāmeṇa saṃsargaḥ kathaṃ jānāsi lakṣmaṇam
analyzed: kva te rāmeṇa saṃsargaḥ katham jānāsi lakṣmaṇam

original: 5.033.002c vānarāṇāṃ narāṇāṃ ca katham āsīt samāgamaḥ
analyzed: vānarāṇām narāṇām ca katham āsīt samāgamaḥ

original: 5.033.003a yāni rāmasya liṅgāni lakṣmaṇasya ca vānara
analyzed: yāni rāmasya liṅgāni lakṣmaṇasya ca vānara

original: 5.033.003c tāni bhūyaḥ samācakṣva na māṃ śokaḥ samāviśet
analyzed: tāni bhūyas samācakṣva na mām śokaḥ samāviśet

original: 5.033.004a kīdṛśaṃ tasya saṃsthānaṃ rūpaṃ rāmasya kīdṛśam
analyzed: kīdṛśam tasya saṃsthānam rūpam rāmasya kīdṛśam

original: 5.033.004c katham ūrū kathaṃ bāhū lakṣmaṇasya ca śaṃsa me
analyzed: katham ūrū katham bāhū lakṣmaṇasya ca śaṃsa me

original: 5.033.005a evam uktas tu vaidehyā hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu vaidehyā hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
tatas rāmam yathātattvam ākhyātum upacakrame

original: 5.033.006a jānantī bata diṣṭyā māṃ vaidehi paripṛcchasi
analyzed: jānantī bata diṣṭyā mām vaidehi paripṛcchasi
bhartuḥ kamala patra akṣi saṃkhyānam lakṣmaṇasya ca

original: 5.033.007a yāni rāmasya cihnāni lakṣmaṇasya ca yāni vai
analyzed: yāni rāmasya cihnāni lakṣmaṇasya ca yāni vai

original: 5.033.007c lakṣitāni viśālākṣi vadataḥ śṛṇu tāni me
analyzed: lakṣitāni viśāla akṣi vadataḥ śṛṇu tāni me
rāmaḥ kamala pattra akṣaḥ sarva bhūta manoharaḥ
rūpa dākṣiṇya saṃpannaḥ prasūtaḥ janakātmaje
tejasā āditya saṃkāśaḥ kṣamayā pṛthivī samaḥ
bṛhaspati samaḥ buddhyā yaśasā vāsava upamaḥ
rakṣitā jīva lokasya sva janasya ca rakṣitā

original: 5.033.010c rakṣitā svasya vṛttasya dharmasya ca paraṃtapaḥ
analyzed: rakṣitā svasya vṛttasya dharmasya ca paraṃtapaḥ
rāmaḥ bhāmini lokasya cāturvarṇyasya rakṣitā

original: 5.033.011c maryādānāṃ ca lokasya kartā kārayitā ca saḥ
analyzed: maryādānām ca lokasya kartā kārayitā ca saḥ
arciṣmān u tyartham brahmacarya vrate sthitaḥ
sādhūnām upakāra jñaḥ pracāra jñaḥ ca karmaṇām
rāja vidyā vinītaḥ ca brāhmaṇānām upāsitā
śrutavān śīla saṃpannaḥ vinītaḥ ca paraṃtapaḥ
yajurveda vinītaḥ ca veda vidbhiḥ su pūjitaḥ

original: 5.033.014c dhanurvede ca vede ca vedāṅgeṣu ca niṣṭhitaḥ
analyzed: dhanurvede ca vede ca vedāṅgeṣu ca niṣṭhitaḥ
vipula aṃsaḥ mahā bāhuḥ kambu grīvaḥ śubha ānanaḥ

original: 5.033.015c gūḍhajatruḥ sutāmrākṣo rāmo devi janaiḥ śrutaḥ
analyzed: gūḍha jatruḥ sutāmra akṣaḥ rāmaḥ devi janaiḥ śrutaḥ
dundubhi svana nirghoṣaḥ snigdha varṇaḥ pratāpavān
samaḥ sama vibhakta aṅgaḥ varṇam śyāmam samāśritaḥ

original: 5.033.017a tristhiras tripralambaś ca trisamas triṣu connataḥ
analyzed: tri sthiraḥ tri pralambaḥ ca tri samaḥ triṣu ca unnataḥ
trivalīvān tri avaṇataḥ catur vyaṅgaḥ tri śīrṣavān
catuṣkalaḥ catur lekhaḥ catuṣkiṣkuḥ catuḥsamaḥ
caturdaśa sama dvandvaḥ catur daṣṭaḥ catur gatiḥ
mahā oṣṭha hanu nāsaḥ ca pañca snigdhaḥ ṣṭa vaṃśavān
daśa padmaḥ daśa bṛhat tribhiḥ vyāptaḥ dvi śuklavān
ṣaṣ unnataḥ nava tanuḥ tribhiḥ vyāpnoti rāghavaḥ
satya dharma paraḥ śrīmān saṃgraha anugrahe rataḥ

original: 5.033.021a bhrātā ca tasya dvaimātraḥ saumitrir aparājitaḥ
analyzed: bhrātā ca tasya dvaimātraḥ saumitriḥ aparājitaḥ
anurāgeṇa rūpeṇa guṇaiḥ ca eva tathāvidhaḥ

original: 5.033.022a tvām eva mārgamāṇo tau vicarantau vasuṃdharām
analyzed: tvām eva mārgamāṇo tau vicarantau vasuṃdharām
dadarśatuḥ mṛgapatim pūrvajena avaropitam
ṛśyamūkasya pṛṣṭhe tu bahu pādapa saṃkule
bhrātuḥ bhāryā ārtam āsīnam sugrīvam priya darśanam

original: 5.033.024a vayaṃ tu harirājaṃ taṃ sugrīvaṃ satyasaṃgaram
analyzed: vayam tu hari rājam tam sugrīvam satya saṃgaram
paricaryāmahe rājyāt pūrvajena avaropitam
tatas tau cīra vasanau dhanuḥ pravara pāṇinau
ṛśyamūkasya śailasya ramyam deśam upāgatau

original: 5.033.026a sa tau dṛṣṭvā naravyāghrau dhanvinau vānararṣabhaḥ
analyzed: sa tau dṛṣṭvā nara vyāghrau dhanvinau vānara ṛṣabhaḥ
abhiplutaḥ gireḥ tasya śikharam bhaya mohitaḥ

original: 5.033.027a tataḥ sa śikhare tasmin vānarendro vyavasthitaḥ
analyzed: tatas sa śikhare tasmin vānara indraḥ vyavasthitaḥ

original: 5.033.027c tayoḥ samīpaṃ mām eva preṣayām āsa satvaraḥ
analyzed: tayoḥ samīpam mām eva preṣayām āsa sa tvaraḥ
tau aham puruṣa vyāghrau sugrīva vacanāt prabhū
rūpa lakṣaṇa saṃpannau kṛtāñjaliḥ upasthitaḥ
tau parijñāta tattva arthau mayā prīti samanvitau

original: 5.033.029c pṛṣṭham āropya taṃ deśaṃ prāpitau puruṣarṣabhau
analyzed: pṛṣṭham āropya tam deśam prāpitau puruṣa ṛṣabhau
niveditau ca tattvena sugrīvāya mahātmane
tayoḥ anyonya saṃbhāṣāt bhṛśam prītiḥ ajāyata
tatra tau kīrti saṃpannau hari īśvara nara īśvarau
paraspara kṛta āśvāsau kathayā pūrva vṛttayā

original: 5.033.032a taṃ tataḥ sāntvayām āsa sugrīvaṃ lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ
analyzed: tam tatas sāntvayām āsa sugrīvam lakṣmaṇa agrajaḥ

original: 5.033.032c strīhetor vālinā bhrātrā nirastam uru tejasā
analyzed: strī hetoḥ vālinā bhrātrā nirastam uru tejasā
tatas tvad nāśa jam śokam rāmasya akliṣṭa karmaṇaḥ
lakṣmaṇaḥ vānara indrāya sugrīvāya nyavedayat

original: 5.033.034a sa śrutvā vānarendras tu lakṣmaṇeneritaṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: sa śrutvā vānara indraḥ tu lakṣmaṇena īritam vacaḥ
tadā āsīt niṣprabhaḥ tyartham graha grastaḥ iva aṃśumān
tatas tvad gātra śobhīni rakṣasā hriyamāṇayā
yāni ābharaṇa jālāni pātitāni mahī tale
tāni sarvāṇi rāmāya ānīya hari yūthapāḥ

original: 5.033.036c saṃhṛṣṭā darśayām āsur gatiṃ tu na vidus tava
analyzed: saṃhṛṣṭāḥ darśayām āsuḥ gatim tu na viduḥ tava
tāni rāmāya dattāni mayā eva upahṛtāni ca
svanavanti tasmin vihata cetasi

original: 5.033.038a tāny aṅke darśanīyāni kṛtvā bahuvidhaṃ tataḥ
analyzed: tāni aṅke darśanīyāni kṛtvā bahuvidham tatas
tena devaprakāśena devena paridevitam

original: 5.033.039a paśyatas tasyā rudatas tāmyataś ca punaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: paśyataḥ tasyāḥ rudataḥ tāmyataḥ ca punar punar
prādīpayan dāśaratheḥ tāni śoka hutāśanam

original: 5.033.040a śayitaṃ ca ciraṃ tena duḥkhārtena mahātmanā
analyzed: śayitam ca ciram tena duḥkha ārtena mahātmanā

original: 5.033.040c mayāpi vividhair vākyaiḥ kṛcchrād utthāpitaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: mayā api vividhaiḥ vākyaiḥ kṛcchrāt utthāpitaḥ punar

original: 5.033.041a tāni dṛṣṭvā mahārhāṇi darśayitvā muhur muhuḥ
analyzed: tāni dṛṣṭvā mahārhāṇi darśayitvā muhur muhur
rāghavaḥ sahasaumitriḥ sugrīve sa nyavedayat
sa tava adarśanāt ārye rāghavaḥ paritapyate
mahatā jvalatā nityam agninā iva agniparvataḥ

original: 5.033.043a tvatkṛte tam anidrā ca śokaś cintā ca rāghavam
analyzed: tvad kṛte tam anidrā ca śokaḥ cintā ca rāghavam
tāpayanti mahātmānam agnyagāram iva agnayaḥ
tava adarśana śokena rāghavaḥ pravicālyate
mahatā bhūmi kampena mahān iva śiloccayaḥ
kānānāni su ramyāṇi nadī prasravaṇāni ca

original: 5.033.045c caran na ratim āpnoti tvam apaśyan nṛpātmaje
analyzed: caran na ratim āpnoti tvam apaśyat nṛpa ātmaje

original: 5.033.046a sa tvāṃ manujaśārdūlaḥ kṣipraṃ prāpsyati rāghavaḥ
analyzed: sa tvām manuja śārdūlaḥ kṣipram prāpsyati rāghavaḥ
sa mitra bāndhavam hatvā rāvaṇam janakātmaje
sahitau rāma sugrīvau ubhau akurutām tadā

original: 5.033.047c samayaṃ vālinaṃ hantuṃ tava cānveṣaṇaṃ tathā
analyzed: samayam vālinam hantum tava ca anveṣaṇam tathā

original: 5.033.048a tato nihatya tarasā rāmo vālinam āhave
analyzed: tatas nihatya tarasā rāmaḥ vālinam āhave
sarva ṛkṣa hari saṃghānām sugrīvam akarot patim
rāma sugrīvayoḥ aikyam devī evam samajāyata

original: 5.033.049c hanūmantaṃ ca māṃ viddhi tayor dūtam ihāgatam
analyzed: hanūmantam ca mām viddhi tayoḥ dūtam iha āgatam
sva rājyam prāpya sugrīvaḥ samanīya mahā harīn

original: 5.033.050c tvadarthaṃ preṣayām āsa diśo daśa mahābalān
analyzed: tvad artham preṣayām āsa diśaḥ daśa mahā balān
ādiṣṭāḥ vānara indreṇa sugrīveṇa mahā ojasaḥ
adri rāja pratīkāśāḥ sarvatas prasthitāḥ mahīm
aṅgadaḥ nāma lakṣmīvān vāli sūnuḥ mahā balaḥ
prasthitaḥ kapi śārdūlaḥ tri bhāga bala saṃvṛtaḥ
teṣām naḥ vipranaṣṭānām vindhye parvata sattame
bhṛśam śoka parīta nām ahorātra gaṇāḥ gatāḥ
te vayam kārya nairāśyāt kālasya atikrameṇa ca

original: 5.033.054c bhayāc ca kapirājasya prāṇāṃs tyaktuṃ vyavasthitāḥ
analyzed: bhayāt ca kapi rājasya prāṇān tyaktum vyavasthitāḥ
vicitya vana durgāṇi giri prasravaṇāni ca

original: 5.033.055c anāsādya padaṃ devyāḥ prāṇāṃs tyaktuṃ vyavasthitāḥ
analyzed: an āsādya padam devyāḥ prāṇān tyaktum vyavasthitāḥ
bhṛśam śoka arṇave magnaḥ paryadevayat aṅgadaḥ

original: 5.033.056c tava nāśaṃ ca vaidehi vālinaś ca tathā vadham
analyzed: tava nāśam ca vaidehi vālinaḥ ca tathā vadham
prāyopaveśam asmākam maraṇam ca jaṭāyuṣaḥ
teṣām naḥ svāmi saṃdeśāt nirāśānām mumūrṣatām
kārya hetoḥ iva āyātaḥ śakuniḥ vīryavān mahān
gṛdhra rājasya sodaryaḥ saṃpātiḥ nāma gṛdhrarāj

original: 5.033.058c śrutvā bhrātṛvadhaṃ kopād idaṃ vacanam abravīt
analyzed: śrutvā bhrātṛ vadham kopāt idam vacanam abravīt

original: 5.033.059a yavīyān kena me bhrātā hataḥ kva ca vināśitaḥ
analyzed: yavīyān kena me bhrātā hataḥ kva ca vināśitaḥ
etat ākhyātum icchāmi bhavadbhiḥ vānara uttamāḥ
aṅgado kathayat tasya janasthāne mahat vadham
rakṣasā bhīma rūpeṇa tvām uddiśya yathātatham

original: 5.033.061a jaṭāyos tu vadhaṃ śrutvā duḥkhitaḥ so 'ruṇātmajaḥ
analyzed: jaṭāyoḥ tu vadham śrutvā duḥkhitaḥ saḥ ruṇa ātmajaḥ

original: 5.033.061c tvām āha sa varārohe vasantīṃ rāvaṇālaye
analyzed: tvām āha sa varārohe vasantīm rāvaṇa ālaye
tasya tat vacanam śrutvā saṃpāteḥ prīti vardhanam
aṅgada pramukhāḥ sarve tatas saṃprasthitāḥ vayam
tvad darśana kṛta utsāhāḥ hṛṣṭāḥ tuṣṭāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ
atha aham hari sainyasya sāgaram dṛśya sīdataḥ

original: 5.033.063c vyavadhūya bhayaṃ tīvraṃ yojanānāṃ śataṃ plutaḥ
analyzed: vyavadhūya bhayam tīvram yojanānām śatam plutaḥ

original: 5.033.064a laṅkā cāpi mayā rātrau praviṣṭā rākṣasākulā
analyzed: laṅkā ca api mayā rātrau praviṣṭā rākṣasa ākulā

original: 5.033.064c rāvaṇaś ca mayā dṛṣṭas tvaṃ ca śokanipīḍitā
analyzed: rāvaṇaḥ ca mayā dṛṣṭaḥ tvam ca śoka nipīḍitā

original: 5.033.065a etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ yathāvṛttam anindite
analyzed: etat te sarvam ākhyātam yathāvṛttam anindite

original: 5.033.065c abhibhāṣasva māṃ devi dūto dāśarather aham
analyzed: abhibhāṣasva mām devi dūtaḥ dāśaratheḥ aham
tvam mām rāma kṛta udyogam tvad nimittam iha āgatam
sugrīva sacivam devi budhyasva pavanātmajam
kuśalī tava kākutsthaḥ sarva śastrabhṛtām varaḥ

original: 5.033.067c guror ārādhane yukto lakṣmaṇaś ca sulakṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: guroḥ ārādhane yuktaḥ lakṣmaṇaḥ ca su lakṣaṇaḥ

original: 5.033.068a tasya vīryavato devi bhartus tava hite rataḥ
analyzed: tasya vīryavataḥ devi bhartuḥ tava hite rataḥ

original: 5.033.068c aham ekas tu saṃprāptaḥ sugrīvavacanād iha
analyzed: aham ekaḥ tu saṃprāptaḥ sugrīva vacanāt iha
mayā iyam asahāyena caratā kāmarūpiṇā
dakṣiṇā diś anukrāntā tvad mārga vicaya eṣiṇā
diṣṭyā aham hari sainyānām tvad nāśam anuśocatām
apaneṣyāmi saṃtāpam tava abhigama śaṃsanāt

original: 5.033.071a diṣṭyā hi na mama vyarthaṃ devi sāgaralaṅghanam
analyzed: diṣṭyā hi na mama vyartham devi sāgara laṅghanam

original: 5.033.071c prāpsyāmy aham idaṃ diṣṭyā tvaddarśanakṛtaṃ yaśaḥ
analyzed: prāpsyāmi aham idam diṣṭyā tvad darśana kṛtam yaśaḥ

original: 5.033.072a rāghavaś ca mahāvīryaḥ kṣipraṃ tvām abhipatsyate
analyzed: rāghavaḥ ca mahā vīryaḥ kṣipram tvām abhipatsyate
sa mitra bāndhavam hatvā rāvaṇam rākṣasa adhipam

original: 5.033.073a kaurajo nāma vaidehi girīṇām uttamo giriḥ
analyzed: kaurajaḥ nāma vaidehi girīṇām uttamaḥ giriḥ

original: 5.033.073c tato gacchati gokarṇaṃ parvataṃ kesarī hariḥ
analyzed: tatas gacchati gokarṇam parvatam kesarī hariḥ

original: 5.033.074a sa ca devarṣibhir dṛṣṭaḥ pitā mama mahākapiḥ
analyzed: sa ca deva ṛṣibhiḥ dṛṣṭaḥ pitā mama mahā kapiḥ
tīrthe nadīpateḥ puṇye śamba sādanam uddharat

original: 5.033.075a tasyāhaṃ hariṇaḥ kṣetre jāto vātena maithili
analyzed: tasya aham hariṇaḥ kṣetre jātaḥ vātena maithili

original: 5.033.075c hanūmān iti vikhyāto loke svenaiva karmaṇā
analyzed: hanūmān iti vikhyātaḥ loke svena eva karmaṇā

original: 5.033.075e viśvāsārthaṃ tu vaidehi bhartur uktā mayā guṇāḥ
analyzed: viśvāsa artham tu vaidehi bhartuḥ uktāḥ mayā guṇāḥ
evam viśvāsitā sītā hetubhiḥ śoka karśitā
upapannaiḥ abhijñānaiḥ dūtam tam avagacchati

original: 5.033.077a atulaṃ ca gatā harṣaṃ praharṣeṇa tu jānakī
analyzed: atulam ca gatā harṣam praharṣeṇa tu jānakī
netrābhyām vakra pakṣmābhyām mumoca ānanda jam jalam
cāru tat ca ānanam tasyāḥ tāmra śukla āyata īkṣaṇam
aśobhata viśāla akṣyāḥ rāhu muktaḥ iva uḍurāj

original: 5.033.078e hanūmantaṃ kapiṃ vyaktaṃ manyate nānyatheti sā
analyzed: hanūmantam kapim vyaktam manyate na anyathā iti sā
athā uvāca hanūmān tām uttaram priya darśanām
hate sure saṃyati śamba sādane
kapi pravīreṇa mahā ṛṣi codanāt
tatas smi vāyu prabhavaḥ hi maithili
prabhāvataḥ tad pratimaḥ ca vānaraḥ
bhūyas eva mahā tejāḥ hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
abravīt praśritam vākyam sītā pratyaya kāraṇāt
vānaraḥ ham mahābhāge dūtaḥ rāmasya dhīmataḥ
rāma nāma aṅkitam ca idam paśya devi aṅgulīyakam

original: 5.034.002e samāśvasihi bhadraṃ te kṣīṇaduḥkhaphalā hy asi
analyzed: samāśvasihi bhadram te kṣīṇa duḥkha phalā hi asi
gṛhītvā prekṣamāṇā sā bhartuḥ kara vibhūṣaṇam
bhartāram iva saṃprāptā jānakī muditā abhavat
cāru tat vadanam tasyāḥ tāmra śukla āyata īkṣaṇam
babhūva praharṣa udagram rāhu muktaḥ iva uḍurāj

original: 5.034.005a tataḥ sā hrīmatī bālā bhartuḥ saṃdeśaharṣitā
analyzed: tatas sā hrīmatī bālā bhartuḥ saṃdeśa harṣitā
parituṭṣā priyam śrutvā prāśaṃsata mahā kapim

original: 5.034.006a vikrāntas tvaṃ samarthas tvaṃ prājñas tvaṃ vānarottama
analyzed: vikrāntaḥ tvam samarthaḥ tvam prājñaḥ tvam vānara uttama
yena idam rākṣasa padam tvayā ekena pradharṣitam
śata yojana vistīrṇaḥ sāgaraḥ makara ālayaḥ
vikrama ślāghanīyena kramatā goṣpadīkṛtaḥ

original: 5.034.008a na hi tvāṃ prākṛtaṃ manye vanaraṃ vanararṣabha
analyzed: na hi tvām prākṛtam manye vanaram vanara ṛṣabha

original: 5.034.008c yasya te nāsti saṃtrāso rāvaṇān nāpi saṃbhramaḥ
analyzed: yasya te nā asti saṃtrāsaḥ rāvaṇāt nā api saṃbhramaḥ
arhase ca kapi śreṣṭha mayā samabhibhāṣitum

original: 5.034.009c yady asi preṣitas tena rāmeṇa viditātmanā
analyzed: yadi asi preṣitaḥ tena rāmeṇa vidita ātmanā

original: 5.034.010a preṣayiṣyati durdharṣo rāmo na hy aparīkṣitam
analyzed: preṣayiṣyati durdharṣaḥ rāmaḥ na hi aparīkṣitam
parākramam a vijñāya mad sakāśam viśeṣataḥ

original: 5.034.011a diṣṭyā ca kuśalī rāmo dharmātmā dharmavatsalaḥ
analyzed: diṣṭyā ca kuśalī rāmaḥ dharma ātmā dharma vatsalaḥ
lakṣmaṇaḥ ca mahā tejāḥ sumitrā ānanda vardhanaḥ

original: 5.034.012a kuśalī yadi kākutsthaḥ kiṃ nu sāgaramekhalām
analyzed: kuśalī yadi kākutsthaḥ kim nu sāgaramekhalām
mahīm dahati kopena yugānta agniḥ iva utthitaḥ

original: 5.034.013a atha vā śaktimantau tau surāṇām api nigrahe
analyzed: atha vā śaktimantau tau surāṇām api nigrahe

original: 5.034.013c mamaiva tu na duḥkhānām asti manye viparyayaḥ
analyzed: mama eva tu na duḥkhānām asti manye viparyayaḥ

original: 5.034.014a kaccic ca vyathate rāmaḥ kaccin na paripatyate
analyzed: kaccit ca vyathate rāmaḥ kaccit na paripatyate
uttarāṇi ca kāryāṇi kurute puruṣottamaḥ

original: 5.034.015a kaccin na dīnaḥ saṃbhrāntaḥ kāryeṣu ca na muhyati
analyzed: kaccit na dīnaḥ saṃbhrāntaḥ kāryeṣu ca na muhyati
kaccit puruṣa kāryāṇi kurute nṛpateḥ sutaḥ
dvividham trividha upāyam upāyam api sevate

original: 5.034.016c vijigīṣuḥ suhṛt kaccin mitreṣu ca paraṃtapaḥ
analyzed: vijigīṣuḥ suhṛd kaccit mitreṣu ca paraṃtapaḥ

original: 5.034.017a kaccin mitrāṇi labhate mitraiś cāpy abhigamyate
analyzed: kaccit mitrāṇi labhate mitraiḥ ca api abhigamyate

original: 5.034.017c kaccit kalyāṇamitraś ca mitraiś cāpi puraskṛtaḥ
analyzed: kaccit kalyāṇa mitraḥ ca mitraiḥ ca api puraskṛtaḥ
kaccit āśāsti devānām prasādam pārthiva ātmajaḥ

original: 5.034.018c kaccit puruṣakāraṃ ca daivaṃ ca pratipadyate
analyzed: kaccit puruṣakāram ca daivam ca pratipadyate

original: 5.034.019a kaccin na vigatasneho vivāsān mayi rāghavaḥ
analyzed: kaccit na vigata snehaḥ vivāsāt mayi rāghavaḥ

original: 5.034.019c kaccin māṃ vyasanād asmān mokṣayiṣyati vānaraḥ
analyzed: kaccit mām vyasanāt asmāt mokṣayiṣyati vānaraḥ
sukhānām ucitaḥ nityam asukhānām anūcitaḥ

original: 5.034.020c duḥkham uttaram āsādya kaccid rāmo na sīdati
analyzed: duḥkham uttaram āsādya kaccit rāmaḥ na sīdati

original: 5.034.021a kausalyāyās tathā kaccit sumitrāyās tathaiva ca
analyzed: kausalyāyāḥ tathā kaccit sumitrāyāḥ tathā eva ca

original: 5.034.021c abhīkṣṇaṃ śrūyate kaccit kuśalaṃ bharatasya ca
analyzed: abhīkṣṇam śrūyate kaccit kuśalam bharatasya ca
mad nimittena māna arhaḥ kaccit śokena rāghavaḥ

original: 5.034.022c kaccin nānyamanā rāmaḥ kaccin māṃ tārayiṣyati
analyzed: kaccit na anya manāḥ rāmaḥ kaccit mām tārayiṣyati
kaccit akṣāuhiṇīm bhīmām bharataḥ bhrātṛ vatsalaḥ
dhvajinīm mantribhiḥ guptām preṣayiṣyati mad kṛte
vānara adhipatiḥ śrīmān sugrīvaḥ kaccit eṣyati
mad kṛte haribhiḥ vīraiḥ vṛtaḥ danta nakha āyudhaiḥ
kaccit ca lakṣmaṇaḥ śūraḥ sumitrā ānanda vardhanaḥ
astra vid śara jālena rākṣasān vidhamiṣyati

original: 5.034.026a raudreṇa kaccid astreṇa rāmeṇa nihataṃ raṇe
analyzed: raudreṇa kaccit astreṇa rāmeṇa nihatam raṇe
drakṣyāmi alpena kālena rāvaṇam sa suhṛd janam
kaccit na tat hema samāna varṇam
tasya ānanam padma samāna gandhi
mayā vinā śuṣyati śoka dīnam
jala kṣaye padmam iva ātapena
dharma apadeśāt tyajataḥ ca rājyām
mām ca api araṇyam nayataḥ padātim

original: 5.034.028c nāsīd vyathā yasya na bhīr na śokaḥ;
analyzed: na āsīt vyathā yasya na bhīḥ na śokaḥ
kaccit sa dhairyam hṛdaye karoti

original: 5.034.029a na cāsya mātā na pitā na cānyaḥ;
analyzed: na ca asya mātā na pitā na ca anyaḥ
snehāt viśiṣṭaḥ sti mayā samaḥ vā
tāvat hi aham dūta jijīviṣā iyam
yāvat pravṛttim śṛṇuyām priyasya
iti iva devī vacanam mahārtham
tam vānara indram madhura artham uktvā
śrotum punar tasya vacaḥ bhirāmam
rāma artha yuktam virarāma rāmā
sītāyāḥ vacanam śrutvā mārutiḥ bhīma vikramaḥ

original: 5.034.031c śirasy añjalim ādhāya vākyam uttaram abravīt
analyzed: śirasi añjalim ādhāya vākyam uttaram abravīt

original: 5.034.032a na tvām ihasthāṃ jānīte rāmaḥ kamalalocanaḥ
analyzed: na tvām ihasthām jānīte rāmaḥ kamala locanaḥ

original: 5.034.032c śrutvaiva tu vaco mahyaṃ kṣipram eṣyati rāghavaḥ
analyzed: śrutvā eva tu vacaḥ mahyam kṣipram eṣyati rāghavaḥ
camūm prakarṣan mahatīm hari ṛṣka gaṇa saṃkulām
viṣṭambhayitvā bāṇa oghaiḥ akṣobhyam varuṇālayam
kariṣyati purīm laṅkām kākutsthaḥ śānta rākṣasām

original: 5.034.034a tatra yady antarā mṛtyur yadi devāḥ sahāsurāḥ
analyzed: tatra yadi antarā mṛtyuḥ yadi devāḥ saha asurāḥ

original: 5.034.034c sthāsyanti pathi rāmasya sa tān api vadhiṣyati
analyzed: sthāsyanti pathi rāmasya sa tān api vadhiṣyati
tava adarśana jena ārye śokena sa pariplutaḥ

original: 5.034.035c na śarma labhate rāmaḥ siṃhārdita iva dvipaḥ
analyzed: na śarma labhate rāmaḥ siṃha arditaḥ iva dvipaḥ

original: 5.034.036a dardareṇa ca te devi śape mūlaphalena ca
analyzed: dardareṇa ca te devi śape mūla phalena ca

original: 5.034.036c malayena ca vindhyena meruṇā mandareṇa ca
analyzed: malayena ca vindhyena meruṇā mandareṇa ca
yathā sunayanam valgu bimba oṣṭham cāru kuṇḍalam
mukham drakṣyasi rāmasya pūrṇa candram iva uditam

original: 5.034.038a kṣipraṃ drakṣyasi vaidehi rāmaṃ prasravaṇe girau
analyzed: kṣipram drakṣyasi vaidehi rāmam prasravaṇe girau
śatakratum iva āsīnam nāka pṛṣṭhasya mūrdhani

original: 5.034.039a na māṃsaṃ rāghavo bhuṅkte na cāpi madhusevate
analyzed: na māṃsam rāghavaḥ bhuṅkte na ca api madhu sevate

original: 5.034.039c vanyaṃ suvihitaṃ nityaṃ bhaktam aśnāti pañcamam
analyzed: vanyam su vihitam nityam bhaktam aśnāti pañcamam

original: 5.034.040a naiva daṃśān na maśakān na kīṭān na sarīsṛpān
analyzed: na eva daṃśān na maśakān na kīṭān na sarīsṛpān
rāghavaḥ panayet gatrāt tvad gatena antarātmanā
nityam dhyāna paraḥ rāmaḥ nityam śoka parāyaṇaḥ

original: 5.034.041c nānyac cintayate kiṃ cit sa tu kāmavaśaṃ gataḥ
analyzed: na anyat cintayate kim cit sa tu kāma vaśam gataḥ

original: 5.034.042a anidraḥ satataṃ rāmaḥ supto 'pi ca narottamaḥ
analyzed: anidraḥ satatam rāmaḥ ca nara uttamaḥ
sītā iti madhurām vāṇīm vyāharan pratibudhyate

original: 5.034.043a dṛṣṭvā phalaṃ vā puṣpaṃ vā yac cānyat strīmanoharam
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā phalam vā puṣpam vā yat ca anyat strī manoharam

original: 5.034.043c bahuśo hā priyety evaṃ śvasaṃs tvām abhibhāṣate
analyzed: bahuśas hā priya iti evam śvasan tvām abhibhāṣate
sa devi nityam paritapyamānaḥ
tvām eva sītā iti abhibhāṣamāṇaḥ
dhṛta vrataḥ rāja sutaḥ mahātmā
tava eva lābhāya kṛta prayatnaḥ
sā rāma saṃkīrtana vīta śokā
rāmasya śokena samāna śokā
śarad mukhena ambuda śeṣa candrā
niśā iva vaideha sutā babhūva
sītā tat vacanam śrutvā pūrṇa candra nibha ānanā
hanūmantam uvāca idam dharma artha sahitam vacaḥ
amṛtam viṣa saṃsṛṣṭam tvayā vānara bhāṣitam

original: 5.035.002c yac ca nānyamanā rāmo yac ca śokaparāyaṇaḥ
analyzed: yat ca na anya manāḥ rāmaḥ yat ca śoka parāyaṇaḥ

original: 5.035.003a aiśvarye vā suvistīrṇe vyasane vā sudāruṇe
analyzed: aiśvarye vā su vistīrṇe vyasane vā su dāruṇe
rajjvā iva puruṣam baddhvā kṛtāntaḥ parikarṣati
vidhiḥ nūnam asaṃhāryaḥ prāṇinām plavaga uttama

original: 5.035.004c saumitriṃ māṃ ca rāmaṃ ca vyasanaiḥ paśya mohitān
analyzed: saumitrim mām ca rāmam ca vyasanaiḥ paśya mohitān
śokasya asya kadā pāram rāghavaḥ dhigamiṣyati
plavamānaḥ pariśrāntaḥ hata nauḥ sāgare yathā

original: 5.035.006a rākṣasānāṃ kṣayaṃ kṛtvā sūdayitvā ca rāvaṇam
analyzed: rākṣasānām kṣayam kṛtvā sūdayitvā ca rāvaṇam

original: 5.035.006c laṅkām unmūlitāṃ kṛtvā kadā drakṣyati māṃ patiḥ
analyzed: laṅkām unmūlitām kṛtvā kadā drakṣyati mām patiḥ

original: 5.035.007a sa vācyaḥ saṃtvarasveti yāvad eva na pūryate
analyzed: sa vācyaḥ saṃtvarasva iti yāvat eva na pūryate

original: 5.035.007c ayaṃ saṃvatsaraḥ kālas tāvad dhi mama jīvitam
analyzed: ayam saṃvatsaraḥ kālaḥ tāvat hi mama jīvitam

original: 5.035.008a vartate daśamo māso dvau tu śeṣau plavaṃgama
analyzed: vartate daśamaḥ māsaḥ dvau tu śeṣau plavaṃgama

original: 5.035.008c rāvaṇena nṛśaṃsena samayo yaḥ kṛto mama
analyzed: rāvaṇena nṛśaṃsena samayaḥ yaḥ kṛtaḥ mama

original: 5.035.009a vibhīṣaṇena ca bhrātrā mama niryātanaṃ prati
analyzed: vibhīṣaṇena ca bhrātrā mama niryātanam prati

original: 5.035.009c anunītaḥ prayatnena na ca tat kurute matim
analyzed: anunītaḥ prayatnena na ca tat kurute matim

original: 5.035.010a mama pratipradānaṃ hi rāvaṇasya na rocate
analyzed: mama pratipradānam hi rāvaṇasya na rocate

original: 5.035.010c rāvaṇaṃ mārgate saṃkhye mṛtyuḥ kālavaśaṃ gatam
analyzed: rāvaṇam mārgate saṃkhye mṛtyuḥ kāla vaśam gatam
jyeṣṭhā kanyā analā vibhīṣaṇa sutā kape

original: 5.035.011c tayā mamaitad ākhyātaṃ mātrā prahitayā svayam
analyzed: tayā mama etat ākhyātam mātrā prahitayā svayam
avindhyaḥ nāma medhāvī vidvān rākṣasa puṃgavaḥ
dhṛtimān śīlavān vṛddhaḥ rāvaṇasya su saṃmataḥ
rāmāt kṣayam anuprāptam rakṣasām pratyacodayat

original: 5.035.013c na ca tasyāpi duṣṭātmā śṛṇoti vacanaṃ hitam
analyzed: na ca tasya api duṣṭa ātmā śṛṇoti vacanam hitam

original: 5.035.014a āśaṃseti hariśreṣṭha kṣipraṃ māṃ prāpsyate patiḥ
analyzed: āśaṃsa iti hari śreṣṭha kṣipram mām prāpsyate patiḥ

original: 5.035.014c antarātmā hi me śuddhas tasmiṃś ca bahavo guṇāḥ
analyzed: antarātmā hi me śuddhaḥ tasmin ca bahavaḥ guṇāḥ
utsāhaḥ pauruṣam sattvam ānṛśaṃsyam kṛtajña tā

original: 5.035.015c vikramaś ca prabhāvaś ca santi vānararāghave
analyzed: vikramaḥ ca prabhāvaḥ ca santi vānara rāghave
caturdaśa sahasrāṇi rākṣasānām jaghāna yaḥ

original: 5.035.016c janasthāne vinā bhrātrā śatruḥ kas tasya nodvijet
analyzed: janasthāne vinā bhrātrā śatruḥ kaḥ tasya nā udvijet

original: 5.035.017a na sa śakyas tulayituṃ vyasanaiḥ puruṣarṣabhaḥ
analyzed: na sa śakyaḥ tulayitum vyasanaiḥ puruṣa ṛṣabhaḥ
aham tasya anubhāva jñā śakrasya iva pulomajā
śara jāla aṃśumām śūraḥ kape rāma divākaraḥ
śatru rakṣaḥ mayam toyam upaśoṣam nayiṣyati
iti saṃjalpamānām tām rāma arthe śoka karśitām
aśru saṃpūrṇa vadanām uvāca hanumān kapiḥ

original: 5.035.020a śrutvaiva tu vaco mahyaṃ kṣipram eṣyati rāghavaḥ
analyzed: śrutvā eva tu vacaḥ mahyam kṣipram eṣyati rāghavaḥ
camūm prakarṣan mahatīm hari ṛkṣa gaṇa saṃkulām

original: 5.035.021a atha vā mocayiṣyāmi tām adyaiva hi rākṣasāt
analyzed: atha vā mocayiṣyāmi tām adyā eva hi rākṣasāt

original: 5.035.021c asmād duḥkhād upāroha mama pṛṣṭham anindite
analyzed: asmāt duḥkhāt upāroha mama pṛṣṭham anindite

original: 5.035.022a tvaṃ hi pṛṣṭhagatāṃ kṛtvā saṃtariṣyāmi sāgaram
analyzed: tvam hi pṛṣṭha gatām kṛtvā saṃtariṣyāmi sāgaram

original: 5.035.022c śaktir asti hi me voḍhuṃ laṅkām api sarāvaṇām
analyzed: śaktiḥ asti hi me voḍhum laṅkām api sa rāvaṇām
aham prasravaṇa sthāya rāghavāya adya maithili
prāpayiṣyāmi śakrāya havyam hutam iva analaḥ
drakṣyasi adyā eva vaidehi rāghavam sahalakṣmaṇam
vyavasāya samāyuktam viṣṇum daitya vadhe yathā
tvad darśana kṛta utsāham āśrama stham mahā balam
puraṃdaram iva āsīnam nāga rājasya mūrdhani

original: 5.035.026a pṛṣṭham āroha me devi mā vikāṅkṣasva śobhane
analyzed: pṛṣṭham āroha me devi mā vikāṅkṣasva śobhane
yogam anviccha rāmeṇa śaśāṅkena iva rohiṇī
kathayantī iva candreṇa sūryeṇa iva suvarcalā
mad pṛṣṭham adhiruhya tvam tara ākāśa mahā arṇavam

original: 5.035.028a na hi me saṃprayātasya tvām ito nayato 'ṅgane
analyzed: na hi me saṃprayātasya tvām itas nayataḥ ṅgane
anugantum gatim śaktāḥ sarve laṅkā nivāsinaḥ
yathā eva aham iha prāptaḥ tathā eva aham asaṃśayam

original: 5.035.029c yāsyāmi paśya vaidehi tvām udyamya vihāyasaṃ
analyzed: yāsyāmi paśya vaidehi tvām udyamya vihāyasam

original: 5.035.030a maithilī tu hariśreṣṭhāc chrutvā vacanam adbhutam
analyzed: maithilī tu hari śreṣṭhāt śrutvā vacanam adbhutam
harṣa vismita sarva aṅgī hanūmantam atha abravīt

original: 5.035.031a hanūman dūram adhvanaṃ kathaṃ māṃ voḍhum icchasi
analyzed: hanūman dūram adhvanam katham mām voḍhum icchasi

original: 5.035.031c tad eva khalu te manye kapitvaṃ hariyūthapa
analyzed: tat eva khalu te manye kapi tvam hari yūthapa

original: 5.035.032a kathaṃ vālpaśarīras tvaṃ mām ito netum icchasi
analyzed: katham vā alpa śarīraḥ tvam mām itas netum icchasi
sakāśam mānavendrasya bhartuḥ me plavaga ṛṣabha
sītāyāḥ vacanam śrutvā hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ

original: 5.035.033c cintayām āsa lakṣmīvān navaṃ paribhavaṃ kṛtam
analyzed: cintayām āsa lakṣmīvān navam paribhavam kṛtam

original: 5.035.034a na me jānāti sattvaṃ vā prabhāvaṃ vāsitekṣaṇā
analyzed: na me jānāti sattvam vā prabhāvam vā asita īkṣaṇā

original: 5.035.034c tasmāt paśyatu vaidehī yad rūpaṃ mama kāmataḥ
analyzed: tasmāt paśyatu vaidehī yat rūpam mama kāmataḥ
iti saṃcintya hanumān tadā plavaga sattamaḥ
darśayām āsa vaidehyāḥ sva rūpam ari mardanaḥ

original: 5.035.036a sa tasmāt pādapād dhīmān āplutya plavagarṣabhaḥ
analyzed: sa tasmāt pādapāt dhīmān āplutya plavaga ṛṣabhaḥ
tatas vardhitum ārebhe sītā pratyaya kāraṇāt
meru mandāra saṃkāśaḥ babhau dīpta anala prabhaḥ
agratas vyavatasthe ca sītāyāḥ vānara ṛṣabhaḥ
hariḥ parvata saṃkāśaḥ tāmra vaktraḥ mahā balaḥ
vajra daṃṣṭra nakhaḥ bhīmaḥ vaidehīm idam abravīt
sa parvata vana uddeśām sa aṭṭa prākāra toraṇām

original: 5.035.039c laṅkām imāṃ sanathāṃ vā nayituṃ śaktir asti me
analyzed: laṅkām imām sanathām vā nayitum śaktiḥ asti me

original: 5.035.040a tad avasthāpya tāṃ buddhir alaṃ devi vikāṅkṣayā
analyzed: tat avasthāpya tām buddhiḥ alam devi vikāṅkṣayā
viśokam kuru vaidehi rāghavam sahalakṣmaṇam
tam dṛṣṭvā acala saṃkāśam uvāca janakātmajā
padma patra viśāla akṣī mārutasya aurasam sutam

original: 5.035.042a tava sattvaṃ balaṃ caiva vijānāmi mahākape
analyzed: tava sattvam balam ca eva vijānāmi mahā kape

original: 5.035.042c vāyor iva gatiṃ cāpi tejaś cāgnir ivādbhutam
analyzed: vāyoḥ iva gatim ca api tejaḥ ca agniḥ iva adbhutam

original: 5.035.043a prākṛto 'nyaḥ kathaṃ cemāṃ bhūmim āgantum arhati
analyzed: prākṛtaḥ nyaḥ katham ca imām bhūmim āgantum arhati
udadheḥ aprameyasya pāram vānara puṃgava

original: 5.035.044a jānāmi gamane śaktiṃ nayane cāpi te mama
analyzed: jānāmi gamane śaktim nayane ca api te mama
avaśyam sāmpradhārya āśu kārya siddhiḥ iha ātmanaḥ

original: 5.035.045a ayuktaṃ tu kapiśreṣṭha mayā gantuṃ tvayā saha
analyzed: ayuktam tu kapi śreṣṭha mayā gantum tvayā saha
vāyu vega savegasya vegaḥ mām mohayet tava

original: 5.035.046a aham ākāśam āsaktā upary upari sāgaram
analyzed: aham ākāśam āsaktā upari upari sāgaram

original: 5.035.046c prapateyaṃ hi te pṛṣṭhād bhayād vegena gacchataḥ
analyzed: prapateyam hi te pṛṣṭhāt bhayāt vegena gacchataḥ
patitā sāgare ca aham timi nakra jhaṣa ākule

original: 5.035.047c bhayeyam āśu vivaśā yādasām annam uttamam
analyzed: bhayeyam āśu vivaśā yādasām annam uttamam

original: 5.035.048a na ca śakṣye tvayā sārdhaṃ gantuṃ śatruvināśana
analyzed: na ca śakṣye tvayā sārdham gantum śatru vināśana

original: 5.035.048c kalatravati saṃdehas tvayy api syād asaṃśayam
analyzed: kalatravati saṃdehaḥ tvayi api syāt asaṃśayam

original: 5.035.049a hriyamāṇāṃ tu māṃ dṛṣṭvā rākṣasā bhīmavikramāḥ
analyzed: hriyamāṇām tu mām dṛṣṭvā rākṣasāḥ bhīma vikramāḥ
anugaccheyuḥ ādiṣṭāḥ rāvaṇena durātmanā

original: 5.035.050a tais tvaṃ parivṛtaḥ śūraiḥ śūlam udgara pāṇibhiḥ
analyzed: taiḥ tvam parivṛtaḥ śūraiḥ śūlam udgara pāṇibhiḥ

original: 5.035.050c bhaves tvaṃ saṃśayaṃ prāpto mayā vīra kalatravān
analyzed: bhaveḥ tvam saṃśayam prāptaḥ mayā vīra kalatravān

original: 5.035.051a sāyudhā bahavo vyomni rākṣasās tvaṃ nirāyudhaḥ
analyzed: sa āyudhāḥ bahavaḥ vyomni rākṣasāḥ tvam nirāyudhaḥ

original: 5.035.051c kathaṃ śakṣyasi saṃyātuṃ māṃ caiva parirakṣitum
analyzed: katham śakṣyasi saṃyātum mām ca eva parirakṣitum
yudhyamānasya rakṣobhiḥ tatas taiḥ krūra karmabhiḥ

original: 5.035.052c prapateyaṃ hi te pṛṣṭhad bhayārtā kapisattama
analyzed: prapateyam hi te bhaya ārtā kapi sattama

original: 5.035.053a atha rakṣāṃsi bhīmāni mahānti balavanti ca
analyzed: atha rakṣāṃsi bhīmāni mahānti balavanti ca

original: 5.035.053c kathaṃ cit sāmparāye tvāṃ jayeyuḥ kapisattama
analyzed: katham cit sāmparāye tvām jayeyuḥ kapi sattama

original: 5.035.054a atha vā yudhyamānasya pateyaṃ vimukhasya te
analyzed: atha vā yudhyamānasya pateyam vimukhasya te

original: 5.035.054c patitāṃ ca gṛhītvā māṃ nayeyuḥ pāparākṣasāḥ
analyzed: patitām ca gṛhītvā mām nayeyuḥ pāpa rākṣasāḥ

original: 5.035.055a māṃ vā hareyus tvaddhastād viśaseyur athāpi vā
analyzed: mām vā hareyuḥ tvad hastāt atha api vā
avyavasthau hi dṛśyete yuddhe jaya parājayau
aham vā api vipadyeyam rakṣobhiḥ abhitarjitā

original: 5.035.056c tvatprayatno hariśreṣṭha bhaven niṣphala eva tu
analyzed: tvad prayatnaḥ hari śreṣṭha bhavet niṣphalaḥ eva tu

original: 5.035.057a kāmaṃ tvam api paryāpto nihantuṃ sarvarākṣasān
analyzed: kāmam tvam api paryāptaḥ nihantum sarva rākṣasān

original: 5.035.057c rāghavasya yaśo hīyet tvayā śastais tu rākṣasaiḥ
analyzed: rāghavasya yaśaḥ hīyet tvayā śastaiḥ tu rākṣasaiḥ

original: 5.035.058a atha vādāya rakṣāṃsi nyasyeyuḥ saṃvṛte hi mām
analyzed: atha vā ādāya rakṣāṃsi nyasyeyuḥ saṃvṛte hi mām

original: 5.035.058c yatra te nābhijānīyur harayo nāpi rāghavaḥ
analyzed: yatra te na abhijānīyuḥ harayaḥ na api rāghavaḥ

original: 5.035.059a ārambhas tu madartho 'yaṃ tatas tava nirarthakaḥ
analyzed: ārambhaḥ tu mad arthaḥ yam tatas tava nirarthakaḥ

original: 5.035.059c tvayā hi saha rāmasya mahān āgamane guṇaḥ
analyzed: tvayā hi saha rāmasya mahān āgamane guṇaḥ
mayi jīvitam āyattam rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ

original: 5.035.060c bhrātṝṇāṃ ca mahābāho tava rājakulasya ca
analyzed: bhrātṝṇām ca mahā bāho tava rāja kulasya ca
tau nirāśau mad arthe tu śoka saṃtāpa karśitau
saha sarva ṛkṣa haribhiḥ tyakṣyataḥ prāṇa saṃgraham

original: 5.035.062a bhartur bhaktiṃ puraskṛtya rāmād anyasya vānara
analyzed: bhartuḥ bhaktim puraskṛtya rāmāt anyasya vānara

original: 5.035.062c nāhaṃ spraṣṭuṃ padā gātram iccheyaṃ vānarottama
analyzed: na aham spraṣṭum padā gātram iccheyam vānara uttama

original: 5.035.063a yad ahaṃ gātrasaṃsparśaṃ rāvaṇasya gatā balāt
analyzed: yat aham gātra saṃsparśam rāvaṇasya gatā balāt

original: 5.035.063c anīśā kiṃ kariṣyāmi vināthā vivaśā satī
analyzed: anīśā kim kariṣyāmi vināthā vivaśā satī

original: 5.035.064a yadi rāmo daśagrīvam iha hatvā sarākṣasaṃ
analyzed: yadi rāmaḥ daśagrīvam iha hatvā

original: 5.035.064c mām ito gṛhya gaccheta tat tasya sadṛśaṃ bhavet
analyzed: mām itas gṛhya gaccheta tat tasya sadṛśam bhavet

original: 5.035.065a śrutā hi dṛṣṭāś ca mayā parākramā;
analyzed: śrutāḥ hi dṛṣṭāḥ ca mayā
mahātmanaḥ tasya raṇa avamardinaḥ
na deva gandharva bhujaṃga rākṣasā
bhavanti rāmeṇa samāḥ hi saṃyuge
samīkṣya tam saṃyati citra kārmukam
mahā balam vāsava tulya vikramam
sa lakṣmaṇam kaḥ viṣaheta rāghavam
hutāśanam dīptam iva anila īritam
sa lakṣmaṇam rāghavam āji mardanam
diśāgajam mattam iva vyavasthitam
saheta kaḥ vānara mukhya saṃyuge
yugānta sūrya pratimam śara arciṣam
sa me hari śreṣṭha sa lakṣmaṇam patim
sa yūthapam kṣipram iha upapādaya
cirāya rāmam prati śoka karśitām
kuruṣva mām vānara mukhya harṣitām

original: 5.036.001a tataḥ sa kapiśārdūlas tena vākyena harṣitaḥ
analyzed: tatas sa kapi śārdūlaḥ tena vākyena harṣitaḥ

original: 5.036.001c sītām uvāca tac chrutvā vākyaṃ vākyaviśāradaḥ
analyzed: sītām uvāca tat śrutvā vākyam vākya viśāradaḥ
yukta rūpam tvayā devi bhāṣitam śubha darśane
sadṛśam strī svabhāvasya sādhvīnām vinayasya ca

original: 5.036.003a strītvaṃ na tu samarthaṃ hi sāgaraṃ vyativartitum
analyzed: strī tvam na tu samartham hi sāgaram vyativartitum
mām adhiṣṭhāya vistīrṇam śata yojanam āyatam

original: 5.036.004a dvitīyaṃ kāraṇaṃ yac ca bravīṣi vinayānvite
analyzed: dvitīyam kāraṇam yat ca bravīṣi vinaya anvite

original: 5.036.004c rāmād anyasya nārhāmi saṃsparśam iti jānaki
analyzed: rāmāt anyasya na arhāmi saṃsparśam iti jānaki

original: 5.036.005a etat te devi sadṛśaṃ patnyās tasya mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: etat te devi sadṛśam patnyāḥ tasya mahātmanaḥ

original: 5.036.005c kā hy anyā tvām ṛte devi brūyād vacanam īdṛśam
analyzed: kā hi anyā tvām ṛte devi brūyāt vacanam īdṛśam
śroṣyate ca eva kākutsthaḥ sarvam niravaśeṣataḥ

original: 5.036.006c ceṣṭitaṃ yat tvayā devi bhāṣitaṃ mama cāgrataḥ
analyzed: ceṣṭitam yat tvayā devi bhāṣitam mama ca agratas
kāraṇaiḥ bahubhiḥ devi rāma priya cikīrṣayā
sneha praskanna manasā mayā etat samudīritam
laṅkāyāḥ duṣpraveśa tvāt dustara tvāt mahodadheḥ
sāmarthyāt ātmanaḥ ca eva mayā etat samudāhṛtam
icchāmi tvām samānetum adyā eva raghu bandhunā

original: 5.036.009c gurusnehena bhaktyā ca nānyathā tad udāhṛtam
analyzed: guru snehena bhaktyā ca na anyathā tat udāhṛtam

original: 5.036.010a yadi notsahase yātuṃ mayā sārdham anindite
analyzed: yadi nā utsahase yātum mayā sārdham anindite

original: 5.036.010c abhijñānaṃ prayaccha tvaṃ jānīyād rāghavo hi yat
analyzed: abhijñānam prayaccha tvam jānīyāt rāghavaḥ hi yat
evam uktā hanumatā sītā sura sutā upamā
uvāca vacanam mandam bāṣpa pragrathita akṣaram

original: 5.036.012a idaṃ śreṣṭham abhijñānaṃ brūyās tvaṃ tu mama priyam
analyzed: idam śreṣṭham abhijñānam brūyāḥ tvam tu mama priyam
śailasya citrakūṭasya pāde pūrva uttare tadā
tāpasa āśrama vāsinyāḥ prājya mūla phala udake
tasmin siddha āśrame deśe mandākinyāḥ adūrataḥ
tasya upavana ṣaṇḍeṣu nānā puṣpa sugandhiṣu
vihṛtya salila klinnā tava aṅke samupāviśam
paryāyeṇa prasuptaḥ ca mama aṅke bharatāgrajaḥ
tatas māṃsa samāyuktaḥ vāyasaḥ paryatuṇḍayat

original: 5.036.016c tam ahaṃ loṣṭam udyamya vārayāmi sma vāyasaṃ
analyzed: tam aham loṣṭam udyamya vārayāmi sma vāyasam

original: 5.036.017a dārayan sa ca māṃ kākas tatraiva parilīyate
analyzed: dārayan sa ca mām kākaḥ tatra eva parilīyate

original: 5.036.017c na cāpy uparaman māṃsād bhakṣārthī balibhojanaḥ
analyzed: na ca api uparaman māṃsāt bhakṣa arthī balibhojanaḥ

original: 5.036.018a utkarṣantyāṃ ca raśanāṃ kruddhāyāṃ mayi pakṣiṇe
analyzed: utkarṣantyām ca raśanām kruddhāyām mayi pakṣiṇe

original: 5.036.018c sraṃsamāne ca vasane tato dṛṣṭā tvayā hy aham
analyzed: sraṃsamāne ca vasane tatas dṛṣṭā tvayā hi aham

original: 5.036.019a tvayā vihasitā cāhaṃ kruddhā saṃlajjitā tadā
analyzed: tvayā vihasitā ca aham kruddhā saṃlajjitā tadā

original: 5.036.019c bhakṣya gṛddhena kālena dāritā tvām upāgatā
analyzed: bhakṣya gṛddhena kālena dāritā tvām upāgatā

original: 5.036.020a āsīnasya ca te śrāntā punar utsaṅgam āviśam
analyzed: āsīnasya ca te śrāntā punar utsaṅgam āviśam
krudhyantī ca prahṛṣṭena tvayā aham parisāntvitā
bāṣpa pūrṇa mukhī mandam cakṣuṣī parimārjatī
lakṣitā aham tvayā nātha vāyasena prakopitā

original: 5.036.022a āśīviṣa iva kruddhaḥ śvasān vākyam abhāṣathāḥ
analyzed: āśīviṣaḥ iva kruddhaḥ śvasān vākyam abhāṣathāḥ

original: 5.036.022c kena te nāganāsoru vikṣataṃ vai stanāntaram
analyzed: kena te nāga nāsā ūru vikṣatam vai stanāntaram
kaḥ krīḍati sa roṣeṇa pañcavaktreṇa bhoginā

original: 5.036.023a vīkṣamāṇas tatas taṃ vai vāyasaṃ samavaikṣathāḥ
analyzed: vīkṣamāṇaḥ tatas tam vai vāyasam samavaikṣathāḥ

original: 5.036.023c nakhaiḥ sarudhirais tīkṣṇair mām evābhimukhaṃ sthitam
analyzed: nakhaiḥ sa rudhiraiḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ mām eva abhimukham sthitam

original: 5.036.024a putraḥ kila sa śakrasya vāyasaḥ patatāṃ varaḥ
analyzed: putraḥ kila sa śakrasya vāyasaḥ patatām varaḥ
dharā antara caraḥ śīghram pavanasya gatau samaḥ
tatas tasmin mahā bāhuḥ kopa saṃvartita īkṣaṇaḥ

original: 5.036.025c vāyase kṛtavān krūrāṃ matiṃ matimatāṃ vara
analyzed: vāyase kṛtavān krūrām matim matimatām vara
sa darbha saṃstarāt gṛhya brahmaṇaḥ streṇa yojayaḥ

original: 5.036.026c sa dīpta iva kālāgnir jajvālābhimukho dvijam
analyzed: sa dīptaḥ iva kālāgniḥ jajvāla abhimukhaḥ dvijam

original: 5.036.027a cikṣepitha pradīptāṃ tām iṣīkāṃ vāyasaṃ prati
analyzed: cikṣepitha pradīptām tām iṣīkām vāyasam prati

original: 5.036.027c anusṛṣṭas tadā kālo jagāma vividhāṃ gatim
analyzed: anusṛṣṭaḥ tadā kālaḥ jagāma vividhām gatim

original: 5.036.027e trāṇakāma imaṃ lokaṃ sarvaṃ vai vicacāra ha
analyzed: trāṇa kāmaḥ imam lokam sarvam vai vicacāra ha

original: 5.036.028a sa pitrā ca parityaktaḥ suraiḥ sarvair maharṣibhiḥ
analyzed: sa pitrā ca parityaktaḥ suraiḥ sarvaiḥ mahā ṛṣibhiḥ

original: 5.036.028c trīṃl lokān saṃparikramya tvām eva śaraṇaṃ gataḥ
analyzed: trīn lokān saṃparikramya tvām eva śaraṇam gataḥ

original: 5.036.029a taṃ tvaṃ nipatitaṃ bhūmau śaraṇyaḥ śaraṇāgatam
analyzed: tam tvam nipatitam bhūmau śaraṇyaḥ śaraṇa āgatam
vadha arham api kākutstha kṛpayā paryapālayaḥ

original: 5.036.029e na śarma labdhvā lokeṣu tvām eva śaraṇaṃ gataḥ
analyzed: na śarma labdhvā lokeṣu tvām eva śaraṇam gataḥ

original: 5.036.030a paridyūnaṃ viṣaṇṇaṃ ca sa tvam āyāntam uktavān
analyzed: paridyūnam viṣaṇṇam ca sa tvam āyāntam uktavān

original: 5.036.030c moghaṃ kartuṃ na śakyaṃ tu brāhmam astraṃ tad ucyatām
analyzed: mogham kartum na śakyam tu brāhmam astram tat ucyatām

original: 5.036.031a tatas tasyākṣi kākasya hinasti sma sa dakṣiṇam
analyzed: tatas tasya akṣi kākasya hinasti sma sa dakṣiṇam

original: 5.036.032a sa te tadā namaskṛtvā rājñe daśarathāya ca
analyzed: sa te tadā namaskṛtvā rājñe daśarathāya ca

original: 5.036.032c tvayā vīra visṛṣṭas tu pratipede svam ālayam
analyzed: tvayā vīra visṛṣṭaḥ tu pratipede svam ālayam
mad kṛte kāka mātre brahmāstram samudīritam

original: 5.036.033c kasmād yo māṃ harat tvattaḥ kṣamase taṃ mahīpate
analyzed: kasmāt yaḥ mām harat tvattaḥ kṣamase tam mahīpate

original: 5.036.034a sa kuruṣva mahotsāhaṃ kṛpāṃ mayi nararṣabha
analyzed: sa kuruṣva mahā utsāham kṛpām mayi nara ṛṣabha

original: 5.036.034c ānṛśaṃsyaṃ paro dharmas tvatta eva mayā śrutaḥ
analyzed: ānṛśaṃsyam paraḥ dharmaḥ tvattaḥ eva mayā śrutaḥ
jānāmi tvām mahā vīryam mahā utsāham mahā balam
apāra pāram akṣobhyam gāmbhīryāt sāgara upamam
bhartāram sa samudrāyāḥ dharaṇyāḥ vāsava upamam

original: 5.036.036a evam astravidāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ sattvavān balavān api
analyzed: evam astra vidām śreṣṭhaḥ sattvavān balavān api

original: 5.036.036c kimartham astraṃ rakṣaḥsu na yojayasi rāghava
analyzed: kimartham astram rakṣaḥsu na yojayasi rāghava

original: 5.036.037a na nāgā nāpi gandharvā nāsurā na marudgaṇāḥ
analyzed: na nāgāḥ na api gandharvāḥ na asurāḥ na marut gaṇāḥ

original: 5.036.037c rāmasya samare vegaṃ śaktāḥ prati samādhitum
analyzed: rāmasya samare vegam śaktāḥ prati samādhitum
