original: 5.036.038a tasyā vīryavataḥ kaś cid yady asti mayi saṃbhramaḥ
analyzed: tasyāḥ vīryavataḥ kaḥ cit yadi asti mayi saṃbhramaḥ

original: 5.036.038c kimarthaṃ na śarais tīkṣṇaiḥ kṣayaṃ nayati rākṣasān
analyzed: kimartham na śaraiḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ kṣayam nayati rākṣasān

original: 5.036.039a bhrātur ādeśam ādāya lakṣmaṇo vā paraṃtapaḥ
analyzed: bhrātuḥ ādeśam ādāya lakṣmaṇaḥ vā paraṃtapaḥ

original: 5.036.039c kasya hetor na māṃ vīraḥ paritrāti mahābalaḥ
analyzed: kasya hetoḥ na mām vīraḥ paritrāti mahā balaḥ
yadi tau puruṣa vyāghrau vāyu indra sama tejasau

original: 5.036.040c surāṇām api durdharṣo kimarthaṃ mām upekṣataḥ
analyzed: surāṇām api durdharṣo kimartham mām upekṣataḥ

original: 5.036.041a mamaiva duṣkṛtaṃ kiṃ cin mahad asti na saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: mama eva duṣkṛtam kim cit mahat asti na saṃśayaḥ

original: 5.036.041c samarthāv api tau yan māṃ nāvekṣete paraṃtapau
analyzed: samarthau api tau yat mām na avekṣete paraṃtapau
kausalyā loka bhartāram suṣuve yam manasvinī

original: 5.036.042c taṃ mamārthe sukhaṃ pṛccha śirasā cābhivādaya
analyzed: tam mama arthe sukham pṛccha śirasā ca abhivādaya

original: 5.036.043a srajaś ca sarvaratnāni priyā yāś ca varāṅganāḥ
analyzed: srajaḥ ca sarva ratnāni priyāḥ yāḥ ca vara aṅganāḥ

original: 5.036.043c aiśvaryaṃ ca viśālāyāṃ pṛthivyām api durlabham
analyzed: aiśvaryam ca viśālāyām pṛthivyām api durlabham
pitaram mātaram ca eva saṃmānya abhiprasādya ca
anupravrajitaḥ rāmam sumitrā yena su prajāḥ
ānukūlyena dharma ātmā tyaktvā sukham anuttamam
anugacchati kākutstham bhrātaram pālayan vane

original: 5.036.046a pitṛvad vartate rāme mātṛvan māṃ samācaran
analyzed: pitṛ vat vartate rāme mātṛ vat mām samācaran

original: 5.036.046c hriyamāṇāṃ tadā vīro na tu māṃ veda lakṣmaṇaḥ
analyzed: hriyamāṇām tadā vīraḥ na tu mām veda lakṣmaṇaḥ
vṛddha upasevī śaktaḥ na bahu bhāṣitā
rāja putraḥ priya śreṣṭhaḥ sadṛśaḥ śvaśurasya me

original: 5.036.048a mattaḥ priyataro nityaṃ bhrātā rāmasya lakṣmaṇaḥ
analyzed: mattaḥ priyataraḥ nityam bhrātā rāmasya lakṣmaṇaḥ

original: 5.036.048c niyukto dhuri yasyāṃ tu tām udvahati vīryavān
analyzed: niyuktaḥ dhuri yasyām tu tām udvahati vīryavān

original: 5.036.049a yaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāghavo naiva vṛddham āryam anusmarat
analyzed: yam dṛṣṭvā rāghavaḥ na eva vṛddham āryam anusmarat

original: 5.036.049c sa mamārthāya kuśalaṃ vaktavyo vacanān mama
analyzed: sa mama arthāya kuśalam vaktavyaḥ vacanāt mama

original: 5.036.049e mṛdur nityaṃ śucir dakṣaḥ priyo rāmasya lakṣmaṇaḥ
analyzed: mṛduḥ nityam śuciḥ dakṣaḥ priyaḥ rāmasya lakṣmaṇaḥ

original: 5.036.050a idaṃ brūyāś ca me nāthaṃ śūraṃ rāmaṃ punaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: idam brūyāḥ ca me nātham śūram rāmam punar punar
jīvitam dhārayiṣyāmi māsam daśaratha ātmaja

original: 5.036.050e ūrdhvaṃ māsān na jīveyaṃ satyenāhaṃ bravīmi te
analyzed: ūrdhvam māsāt na jīveyam satyena aham bravīmi te
rāvaṇena uparuddhām mām nikṛtyā pāpa karmaṇā

original: 5.036.051c trātum arhasi vīra tvaṃ pātālād iva kauśikīm
analyzed: trātum arhasi vīra tvam pātālāt iva kauśikīm

original: 5.036.052a tato vastragataṃ muktvā divyaṃ cūḍāmaṇiṃ śubham
analyzed: tatas vastra gatam muktvā divyam cūḍāmaṇim śubham
pradeyaḥ rāghavāya iti sītā hanumate dadau
pratigṛhya tatas vīraḥ maṇi ratnam anuttamam

original: 5.036.053c aṅgulyā yojayām āsa na hy asyā prābhavad bhujaḥ
analyzed: aṅgulyā yojayām āsa na hi asyā prābhavat bhujaḥ
maṇi ratnam kapi varaḥ pratigṛhya abhivādya ca

original: 5.036.054c sītāṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā praṇataḥ pārśvataḥ sthitaḥ
analyzed: sītām pradakṣiṇam kṛtvā praṇataḥ pārśvatas sthitaḥ
harṣeṇa mahatā yuktaḥ sītā darśana jena saḥ

original: 5.036.055c hṛdayena gato rāmaṃ śarīreṇa tu viṣṭhitaḥ
analyzed: hṛdayena gataḥ rāmam śarīreṇa tu viṣṭhitaḥ
maṇi varam upagṛhya tam mahārham
janaka nṛpa ātmajayā dhṛtam prabhāvāt
giri vara pavana avadhūta muktaḥ
sukhita manāḥ pratisaṃkramam prapede

original: 5.037.001a maṇiṃ dattvā tataḥ sītā hanūmantam athābravīt
analyzed: maṇim dattvā tatas sītā hanūmantam atha abravīt
abhijñānam abhijñātam etat rāmasya tattvataḥ

original: 5.037.002a maṇiṃ tu dṛṣṭvā rāmo vai trayāṇāṃ saṃsmariṣyati
analyzed: maṇim tu dṛṣṭvā rāmaḥ vai trayāṇām saṃsmariṣyati

original: 5.037.002c vīro jananyā mama ca rājño daśarathasya ca
analyzed: vīraḥ jananyāḥ mama ca rājñaḥ daśarathasya ca

original: 5.037.003a sa bhūyas tvaṃ samutsāhe codito harisattama
analyzed: sa bhūyas tvam samutsāhe coditaḥ hari sattama
asmin kārya samārambhe pracintaya yat uttaram
tvam asmin kārya niryoge pramāṇam hari sattama

original: 5.037.004c tasya cintaya yo yatno duḥkhakṣayakaro bhavet
analyzed: tasya cintaya yaḥ yatnaḥ duḥkha kṣaya karaḥ bhavet
sa tathā iti pratijñāya mārutiḥ bhīma vikramaḥ
śirasā āvandya vaidehīm gamanāya upacakrame
jñātvā saṃprasthitam devī vānaram mārutātmajam
bāṣpa gadgadayā vācā maithilī vākyam abravīt
kuśalam hanuman brūyāḥ sahitau rāma lakṣmaṇau

original: 5.037.007c sugrīvaṃ ca sahāmātyaṃ vṛddhān sarvāṃś ca vānarān
analyzed: sugrīvam ca saha amātyam vṛddhān sarvān ca vānarān

original: 5.037.008a yathā ca sa mahābāhur māṃ tārayati rāghavaḥ
analyzed: yathā ca sa mahā bāhuḥ mām tārayati rāghavaḥ
asmāt duḥkha ambu saṃrodhāt tvam samādhātum arhasi

original: 5.037.009a jīvantīṃ māṃ yathā rāmaḥ saṃbhāvayati kīrtimān
analyzed: jīvantīm mām yathā rāmaḥ saṃbhāvayati kīrtimān

original: 5.037.009c tat tvayā hanuman vācyaṃ vācā dharmam avāpnuhi
analyzed: tat tvayā hanuman vācyam vācā dharmam avāpnuhi

original: 5.037.010a nityam utsāhayuktāś ca vācaḥ śrutvā mayeritāḥ
analyzed: nityam utsāha yuktāḥ ca vācaḥ śrutvā mayā īritāḥ
vardhiṣyate dāśaratheḥ pauruṣam mad avāptaye
mad saṃdeśa yutāḥ vācaḥ tvattaḥ śrutvā eva rāghavaḥ
parākrama vidhim vīraḥ vidhivat saṃvidhāsyati

original: 5.037.012a sītāyās tad vacaḥ śrutvā hanumān mārutātmajaḥ
analyzed: sītāyāḥ tat vacaḥ śrutvā hanumān mārutātmajaḥ

original: 5.037.012c śirasy añjalim ādhāya vākyam uttaram abravīt
analyzed: śirasi añjalim ādhāya vākyam uttaram abravīt
kṣipram eṣyati kākutsthaḥ hari ṛkṣa pravaraiḥ vṛtaḥ

original: 5.037.013c yas te yudhi vijityārīñ śokaṃ vyapanayiṣyati
analyzed: yaḥ te yudhi vijitya ārīm śokam vyapanayiṣyati

original: 5.037.014a na hi paśyāmi martyeṣu nāmareṣv asureṣu vā
analyzed: na hi paśyāmi martyeṣu na amareṣu asureṣu vā

original: 5.037.014c yas tasya vamato bāṇān sthātum utsahate 'grataḥ
analyzed: yaḥ tasya vamataḥ bāṇān sthātum utsahate gratas

original: 5.037.015a apy arkam api parjanyam api vaivasvataṃ yamam
analyzed: api arkam api parjanyam api vaivasvatam yamam

original: 5.037.015c sa hi soḍhuṃ raṇe śaktas tavahetor viśeṣataḥ
analyzed: sa hi soḍhum raṇe śaktaḥ tava hetoḥ viśeṣataḥ

original: 5.037.016a sa hi sāgaraparyantāṃ mahīṃ śāsitum īhate
analyzed: sa hi sāgara paryantām mahīm śāsitum īhate

original: 5.037.016c tvan nimitto hi rāmasya jayo janakanandini
analyzed: tvat nimittaḥ hi rāmasya jayaḥ janakanandini

original: 5.037.017a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā samyak satyaṃ subhāṣitam
analyzed: tasya tat vacanam śrutvā samyak satyam subhāṣitam

original: 5.037.017c jānakī bahu mene 'tha vacanaṃ cedam abravīt
analyzed: jānakī bahu mene vacanam ca idam abravīt

original: 5.037.018a tatas taṃ prasthitaṃ sītā vīkṣamāṇā punaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: tatas tam prasthitam sītā vīkṣamāṇā punar punar
bhartuḥ sneha anvitam vākyam sauhārdāt anumānayat

original: 5.037.019a yadi vā manyase vīra vasaikāham ariṃdama
analyzed: yadi vā manyase vīra vasa ekāham ariṃdama

original: 5.037.019c kasmiṃś cit saṃvṛte deśe viśrāntaḥ śvo gamiṣyasi
analyzed: kasmin cit saṃvṛte deśe viśrāntaḥ śvas gamiṣyasi

original: 5.037.020a mama ced alpabhāgyāyāḥ sāmnidhyāt tava vīryavān
analyzed: mama ced alpabhāgyāyāḥ sāmnidhyāt tava vīryavān

original: 5.037.020c asya śokasya mahato muhūrtaṃ mokṣaṇaṃ bhavet
analyzed: asya śokasya mahataḥ muhūrtam mokṣaṇam bhavet
gate hi hari śārdūla punarāgamanāya tu

original: 5.037.021c prāṇānām api saṃdeho mama syān nātra saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: prāṇānām api saṃdehaḥ mama syāt na atra saṃśayaḥ
tava adarśana jaḥ śokaḥ bhūyas mām paritāpayet
duḥkhāt duḥkha parāmṛṣṭām dīpayan iva vānara

original: 5.037.023a ayaṃ ca vīra saṃdehas tiṣṭhatīva mamāgrataḥ
analyzed: ayam ca vīra saṃdehaḥ tiṣṭhati iva mama agratas
su mahān tvad sahāyeṣu hari ṛkṣeṣu hari īśvara

original: 5.037.024a kathaṃ nu khalu duṣpāraṃ tariṣyanti mahodadhim
analyzed: katham nu khalu duṣpāram tariṣyanti mahā udadhim
tāni hari ṛkṣa sainyāni tau vā nara vara ātmajau
trayāṇām eva bhūtānām sāgarasya iha laṅghane

original: 5.037.025c śaktiḥ syād vainateyasya tava vā mārutasya vā
analyzed: śaktiḥ syāt vainateyasya tava vā mārutasya vā
tat asmin kārya niryoge vīra evam duratikrame

original: 5.037.026c kiṃ paśyasi samādhānaṃ tvaṃ hi kāryavidāṃ varaḥ
analyzed: kim paśyasi samādhānam tvam hi kārya vidām varaḥ

original: 5.037.027a kāmam asya tvam evaikaḥ kāryasya parisādhane
analyzed: kāmam asya tvam eva ekaḥ kāryasya parisādhane
paryāptaḥ para vīra ghna yaśasyaḥ te bala udayaḥ

original: 5.037.028a balaiḥ samagrair yadi māṃ rāvaṇaṃ jitya saṃyuge
analyzed: balaiḥ samagraiḥ yadi mām rāvaṇam jitya saṃyuge

original: 5.037.028c vijayī svapuraṃ yāyāt tat tu me syād yaśaskaram
analyzed: vijayī sva puram yāyāt tat tu me syāt yaśaskaram

original: 5.037.029a balais tu saṃkulāṃ kṛtvā laṅkāṃ parabalārdanaḥ
analyzed: balaiḥ tu saṃkulām kṛtvā laṅkām para bala ardanaḥ

original: 5.037.029c māṃ nayed yadi kākutsthas tat tasya sadṛśaṃ bhavet
analyzed: mām nayet yadi kākutsthaḥ tat tasya sadṛśam bhavet

original: 5.037.030a tad yathā tasya vikrāntam anurūpaṃ mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: tat yathā tasya vikrāntam anurūpam mahātmanaḥ

original: 5.037.030c bhaved āhava śūrasya tathā tvam upapādaya
analyzed: bhavet āhava śūrasya tathā tvam upapādaya
tat artha upahitam vākyam sahitam hetu saṃhitam

original: 5.037.031c niśamya hanumāñ śeṣaṃ vākyam uttaram abravīt
analyzed: niśamya hanumām śeṣam vākyam uttaram abravīt
devi hari ṛkṣa sainyānām īśvaraḥ plavatām varaḥ
sugrīvaḥ sattva saṃpannaḥ tava arthe kṛta niścayaḥ
sa vānara sahasrāṇām koṭībhiḥ abhisaṃvṛtaḥ
kṣipram eṣyati vaidehi rākṣasānām nibarhaṇaḥ
tasya vikrama saṃpannāḥ sattvavantaḥ mahā balāḥ
manaḥ saṃkalpa saṃpātāḥ nideśe harayaḥ sthitāḥ

original: 5.037.035a yeṣāṃ nopari nādhastān na tiryak sajjate gatiḥ
analyzed: yeṣām na upari na adhastāt na tiryak sajjate gatiḥ

original: 5.037.035c na ca karmasu sīdanti mahatsv amitatejasaḥ
analyzed: na ca karmasu sīdanti mahatsu amita tejasaḥ
asakṛt taiḥ mahā utsahaiḥ sa sāgara dharādharā
pradakṣiṇīkṛtā bhūmiḥ vāyu mārga anusāribhiḥ

original: 5.037.037a madviśiṣṭāś ca tulyāś ca santi tatra vanaukasaḥ
analyzed: mad viśiṣṭāḥ ca tulyāḥ ca santi tatra vanaukasaḥ

original: 5.037.037c mattaḥ pratyavaraḥ kaś cin nāsti sugrīvasaṃnidhau
analyzed: mattaḥ pratyavaraḥ kaḥ cit nā asti sugrīva saṃnidhau

original: 5.037.038a ahaṃ tāvad iha prāptaḥ kiṃ punas te mahābalāḥ
analyzed: aham tāvat iha prāptaḥ kim punar te mahā balāḥ

original: 5.037.038c na hi prakṛṣṭāḥ preṣyante preṣyante hītare janāḥ
analyzed: na hi prakṛṣṭāḥ preṣyante preṣyante hi itare janāḥ

original: 5.037.039a tad alaṃ paritāpena devi śoko vyapaitu te
analyzed: tat alam paritāpena devi śokaḥ vyapaitu te
eka utpātena te laṅkām eṣyanti hari yūthapāḥ

original: 5.037.040a mama pṛṣṭhagatau tau ca candrasūryāv ivoditau
analyzed: mama pṛṣṭha gatau tau ca candra sūryau iva uditau
tvad sakāśam mahāsattvau nṛ siṃhau āgamiṣyataḥ

original: 5.037.041a tau hi vīrau naravarau sahitau rāmalakṣmaṇau
analyzed: tau hi vīrau nara varau sahitau rāma lakṣmaṇau
āgamya nagarīm laṅkām sāyakaiḥ vidhamiṣyataḥ
sa gaṇam rāvaṇam hatvā rāghavaḥ raghunandanaḥ
tvām ādāya varārohe sva puram pratiyāsyati

original: 5.037.043a tad āśvasihi bhadraṃ te bhava tvaṃ kālakāṅkṣiṇī
analyzed: tat āśvasihi bhadram te bhava tvam kāla kāṅkṣiṇī
nacirāt drakṣyase rāmam prajvajantam iva anilam
nihate rākṣasa indre ca sa putra amātya bāndhave
tvam sameṣyasi rāmeṇa śaśāṅkena iva rohiṇī

original: 5.037.045a kṣipraṃ tvaṃ devi śokasya pāraṃ yāsyasi maithili
analyzed: kṣipram tvam devi śokasya pāram yāsyasi maithili
rāvaṇam ca eva rāmeṇa nihatam drakṣyase cirāt
evam āśvasya vaidehīm hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ

original: 5.037.046c gamanāya matiṃ kṛtvā vaidehīṃ punar abravīt
analyzed: gamanāya matim kṛtvā vaidehīm punar abravīt

original: 5.037.047a tam arighnaṃ kṛtātmānaṃ kṣipraṃ drakṣyasi rāghavam
analyzed: tam ari ghnam kṛtātmānam kṣipram drakṣyasi rāghavam
lakṣmaṇam ca dhanuṣpāṇim laṅkā dvāram upasthitam
nakha daṃṣṭra āyudhān vīrān siṃha śārdūla vikramān
vānarān vāraṇa indra ābhān kṣipram drakṣyasi saṃgatān
śaila ambuda nikāśānām laṅkā malaya sānuṣu
nardatām kapi mukhyānām ārye yūthāni anekaśas

original: 5.037.050a sa tu marmaṇi ghoreṇa tāḍito manmatheṣuṇā
analyzed: sa tu marmaṇi ghoreṇa tāḍitaḥ manmatha iṣuṇā

original: 5.037.050c na śarma labhate rāmaḥ siṃhārdita iva dvipaḥ
analyzed: na śarma labhate rāmaḥ siṃha arditaḥ iva dvipaḥ

original: 5.037.051a mā rudo devi śokena mā bhūt te manaso 'priyam
analyzed: mā rudaḥ devi śokena mā bhūt te manasaḥ priyam

original: 5.037.051c śacīva pathyā śakreṇa bhartrā nāthavatī hy asi
analyzed: śacī iva pathyā śakreṇa bhartrā nāthavatī hi asi

original: 5.037.052a rāmād viśiṣṭaḥ ko 'nyo 'sti kaś cit saumitriṇā samaḥ
analyzed: rāmāt viśiṣṭaḥ kaḥ asti kaḥ cit saumitriṇā samaḥ
agni māruta kalpau tau bhrātarau tava saṃśrayau
na asmin ciram vatsyasi devi deśe
rakṣaḥ gaṇaiḥ adhyuṣitaḥ ti raudre
na te cirāt āgamanam priyasya
kṣamasva mad saṃgama kāla mātram

original: 5.038.001a śrutvā tu vacanaṃ tasya vāyusūnor mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: śrutvā tu vacanam tasya vāyusūnoḥ mahātmanaḥ
uvāca ātma hitam vākyam sītā sura sutā upamā
tvām dṛṣṭvā priya vaktāram saṃprahṛṣyāmi vānara
ardha saṃjāta sasyā iva vṛṣṭim prāpya vasuṃdharā
yathā tam puruṣa vyāghram gātraiḥ śoka abhikarśitaiḥ

original: 5.038.003c saṃspṛśeyaṃ sakāmāhaṃ tathā kuru dayāṃ mayi
analyzed: saṃspṛśeyam sa kāmā aham tathā kuru dayām mayi
abhijñānam ca rāmasya dattam hari gaṇa uttama
kṣiptām īṣikām kākasya kopāt eka akṣi śātanīm

original: 5.038.005c tvayā pranaṣṭe tilake taṃ kila smartum arhasi
analyzed: tvayā pranaṣṭe tilake tam kila smartum arhasi

original: 5.038.006a sa vīryavān kathaṃ sītāṃ hṛtāṃ samanumanyase
analyzed: sa vīryavān katham sītām hṛtām samanumanyase
vasantīm rakṣasām madhye mahā indra varuṇa upama
eṣa cūḍāmaṇiḥ divyaḥ mayā su parirakṣitaḥ

original: 5.038.007c etaṃ dṛṣṭvā prahṛṣyāmi vyasane tvām ivānagha
analyzed: etam dṛṣṭvā prahṛṣyāmi vyasane tvām iva anagha

original: 5.038.008a eṣa niryātitaḥ śrīmān mayā te vārisaṃbhavaḥ
analyzed: eṣa niryātitaḥ śrīmān mayā te vāri saṃbhavaḥ

original: 5.038.008c ataḥ paraṃ na śakṣyāmi jīvituṃ śokalālasā
analyzed: atas param na śakṣyāmi jīvitum śoka lālasā

original: 5.038.009a asahyāni ca duḥkhāni vācaś ca hṛdayacchidaḥ
analyzed: asahyāni ca duḥkhāni vācaḥ ca hṛdaya chidaḥ
rākṣasīnām su ghorāṇām tvad kṛte marṣayāmi aham
dhārayiṣyāmi māsam tu jīvitam śatru sūdana

original: 5.038.010c māsād ūrdhvaṃ na jīviṣye tvayā hīnā nṛpātmaja
analyzed: māsāt ūrdhvam na jīviṣye tvayā hīnā nṛpa ātmaja

original: 5.038.011a ghoro rākṣasarājo 'yaṃ dṛṣṭiś ca na sukhā mayi
analyzed: ghoraḥ rākṣasa rājaḥ yam dṛṣṭiḥ ca na sukhā mayi

original: 5.038.011c tvāṃ ca śrutvā vipadyantaṃ na jīveyam ahaṃ kṣaṇam
analyzed: tvām ca śrutvā vipadyantam na jīveyam aham kṣaṇam
vaidehyāḥ vacanam śrutvā karuṇam sa aśru bhāṣitam
athā abravīt mahā tejāḥ hanumān mārutātmajaḥ

original: 5.038.013a tvacchokavimukho rāmo devi satyena te śape
analyzed: tvad śoka vimukhaḥ rāmaḥ devi satyena te śape
rāme śoka abhibhūte tu lakṣmaṇaḥ paritapyate

original: 5.038.014a dṛṣṭā kathaṃ cid bhavatī na kālaḥ pariśocitum
analyzed: dṛṣṭā katham cit bhavatī na kālaḥ pariśocitum

original: 5.038.014c imaṃ muhūrtaṃ duḥkhānām antaṃ drakṣyasi bhāmini
analyzed: imam muhūrtam duḥkhānām antam drakṣyasi bhāmini
tau ubhau puruṣa vyāghrau rāja putrau aninditau
tvad darśana kṛta utsāhau laṅkām bhasmīkariṣyataḥ

original: 5.038.016a hatvā tu samare krūraṃ rāvaṇaṃ saha bāndhavam
analyzed: hatvā tu samare krūram rāvaṇam saha bāndhavam

original: 5.038.016c rāghavau tvāṃ viśālākṣi svāṃ purīṃ prāpayiṣyataḥ
analyzed: rāghavau tvām viśāla akṣi svām purīm prāpayiṣyataḥ

original: 5.038.017a yat tu rāmo vijānīyād abhijñānam anindite
analyzed: yat tu rāmaḥ vijānīyāt abhijñānam anindite

original: 5.038.017c prītisaṃjananaṃ tasya bhūyas tvaṃ dātum arhasi
analyzed: prīti saṃjananam tasya bhūyas tvam dātum arhasi
sā bravīt dattam eva iha mayā abhijñānam uttamam

original: 5.038.018c etad eva hi rāmasya dṛṣṭvā matkeśabhūṣaṇam
analyzed: etat eva hi rāmasya dṛṣṭvā mad keśabhūṣaṇam

original: 5.038.018e śraddheyaṃ hanuman vākyaṃ tava vīra bhaviṣyati
analyzed: śraddheyam hanuman vākyam tava vīra bhaviṣyati

original: 5.038.019a sa taṃ maṇivaraṃ gṛhya śrīmān plavagasattamaḥ
analyzed: sa tam maṇi varam gṛhya śrīmān plavaga sattamaḥ
praṇamya śirasā devīm gamanāya upacakrame
tam utpāta kṛta utsāham avekṣya hari puṃgavam
vardhamānam mahā vegam uvāca janakātmajā
aśru pūrṇa mukhī dīnā bāṣpa gadgadayā girā
hanūman siṃha saṃkāśau bhrātarau rāma lakṣmaṇau

original: 5.038.021c sugrīvaṃ ca sahāmātyaṃ sarvān brūyā anāmayam
analyzed: sugrīvam ca saha amātyam sarvān brūyāḥ anāmayam

original: 5.038.022a yathā ca sa mahābāhur māṃ tārayati rāghavaḥ
analyzed: yathā ca sa mahā bāhuḥ mām tārayati rāghavaḥ
asmāt duḥkha ambu saṃrodhāt tat samādhātum arhasi
imam ca tīvram mama śoka vegam
rakṣobhiḥ ebhiḥ paribhartsanam ca
brūyāḥ tu rāmasya gataḥ samīpam
śivaḥ ca te dhvāstu hari pravīra
sa rāja putryā prativedita arthaḥ
kapiḥ kṛtārthaḥ parihṛṣṭa cetāḥ
tat alpa śeṣam prasamīkṣya kāryam
diśam hi udīcīm manasā jagāma

original: 5.039.001a sa ca vāgbhiḥ praśastābhir gamiṣyan pūjitas tayā
analyzed: sa ca vāgbhiḥ praśastābhiḥ gamiṣyan pūjitaḥ tayā

original: 5.039.001c tasmād deśād apakramya cintayām āsa vānaraḥ
analyzed: tasmāt deśāt apakramya cintayām āsa vānaraḥ
alpa śeṣam idam kāryam dṛṣṭā iyam asita īkṣaṇā

original: 5.039.002c trīn upāyān atikramya caturtha iha dṛśyate
analyzed: trīn upāyān atikramya caturthaḥ iha dṛśyate
na sāma rakṣaḥsu guṇāya kalpate
na danam artha upaciteṣu vartate
na bheda sādhyāḥ bala darpitāḥ janāḥ
parākramaḥ tu eṣa mama iha rocate
na ca asya kāryasya parākramāt ṛte
viniścayaḥ kaḥ cit iha upapadyate
hṛta pravīrāḥ tu raṇe hi rākṣasāḥ

original: kathaṃ cid īyur yad ihādya mārdavam
analyzed: katham cit īyuḥ yat iha adya mārdavam

original: 5.039.005a kārye karmaṇi nirdiṣṭo yo bahūny api sādhayet
analyzed: kārye karmaṇi nirdiṣṭaḥ yaḥ bahūni api sādhayet
pūrva kārya virodhena sa kāryam kartum arhati

original: 5.039.006a na hy ekaḥ sādhako hetuḥ svalpasyāpīha karmaṇaḥ
analyzed: na hi ekaḥ sādhakaḥ hetuḥ su alpasya api iha karmaṇaḥ

original: 5.039.006c yo hy arthaṃ bahudhā veda sa samartho 'rthasādhane
analyzed: yaḥ hi artham bahudhā veda sa samarthaḥ rtha sādhane
iha eva tāvat kṛta niścayaḥ hi aham
yadi vrajeyam plavaga īśvara ālayam
tatas kṛtam syāt mama bhartṛ śāsanam

original: 5.039.008a kathaṃ nu khalv adya bhavet sukhāgataṃ;
analyzed: katham nu khalu adya bhavet sukhāgatam
prasahya yuddham mama rākṣasaiḥ saha
tathā eva khalu ātma balam ca sāravat
samānayet mām ca raṇe daśānanaḥ
idam asya nṛśaṃsasya nandana upamam uttamam
vanam netra manaḥ kāntam nānā druma latā yutam
idam vidhvaṃsayiṣyāmi śuṣkam vanam iva analaḥ

original: 5.039.010c asmin bhagne tataḥ kopaṃ kariṣyati sa rāvaṇaḥ
analyzed: asmin bhagne tatas kopam kariṣyati sa rāvaṇaḥ
tatas mahat sa aśva mahā ratha dvipam
balam samāneṣu api rākṣasa adhipaḥ
triśūla kālāyasa paṭṭiśa āyudham
tatas mahat yuddham idam bhaviṣyati
aham tu taiḥ saṃyati caṇḍa vikramaiḥ
sametya rakṣobhiḥ asaṃga vikramaḥ
nihatya tat rāvaṇa coditam balam
sukham gamiṣyāmi kapi īśvara ālayam
tatas māruta vat kruddhaḥ mārutiḥ bhīma vikramaḥ
ūru vegena mahatā drumān kṣeptum atha ārabhat

original: 5.039.014a tatas tad dhanumān vīro babhañja pramadāvanam
analyzed: tatas tat dhanumān vīraḥ babhañja pramadā vanam
matta dvija samāghuṣṭam nānā druma latā yutam

original: 5.039.015a tad vanaṃ mathitair vṛkṣair bhinnaiś ca salilāśayaiḥ
analyzed: tat vanam mathitaiḥ vṛkṣaiḥ bhinnaiḥ ca salilāśayaiḥ
cūrṇitaiḥ parvata agraiḥ ca babhūva apriya darśanam
latāgṛhaiḥ citragṛhaiḥ ca nāśitaiḥ
mahā uragaiḥ vyāla mṛgaiḥ ca nirdhutaiḥ
śilāgṛhaiḥ unmathitaiḥ tathā gṛhaiḥ
pranaṣṭa rūpam tat abhūt mahat vanam
sa tasya kṛtvā arthapateḥ mahā kapiḥ
mahat vyalīkam manasaḥ mahātmanaḥ
yuyutsuḥ ekaḥ bahubhiḥ mahā balaiḥ
śriyā jvalan toraṇam āśritaḥ kapiḥ
tatas pakṣi ninādena vṛkṣa bhaṅga svanena ca
babhūvuḥ trāsa saṃbhrāntāḥ sarve laṅkā nivāsinaḥ
vidrutāḥ ca bhaya trastāḥ vineduḥ mṛga pakṣuṇaḥ
rakṣasām ca nimittāni krūrāṇi pratipedire
tatas gatāyām nidrāyām rākṣasyaḥ vikṛta ānanāḥ

original: 5.040.003c tad vanaṃ dadṛśur bhagnaṃ taṃ ca vīraṃ mahākapim
analyzed: tat vanam dadṛśuḥ bhagnam tam ca vīram mahā kapim

original: 5.040.004a sa tā dṛṣṭva mahābāhur mahāsattvo mahābalaḥ
analyzed: sa tāḥ dṛṣṭvā mahā bāhuḥ mahā sattvaḥ mahā balaḥ
cakāra su mahat rūpam rākṣasīnām bhaya āvaham
tatas tam giri saṃkāśam atikāyam mahā balam
rākṣasyaḥ vānaram dṛṣṭvā papracchuḥ janakātmajām

original: 5.040.006a ko 'yaṃ kasya kuto vāyaṃ kiṃnimittam ihāgataḥ
analyzed: kaḥ yam kasya kutas vā ayam kiṃnimittam iha āgataḥ

original: 5.040.006c kathaṃ tvayā sahānena saṃvādaḥ kṛta ity uta
analyzed: katham tvayā saha anena saṃvādaḥ kṛtaḥ iti uta

original: 5.040.007a ācakṣva no viśālākṣi mā bhūt te subhage bhayam
analyzed: ācakṣva naḥ viśāla akṣi mā bhūt te subhage bhayam

original: 5.040.007c saṃvādam asitāpāṅge tvayā kiṃ kṛtavān ayam
analyzed: saṃvādam asita apāṅge tvayā kim kṛtavān ayam
atha abravīt tadā sādhvī sītā sarva aṅga śobhanā

original: 5.040.008c rakṣasāṃ kāmarūpāṇāṃ vijñāne mama kā gatiḥ
analyzed: rakṣasām kāmarūpāṇām vijñāne mama kā gatiḥ

original: 5.040.009a yūyam evāsya jānīta yo 'yaṃ yad vā kariṣyati
analyzed: yūyam eva asya jānīta yaḥ yam yat vā kariṣyati

original: 5.040.009c ahir eva aheḥ pādān vijānāti na saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: ahiḥ eva aheḥ pādān vijānāti na saṃśayaḥ

original: 5.040.010a aham apy asya bhītāsmi nainaṃ jānāmi ko 'nvayam
analyzed: aham api asya bhītā asmi na enam jānāmi kaḥ nu ayam
vedmi rākṣasam eva enam kāmarūpiṇam āgatam

original: 5.040.011a vaidehyā vacanaṃ śrutvā rākṣasyo vidrutā drutam
analyzed: vaidehyāḥ vacanam śrutvā rākṣasyaḥ vidrutāḥ drutam

original: 5.040.011c sthitāḥ kāś cid gatāḥ kāś cid rāvaṇāya niveditum
analyzed: sthitāḥ kāḥ cit gatāḥ kāḥ cit rāvaṇāya niveditum
rāvaṇasya samīpe tu rākṣasyaḥ vikṛta ānanāḥ
virūpam vānaram bhīmam ākhyatum upacakramuḥ
aśoka vanikā madhye rājan bhīma vapuḥ kapiḥ
sītayā kṛta saṃvādaḥ tiṣṭhati amita vikramaḥ

original: 5.040.014a na ca taṃ jānakī sītā hariṃ hariṇalocaṇā
analyzed: na ca tam jānakī sītā harim hariṇa locaṇā
asmābhiḥ bahudhā pṛṣṭā nivedayitum icchati

original: 5.040.015a vāsavasya bhaved dūto dūto vaiśravaṇasya vā
analyzed: vāsavasya bhavet dūtaḥ dūtaḥ vaiśravaṇasya vā
preṣitaḥ vā api rāmeṇa sītā anveṣaṇa kāṅkṣayā

original: 5.040.016a tena tvadbhūtarūpeṇa yat tat tava manoharam
analyzed: tena tvad bhūta rūpeṇa yat tat tava manoharam
nānā mṛga gaṇa ākīrṇam pramṛṣṭam pramadā vanam

original: 5.040.017a na tatra kaś cid uddeśo yas tena na vināśitaḥ
analyzed: na tatra kaḥ cit uddeśaḥ yaḥ tena na vināśitaḥ

original: 5.040.017c yatra sā jānakī sītā sa tena na vināśitaḥ
analyzed: yatra sā jānakī sītā sa tena na vināśitaḥ
jānakī rakṣaṇa artham vā śramāt vā na upalabhyate

original: 5.040.018c atha vā kaḥ śramas tasya saiva tenābhirakṣitā
analyzed: atha vā kaḥ śramaḥ tasya sā eva tena abhirakṣitā
cāru pallava patra āḍhyam yam sītā svayam āsthitā
pravṛddhaḥ śiṃśapā vṛkṣaḥ sa ca tena abhirakṣitaḥ
tasya ugra rūpasya ugram tvam daṇḍam ājñātum arhasi

original: 5.040.020c sītā saṃbhāṣitā yena tad vanaṃ ca vināśitam
analyzed: sītā saṃbhāṣitā yena tat vanam ca vināśitam
manaḥ parigṛhītām tām tava rakṣaḥ gaṇa īśvara

original: 5.040.021c kaḥ sītām abhibhāṣeta yo na syāt tyaktajīvitaḥ
analyzed: kaḥ sītām abhibhāṣeta yaḥ na syāt tyakta jīvitaḥ
rākṣasīnām vacaḥ śrutvā rāvaṇaḥ rākṣaseśvaraḥ
huta agiḥ iva jajvāla kopa saṃvartita īkṣaṇaḥ

original: 5.040.023a ātmanaḥ sadṛśāñ śūrān kiṃkarān nāma rākṣasān
analyzed: ātmanaḥ sadṛśām śūrān kiṃkarān nāma rākṣasān
vyādideśa mahā tejāḥ nigraha artham hanūmataḥ
teṣām aśīti sāhasram kiṃkarāṇām tarasvinām
niryayuḥ bhavanāt tasmāt kūṭamudgara pāṇayaḥ
mahā udarāḥ mahā daṃṣṭrāḥ ghora rūpāḥ mahā balāḥ
yuddha abhimanasaḥ sarve

original: 5.040.026a te kapiṃ taṃ samāsādya toraṇastham avasthitam
analyzed: te kapim tam samāsādya toraṇa stham avasthitam
abhipetuḥ mahā vegāḥ pataṅgāḥ iva pāvakam
te gadābhiḥ vicitrābhiḥ parighaiḥ kāñcana aṅgadaiḥ
ājaghnuḥ vānara śreṣṭham śaraiḥ āditya saṃnibhaiḥ
hanūmān api tejasvī śrīmān parvata saṃnibhaḥ

original: 5.040.028c kṣitāv āvidhya lāṅgūlaṃ nanāda ca mahāsvanam
analyzed: kṣitau āvidhya lāṅgūlam nanāda ca mahā svanam
tasya saṃnāda śabdena te bhavan bhaya śaṅkitāḥ
dadṛśuḥ ca hanūmantam saṃdhyā megham iva unnatam
svāmi saṃdeśa niḥśaṅkāḥ tatas te rākṣasāḥ kapim

original: 5.040.030c citraiḥ praharaṇair bhīmair abhipetus tatas tataḥ
analyzed: citraiḥ praharaṇaiḥ bhīmaiḥ abhipetuḥ tatas tatas

original: 5.040.031a sa taiḥ parivṛtaḥ śūraiḥ sarvataḥ sa mahābalaḥ
analyzed: sa taiḥ parivṛtaḥ śūraiḥ sarvatas sa mahā balaḥ
āsasāda āyasam bhīmam parigham toraṇa āśritam

original: 5.040.032a sa taṃ parigham ādāya jaghāna rajanīcarān
analyzed: sa tam parigham ādāya jaghāna rajanīcarān
sa pannagam iva ādāya sphurantam vinatā sutaḥ
vicacāra ambare vīraḥ parigṛhya ca mārutiḥ

original: 5.040.034a sa hatvā rākṣasān vīraḥ kiṃkarān mārutātmajaḥ
analyzed: sa hatvā rākṣasān vīraḥ kiṃkarān mārutātmajaḥ
yuddha ākāṅkṣī punar vīraḥ toraṇam samupasthitaḥ

original: 5.040.035a tatas tasmād bhayān muktāḥ kati cit tatra rākṣasāḥ
analyzed: tatas tasmāt bhayāt muktāḥ kati cit tatra rākṣasāḥ
nihatān kiṃkarān sarvān rāvaṇāya nyavedayan
sa rākṣasānām nihatam mahā balam
niśamya rājā parivṛtta locanaḥ
samādideśa apratimam parākrame
prahasta putram samare su durjayam

original: 5.041.001a tataḥ sa kiṃkarān hatvā hanūmān dhyānam āsthitaḥ
analyzed: tatas sa kiṃkarān hatvā hanūmān dhyānam āsthitaḥ

original: 5.041.001c vanaṃ bhagnaṃ mayā caityaprāsādo na vināśitaḥ
analyzed: vanam bhagnam mayā caitya prāsādaḥ na vināśitaḥ

original: 5.041.001e tasmāt prāsādam apy evam imaṃ vidhvaṃsayāmy aham
analyzed: tasmāt prāsādam api evam imam vidhvaṃsayāmi aham

original: 5.041.002a iti saṃcintya hanumān manasā darśayan balam
analyzed: iti saṃcintya hanumān manasā darśayan balam
caitya prāsādam āplutya meru śṛṅgam iva unnatam
āruroha hari śreṣṭhaḥ hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
saṃpradhṛṣya ca durdharṣaḥ caitya prāsādam unnatam
hanūmān prajvalan lakṣmyā pāriyātra upamaḥ bhavat

original: 5.041.004a sa bhūtvā tu mahākāyo hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
analyzed: sa bhūtvā tu mahā kāyaḥ hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ

original: 5.041.004c dhṛṣṭam āsphoṭayām āsa laṅkāṃ śabdena pūrayan
analyzed: dhṛṣṭam āsphoṭayām āsa laṅkām śabdena pūrayan
tasya āsphoṭita śabdena mahatā śrotra ghātinā

original: 5.041.005c petur vihaṃgā gaganād uccaiś cedam aghoṣayat
analyzed: petuḥ vihaṃgāḥ gaganāt uccaiḥ ca idam aghoṣayat

original: 5.041.006a jayaty atibalo rāmo lakṣmaṇaś ca mahābalaḥ
analyzed: jayati atibalaḥ rāmaḥ lakṣmaṇaḥ ca mahā balaḥ
rājā jayati sugrīvaḥ rāghaveṇa abhipālitaḥ
dāsaḥ ham kosala indrasya rāmasya akliṣṭa karmaṇaḥ
hanumān śatru sainyānām nihantā mārutātmajaḥ

original: 5.041.008a na rāvaṇasahasraṃ me yuddhe pratibalaṃ bhavet
analyzed: na rāvaṇa sahasram me yuddhe pratibalam bhavet

original: 5.041.008c śilābhis tu praharataḥ pādapaiś ca sahasraśaḥ
analyzed: śilābhiḥ tu praharataḥ pādapaiḥ ca sahasraśas

original: 5.041.009a ardayitvā purīṃ laṅkām abhivādya ca maithilīm
analyzed: ardayitvā purīm laṅkām abhivādya ca maithilīm
samṛddha arthaḥ gamiṣyāmi miṣatām sarva rakṣasām
evam uktvā vimāna sthaḥ caitya sthān hari puṃgavaḥ
nanāda bhīma nirhrādaḥ rakṣasām janayan bhayam

original: 5.041.011a tena śabdena mahatā caityapālāḥ śataṃ yayuḥ
analyzed: tena śabdena mahatā caitya pālāḥ śatam yayuḥ

original: 5.041.011c gṛhītvā vividhān astrān prāsān khaḍgān paraśvadhān
analyzed: gṛhītvā vividhān astrān prāsān khaḍgān paraśvadhān
visṛjantaḥ mahā kṣayāḥ mārutim paryavārayan

original: 5.041.012a āvarta iva gaṅgāyās toyasya vipulo mahān
analyzed: āvartaḥ iva gaṅgāyāḥ toyasya vipulaḥ mahān

original: 5.041.012c parikṣipya hariśreṣṭhaṃ sa babhau rakṣasāṃ gaṇaḥ
analyzed: parikṣipya hari śreṣṭham sa babhau rakṣasām gaṇaḥ
tatas vātātmajaḥ kruddhaḥ bhīma rūpam samāsthitaḥ
prāsādasya mahān tasya stambham hema pariṣkṛtam
utpāṭayitvā vegena hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ

original: 5.041.014e tatas taṃ bhrāmayām āsa śatadhāraṃ mahābalaḥ
analyzed: tatas tam bhrāmayām āsa śata dhāram mahā balaḥ
sa rākṣasa śatam hatvā vajreṇa indraḥ iva asurān
antarikṣa sthitaḥ śrīmān idam vacanam abravīt
mādṛśānām sahasrāṇi visṛṣṭāni mahātmanām
balinām vānara indrāṇām sugrīva vaśa vartinām

original: 5.041.017a śataiḥ śatasahasraiś ca koṭībhir ayutair api
analyzed: śataiḥ śata sahasraiḥ ca koṭībhiḥ ayutaiḥ api
āgamiṣyati sugrīvaḥ sarveṣām vaḥ niṣūdanaḥ

original: 5.041.018a neyam asti purī laṅkā na yūyaṃ na ca rāvaṇaḥ
analyzed: na iyam asti purī laṅkā na yūyam na ca rāvaṇaḥ
yasmāt ikṣvāku nāthena baddham vairam mahātmanā
saṃdiṣṭaḥ rākṣasa indreṇa prahastasya sutaḥ balī
jambumālī mahā daṃṣṭraḥ nirjagāma dhanuḥ dharaḥ
rakta mālya ambara dharaḥ sragvī rucira kuṇḍalaḥ
mahān vivṛtta nayanaḥ caṇḍaḥ samara durjayaḥ
dhanuḥ śakra dhanuḥ prakhyam mahat rucira sāyakam
visphārayāṇaḥ vegena vajra aśani sama svanam
tasya visphāra ghoṣeṇa dhanuṣaḥ mahatā diśaḥ

original: 5.042.004c pradiśaś ca nabhaś caiva sahasā samapūryata
analyzed: pradiśaḥ ca nabhaḥ ca eva sahasā samapūryata

original: 5.042.005a rathena kharayuktena tam āgatam udīkṣya saḥ
analyzed: rathena khara yuktena tam āgatam udīkṣya saḥ

original: 5.042.005c hanūmān vegasaṃpanno jaharṣa ca nanāda ca
analyzed: hanūmān vega saṃpannaḥ jaharṣa ca nanāda ca
tam toraṇa viṭaṅka stham hanūmantam mahā kapim
jambumālī mahā bāhuḥ vivyādha niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
ardhacandreṇa vadane śirasi ekena karṇinā

original: 5.042.007c bāhvor vivyādha nārācair daśabhis taṃ kapīśvaram
analyzed: bāhvoḥ vivyādha nārācaiḥ daśabhiḥ tam kapi īśvaram

original: 5.042.008a tasya tac chuśubhe tāmraṃ śareṇābhihataṃ mukham
analyzed: tasya tat śuśubhe tāmram śareṇa abhihatam mukham
śaradi iva ambujam phullam viddham bhāskara raśminā
cukopa bāṇa abhihataḥ rākṣasasya mahā kapiḥ
tatas pārśve ti vipulām dadarśa mahatīm śilām

original: 5.042.010a tarasā tāṃ samutpāṭya cikṣepa balavad balī
analyzed: tarasā tām samutpāṭya cikṣepa balavat balī

original: 5.042.010c tāṃ śarair daśabhiḥ kruddhas tāḍayām āsa rākṣasaḥ
analyzed: tām śaraiḥ daśabhiḥ kruddhaḥ tāḍayām āsa rākṣasaḥ

original: 5.042.011a vipannaṃ karma tad dṛṣṭvā hanūmāṃś caṇḍavikramaḥ
analyzed: vipannam karma tat dṛṣṭvā hanūmān caṇḍa vikramaḥ

original: 5.042.011c sālaṃ vipulam utpāṭya bhrāmayām āsa vīryavān
analyzed: sālam vipulam utpāṭya bhrāmayām āsa vīryavān
bhrāmayantam kapim dṛṣṭvā sāla vṛkṣam mahā balam
cikṣepa su bahūn jambumālī mahā balaḥ

original: 5.042.013a sālaṃ caturbhir ciccheda vānaraṃ pañcabhir bhuje
analyzed: sālam caturbhiḥ ciccheda vānaram pañcabhiḥ bhuje

original: 5.042.013c urasy ekena bāṇena daśabhis tu stanāntare
analyzed: urasi ekena bāṇena daśabhiḥ tu stanāntare

original: 5.042.014a sa śaraiḥ pūritatanuḥ krodhena mahatā vṛtaḥ
analyzed: sa śaraiḥ pūrita tanuḥ krodhena mahatā vṛtaḥ

original: 5.042.014c tam eva parighaṃ gṛhya bhrāmayām āsa vegitaḥ
analyzed: tam eva parigham gṛhya bhrāmayām āsa vegitaḥ
ativegaḥ tivegena bhrāmayitvā bala utkaṭaḥ
parigham pātayām āsa jambumāleḥ mahā urasi

original: 5.042.016a tasya caiva śiro nāsti na bāhū na ca jānunī
analyzed: tasya ca eva śiraḥ na asti na bāhū na ca jānunī

original: 5.042.016c na dhanur na ratho nāśvās tatrādṛśyanta neṣavaḥ
analyzed: na dhanuḥ na rathaḥ na aśvāḥ tatra adṛśyanta na iṣavaḥ

original: 5.042.017a sa hatas tarasā tena jambumālī mahārathaḥ
analyzed: sa hataḥ tarasā tena jambumālī mahā rathaḥ
papāta nihataḥ bhūmau cūrṇita aṅga vibhūṣaṇaḥ

original: 5.042.018a jambumāliṃ ca nihataṃ kiṃkarāṃś ca mahābalān
analyzed: jambumālim ca nihatam kiṃkarān ca mahā balān
cukrodha rāvaṇaḥ śrutvā kopa saṃrakta locanaḥ
sa roṣa saṃvartita tāmra locanaḥ
prahasta putre nihate mahā bale
amātya putrān ati vīrya vikramān
samādideśa āśu niśācara īśvaraḥ

original: 5.043.001a tatas te rākṣasendreṇa coditā mantriṇaḥ sutāḥ
analyzed: tatas te rākṣasa indreṇa coditāḥ mantriṇaḥ sutāḥ
niryayuḥ bhavanāt tasmāt sapta sapta arci varcasaḥ
mahā bala parīvārāḥ dhanuṣmantaḥ mahā balāḥ
kṛtāstra astra vidām śreṣṭhāḥ paraspara jaya eṣiṇaḥ
hema jāla parikṣiptaiḥ dhvajavadbhiḥ patākibhiḥ
toyada svana nirghoṣaiḥ vāji yuktaiḥ mahā rathaiḥ
tapta kāñcana citrāṇi cāpāni amita vikramāḥ
visphārayantaḥ saṃhṛṣṭāḥ taḍidvantaḥ iva ambudāḥ

original: 5.043.005a jananyas tās tatas teṣāṃ viditvā kiṃkarān hatān
analyzed: jananyaḥ tāḥ tatas teṣām viditvā kiṃkarān hatān
babhūvuḥ śoka saṃbhrāntāḥ sa bāndhava suhṛd janāḥ
te paraspara saṃgharṣāḥ tapta kāñcana bhūṣaṇāḥ
abhipetuḥ hanūmantam toraṇa stham avasthitam
sṛjantaḥ bāṇa vṛṣṭim te ratha garjita niḥsvanāḥ
vṛṣṭimantaḥ iva ambhodāḥ viceruḥ nairṛta ṛṣabhāḥ
avakīrṇaḥ tatas tābhiḥ hanumān śara vṛṣṭibhiḥ
abhavat saṃvṛta ākāraḥ śailarāj iva vṛṣṭibhiḥ

original: 5.043.009a sa śarān vañcayām āsa teṣām āśucaraḥ kapiḥ
analyzed: sa śarān vañcayām āsa teṣām āśu caraḥ kapiḥ
ratha vegān ca vīrāṇām vicaran vimale mbare

original: 5.043.010a sa taiḥ krīḍan dhanuṣmadbhir vyomni vīraḥ prakāśate
analyzed: sa taiḥ krīḍan dhanuṣmadbhiḥ vyomni vīraḥ prakāśate

original: 5.043.010c dhanuṣmadbhir yathā meghair mārutaḥ prabhur ambare
analyzed: dhanuṣmadbhiḥ yathā meghaiḥ mārutaḥ prabhuḥ ambare

original: 5.043.011a sa kṛtvā ninadaṃ ghoraṃ trāsayaṃs tāṃ mahācamūm
analyzed: sa kṛtvā ninadam ghoram trāsayan tām mahā camūm

original: 5.043.011c cakāra hanumān vegaṃ teṣu rakṣaḥsu vīryavān
analyzed: cakāra hanumān vegam teṣu rakṣaḥsu vīryavān

original: 5.043.012a talenābhihanat kāṃś cit pādaiḥ kāṃś cit paraṃtapaḥ
analyzed: talena abhihanat kān cit pādaiḥ kān cit paraṃtapaḥ

original: 5.043.012c muṣṭinābhyahanat kāṃś cin nakhaiḥ kāṃś cid vyadārayat
analyzed: muṣṭinā abhyahanat kān cit nakhaiḥ kān cit vyadārayat

original: 5.043.013a pramamāthorasā kāṃś cid ūrubhyām aparān kapiḥ
analyzed: pramamātha urasā kān cit ūrubhyām aparān kapiḥ

original: 5.043.013c ke cit tasyaiva nādena tatraiva patitā bhuvi
analyzed: ke cid tasya eva nādena tatra eva patitāḥ bhuvi

original: 5.043.014a tatas teṣv avapanneṣu bhūmau nipatiteṣu ca
analyzed: tatas teṣu avapanneṣu bhūmau nipatiteṣu ca

original: 5.043.014c tat sainyam agamat sarvaṃ diśo daśabhayārditam
analyzed: tat sainyam agamat sarvam diśaḥ daśa bhaya arditam

original: 5.043.015a vinedur visvaraṃ nāgā nipetur bhuvi vājinaḥ
analyzed: vineduḥ visvaram nāgāḥ nipetuḥ bhuvi vājinaḥ
bhagna nīḍa dhvaja chatraiḥ bhūḥ ca kīrṇā abhavat rathaiḥ
sa tān pravṛddhān vinihatya rākṣasān
yuyutsuḥ anyaiḥ punar eva rākṣasaiḥ
tat eva vīraḥ bhijagāma toraṇam
hatān mantri sutān buddhvā vānareṇa mahātmanā
rāvaṇaḥ saṃvṛta ākāraḥ cakāra matim uttamām
sa virūpākṣa yūpākṣau durdharam ca eva rākṣasam
praghasam bhāsakarṇam ca pañca senā agra nāyakān
saṃdideśa daśagrīvaḥ vīrān naya viśāradān
hanumat grahaṇe vyagrān vāyu vega samān yudhi
yāta senā agragāḥ sarve mahā bala parigrahāḥ
sa vāji ratha mātaṅgāḥ sa kapiḥ śāsyatām iti

original: 5.044.005a yat taiś ca khalu bhāvyaṃ syāt tam āsādya vanālayam
analyzed: yat taiḥ ca khalu bhāvyam syāt tam āsādya vana ālayam
karma ca api samādheyam deśa kāla virodhitam

original: 5.044.006a na hy ahaṃ taṃ kapiṃ manye karmaṇā pratitarkayan
analyzed: na hi aham tam kapim manye karmaṇā pratitarkayan
sarvathā tat mahat bhūtam mahā bala parigraham

original: 5.044.006e bhaved indreṇa vā sṛṣṭam asmadarthaṃ tapobalāt
analyzed: bhavet indreṇa vā sṛṣṭam asmad artham tapaḥ balāt
sa nāga yakṣa gandharvāḥ deva asura mahā ṛṣayaḥ

original: 5.044.007c yuṣmābhiḥ sahitaiḥ sarvair mayā saha vinirjitāḥ
analyzed: yuṣmābhiḥ sahitaiḥ sarvaiḥ mayā saha vinirjitāḥ

original: 5.044.008a tair avaśyaṃ vidhātavyaṃ vyalīkaṃ kiṃ cid eva naḥ
analyzed: taiḥ avaśyam vidhātavyam vyalīkam kim cit eva naḥ

original: 5.044.008c tad eva nātra saṃdehaḥ prasahya parigṛhyatām
analyzed: tat eva na atra saṃdehaḥ prasahya parigṛhyatām
na avamanyaḥ bhavadbhiḥ ca hariḥ krūra parākramaḥ

original: 5.044.009c dṛṣṭā hi harayaḥ śīghrā mayā vipulavikramāḥ
analyzed: dṛṣṭāḥ hi harayaḥ śīghrāḥ mayā vipula vikramāḥ

original: 5.044.010a vālī ca saha sugrīvo jāmbavāṃś ca mahābalaḥ
analyzed: vālī ca saha sugrīvaḥ jāmbavān ca mahā balaḥ

original: 5.044.010c nīlaḥ senāpatiś caiva ye cānye dvividādayaḥ
analyzed: nīlaḥ senāpatiḥ ca eva ye ca anye dvivida ādayaḥ

original: 5.044.011a naiva teṣāṃ gatir bhīmā na tejo na parākramaḥ
analyzed: na eva teṣām gatiḥ bhīmā na tejaḥ na parākramaḥ

original: 5.044.011c na matir na balotsāho na rūpaparikalpanam
analyzed: na matiḥ na bala utsāhaḥ na rūpa parikalpanam

original: 5.044.012a mahat sattvam idaṃ jñeyaṃ kapirūpaṃ vyavasthitam
analyzed: mahat sattvam idam jñeyam kapi rūpam vyavasthitam

original: 5.044.012c prayatnaṃ mahad āsthāya kriyatām asya nigrahaḥ
analyzed: prayatnam mahat āsthāya kriyatām asya nigrahaḥ
kāmam lokāḥ trayaḥ sa indrāḥ sa sura asura mānavāḥ

original: 5.044.013c bhavatām agrataḥ sthātuṃ na paryāptā raṇājire
analyzed: bhavatām agratas sthātum na paryāptāḥ raṇa ajire

original: 5.044.014a tathāpi tu nayajñena jayam ākāṅkṣatā raṇe
analyzed: tathā api tu naya jñena jayam ākāṅkṣatā raṇe

original: 5.044.014c ātmā rakṣyaḥ prayatnena yuddhasiddhir hi cañcalā
analyzed: ātmā rakṣyaḥ prayatnena yuddha siddhiḥ hi cañcalā
te svāmi vacanam sarve pratigṛhya mahā ojasaḥ
samutpetuḥ mahā vegāḥ hutāśa sama tejasaḥ

original: 5.044.016a rathaiś ca mattair nāgaiś ca vājibhiś ca mahājavaiḥ
analyzed: rathaiḥ ca mattaiḥ nāgaiḥ ca vājibhiḥ ca mahā javaiḥ

original: 5.044.016c śastraiś ca vividhais tīkṣṇaiḥ sarvaiś copacitā balaiḥ
analyzed: śastraiḥ ca vividhaiḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ sarvaiḥ ca upacitāḥ balaiḥ

original: 5.044.017a tatas taṃ dadṛśur vīrā dīpyamānaṃ mahākapim
analyzed: tatas tam dadṛśuḥ vīrāḥ dīpyamānam mahā kapim
raśmimantam iva udyantam sva tejaḥ raśmi mālinam
toraṇa stham mahā vegam mahā sattvam mahā balam
mahāmatim mahā utsāham mahā kāyam mahā balam

original: 5.044.019a taṃ samīkṣyaiva te sarve dikṣu sarvāsv avasthitāḥ
analyzed: tam samīkṣya eva te sarve dikṣu sarvāsu avasthitāḥ

original: 5.044.019c tais taiḥ praharaṇair bhīmair abhipetus tatas tataḥ
analyzed: taiḥ taiḥ praharaṇaiḥ bhīmaiḥ abhipetuḥ tatas tatas

original: 5.044.020a tasya pañcāyasās tīkṣṇāḥ sitāḥ pītamukhāḥ śarāḥ
analyzed: tasya pañca āyasāḥ tīkṣṇāḥ sitāḥ pīta mukhāḥ śarāḥ
śiraḥ ti utpala patra ābhāḥ durdhareṇa nipātitāḥ

original: 5.044.021a sa taiḥ pañcabhir āviddhaḥ śaraiḥ śirasi vānaraḥ
analyzed: sa taiḥ pañcabhiḥ āviddhaḥ śaraiḥ śirasi vānaraḥ

original: 5.044.021c utpapāta nadan vyomni diśo daśa vinādayan
analyzed: utpapāta nadan vyomni diśaḥ daśa vinādayan

original: 5.044.022a tatas tu durdharo vīraḥ sarathaḥ sajjakārmukaḥ
analyzed: tatas tu durdharaḥ vīraḥ sa rathaḥ sajja kārmukaḥ
kiram śara śataiḥ na ekaiḥ abhipede mahā balaḥ

original: 5.044.023a sa kapir vārayām āsa taṃ vyomni śaravarṣiṇam
analyzed: sa kapiḥ vārayām āsa tam vyomni śara varṣiṇam
vṛṣṭimantam payoda ante payodam iva mārutaḥ
ardyamānaḥ tatas tena durdhareṇa anilātmajaḥ

original: 5.044.024c cakāra ninadaṃ bhūyo vyavardhata ca vegavān
analyzed: cakāra ninadam bhūyas vyavardhata ca vegavān

original: 5.044.025a sa dūraṃ sahasotpatya durdharasya rathe hariḥ
analyzed: sa dūram sahasā utpatya durdharasya rathe hariḥ
nipapāta mahā vegaḥ vidyut rāśiḥ girau iva
tatas tam mathita aṣṭa aśvam ratham bhagna akṣa kūvaram
vihāya nyapatat bhūmau durdharaḥ tyakta jīvitaḥ
tam virūpākṣa yūpākṣau dṛṣṭvā nipatitam bhuvi
saṃjāta roṣau durdharṣau utpetatuḥ ariṃdamau
sa tābhyām sahasā utpatya viṣṭhitaḥ vimale mbare
mudgarābhyām mahā bāhuḥ vakṣasi abhihataḥ kapiḥ
tayoḥ vegavatoḥ vegam vinihatya mahā balaḥ
nipapāta punar bhūmau suparṇa sama vikramaḥ

original: 5.044.030a sa sālavṛkṣam āsādya samutpāṭya ca vānaraḥ
analyzed: sa sāla vṛkṣam āsādya samutpāṭya ca vānaraḥ

original: 5.044.030c tāv ubhau rākṣasau vīrau jaghāna pavanātmajaḥ
analyzed: tau ubhau rākṣasau vīrau jaghāna pavanātmajaḥ

original: 5.044.031a tatas tāṃs trīn hatāñ jñātvā vānareṇa tarasvinā
analyzed: tatas tān trīn hatām jñātvā vānareṇa tarasvinā
abhipede mahā vegaḥ prasahya praghasaḥ harim

original: 5.044.032a bhāsakarṇaś ca saṃkruddhaḥ śūlam ādāya vīryavān
analyzed: bhāsakarṇaḥ ca saṃkruddhaḥ śūlam ādāya vīryavān
ekatas kapi śārdūlam yaśasvinam avasthitau
paṭṭiśena śita agreṇa praghasaḥ pratyapothayat
bhāsa karṇaḥ ca śūlena rākṣasaḥ kapi sattamam
sa tābhyām vikṣataiḥ gātraiḥ asṛj digdha tanūruhaḥ
abhavat vānaraḥ kruddhaḥ bāla sūrya sama prabhaḥ
samutpāṭya gireḥ śṛṅgam sa mṛga vyāla pādapam
jaghāna hanumān vīraḥ rākṣasau kapi kuñjaraḥ
tatas teṣu avasanneṣu senāpatiṣu pañcasu

original: 5.044.036c balaṃ tad avaśeṣaṃ tu nāśayām āsa vānaraḥ
analyzed: balam tat avaśeṣam tu nāśayām āsa vānaraḥ

original: 5.044.037a aśvair aśvān gajair nāgān yodhair yodhān rathai rathān
analyzed: aśvaiḥ aśvān gajaiḥ nāgān yodhaiḥ yodhān rathaiḥ rathān

original: 5.044.037c sa kapir nāśayām āsa sahasrākṣa ivāsurān
analyzed: sa kapiḥ nāśayām āsa sahasrākṣaḥ iva asurān

original: 5.044.038a hatair nāgaiś ca turagair bhagnākṣaiś ca mahārathaiḥ
analyzed: hataiḥ nāgaiḥ ca turagaiḥ bhagna akṣaiḥ ca mahā rathaiḥ

original: 5.044.038c hataiś ca rākṣasair bhūmī ruddhamārgā samantataḥ
analyzed: hataiḥ ca rākṣasaiḥ bhūmī ruddha mārgā samantataḥ
tatas kapiḥ tān dhvajinī patīn raṇe
nihatya vīrān sa balān sa vāhanān
tat eva vīraḥ parigṛhya toraṇam
kṛtakṣaṇaḥ kālaḥ iva prajā kṣaye
senāpatīn pañca sa tu pramāpitān
hanūmatā sa anucarān sa vāhanān
samīkṣya rājā samara uddhata unmukham
kumāram akṣam prasamaikṣata akṣatam
sa tasya dṛṣṭi arpaṇa saṃpracoditaḥ
pratāpavān kāñcana citra kārmukaḥ
samutpapāta atha sadasi
dvijāti mukhyaiḥ haviṣā iva pāvakaḥ
tatas mahat bāla divākara prabham
pratapta jāmbūnada jāla saṃtatam
rathām samāsthāya yayau sa vīryavān
mahā harim tam prati nairṛta ṛṣabhaḥ
tatas tapaḥ saṃgraha saṃcaya arjitam
pratapta jāmbūnada jāla śobhitam
patākinam ratna vibhūṣita dhvajam
manojava aṣṭa aśva varaiḥ su yojitam
sura asura adhṛṣyam asaṃga cāriṇam
ravi prabham vyoma caram samāhitam
sa tūṇam aṣṭa asi nibaddha bandhuram
yathā krama āveśita śakti tomaram
virājamānam pratipūrṇa vastunā
sa hema dāmnā śaśi sūrya varvasā
divākara ābham ratham āsthitaḥ tatas
sa nirjagāma amara tulya vikramaḥ

original: 5.045.007a sa pūrayan khaṃ ca mahīṃ ca sācalāṃ;
analyzed: sa pūrayan kham ca mahīm ca sa acalām
turaṃga mataṅga mahā ratha svanaiḥ
balaiḥ sametaiḥ sa hi toraṇa sthitam
samartham āsīnam upāgamat kapim
sa tam samāsādya harim hari īkṣaṇaḥ
yugānta kāla agnim iva prajā kṣaye
avasthitam vismita jāta saṃbhramaḥ
samaikṣata akṣaḥ bahu māna cakṣuṣā

original: 5.045.009a sa tasya vegaṃ ca kaper mahātmanaḥ;
analyzed: sa tasya vegam ca kapeḥ mahātmanaḥ
parākramam ca ariṣu pārhtiva ātmajaḥ
vicārayan kham ca balam mahā balaḥ
hima kṣaye sūryaḥ iva abhivardhate
sa jāta manyuḥ prasamīkṣya vikramam
sthiraḥ sthitaḥ saṃyati durnivāraṇam
samāhita ātmā hanumantam āhave
pracodayām āsa śaraiḥ tribhiḥ śitaiḥ
tatas kapim tam prasamīkṣya garvitam
jita śramam śatru parājayoḥ jitam
avaikṣata akṣaḥ samudīrṇa mānasaḥ
sa bāṇa pāṇiḥ pragṛhīta kārmukaḥ
sa hema niṣka aṅgada cāru kuṇḍalaḥ
samāsasāda āśu parākramaḥ kapim
tayoḥ babhūva apratimaḥ samāgamaḥ
sura asurāṇām api saṃbhrama pradaḥ
rarāsa bhūmiḥ na tatāpa bhānumān
vavau na vāyuḥ pracacāla ca acalaḥ
kapeḥ kumārasya ca vīkṣya saṃyugam

original: nanāda ca dyaur udadhiś ca cukṣubhe
analyzed: nanāda ca dyauḥ udadhiḥ ca cukṣubhe
tatas sa vīraḥ sumukhān patatriṇaḥ
suvarṇa puṅkhān sa viṣān iva uragān
charān atha trīn kapi mūrdhni apātayat

original: 5.045.015a sa taiḥ śarair mūrdhni samaṃ nipātitaiḥ;
analyzed: sa taiḥ śaraiḥ mūrdhni samam nipātitaiḥ
kṣaran asṛj digdha vivṛtta locanaḥ
nava udita āditya nibhaḥ śara aṃśumān
vyarājata ādityaḥ iva aṃśu mālikaḥ
tatas sa piṅga adhipa mantri sattamaḥ
samīkṣya tam rāja vara ātmajam raṇe
udagra citra āyudha citra kārmukam
jaharṣa ca apūryata ca āhava unmukhaḥ
sa mandara agra sthaḥ iva aṃśumālī
vivṛddha kopaḥ bala vīrya saṃyutaḥ
kumāram akṣam sa balam sa vāhanam
dadāha netra agni marīcibhiḥ tadā
tatas sa bāṇāsana śakrakārmukaḥ
śara pravarṣaḥ yudhi rākṣasa ambudaḥ
śarān mumoca āśu hari īśvara acale
balāhakaḥ vṛṣṭim iva acala uttame
tatas kapiḥ tam raṇa caṇḍa vikramam
vivṛddha tejaḥ bala vīrya sāyakam
kumāram akṣam prasamīkṣya saṃyuge
nanāda harṣāt ghana tulya vikramaḥ
sa bāla bhāvāt yudhi vīrya darpitaḥ
pravṛddha manyuḥ kṣataja upama īkṣaṇaḥ
samāsasāda apratimam raṇe kapim
gajaḥ mahā kūpam iva āvṛtam tṛṇaiḥ
sa tena bāṇaiḥ prasabham nipātitaiḥ
cakāra nādam ghana nāda niḥsvanaḥ
samutpapāta āśu nabhaḥ sa mārutiḥ
bhuja ūru vikṣepaṇa ghora darśanaḥ
samutpatantam samabhidravat balī
sa rākṣasānām pravaraḥ pratāpavān
rathī ratha śreṣṭhatamaḥ kiram śaraiḥ
payodharaḥ śailam iva aśma vṛṣṭibhiḥ

original: 5.045.023a sa tāñ śarāṃs tasya vimokṣayan kapiś;
analyzed: sa tām śarān tasya vimokṣayan kapiḥ
cacāra vīraḥ pathi vāyu sevite
śara antare māruta vat viniṣpatan
manojavaḥ saṃyati caṇḍa vikramaḥ
tam ātta bāṇāsanam āhava unmukham
kham āstṛṇantam vividhaiḥ śara uttamaiḥ
avaikṣata akṣam bahu māna cakṣuṣā
jagāma cintām ca sa mārutātmajaḥ
tatas śaraiḥ bhinna bhujāntaraḥ kapiḥ
kumāra varyeṇa mahātmanā nadan
vicintayām āsa raṇe parākramam
karoti ayam karma mahat mahā balaḥ
na ca asya sarva āhava karma śobhinaḥ
pramāpaṇe me matiḥ atra jāyate

original: 5.045.027a ayaṃ mahātmā ca mahāṃś ca vīryataḥ;
analyzed: ayam mahātmā ca mahān ca vīryataḥ
samāhitaḥ ca atisahaḥ ca saṃyuge
asaṃśayam karma guṇa udayāt ayam
sa nāga yakṣaiḥ munibhiḥ ca pūjitaḥ
parākrama utsāha vivṛddha mānasaḥ
samīkṣate mām pramukha āgataḥ sthitaḥ
parākramaḥ hi asya manāṃsi kampayet
sura asurāṇām api śīghrakāriṇaḥ
na khalu ayam na abhibhavet upekṣitaḥ
parākramaḥ hi asya raṇe vivardhate
pramāpaṇam tu eva mama asya rocate
na vardhamānaḥ gniḥ upekṣitum kṣamaḥ
iti pravegam tu parasya tarkayan
sva karma yogam ca vidhāya vīryavān
cakāra vegam tu mahā balaḥ tadā
matim ca cakre sya vadhe mahā kapiḥ
sa tasya tān aṣṭa hayān mahā javān
samāhitān bhāra sahān vivartane
jaghāna vīraḥ pathi vāyu sevite
talaprahālaiḥ pavanātmajaḥ kapiḥ
tatas talena abhihataḥ mahā rathaḥ
sa tasya piṅga adhipa mantri nirjitaḥ
sa bhagna nīḍaḥ parimukta kūbaraḥ
papāta bhūmau hata vājiḥ ambarāt
sa tam parityajya mahā rathaḥ ratham
sa kārmukaḥ khaḍga dharaḥ kham utpatat
tapaḥ abhiyogāt ṛṣiḥ ugra vīryavān
vihāya deham marutām iva ālayam
tatas kapiḥ tam vicarantam ambare
patatri rāja anila siddha sevite
sametya tam māruta vega vikramaḥ
krameṇa jagrāha ca pādayoḥ dṛḍham
sa tam samāvidhya sahasraśas kapiḥ
mahā uragam gṛhya iva aṇḍajeśvaraḥ
mumoca vegāt pitṛ tulya vikramaḥ
mahī tale saṃyati vānara uttamaḥ
sa bhagna bāhu ūru kaṭī śiraḥ dharaḥ
kṣaran asṛt nirmathita asthi locanaḥ
sa bhinna saṃdhiḥ pravikīrṇa bandhanaḥ
hataḥ kṣitau vāyusutena rākṣasaḥ
mahā kapiḥ bhūmi tale nipīḍya tam
cakāra rakṣaḥ adhipateḥ mahat bhayam
mahā ṛṣibhiḥ cakracaraiḥ mahāvrataiḥ
sametya bhūtaiḥ ca sa yakṣa pannagaiḥ
suraiḥ ca sa indraiḥ bhṛśa jāta vismayaiḥ
hate kumāre sa kapiḥ nirīkṣitaḥ
nihatya tam vajrasuta upama prabham
kumāram akṣam kṣataja upama īkṣaṇam
tat eva vīraḥ bhijagāma toraṇam
kṛtakṣaṇaḥ kālaḥ iva prajā kṣaye
tatas tu rakṣaḥ adhipatiḥ mahātmā
hanūmatā akṣe nihate kumāre
manaḥ samādhāya tadā indra kalpam
samādideśa indrajitam sa roṣāt
tvam astra vid śastra bhṛtām variṣṭhaḥ
sura asurāṇām api śoka dātā
sureṣu sa indreṣu ca dṛṣṭa karmā
tava astra balam āsādya na asurāḥ na marut gaṇāḥ

original: 5.046.003c na kaś cit triṣu lokeṣu saṃyuge na gataśramaḥ
analyzed: na kaḥ cit triṣu lokeṣu saṃyuge na gata śramaḥ
bhuja vīrya abhiguptaḥ ca tapasā ca abhirakṣitaḥ
deśa kāla vibhāga jñaḥ tvam eva mati sattamaḥ
na te sti aśakyam samareṣu karmaṇā
na te sti akāryam mati pūrva mantraṇe

original: 5.046.005c na so 'sti kaś cit triṣu saṃgraheṣu vai;
analyzed: na saḥ sti kaḥ cit triṣu saṃgraheṣu vai

original: na veda yas te 'strabalaṃ balaṃ ca te
analyzed: na veda yaḥ te stra balam balam ca te
mama anurūpam tapasaḥ balam ca te
parākramaḥ ca astra balam ca saṃyuge
na tvām samāsādya raṇa avamarde
manaḥ śramam gacchati niścita artham

original: 5.046.007a nihatā iṃkarāḥ sarve jambumālī ca rākṣasaḥ
analyzed: nihatāḥ iṃkarāḥ sarve jambumālī ca rākṣasaḥ
amātya putrāḥ vīrāḥ ca pañca senā agra yāyinaḥ

original: 5.046.008a sahodaras te dayitaḥ kumāro 'kṣaś ca sūditaḥ
analyzed: sahodaraḥ te dayitaḥ kumāro kṣaḥ ca sūditaḥ

original: 5.046.008c na tu teṣv eva me sāro yas tvayy ariniṣūdana
analyzed: na tu teṣu eva me sāraḥ yaḥ tvayi ari niṣūdana

original: 5.046.009a idaṃ hi dṛṣṭvā matiman mahad balaṃ;
analyzed: idam hi dṛṣṭvā matimat mahat balam
kapeḥ prabhāvam ca parākramam ca
tvam ātmanaḥ ca api samīkṣya sāram
kuruṣva vegam sva bala anurūpam
bala avamardaḥ tvayi saṃnikṛṣṭe
yathā gate śāmyati śānta śatrau
tathā samīkṣya ātma balam param ca
samārabhasva astra vidām variṣṭha

original: 5.046.011a na khalv iyaṃ matiḥ śreṣṭhā yat tvāṃ saṃpreṣayāmy aham
analyzed: na khalu iyam matiḥ śreṣṭhā yat tvām saṃpreṣayāmi aham

original: 5.046.011c iyaṃ ca rājadharmāṇāṃ kṣatrasya ca matir matā
analyzed: iyam ca rāja dharmāṇām kṣatrasya ca matiḥ matā
nānā śastraiḥ ca saṃgrāme vaiśāradyam ariṃdama

original: 5.046.012c avaśyam eva boddhavyaṃ kāmyaś ca vijayo raṇe
analyzed: avaśyam eva boddhavyam kāmyaḥ ca vijayaḥ raṇe
tatas pituḥ tat vacanam niśamya
pradakṣiṇam dakṣasuta prabhāvaḥ
cakāra bhartāram adīna sattvaḥ
raṇāya vīraḥ pratipanna buddhiḥ

original: 5.046.014a tatas taiḥ svagaṇair iṣṭair indrajit pratipūjitaḥ
analyzed: tatas taiḥ sva gaṇaiḥ iṣṭaiḥ indrajit pratipūjitaḥ
yuddha uddhata kṛta utsāhaḥ saṃgrāmam pratipadyata
śrīmān padma palāśa akṣaḥ rākṣasa adhipateḥ sutaḥ
nirjagāma mahā tejāḥ samudraḥ iva parvasu
sa pakṣi rāja upama tulya vegaiḥ
vyālaiḥ caturbhiḥ sita tīkṣṇa daṃṣṭraiḥ
ratham samāyuktam asaṃga vegam
samāruroha indrajit indra kalpaḥ

original: 5.046.017a sa rathī dhanvināṃ śreṣṭhaḥ śastrajño 'stravidāṃ varaḥ
analyzed: sa rathī dhanvinām śreṣṭhaḥ śastra jñaḥ stra vidām varaḥ
rathena abhiyayau kṣipram hanūmān yatra saḥ bhavat

original: 5.046.018a sa tasya rathanirghoṣaṃ jyāsvanaṃ kārmukasya ca
analyzed: sa tasya ratha nirghoṣam jyā svanam kārmukasya ca
niśamya hari vīraḥ sau saṃprahṛṣṭataraḥ bhavat

original: 5.046.019a sumahac cāpam ādāya śitaśalyāṃś ca sāyakān
analyzed: su mahat cāpam ādāya śita śalyān ca sāyakān
hanūmantam abhipretya jagāma raṇapaṇḍitaḥ
tasmin tatas saṃyati jāta harṣe
raṇāya nirgacchati bāṇa pāṇau
diśaḥ ca sarvāḥ kaluṣāḥ babhūvuḥ
mṛgāḥ ca raudrāḥ bahudhā vineduḥ
samāgatāḥ tatra tu nāga yakṣā
mahā ṛṣayaḥ cakracarāḥ ca siddhāḥ
nabhaḥ samāvṛtya ca pakṣi saṃghā
vineduḥ uccais parama prahṛṣṭāḥ

original: 5.046.022a āyantaṃ sarathaṃ dṛṣṭvā tūrṇam indrajitaṃ kapiḥ
analyzed: āyantam sa ratham dṛṣṭvā tūrṇam indrajitam kapiḥ
vinanāda mahā nādam vyavardhata ca vegavān

original: 5.046.023a indrajit tu rathaṃ divyam āsthitaś citrakārmukaḥ
analyzed: indrajit tu ratham divyam āsthitaḥ citra kārmukaḥ
dhanuḥ visphārayām āsa taḍit ūrjita niḥsvanam
tatas sametau ati tīkṣṇa vegau
mahā balau tau raṇa nirviśaṅkau
kapiḥ ca rakṣaḥ adhipateḥ ca putraḥ
sura asura indrau iva baddha vairau
sa tasya vīrasya mahā rathasya
dhanuṣmataḥ saṃyati saṃmatasya
śara pravegam vyahanat pravṛddhaḥ
cacāra mārge pituḥ aprameyaḥ
tatas śarān āyata tīkṣṇa śalyān
su patriṇaḥ kāñcana citra puṅkhān
mumoca vīraḥ para vīra hantā
su saṃtatān vajra nipāta vegān
sa tasya tat syandana niḥsvanam ca
mṛdaṅga bherī paṭaha svanam ca
vikṛṣyamāṇasya ca kārmukasya
niśamya ghoṣam punar utpapāta
śarāṇām antareṣu āśu vyavartata mahā kapiḥ
hariḥ mokṣayan lakṣya saṃgraham
śarāṇām agratas tasya punar samabhivartata
prasārya hastau hanumān utpapāta anilātmajaḥ
tau ubhau vega saṃpannau raṇa karma viśāradau
sarva bhūta manogrāhi cakratuḥ yuddham uttamam
hanūmataḥ veda na rākṣasaḥ ntaram
na mārutiḥ tasya mahātmanaḥ ntaram
parasparam nirviṣahau babhūvatuḥ
sametya tau deva samāna vikramau
tatas tu lakṣye sa vihanyamāne
śareṣu mogheṣu ca saṃpatatsu
jagāma cintām mahatīm mahātmā
samādhi saṃyoga samāhita ātmā
tatas matim rākṣasa rāja sūnuḥ
cakāra tasmin hari vīra mukhye
avadhya tām tasya kapeḥ samīkṣya
katham nigacchet iti nigraha artham

original: 5.046.034a tataḥ paitāmahāṃ vīraḥ so 'stram astravidāṃ varaḥ
analyzed: tatas paitāmahām vīraḥ saḥ stram astra vidām varaḥ
saṃdadhe su mahā tejāḥ tam hari pravaram prati
avadhyaḥ yam iti jñātvā tam astreṇa astra tattva vid
nijagrāha mahā bāhuḥ mārutātmajam indrajit

original: 5.046.036a tena baddhas tato 'streṇa rākṣasena sa vānaraḥ
analyzed: tena baddhaḥ tatas streṇa rākṣasena sa vānaraḥ

original: 5.046.036c abhavan nirviceṣṭaś ca papāta ca mahītale
analyzed: abhavat nirviceṣṭaḥ ca papāta ca mahī tale
buddhvā sa tadā astrabandham
prabhoḥ prabhāvāt vigata alpa vegaḥ
pitāmaha anugraham ātmanaḥ ca
vicintayām āsa hari pravīraḥ
tatas svāyambhuvaiḥ mantraiḥ brahmāstram abhimantritam
hanūmān cintayām āsa vara dānam pitāmahāt
na me strabandhasya ca śaktiḥ asti
vimokṣaṇe loka guroḥ prabhāvāt
iti evam evam vihitaḥ strabandho
mayā ātmayoneḥ anuvartitavyaḥ
sa vīryam astrasya kapiḥ vicārya
pitāmaha anugraham ātmanaḥ ca
vimokṣa śaktim paricintayitvā
pitāmaha ājñām anuvartate sma

original: 5.046.041a astreṇāpi hi baddhasya bhayaṃ mama na jāyate
analyzed: astreṇa api hi baddhasya bhayam mama na jāyate
pitāmaha mahā indrābhyām rakṣitasya anilena ca

original: 5.046.042a grahaṇe cāpi rakṣobhir mahan me guṇadarśanam
analyzed: grahaṇe ca api rakṣobhiḥ mahat me guṇa darśanam

original: 5.046.042c rākṣasendreṇa saṃvādas tasmād gṛhṇantu māṃ pare
analyzed: rākṣasa indreṇa saṃvādaḥ tasmāt gṛhṇantu mām pare
sa niścita arthaḥ para vīra hantā
samīkṣya karī vinivṛtta ceṣṭaḥ
paraiḥ prasahya abhigataiḥ nigṛhya
nanāda taiḥ taiḥ paribhartsyamānaḥ

original: 5.046.044a tatas taṃ rākṣasā dṛṣṭvā nirviceṣṭam ariṃdamam
analyzed: tatas tam rākṣasāḥ dṛṣṭvā nirviceṣṭam ariṃdamam

original: 5.046.044c babandhuḥ śaṇavalkaiś ca drumacīraiś ca saṃhataiḥ
analyzed: babandhuḥ śaṇa valkaiḥ ca druma cīraiḥ ca saṃhataiḥ

original: 5.046.045a sa rocayām āsa paraiś ca bandhanaṃ;
analyzed: sa rocayām āsa paraiḥ ca bandhanam
prasahya vīraiḥ abhinigraham ca
kautūhalāt mām yadi rākṣasa indraḥ
draṣṭum vyavasyet iti niścita arthaḥ

original: 5.046.046a sa baddhas tena valkena vimukto 'streṇa vīryavān
analyzed: sa baddhaḥ tena valkena vimuktaḥ streṇa vīryavān

original: 5.046.046c astrabandhaḥ sa cānyaṃ hi na bandham anuvartate
analyzed: astrabandhaḥ sa ca anyam hi na bandham anuvartate
atha indrajit tam druma cīra bandham
vicārya vīraḥ kapi sattamam tam
vimuktam astreṇa jagāma cintām
anyena baddhaḥ hi anuvartate stram
aho mahat karma kṛtam nirarthakam
na rākṣasaiḥ mantra gatiḥ vimṛṣṭā
punar ca na astre vihate stram anyat
pravartate saṃśayitāḥ sma sarve
astreṇa hanumān muktaḥ na ātmānam avabudhyate

original: 5.046.049c kṛṣyamāṇas tu rakṣobhis taiś ca bandhair nipīḍitaḥ
analyzed: kṛṣyamāṇaḥ tu rakṣobhiḥ taiḥ ca bandhaiḥ nipīḍitaḥ
hanyamānaḥ tatas krūraiḥ rākṣasaiḥ kāṣṭha muṣṭibhiḥ
samīpam rākṣasa indrasya prākṛṣyata sa vānaraḥ
atha indrajit tam prasamīkṣya muktam
astreṇa baddham druma cīra sūtraiḥ
vyadarśayat tatra mahā balam tam
hari pravīram sa gaṇāya rājñe

original: 5.046.052a taṃ mattam iva mātaṅgaṃ baddhaṃ kapivarottamam
analyzed: tam mattam iva mātaṅgam baddham kapi vara uttamam
rākṣasāḥ rākṣasa indrāya rāvaṇāya nyavedayan

original: 5.046.053a ko 'yaṃ kasya kuto vāpi kiṃ kāryaṃ ko vyapāśrayaḥ
analyzed: kaḥ yam kasya kutas vā api kim kāryam kaḥ vyapāśrayaḥ
iti rākṣasa vīrāṇām tatra saṃjajñire kathāḥ

original: 5.046.054a hanyatāṃ dahyatāṃ vāpi bhakṣyatām iti cāpare
analyzed: hanyatām dahyatām vā api bhakṣyatām iti ca apare
rākṣasāḥ tatra saṃkruddhāḥ parasparam atha abruvan
atītya mārgam sahasā mahātmā
sa tatra rakṣaḥ dhipa pāda mūle
dadarśa rājñaḥ paricāra vṛddhān
gṛham mahā ratna vibhūṣitam ca
sa dadarśa mahā tejāḥ rāvaṇaḥ kapi sattamam
rakṣobhiḥ vikṛta ākāraiḥ kṛṣyamāṇam itas tatas
rākṣasa adhipatim ca api dadarśa kapi sattamaḥ
tejaḥ bala samāyuktam tapantam iva bhāskaram
sa roṣa saṃvartita tāmra dṛṣṭiḥ
daśānanaḥ tam kapim anvavekṣya
atha upaviṣṭān kula śīla vṛddhān
samādiśat tam prati mantra mukhyān

original: 5.046.059a yathākramaṃ taiḥ sa kapiś ca pṛṣṭaḥ;
analyzed: yathākramam taiḥ sa kapiḥ ca pṛṣṭaḥ
kārya artham arthasya ca mūlam ādau
nivedayām āsa hari īśvarasya
dūtaḥ sakāśāt aham āgataḥ smi

original: 5.047.001a tataḥ sa karmaṇā tasya vismito bhīmavikramaḥ
analyzed: tatas sa karmaṇā tasya vismitaḥ bhīma vikramaḥ
hanumān roṣa tāmra akṣaḥ rakṣaḥ dhipam avaikṣata
bhājamānam mahārheṇa kāñcanena virājatā
muktā jāla āvṛtena atha mukuṭena mahā dyutim
vajra saṃyoga saṃyuktaiḥ mahārha maṇi vigrahaiḥ
haimaiḥ ābharaṇaiḥ citraiḥ manasā iva prakalpitaiḥ
mahārha kṣauma saṃvītam raktacandana rūṣitam
su anuliptam vicitrābhiḥ vividhabhiḥ ca bhaktibhiḥ
vipulaiḥ darśanīyaiḥ ca rakṣā akṣaiḥ bhīma darśanaiḥ
dīpta tīkṣṇa mahā daṃṣṭraiḥ pralamba daśanacchadaiḥ
śirobhiḥ daśabhiḥ vīram bhrājamānam mahā ojasam
nānā vyāla samākīrṇaiḥ śikharaiḥ iva mandaram
nīlāñjana caya prakhyam hāreṇa urasi rājatā
pūrṇa candra ābha vaktreṇa sa balākam iva ambudam
bāhubhiḥ baddha keyūraiḥ candana uttama rūṣitaiḥ
bhrājamāna aṅgadaiḥ pīnaiḥ pañca śīrṣaiḥ iva uragaiḥ
mahati sphāṭike citre ratna saṃyoga saṃskṛte
uttama āstaraṇa āstīrṇe upaviṣṭam varāsane
alaṃkṛtābhiḥ atyartham pramadābhiḥ samantataḥ
vāla vyajana hastābhiḥ ārāt samupasevitam
durdhareṇa prahastena mahāpārśvena rakṣasā
mantribhiḥ mantra tattva jñaiḥ nikumbhena ca mantriṇā
upopaviṣṭam rakṣobhiḥ caturbhiḥ bala darpitaiḥ

original: 5.047.012c kṛtsnaiḥ parivṛtaṃ lokaṃ caturbhir iva sāgaraiḥ
analyzed: kṛtsnaiḥ parivṛtam lokam caturbhiḥ iva sāgaraiḥ
mantribhiḥ mantra tattva jñaiḥ anyaiḥ ca śubha buddhibhiḥ
anvāsyamānam sacivaiḥ suraiḥ iva sureśvaram
apaśyat rākṣasa patim hanūmān ati tejasam
viṣṭhitam meru śikhare sa toyam iva toyadam
sa taiḥ saṃpīḍyamānaḥ pi rakṣobhiḥ bhīma vikramaiḥ
vismayam paramam gatvā rakṣaḥ dhipam avaikṣata
bhrājamānam tatas dṛṣṭvā hanumān rākṣaseśvaram

original: 5.047.016c manasā cintayām āsa tejasā tasya mohitaḥ
analyzed: manasā cintayām āsa tejasā tasya mohitaḥ

original: 5.047.017a aho rūpam aho dhairyam aho sattvam aho dyutiḥ
analyzed: aho rūpam aho dhairyam aho sattvam aho dyutiḥ
aho rākṣasa rājasya sarva lakṣaṇa yukta tā

original: 5.047.018a yady adharmo na balavān syād ayaṃ rākṣaseśvaraḥ
analyzed: yadi adharmaḥ na balavān syāt ayam rākṣaseśvaraḥ
syāt ayam sura lokasya sa śakrasya api rakṣitā

original: 5.047.019a tena bibhyati khalv asmāl lokāḥ sāmaradānavāḥ
analyzed: tena bibhyati khalu asmāt lokāḥ sa amara dānavāḥ

original: 5.047.019c ayaṃ hy utsahate kruddhaḥ kartum ekārṇavaṃ jagat
analyzed: ayam hi utsahate kruddhaḥ kartum ekārṇavam jagat

original: 5.047.020a iti cintāṃ bahuvidhām akaron matimān kapiḥ
analyzed: iti cintām bahuvidhām akarot matimān kapiḥ
dṛṣṭvā rākṣasa rājasya prabhāvam amita ojasaḥ

original: 5.048.001a tam udvīkṣya mahābāhuḥ piṅgākṣaṃ purataḥ sthitam
analyzed: tam udvīkṣya mahā bāhuḥ piṅga akṣam puratas sthitam
roṣeṇa mahatā āviṣṭaḥ rāvaṇaḥ loka rāvaṇaḥ
sa rājā roṣa tāmra akṣaḥ prahastam mantri sattamam
kāla yuktam uvāca idam vacaḥ vipulam arthavat

original: 5.048.003a durātmā pṛcchyatām eṣa kutaḥ kiṃ vāsya kāraṇam
analyzed: durātmā pṛcchya tām eṣa kutas kim vā asya kāraṇam

original: 5.048.003c vanabhaṅge ca ko 'syārtho rākṣasīnāṃ ca tarjane
analyzed: vana bhaṅge ca kaḥ sya arthaḥ rākṣasīnām ca tarjane

original: 5.048.004a rāvaṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā prahasto vākyam abravīt
analyzed: rāvaṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā prahastaḥ vākyam abravīt

original: 5.048.004c samāśvasihi bhadraṃ te na bhīḥ kāryā tvayā kape
analyzed: samāśvasihi bhadram te na bhīḥ kāryā tvayā kape

original: 5.048.005a yadi tāvat tvam indreṇa preṣito rāvaṇālayam
analyzed: yadi tāvat tvam indreṇa preṣitaḥ rāvaṇa ālayam

original: 5.048.005c tattvam ākhyāhi mā te bhūd bhayaṃ vānara mokṣyase
analyzed: tattvam ākhyāhi mā te bhūt bhayam vānara mokṣyase

original: 5.048.006a yadi vaiśravaṇasya tvaṃ yamasya varuṇasya ca
analyzed: yadi vaiśravaṇasya tvam yamasya varuṇasya ca

original: 5.048.006c cārurūpam idaṃ kṛtvā yamasya varuṇasya ca
analyzed: cāru rūpam idam kṛtvā yamasya varuṇasya ca
viṣṇunā preṣitaḥ vā api dūtaḥ vijaya kāṅkṣiṇā

original: 5.048.007c na hi te vānaraṃ tejo rūpamātraṃ tu vānaram
analyzed: na hi te vānaram tejaḥ rūpa mātram tu vānaram
tattvataḥ kathayasva adya tatas vānara mokṣyase

original: 5.048.008c anṛtaṃ vadataś cāpi durlabhaṃ tava jīvitam
analyzed: anṛtam vadataḥ ca api durlabham tava jīvitam

original: 5.048.009a atha vā yannimittas te praveśo rāvaṇālaye
analyzed: atha vā yad nimittaḥ te praveśaḥ rāvaṇa ālaye
evam uktaḥ hari varaḥ tadā rakṣaḥ gaṇa īśvaram

original: 5.048.010c abravīn nāsmi śakrasya yamasya varuṇasya vā
analyzed: abravīt na asmi śakrasya yamasya varuṇasya vā

original: 5.048.011a dhanadena na me sakhyaṃ viṣṇunā nāsmi coditaḥ
analyzed: dhanadena na me sakhyam viṣṇunā nā asmi coditaḥ

original: 5.048.011c jātir eva mama tv eṣā vānaro 'ham ihāgataḥ
analyzed: jātiḥ eva mama tu eṣā vānaraḥ ham iha āgataḥ

original: 5.048.012a darśane rākṣasendrasya durlabhe tad idaṃ mayā
analyzed: darśane rākṣasa indrasya durlabhe tat idam mayā
vanam rākṣasa rājasya darśana arthe vināśitam

original: 5.048.013a tatas te rākṣasāḥ prāptā balino yuddhakāṅkṣiṇaḥ
analyzed: tatas te rākṣasāḥ prāptāḥ balinaḥ yuddha kāṅkṣiṇaḥ

original: 5.048.013c rakṣaṇārthaṃ ca dehasya pratiyuddhā mayā raṇe
analyzed: rakṣaṇa artham ca dehasya pratiyuddhāḥ mayā raṇe

original: 5.048.014a astrapāśair na śakyo 'haṃ baddhuṃ devāsurair api
analyzed: astra pāśaiḥ na śakyaḥ ham baddhum deva asuraiḥ api
pitāmahāt eva varaḥ mama api eṣaḥ bhyupāgataḥ
rājānam draṣṭu kāmena mayā astram anuvartitam

original: 5.048.015c vimukto aham astreṇa rākṣasais tv atipīḍitaḥ
analyzed: vimuktaḥ aham astreṇa rākṣasaiḥ tu atipīḍitaḥ
dūtaḥ ham iti vijñeyaḥ rāghavasya amita ojasaḥ

original: 5.048.016c śrūyatāṃ cāpi vacanaṃ mama pathyam idaṃ prabho
analyzed: śrūyatām ca api vacanam mama pathyam idam prabho
tam samīkṣya mahāsattvam sattvavān hari sattamaḥ

original: 5.049.001c vākyam arthavad avyagras tam uvāca daśānanam
analyzed: vākyam arthavat avyagraḥ tam uvāca daśānanam
aham sugrīva saṃdeśāt iha prāptaḥ tava ālayam

original: 5.049.002c rākṣasendra harīśas tvāṃ bhrātā kuśalam abravīt
analyzed: rākṣasa indra hari īśaḥ tvām bhrātā kuśalam abravīt
bhrātuḥ śṛṇu samādeśam sugrīvasya mahātmanaḥ

original: 5.049.003c dharmārthopahitaṃ vākyam iha cāmutra ca kṣamam
analyzed: dharma artha upahitam vākyam iha ca amutra ca kṣamam
rājā daśarathaḥ nāma ratha kuñjara vājimān
pitā iva bandhuḥ lokasya sura īśvara sama dyutiḥ

original: 5.049.005a jyeṣṭhas tasya mahābāhuḥ putraḥ priyakaraḥ prabhuḥ
analyzed: jyeṣṭhaḥ tasya mahā bāhuḥ putraḥ priya karaḥ prabhuḥ
pituḥ nideśāt niṣkrāntaḥ praviṣṭaḥ daṇḍaka vanam

original: 5.049.006a lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā sītayā cāpi bhāryayā
analyzed: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā sītayā ca api bhāryayā

original: 5.049.006c rāmo nāma mahātejā dharmyaṃ panthānam āśritaḥ
analyzed: rāmaḥ nāma mahā tejāḥ dharmyam panthānam āśritaḥ

original: 5.049.007a tasya bhāryā vane naṣṭā sītā patim anuvratā
analyzed: tasya bhāryā vane naṣṭā sītā patim anuvratā
vaidehasya sutāḥ rājñaḥ janakasya mahātmanaḥ

original: 5.049.008a sa mārgamāṇas tāṃ devīṃ rājaputraḥ sahānujaḥ
analyzed: sa mārgamāṇaḥ tām devīm rāja putraḥ sahānujaḥ
ṛśyamūkam anuprāptaḥ sugrīveṇa ca saṃgataḥ
tasya tena pratijñātam sītāyāḥ parimārgaṇam
sugrīvasya api rāmeṇa hari rājyam niveditam

original: 5.049.010a tatas tena mṛdhe hatvā rājaputreṇa vālinam
analyzed: tatas tena mṛdhe hatvā rāja putreṇa vālinam
sugrīvaḥ sthāpitaḥ rājye hari ṛkṣāṇām gaṇa īśvaraḥ
sa sītā mārgaṇe vyagraḥ sugrīvaḥ satya saṃgaraḥ

original: 5.049.011c harīn saṃpreṣayām āsa diśaḥ sarvā harīśvaraḥ
analyzed: harīn saṃpreṣayām āsa diśaḥ sarvāḥ hari īśvaraḥ

original: 5.049.012a tāṃ harīṇāṃ sahasrāṇi śatāni niyutāni ca
analyzed: tām harīṇām sahasrāṇi śatāni niyutāni ca

original: 5.049.012c dikṣu sarvāsu mārgante adhaś copari cāmbare
analyzed: dikṣu sarvāsu mārgante adhas ca upari ca ambare

original: 5.049.013a vainateya samāḥ ke cit ke cit tatrānilopamāḥ
analyzed: vainateya samāḥ ke cit ke cit tatra anila upamāḥ
asaṃga gatayaḥ śīghrāḥ hari vīrāḥ mahā balāḥ

original: 5.049.014a ahaṃ tu hanumān nāma mārutasyaurasaḥ sutaḥ
analyzed: aham tu hanumān nāma mārutasya aurasaḥ sutaḥ

original: 5.049.014c sītāyās tu kṛte tūrṇaṃ śatayojanam āyatam
analyzed: sītāyāḥ tu kṛte tūrṇam śata yojanam āyatam
samudram laṅghayitvā eva tām didṛkṣuḥ iha āgataḥ
tat bhavān dṛṣṭa dharma arthaḥ tapaḥ kṛta parigrahaḥ
para dārān mahā prājña na uparoddhum tvam arhasi

original: 5.049.016a na hi dharmaviruddheṣu bahv apāyeṣu karmasu
analyzed: na hi dharma viruddheṣu bahu apāyeṣu karmasu
mūla ghātiṣu sajjante buddhimantaḥ bhavadvidhāḥ
kaḥ ca lakṣmaṇa muktānām rāma kopa anuvartinām

original: 5.049.017c śarāṇām agrataḥ sthātuṃ śakto devāsureṣv api
analyzed: śarāṇām agratas sthātum śaktaḥ deva asureṣu api

original: 5.049.018a na cāpi triṣu lokeṣu rājan vidyeta kaś cana
analyzed: na ca api triṣu lokeṣu rājan vidyeta kaḥ cana

original: 5.049.018c rāghavasya vyalīkaṃ yaḥ kṛtvā sukham avāpnuyāt
analyzed: rāghavasya vyalīkam yaḥ kṛtvā sukham avāpnuyāt

original: 5.049.019a tat trikālahitaṃ vākyaṃ dharmyam arthānubandhi ca
analyzed: tat tri kāla hitam vākyam dharmyam artha anubandhi ca
manyasva naradevāya jānakī pratidīyatām

original: 5.049.020a dṛṣṭā hīyaṃ mayā devī labdhaṃ yad iha durlabham
analyzed: dṛṣṭā hi iyam mayā devī labdham yat iha durlabham

original: 5.049.020c uttaraṃ karma yac cheṣaṃ nimittaṃ tatra rāghavaḥ
analyzed: uttaram karma yat śeṣam nimittam tatra rāghavaḥ
lakṣitā iyam mayā sītā tathā śoka parāyaṇā

original: 5.049.021c gṛhya yāṃ nābhijānāsi pañcāsyām iva pannagīm
analyzed: gṛhya yām na abhijānāsi pañca āsyām iva pannagīm

original: 5.049.022a neyaṃ jarayituṃ śakyā sāsurair amarair api
analyzed: na iyam jarayitum śakyā sa asuraiḥ amaraiḥ api
viṣa saṃsṛṣṭam atyartham bhuktam annam iva ojasā
tapaḥ saṃtāpa labdhaḥ te yaḥ yam dharma parigrahaḥ
na sa nāśayitum nyāyyaḥ ātma prāṇa parigrahaḥ
avadhya tām tapobhiḥ yām bhavān samanupaśyati

original: 5.049.024c ātmanaḥ sāsurair devair hetus tatrāpy ayaṃ mahān
analyzed: ātmanaḥ sa asuraiḥ devaiḥ hetuḥ tatra api ayam mahān

original: 5.049.025a sugrīvo na hi devo 'yaṃ nāsuro na ca mānuṣaḥ
analyzed: sugrīvaḥ na hi devaḥ yam na asuraḥ na ca mānuṣaḥ

original: 5.049.025c na rākṣaso na gandharvo na yakṣo na ca pannagaḥ
analyzed: na rākṣasaḥ na gandharvaḥ na yakṣaḥ na ca pannagaḥ

original: 5.049.026a mānuṣo rāghavo rājan sugrīvaś ca harīśvaraḥ
analyzed: mānuṣaḥ rāghavaḥ rājan sugrīvaḥ ca hari īśvaraḥ
tasmāt prāṇa paritrāṇam katham rājan kariṣyasi
na tu dharma upasaṃhāram adharma phala saṃhitam

original: 5.049.027c tad eva phalam anveti dharmaś cādharmanāśanaḥ
analyzed: tat eva phalam anveti dharmaḥ ca adharma nāśanaḥ

original: 5.049.028a prāptaṃ dharmaphalaṃ tāvad bhavatā nātra saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: prāptam dharma phalam tāvat bhavatā na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: 5.049.028c phalam asyāpy adharmasya kṣipram eva prapatsyase
analyzed: phalam asya api adharmasya kṣipram eva prapatsyase
janasthāna vadham buddhvā buddhvā vāli vadham tathā
rāma sugrīva sakhyam ca budhyasva hitam ātmanaḥ

original: 5.049.030a kāmaṃ khalv aham apy ekaḥ savājirathakuñjarām
analyzed: kāmam khalu aham api ekaḥ sa vāji ratha kuñjarām

original: 5.049.030c laṅkāṃ nāśayituṃ śaktas tasyaiṣa tu viniścayaḥ
analyzed: laṅkām nāśayitum śaktaḥ tasya eṣa tu viniścayaḥ
rāmeṇa hi pratijñātam hari ṛkṣa gaṇa saṃnidhau

original: 5.049.031c utsādanam amitrāṇāṃ sītā yais tu pradharṣitā
analyzed: utsādanam amitrāṇām sītā yaiḥ tu pradharṣitā

original: 5.049.032a apakurvan hi rāmasya sākṣād api puraṃdaraḥ
analyzed: apakurvan hi rāmasya sākṣāt api puraṃdaraḥ

original: 5.049.032c na sukhaṃ prāpnuyād anyaḥ kiṃ punas tvadvidho janaḥ
analyzed: na sukham prāpnuyāt anyaḥ kim punar tvadvidhaḥ janaḥ

original: 5.049.033a yāṃ sītety abhijānāsi yeyaṃ tiṣṭhati te vaśe
analyzed: yām sītā iti abhijānāsi yā iyam tiṣṭhati te vaśe
kālarātrī iti tām viddhi sarva laṅkā vināśinīm
tat alam kāla pāśena sītā vigraha rūpiṇā
svayam skandha avasaktena kṣamam ātmani cintyatām
sītāyāḥ tejasā dagdhām rāma kopa prapīḍitām
dahya manām imām paśya purīm sa aṭṭa pratolikām
sa sauṣṭhava upetam adīna vādinaḥ
kapeḥ niśamya apratimaḥ priyam vacaḥ
daśa ānanaḥ kopa vivṛtta locanaḥ
samādiśat tasya vadham mahā kapeḥ
tasya tat vacanam śrutvā vānarasya mahātmanaḥ
ājñāpayat vadham tasya rāvaṇaḥ krodha mūrchitaḥ
vadhe tasya samājñapte rāvaṇena durātmanā
niveditavataḥ dautyam na anumene vibhīṣaṇaḥ

original: 5.050.003a taṃ rakṣo'dhipatiṃ kruddhaṃ tac ca kāryam upasthitam
analyzed: tam rakṣaḥ adhipatim kruddham tat ca kāryam upasthitam

original: 5.050.003c viditvā cintayām āsa kāryaṃ kāryavidhau sthitaḥ
analyzed: viditvā cintayām āsa kāryam kārya vidhau sthitaḥ
niścita arthaḥ tatas sāmnā āpūjya śatrujit agrajam
uvāca hitam atyartham vākyam vākya viśāradaḥ

original: 5.050.005a rājan dharmaviruddhaṃ ca lokavṛtteś ca garhitam
analyzed: rājan dharma viruddham ca loka vṛtteḥ ca garhitam

original: 5.050.005c tava cāsadṛśaṃ vīra kaper asya pramāpaṇam
analyzed: tava ca a sadṛśam vīra kapeḥ asya pramāpaṇam
asaṃśayam śatruḥ ayam pravṛddhaḥ
kṛtam hi anena apriyam aprameyam
na dūta vadhyām pravadanti
dūtasya dṛṣṭāḥ bahavaḥ hi daṇḍāḥ
vairūpyām aṅgeṣu kaśā abhighātaḥ
mauṇḍyam tathā lakṣmaṇa saṃnipātaḥ
etān hi dūte pravadanti daṇḍān

original: vadhas tu dūtasya na naḥ śruto 'pi
analyzed: vadhaḥ tu dūtasya na naḥ śrutaḥ u pi
katham ca dharma artha vinīta buddhiḥ
bhavadvidhaḥ kopa vaśe hi tiṣṭhet
kopam niyacchanti hi sattvavantaḥ
na dharma vāde na ca loka vṛtte
na śāstra buddhi grahaṇeṣu vā api
vidyeta kaḥ cit tava vīra tulyaḥ
tvam hi uttamaḥ sarva sura asurāṇām

original: 5.050.010a na cāpy asya kaper ghāte kaṃ cit paśyāmy ahaṃ guṇam
analyzed: na ca api asya kapeḥ ghāte kam cit paśyāmi aham guṇam

original: 5.050.010c teṣv ayaṃ pātyatāṃ daṇḍo yair ayaṃ preṣitaḥ kapiḥ
analyzed: teṣu ayam pātyatām daṇḍaḥ yaiḥ ayam preṣitaḥ kapiḥ

original: 5.050.011a sādhur vā yadi vāsādhur parair eṣa samarpitaḥ
analyzed: sādhuḥ vā yadi vā asādhuḥ paraiḥ eṣa samarpitaḥ

original: 5.050.011c bruvan parārthaṃ paravān na dūto vadham arhati
analyzed: bruvan para artham paravān na dūtaḥ vadham arhati

original: 5.050.012a api cāsmin hate rājan nānyaṃ paśyāmi khecaram
analyzed: api ca asmin hate rājan na anyam paśyāmi khecaram

original: 5.050.012c iha yaḥ punar āgacchet paraṃ pāraṃ mahodadhiḥ
analyzed: iha yaḥ punar āgacchet param pāram mahā udadhiḥ

original: 5.050.013a tasmān nāsya vadhe yatnaḥ kāryaḥ parapuraṃjaya
analyzed: tasmāt na asya vadhe yatnaḥ kāryaḥ parapuraṃjaya

original: 5.050.013c bhavān sendreṣu deveṣu yatnam āsthātum arhati
analyzed: bhavān sa indreṣu deveṣu yatnam āsthātum arhati

original: 5.050.014a asmin vinaṣṭe na hi dūtam anyaṃ;
analyzed: asmin vinaṣṭe na hi dūtam anyam
paśyāmi yaḥ tau nara rāja putrau
yuddhāya yuddha priya durvinītau
udyojayet dīrgha pathā avaruddhau
parākrama utsāha manasvinām ca
sura asurāṇām api durjayena
tvayā manaḥ nandana nairṛtānām
yuddha āyatiḥ nāśayitum na yuktā

original: 5.050.016a hitāś ca śūrāś ca samāhitāś ca;
analyzed: hitāḥ ca śūrāḥ ca samāhitāḥ ca
kuleṣu jātāḥ ca mahā guṇeṣu
manasvinaḥ śastra bhṛtām variṣṭhāḥ
koṭi agraśas te subhṛtāḥ ca yodhāḥ
tat ekadeśena balasya tāvat
ke cit tava ādeśa kṛtaḥ upayāntu
tau rāja putrau vinigṛhya mūḍhau
pareṣu te bhāvayitum prabhāvam
tasya tat vacanam śrutvā daśagrīvaḥ mahā balaḥ
deśa kāla hitam vākyam bhrātuḥ uttamam abravīt

original: 5.051.002a samyag uktaṃ hi bhavatā dūtavadhyā vigarhitā
analyzed: samyak uktam hi bhavatā dūta vadhyā vigarhitā

original: 5.051.002c avaśyaṃ tu vadhād anyaḥ kriyatām asya nigrahaḥ
analyzed: avaśyam tu vadhāt anyaḥ kriyatām asya nigrahaḥ

original: 5.051.003a kapīnāṃ kila lāṅgūlam iṣṭaṃ bhavati bhūṣaṇam
analyzed: kapīnām kila lāṅgūlam iṣṭam bhavati bhūṣaṇam

original: 5.051.003c tad asya dīpyatāṃ śīghraṃ tena dagdhena gacchatu
analyzed: tat asya dīpyatām śīghram tena dagdhena gacchatu
tatas paśyantu imam dīnam aṅga vairūpya karśitam
sa mitrāḥ jñātayaḥ sarve bāndhavāḥ sa suhṛd janāḥ
ājñāpayat rākṣasa indraḥ puram sarvam sa catvaram
lāṅgūlena pradīptena rakṣobhiḥ pariṇīyatām
tasya tat vacanam śrutvā rākṣasāḥ kopa karkaśāḥ

original: 5.051.006c veṣṭante tasya lāṅgūlaṃ jīrṇaiḥ kārpāsikaiḥ paṭaiḥ
analyzed: veṣṭante tasya lāṅgūlam jīrṇaiḥ kārpāsikaiḥ paṭaiḥ
saṃveṣṭyamāne lāṅgūle vyavardhata mahā kapiḥ

original: 5.051.007c śuṣkam indhanam āsādya vaneṣv iva hutāśanaḥ
analyzed: śuṣkam indhanam āsādya vaneṣu iva hutāśanaḥ
tailena pariṣicya atha te gnim tatra avapātayan
lāṅgūlena pradīptena rākṣasān tān apātayat
roṣa amarṣa parīta ātmā bāla sūrya sama ānanaḥ

original: 5.051.010a sa bhūyaḥ saṃgataiḥ krūrai rākasair harisattamaḥ
analyzed: sa bhūyas saṃgataiḥ krūraiḥ rākasaiḥ hari sattamaḥ
nibaddhaḥ kṛtavān vīraḥ tad kāla sadṛśīm matim

original: 5.051.011a kāmaṃ khalu na me śaktā nibadhasyāpi rākṣasāḥ
analyzed: kāmam khalu na me śaktāḥ nibadhasya api rākṣasāḥ

original: 5.051.011c chittvā pāśān samutpatya hanyām aham imān punaḥ
analyzed: chittvā pāśān samutpatya hanyām aham imān punar

original: 5.051.012a sarveṣām eva paryāpto rākṣasānām ahaṃ yudhi
analyzed: sarveṣām eva paryāptaḥ rākṣasānām aham yudhi

original: 5.051.012c kiṃ tu rāmasya prītyarthaṃ viṣahiṣye 'ham īdṛśam
analyzed: kim tu rāmasya prīti artham viṣahiṣye ham īdṛśam

original: 5.051.013a laṅkā carayitavyā me punar eva bhaved iti
analyzed: laṅkā carayitavyā me punar eva bhavet iti

original: 5.051.013c rātrau na hi sudṛṣṭā me durgakarmavidhānataḥ
analyzed: rātrau na hi su dṛṣṭā me durga karma vidhānataḥ

original: 5.051.013e avaśyam eva draṣṭavyā mayā laṅkā niśākṣaye
analyzed: avaśyam eva draṣṭavyā mayā laṅkā niśā kṣaye

original: 5.051.014a kāmaṃ bandhaiś ca me bhūyaḥ pucchasyoddīpanena ca
analyzed: kāmam bandhaiḥ ca me bhūyas pucchasya uddīpanena ca

original: 5.051.014c pīḍāṃ kurvantu rakṣāṃsi na me 'sti manasaḥ śramaḥ
analyzed: pīḍām kurvantu rakṣāṃsi na me sti manasaḥ śramaḥ
tatas te saṃvṛta ākāram sattvavantam mahā kapim
parigṛhya yayuḥ hṛṣṭāḥ rākṣasāḥ kapi kuñjaram
śaṅkha bherī ninādaiḥ taiḥ ghoṣayantaḥ sva karmabhiḥ

original: 5.051.016c rākṣasāḥ krūrakarmāṇaś cārayanti sma tāṃ purīm
analyzed: rākṣasāḥ krūra karmāṇaḥ cārayanti sma tām purīm
hanumān cārayām āsa rākṣasānām mahā purīm
athā apaśyat vimānāni vicitrāṇi mahā kapiḥ

original: 5.051.018a saṃvṛtān bhūmibhāgāṃś ca suvibhaktāṃś ca catvarān
analyzed: saṃvṛtān bhūmi bhāgān ca suvibhaktān ca catvarān

original: 5.051.018c rathyāś ca gṛhasaṃbādhāḥ kapiḥ śṛṅgāṭakāni ca
analyzed: rathyāḥ ca gṛha saṃbādhāḥ kapiḥ śṛṅgāṭakāni ca
catvareṣu catuṣkeṣu rājamārge tathā eva ca

original: 5.051.019c ghoṣayanti kapiṃ sarve cārīka iti rākṣasāḥ
analyzed: ghoṣayanti kapim sarve cārīkaḥ iti rākṣasāḥ
dīpyamāne tatas tasya lāṅgūla agre hanūmataḥ

original: 5.051.020c rākṣasyas tā virūpākṣyaḥ śaṃsur devyās tad apriyam
analyzed: rākṣasyaḥ tāḥ virūpa akṣyaḥ śaṃsuḥ devyāḥ tat apriyam

original: 5.051.021a yas tvayā kṛtasaṃvādaḥ sīte tāmramukhaḥ kapiḥ
analyzed: yaḥ tvayā kṛta saṃvādaḥ sīte tāmra mukhaḥ kapiḥ
lāṅgūlena pradīptena saḥ eṣa pariṇīyate
śrutvā tat vacanam krūram ātma apaharaṇa upamam
vaidehī śoka saṃtaptā hutāśanam upāgamat
maṅgala abhimukhī tasya sā tadā āsīt mahā kapeḥ
upatasthe viśāla akṣī prayatā havyavāhanam

original: 5.051.024a yady asti patiśuśrūṣā yady asti caritaṃ tapaḥ
analyzed: yadi asti pati śuśrūṣā yadi asti caritam tapaḥ

original: 5.051.024c yadi cāsty ekapatnītvaṃ śīto bhava hanūmataḥ
analyzed: yadi ca asti ekapatnī tvam śītaḥ bhava hanūmataḥ

original: 5.051.025a yadi kaś cid anukrośas tasya mayy asti dhīmataḥ
analyzed: yadi kaḥ cit anukrośaḥ tasya mayi asti dhīmataḥ

original: 5.051.025c yadi vā bhāgyaśeṣaṃ me śīto bhava hanūmataḥ
analyzed: yadi vā bhāgya śeṣam me śītaḥ bhava hanūmataḥ
yadi mām vṛtta saṃpannām tad samāgama lālasām

original: 5.051.026c sa vijānāti dharmātmā śīto bhava hanūmataḥ
analyzed: sa vijānāti dharma ātmā śītaḥ bhava hanūmataḥ

original: 5.051.027a yadi māṃ tārayaty āryaḥ sugrīvaḥ satyasaṃgaraḥ
analyzed: yadi mām tārayati āryaḥ sugrīvaḥ satya saṃgaraḥ

original: 5.051.027c asmād duḥkhān mahābāhuḥ śīto bhava hanūmataḥ
analyzed: asmāt duḥkhāt mahā bāhuḥ śītaḥ bhava hanūmataḥ
tatas tīkṣṇa arciḥ avyagraḥ pradakṣiṇa śikhaḥ nalaḥ

original: 5.051.028c jajvāla mṛgaśāvākṣyāḥ śaṃsann iva śivaṃ kapeḥ
analyzed: jajvāla mṛgaśāvākṣyāḥ śaṃsan iva śivam kapeḥ

original: 5.051.029a dahyamāne ca lāṅgūle cintayām āsa vānaraḥ
analyzed: dahyamāne ca lāṅgūle cintayām āsa vānaraḥ

original: 5.051.029c pradīpto 'gnir ayaṃ kasmān na māṃ dahati sarvataḥ
analyzed: pradīptaḥ agniḥ ayam kasmāt na mām dahati sarvatas

original: 5.051.030a dṛśyate ca mahājvālaḥ karoti ca na me rujam
analyzed: dṛśyate ca mahā jvālaḥ karoti ca na me rujam
śiśirasya iva saṃpātaḥ lāṅgūla agre pratiṣṭhitaḥ

original: 5.051.031a atha vā tad idaṃ vyaktaṃ yad dṛṣṭaṃ plavatā mayā
analyzed: atha vā tat idam vyaktam yat dṛṣṭam plavatā mayā
rāma prabhāvāt āścaryam parvataḥ saritām patau

original: 5.051.032a yadi tāvat samudrasya mainākasya ca dhīmatha
analyzed: yadi tāvat samudrasya mainākasya ca

original: 5.051.032c rāmārthaṃ saṃbhramas tādṛk kim agnir na kariṣyati
analyzed: rāma artham saṃbhramaḥ tādṛś kim agniḥ na kariṣyati
sītāyāḥ ca ānṛśaṃsyena tejasā rāghavasya ca

original: 5.051.033c pituś ca mama sakhyena na māṃ dahati pāvakaḥ
analyzed: pituḥ ca mama sakhyena na mām dahati pāvakaḥ

original: 5.051.034a bhūyaḥ sa cintayām āsa muhūrtaṃ kapikuñjaraḥ
analyzed: bhūyas sa cintayām āsa muhūrtam kapi kuñjaraḥ
utpapāta atha vegena nanāda ca mahā kapiḥ
pura dvāram tatas śrīmām śaila śṛṅgam iva unnatam
vibhakta rakṣaḥ saṃbādham āsasāda anilātmajaḥ

original: 5.051.036a sa bhūtvā śailasaṃkāśaḥ kṣaṇena punar ātmavān
analyzed: sa bhūtvā śaila saṃkāśaḥ kṣaṇena punar ātmavān
hrasvatām paramām prāptaḥ bandhanāni avaśātayat
vimuktaḥ ca abhavat śrīmān punar parvata saṃnibhaḥ
vīkṣamāṇaḥ ca dadṛśe parigham toraṇa āśritam
sa tam gṛhya mahā bāhuḥ kālāyasa pariṣkṛtam

original: 5.051.038c rakṣiṇas tān punaḥ sarvān sūdayām āsa mārutiḥ
analyzed: rakṣiṇaḥ tān punar sarvān sūdayām āsa mārutiḥ
sa tān nihatvā raṇa caṇḍa vikramaḥ
samīkṣamāṇaḥ punar eva laṅkām
pradīpta lāṅgūla kṛta arci mālī
prakāśata ādityaḥ iva aṃśumālī
vīkṣamāṇaḥ tatas laṅkām kapiḥ kṛta manorathaḥ
vardhamāna samutsāhaḥ kārya śeṣam acintayat

original: 5.052.002a kiṃ nu khalv aviśiṣṭaṃ me kartavyam iha sāmpratam
analyzed: kim nu khalu a viśiṣṭam me kartavyam iha sāmpratam

original: 5.052.002c yad eṣāṃ rakṣasāṃ bhūyaḥ saṃtāpajananaṃ bhavet
analyzed: yat eṣām rakṣasām bhūyaḥ saṃtāpa jananam bhavet

original: 5.052.003a vanaṃ tāvat pramathitaṃ prakṛṣṭā rākṣasā hatāḥ
analyzed: vanam tāvat pramathitam prakṛṣṭāḥ rākṣasāḥ hatāḥ
bala eka deśaḥ kṣapitaḥ śeṣam durga vināśanam
durge vināśite karma bhavet sukha pariśramam

original: 5.052.004c alpayatnena kārye 'smin mama syāt saphalaḥ śramaḥ
analyzed: alpa yatnena kārye smin mama syāt saphalaḥ śramaḥ

original: 5.052.005a yo hy ayaṃ mama lāṅgūle dīpyate havyavāhanaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ hi ayam mama lāṅgūle dīpyate havyavāhanaḥ

original: 5.052.005c asya saṃtarpaṇaṃ nyāyyaṃ kartum ebhir gṛhottamaiḥ
analyzed: asya saṃtarpaṇam nyāyyam kartum ebhiḥ gṛha uttamaiḥ
tatas pradīpta lāṅgūlaḥ sa vidyut iva toyadaḥ
bhavana agreṣu laṅkāyāḥ vicacāra mahā kapiḥ
mumoca hanumān agnim kāla anala śikhā upamam
śvasanena ca saṃyogāt ativegaḥ mahā balaḥ
kālāgniḥ iva jajvāla prāvardhata hutāśanaḥ

original: 5.052.009a pradīptam agniṃ pavanas teṣu veśmasu cārayat
analyzed: pradīptam agnim pavanaḥ teṣu veśmasu cārayat
tāni kāñcana jālāni muktāmaṇi mayāni ca
bhavanāni avaśīryanta ratnavanti mahānti ca
tāni bhagna vimānāni nipetuḥ vasudhā tale
bhavanāni iva siddhānām ambarāt puṇya saṃkṣaye
vajra vidruma vaidūrya muktā rajata saṃhitān

original: 5.052.012c vicitrān bhavanād dhātūn syandamānān dadarśa saḥ
analyzed: vicitrān bhavanāt dhātūn syandamānān dadarśa saḥ

original: 5.052.013a nāgnis tṛpyati kāṣṭhānāṃ tṛṇānāṃ ca yathā tathā
analyzed: na agniḥ tṛpyati kāṣṭhānām tṛṇānām ca yathā tathā

original: 5.052.013c hanūmān rākṣasendrāṇāṃ vadhe kiṃ cin na tṛpyati
analyzed: hanūmān rākṣasa indrāṇām vadhe kim cit na tṛpyati
