hutāśana jvāla samāvṛtā sā
hata pravīrā parivṛtta yodhā
hanūmātaḥ krodha bala abhibhūtā
babhūva śāpa upahatā iva laṅkā
sa saṃbhramam trasta viṣaṇṇa rākṣasām
samujjvalat jvāla hutāśana aṅkitām
dadarśa laṅkām hanumān mahā manāḥ
svayambhu kopa upahatām iva avanim

original: 5.052.016a sa rākṣasāṃs tān subahūṃś ca hatvā;
analyzed: sa rākṣasān tān su bahūn ca hatvā
vanam ca bhaṅktvā bahu pādapam tat
visṛjya rakṣaḥ bhavaneṣu ca agnim
jagāma rāmam manasā mahātmā
laṅkām samastām saṃdīpya lāṅgūla agnim mahā kapiḥ
nirvāpayām āsa tadā samudre hari sattamaḥ
saṃdīpyamānām vidhvastām trasta rakṣaḥ gaṇām purīm

original: 5.053.001c avekṣya hānumāṃl laṅkāṃ cintayām āsa vānaraḥ
analyzed: avekṣya ha anumān laṅkām cintayām āsa vānaraḥ

original: 5.053.002a tasyābhūt sumahāṃs trāsaḥ kutsā cātmany ajāyata
analyzed: tasya abhūt su mahān trāsaḥ kutsā ca ātmani ajāyata

original: 5.053.002c laṅkāṃ pradahatā karma kiṃsvit kṛtam idaṃ mayā
analyzed: laṅkām pradahatā karma kim svid kṛtam idam mayā

original: 5.053.003a dhanyās te puruṣaśreṣṭha ye buddhyā kopam utthitam
analyzed: dhanyāḥ te puruṣa śreṣṭha ye buddhyā kopam utthitam
nirundhanti mahātmānaḥ dīptam agnim iva ambhasā

original: 5.053.004a yadi dagdhā tv iyaṃ laṅkā nūnam āryāpi jānakī
analyzed: yadi dagdhā tu iyam laṅkā nūnam āryā api jānakī

original: 5.053.004c dagdhā tena mayā bhartur hataṃ kāryam ajānatā
analyzed: dagdhā tena mayā bhartuḥ hatam kāryam a jānatā

original: 5.053.005a yad artham ayam ārambhas tat kāryam avasāditam
analyzed: yat artham ayam ārambhaḥ tat kāryam avasāditam

original: 5.053.005c mayā hi dahatā laṅkāṃ na sītā parirakṣitā
analyzed: mayā hi dahatā laṅkām na sītā parirakṣitā

original: 5.053.006a īṣatkāryam idaṃ kāryaṃ kṛtam āsīn na saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: īṣatkāryam idam kāryam kṛtam āsīt na saṃśayaḥ
tasya krodha abhibhūtena mayā mūla kṣayaḥ kṛtaḥ

original: 5.053.007a vinaṣṭā jānakī vyaktaṃ na hy adagdhaḥ pradṛśyate
analyzed: vinaṣṭā jānakī vyaktam na hi adagdhaḥ pradṛśyate

original: 5.053.007c laṅkāyāḥ kaś cid uddeśaḥ sarvā bhasmīkṛtā purī
analyzed: laṅkāyāḥ kaḥ cit uddeśaḥ sarvā bhasmīkṛtā purī

original: 5.053.008a yadi tad vihataṃ kāryaṃ mayā prajñāviparyayāt
analyzed: yadi tat vihatam kāryam mayā prajñā viparyayāt
iha eva prāṇa saṃnyāsaḥ mama api hi atirocate

original: 5.053.009a kim agnau nipatāmy adya āhosvid vaḍavāmukhe
analyzed: kim agnau nipatāmi adya āhosvit vaḍavāmukhe
śarīram āho sattvānām dadmi sāgara vāsinām

original: 5.053.010a kathaṃ hi jīvatā śakyo mayā draṣṭuṃ harīśvaraḥ
analyzed: katham hi jīvatā śakyaḥ mayā draṣṭum hari īśvaraḥ
tau vā puruṣa śārdūlau kārya sarvasva ghātinā

original: 5.053.011a mayā khalu tad evedaṃ roṣadoṣāt pradarśitam
analyzed: mayā khalu tat eva idam roṣa doṣāt pradarśitam
prathitam triṣu lokeṣu kapitam anavasthitam

original: 5.053.012a dhig astu rājasaṃ bhāvam anīśam anavasthitam
analyzed: dhik astu rājasam bhāvam anīśam anavasthitam

original: 5.053.012c īśvareṇāpi yad rāgān mayā sītā na rakṣitā
analyzed: īśvareṇa api yat rāgāt mayā sītā na rakṣitā

original: 5.053.013a vinaṣṭāyāṃ tu sītāyāṃ tāv ubhau vinaśiṣyataḥ
analyzed: vinaṣṭāyām tu sītāyām tau ubhau vinaśiṣyataḥ
tayoḥ vināśe sugrīvaḥ sa bandhuḥ vinaśiṣyati

original: 5.053.014a etad eva vacaḥ śrutvā bharato bhrātṛvatsalaḥ
analyzed: etat eva vacaḥ śrutvā bharataḥ bhrātṛ vatsalaḥ
dharma ātmā saha śatrughnaḥ katham śakṣyati jīvitum
ikṣvāku vaṃśe dharmiṣṭhe gate nāśam asaṃśayam
bhaviṣyanti prajāḥ sarvāḥ śoka saṃtāpa pīḍitāḥ
tat aham bhāgya rahitaḥ lupta dharma artha saṃgrahaḥ
roṣa doṣa parīta ātmā vyaktam loka vināśanaḥ
iti cintayataḥ tasya nimittāni upapedire

original: 5.053.017c pūram apy upalabdhāni sākṣāt punar acintayat
analyzed: pūram api upalabdhāni sākṣāt punar acintayat

original: 5.053.018a atha vā cārusarvāṅgī rakṣitā svena tejasā
analyzed: atha vā cāru sarva aṅgī rakṣitā svena tejasā

original: 5.053.018c na naśiṣyati kalyāṇī nāgnir agnau pravartate
analyzed: na naśiṣyati kalyāṇī na agniḥ agnau pravartate

original: 5.053.019a na hi dharmān manas tasya bhāryām amitatejasaḥ
analyzed: na hi dharmāt manaḥ tasya bhāryām amita tejasaḥ
sva cāritra abhiguptām tām spraṣṭum arhati pāvakaḥ
nūnam rāma prabhāvena vaidehyāḥ sukṛtena ca
yat mām dahana karmā ayam na adahat havyavāhanaḥ

original: 5.053.021a trayāṇāṃ bharatādīnāṃ bhrātṝṇāṃ devatā ca yā
analyzed: trayāṇām bharata ādīnām bhrātṝṇām devatā ca yā

original: 5.053.021c rāmasya ca manaḥkāntā sā kathaṃ vinaśiṣyati
analyzed: rāmasya ca manaḥ kāntā sā katham vinaśiṣyati

original: 5.053.022a yad vā dahanakarmāyaṃ sarvatra prabhur avyayaḥ
analyzed: yat vā dahana karmā ayam sarvatra prabhuḥ avyayaḥ

original: 5.053.022c na me dahati lāṅgūlaṃ katham āryāṃ pradhakṣyati
analyzed: na me dahati lāṅgūlam katham āryām pradhakṣyati
tapasā satya vākyena ananyatvāt ca bhartari

original: 5.053.023c api sā nirdahed agniṃ na tām agniḥ pradhakṣyati
analyzed: api sā nirdahet agnim na tām agniḥ pradhakṣyati

original: 5.053.024a sa tathā cintayaṃs tatra devyā dharmaparigraham
analyzed: sa tathā cintayan tatra devyāḥ dharma parigraham
śuśrāva hanumān vākyam cāraṇānām mahātmanām

original: 5.053.025a aho khalu kṛtaṃ karma durviṣahyaṃ hanūmatā
analyzed: aho khalu kṛtam karma durviṣahyam hanūmatā
agnim visṛjata abhīkṣṇam bhīmam rākṣasa sadmani
dagdhā iyam nagarī laṅkā sa aṭṭa prākāra toraṇā

original: 5.053.026c jānakī na ca dagdheti vismayo 'dbhuta eva naḥ
analyzed: jānakī na ca dagdhā iti vismayaḥ dbhutaḥ eva naḥ

original: 5.053.027a sa nimittaiś ca dṛṣṭārthaiḥ kāraṇaiś ca mahāguṇaiḥ
analyzed: sa nimittaiḥ ca dṛṣṭa arthaiḥ kāraṇaiḥ ca mahā guṇaiḥ
ṛṣi vākyaiḥ ca hanumān abhavat prīta mānasaḥ
tatas kapiḥ prāpta manoratha arthaḥ
tām akṣatām rāja sutām viditvā
pratyakṣatas tām punar eva dṛṣṭvā
pratiprayāṇāya matim cakāra
tatas tu śiṃśapā mūle jānakīm paryavasthitām
abhivādya abravīt diṣṭyā paśyāmi tvām iha akṣatām

original: 5.054.002a tatas taṃ prasthitaṃ sītā vīkṣamāṇā punaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: tatas tam prasthitam sītā vīkṣamāṇā punar punar
bhartṛ sneha anvitam vākyam hanūmantam abhāṣata

original: 5.054.003a kāmam asya tvam evaikaḥ kāryasya parisādhane
analyzed: kāmam asya tvam eva ekaḥ kāryasya parisādhane
paryāptaḥ para vīra ghna yaśasyaḥ te bala udayaḥ

original: 5.054.004a balais tu saṃkulāṃ kṛtvā laṅkāṃ parabalārdanaḥ
analyzed: balaiḥ tu saṃkulām kṛtvā laṅkām para bala ardanaḥ

original: 5.054.004c māṃ nayed yadi kākutsthas tasya tat sādṛśaṃ bhavet
analyzed: mām nayet yadi kākutsthaḥ tasya tat sādṛśam bhavet

original: 5.054.005a tad yathā tasya vikrāntam anurūpaṃ mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: tat yathā tasya vikrāntam anurūpam mahātmanaḥ
bhavati āhava śūrasya tat tvam eva upapādaya
tat artha upahitam vākyam praśritam hetu saṃhitam

original: 5.054.006c niśamya hanumāṃs tasyā vākyam uttaram abravīt
analyzed: niśamya hanumān tasyāḥ vākyam uttaram abravīt
kṣipram eṣyati kākutsthaḥ hari ṛkṣa pravaraiḥ vṛtaḥ

original: 5.054.007c yas te yudhi vijityārīñ śokaṃ vyapanayiṣyati
analyzed: yaḥ te yudhi vijitya ārīm śokam vyapanayiṣyati
evam āśvāsya vaidehīm hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
gamanāya matim kṛtvā vaidehīm abhyavādayat
tatas sa kapi śārdūlaḥ svāmi saṃdarśana utsukaḥ
āruroha giri śreṣṭham ariṣṭam ari mardanaḥ
tuṅga padmaka juṣṭābhiḥ nīlābhiḥ vana rājibhiḥ

original: 5.054.010c sālatālāśvakarṇaiś ca vaṃśaiś ca bahubhir vṛtam
analyzed: sāla tāla aśvakarṇaiḥ ca vaṃśaiḥ ca bahubhiḥ vṛtam
latā vitānaiḥ vitataiḥ puṣpavadbhiḥ alaṃkṛtam
nānā mṛga gaṇa ākīrṇam dhātu nisyanda bhūṣitam
bahu prasravaṇa upetam śilā saṃcaya saṃkaṭam
mahā ṛṣi yakṣa gandharva kiṃnara uraga sevitam
latā pādapa saṃbādham siṃha ākulita kandaram
vyāghra saṃgha samākīrṇam svādu mūla phala drumam
tam āruroha atibalaḥ parvatam plavaga uttamaḥ
rāma darśana śīghreṇa praharṣeṇa abhicoditaḥ
tena pāda tala ākrāntāḥ ramyeṣu giri sānuṣu
sa ghoṣāḥ samaśīryanta śilāḥ cūrṇīkṛtāḥ tatas

original: 5.054.016a sa tam āruhya śailendraṃ vyavardhata mahākapiḥ
analyzed: sa tam āruhya śaila indram vyavardhata mahā kapiḥ
dakṣiṇāt uttaram pāram prārthayan lavaṇāmbhasaḥ
adhiruhya tatas vīraḥ parvatam pavanātmajaḥ
dadarśa sāgaram bhīmam mīna uraga niṣevitam
sa mārutaḥ iva ākāśam mārutasya ātmasaṃbhavaḥ
prapede hari śārdūlaḥ dakṣiṇāt uttarām diśam

original: 5.054.019a sa tadā pīḍitas tena kapinā parvatottamaḥ
analyzed: sa tadā pīḍitaḥ tena kapinā parvata uttamaḥ

original: 5.054.019c rarāsa saha tair bhūtaiḥ prāviśad vasudhātalam
analyzed: rarāsa saha taiḥ bhūtaiḥ prāviśat vasudhā talam

original: 5.054.019e kampamānaiś ca śikharaiḥ patadbhir api ca drumaiḥ
analyzed: kampamānaiḥ ca śikharaiḥ patadbhiḥ api ca drumaiḥ
tasya ūru vegāt mathitāḥ pādapāḥ puṣpa śālinaḥ
nipetuḥ bhū tale rugṇāḥ śakra āyudha hatāḥ iva
kandara udara saṃsthānām pīḍitānām mahā ojasām

original: 5.054.021c siṃhānāṃ ninado bhīmo nabho bhindan sa śuśruve
analyzed: siṃhānām ninadaḥ bhīmaḥ nabhaḥ bhindan sa śuśruve
srasta vyāviddha vasanāḥ vyākulīkṛta bhūṣaṇā
vidyādharyaḥ samutpetuḥ sahasā dharaṇīdharāt
atipramāṇāḥ balinaḥ dīpta jihvāḥ mahāviṣāḥ
nipīḍita śiraḥ grīvāḥ vyaveṣṭanta mahā ahayaḥ
kiṃnara uraga gandharva yakṣa vidyādharāḥ tathā

original: 5.054.024c pīḍitaṃ taṃ nagavaraṃ tyaktvā gaganam āsthitāḥ
analyzed: pīḍitam tam naga varam tyaktvā gaganam āsthitāḥ

original: 5.054.025a sa ca bhūmidharaḥ śrīmān balinā tena pīḍitaḥ
analyzed: sa ca bhūmidharaḥ śrīmān balinā tena pīḍitaḥ
sa vṛkṣa śikhara udagrāḥ praviveśa rasātalam
daśa yojana vistāraḥ triṃśat yojanam ucchritaḥ

original: 5.054.026c dharaṇyāṃ samatāṃ yātaḥ sa babhūva dharādharaḥ
analyzed: dharaṇyām samatām yātaḥ sa babhūva dharādharaḥ
tiṣya śravaṇa kadambam abhra śaivala śādvalam
punarvasu mahāmīnam lohitāṅga mahāgraham
airāvata mahā dvīpam svātī haṃsa viloḍitam
vāta saṃghāta jāta ūrmim candra aṃśu śiśira ambumat
grasamānaḥ iva ākāśam tārādhipam iva ālikhan
haran iva sa nakṣatram gaganam sa arka maṇḍalam
mārutasya ālayam śrīmān kapiḥ vyoma caraḥ mahān
hanūmān megha jālāni vikarṣan iva gacchati
pāṇḍura aruṇa varṇāni nīla māñjiṣṭhakāni ca
harita aruṇa varṇāni mahā abhrāṇi cakāśire

original: 5.055.007a praviśann abhrajālāni niṣkramaṃś ca punaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: praviśan abhra jālāni niṣkraman ca punar punar

original: 5.055.007c pracchannaś ca prakāśaś ca candramā iva lakṣyate
analyzed: pracchannaḥ ca prakāśaḥ ca candramāḥ iva lakṣyate
nadan nādena mahatā megha svana mahā svanaḥ
ājagāma mahā tejāḥ punar madhyena sāgaram
parvata indram sunābham ca samupaspṛśya vīryavān
jyā muktaḥ iva nārācaḥ mahā vegaḥ bhyupāgataḥ

original: 5.055.010a sa kiṃ cid anusaṃprāptaḥ samālokya mahāgirim
analyzed: sa kim cit anusaṃprāptaḥ samālokya mahā girim
mahā indra megha saṃkāśam nanāda hari puṃgavaḥ

original: 5.055.011a niśamya nadato nādaṃ vānarās te samantataḥ
analyzed: niśamya nadataḥ nādam vānarāḥ te samantataḥ
babhūvuḥ utsukāḥ sarve suhṛd darśana kāṅkṣiṇaḥ
jāmbavān sa hari śreṣṭhaḥ prīti saṃhṛṣṭa mānasaḥ

original: 5.055.012c upāmantrya harīn sarvān idaṃ vacanam abravīt
analyzed: upāmantrya harīn sarvān idam vacanam abravīt
sarvathā kṛta kāryaḥ sau hanūmān na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: 5.055.013c na hy asyākṛtakāryasya nāda evaṃvidho bhavet
analyzed: na hi asya akṛta kāryasya nādaḥ evaṃvidhaḥ bhavet

original: 5.055.014a tasyā bāhūruvegaṃ ca ninādaṃ ca mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: tasyāḥ bāhu ūru vegam ca ninādam ca mahātmanaḥ

original: 5.055.014c niśamya harayo hṛṣṭāḥ samutpetus tatas tataḥ
analyzed: niśamya harayaḥ hṛṣṭāḥ samutpetuḥ tatas tatas

original: 5.055.015a te nagāgrān nagāgrāṇi śikharāc chikharāṇi ca
analyzed: te naga agrāt naga agrāṇi śikharāt śikharāṇi ca
prahṛṣṭāḥ samapadyanta hanūmantam didṛkṣavaḥ

original: 5.055.016a te prītāḥ pādapāgreṣu gṛhya śākhāḥ supuṣpitāḥ
analyzed: te prītāḥ pādapa agreṣu gṛhya śākhāḥ su puṣpitāḥ
vāsāṃsi iva prakāśāni samāvidhyanta vānarāḥ
tam abhra ghana saṃkāśam āpatantam mahā kapim

original: 5.055.017c dṛṣṭvā te vānarāḥ sarve tasthuḥ prāñjalayas tadā
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā te vānarāḥ sarve tasthuḥ prāñjalayaḥ tadā

original: 5.055.018a tatas tu vegavāṃs tasya girer girinibhaḥ kapiḥ
analyzed: tatas tu vegavān tasya gireḥ giri nibhaḥ kapiḥ
nipapāta mahendrasya śikhare pādapa ākule
tatas te prīta manasaḥ sarve vānara puṃgavāḥ
hanūmantam mahātmānam parivārya upatasthire

original: 5.055.020a parivārya ca te sarve parāṃ prītim upāgatāḥ
analyzed: parivārya ca te sarve parām prītim upāgatāḥ
prahṛṣṭa vadanāḥ sarve tam arogam upāgatam

original: 5.055.021a upāyanāni cādāya mūlāni ca phalāni ca
analyzed: upāyanāni ca ādāya mūlāni ca phalāni ca
pratyarcayan hari śreṣṭham harayaḥ mārutātmajam

original: 5.055.022a vinedur muditāḥ ke cic cakruḥ kila kilāṃ tathā
analyzed: vineduḥ muditāḥ ke cid cakruḥ kila kilām tathā
hṛṣṭāḥ pādapa śākhāḥ ca āninyuḥ vānara ṛṣabhāḥ

original: 5.055.023a hanūmāṃs tu gurūn vṛddhāñ jāmbavat pramukhāṃs tadā
analyzed: hanūmān tu gurūn vṛddhām jāmbavat pramukhān tadā
kumāram aṅgadam ca eva saḥ vandata mahā kapiḥ

original: 5.055.024a sa tābhyāṃ pūjitaḥ pūjyaḥ kapibhiś ca prasāditaḥ
analyzed: sa tābhyām pūjitaḥ pūjyaḥ kapibhiḥ ca prasāditaḥ
dṛṣṭā devī iti vikrāntaḥ saṃkṣepeṇa nyavedayat

original: 5.055.025a niṣasāda ca hastena gṛhītvā vālinaḥ sutam
analyzed: niṣasāda ca hastena gṛhītvā vālinaḥ sutam
ramaṇīye vana uddeśe mahendrasya gireḥ tadā

original: 5.055.026a hanūmān abravīd dhṛṣṭas tadā tān vānararṣabhān
analyzed: hanūmān abravīt dhṛṣṭaḥ tadā tān vānara ṛṣabhān
aśoka vanikā saṃsthā dṛṣṭā sā janakātmajā
rakṣyamāṇā su ghorābhiḥ rākṣasībhiḥ aninditā
eka veṇī dharā bālā rāma darśana lālasā
upavāsa pariśrāntā malinā jaṭilā kṛśā
tatas dṛṣṭā iti vacanam mahārtham amṛta upamam

original: 5.055.028c niśamya māruteḥ sarve muditā vānarā bhavan
analyzed: niśamya māruteḥ sarve muditāḥ vānarāḥ bhavan

original: 5.055.029a kṣveḍanty anye nadanty anye garjanty anye mahābalāḥ
analyzed: kṣveḍanti anye nadanti anye garjanti anye mahā balāḥ

original: 5.055.029c cakruḥ kila kilām anye pratigarjanti cāpare
analyzed: cakruḥ kila kilām anye pratigarjanti ca apare
ke cit ucchrita lāṅgūlāḥ prahṛṣṭāḥ kapi kuñjarāḥ
añcita āyata dīrghāṇi lāṅgūlāni pravivyadhuḥ
apare tu hanūmantam vānarāḥ vāraṇa upamam
āplutya giri śṛṅgebhyaḥ saṃspṛśanti sma harṣitāḥ
ukta vākyam hanūmantam aṅgadaḥ tu tadā bravīt
sarveṣām hari vīrāṇām madhye vācam anuttamām

original: 5.055.033a sattve vīrye na te kaś cit samo vānaravidyate
analyzed: sattve vīrye na te kaḥ cit samaḥ vānara vidyate

original: 5.055.033c yad avaplutya vistīrṇaṃ sāgaraṃ punar āgataḥ
analyzed: yat avaplutya vistīrṇam sāgaram punar āgataḥ

original: 5.055.034a diṣṭyā dṛṣṭā tvayā devī rāmapatnī yaśasvinī
analyzed: diṣṭyā dṛṣṭā tvayā devī rāma patnī yaśasvinī

original: 5.055.034c diṣṭyā tyakṣyati kākutsthaḥ śokaṃ sītā viyogajam
analyzed: diṣṭyā tyakṣyati kākutsthaḥ śokam sītā viyoga jam
tatas ṅgadam hanūmantam jāmbavantam ca vānarāḥ
parivārya pramuditāḥ bhejire vipulāḥ śilāḥ
śrotu kāmāḥ samudrasya laṅghanam vānara uttamāḥ

original: 5.055.036c darśanaṃ cāpi laṅkāyāḥ sītāyā rāvaṇasya ca
analyzed: darśanam ca api laṅkāyāḥ sītāyāḥ rāvaṇasya ca
tasthuḥ prāñjalayaḥ sarve hanūmat vadana unmukhāḥ

original: 5.055.037a tasthau tatrāṅgadaḥ śrīmān vānarair bahubhir vṛtaḥ
analyzed: tasthau tatra aṅgadaḥ śrīmān vānaraiḥ bahubhiḥ vṛtaḥ
upāsyamānaḥ vibudhaiḥ divi devapatiḥ yathā
hanūmatā kīrtimatā yaśasvinā
tathā aṅgadena aṅgada baddha bāhunā
mudā tadā adhyāsitam unnatam mahan
mahīdhara agram jvalitam śriyā abhavat

original: 5.056.001a tatas tasya gireḥ śṛṅge mahendrasya mahābalāḥ
analyzed: tatas tasya gireḥ śṛṅge mahendrasya mahā balāḥ
hanumat pramukhāḥ prītim harayaḥ jagmuḥ uttamām
tam tatas pratisaṃhṛṣṭaḥ prītimantam mahā kapim
jāmbavān kārya vṛttāntam apṛcchat anilātmajam

original: 5.056.003a kathaṃ dṛṣṭā tvayā devī kathaṃ vā tatra vartate
analyzed: katham dṛṣṭā tvayā devī katham vā tatra vartate

original: 5.056.003c tasyāṃ vā sa kathaṃ vṛttaḥ krūrakarmā daśānanaḥ
analyzed: tasyām vā sa katham vṛttaḥ krūra karmā daśānanaḥ

original: 5.056.004a tattvataḥ sarvam etan naḥ prabrūhi tvaṃ mahākape
analyzed: tattvataḥ sarvam etat naḥ prabrūhi tvam mahā kape
śruta arthāḥ cintayiṣyāmaḥ bhūyas kārya viniścayam

original: 5.056.005a yaś cārthas tatra vaktavyo gatair asmābhir ātmavān
analyzed: yaḥ ca arthaḥ tatra vaktavyaḥ gataiḥ asmābhiḥ ātmavān

original: 5.056.005c rakṣitavyaṃ ca yat tatra tad bhavān vyākarotu naḥ
analyzed: rakṣitavyam ca yat tatra tat bhavān vyākarotu naḥ
sa niyuktaḥ tatas tena saṃprahṛṣṭa tanūruhaḥ
namasyam śirasā devyai sītāyai pratyabhāṣata

original: 5.056.007a pratyakṣam eva bhavatāṃ mahendrāgrāt kham āplutaḥ
analyzed: pratyakṣam eva bhavatām mahendra agrāt kham āplutaḥ
udadheḥ dakṣiṇam pāram kāṅkṣamāṇaḥ samāhitaḥ

original: 5.056.008a gacchataś ca hi me ghoraṃ vighnarūpam ivābhavat
analyzed: gacchataḥ ca hi me ghoram vighna rūpam iva abhavat
kāñcanam śikharam divyam paśyāmi su manoharam

original: 5.056.009a sthitaṃ panthānam āvṛtya mene vighnaṃ ca taṃ nagam
analyzed: sthitam panthānam āvṛtya mene vighnam ca tam nagam
upasaṃgamya tam divyam kāñcanam naga sattamam

original: 5.056.010c kṛtā me manasā buddhir bhettavyo 'yaṃ mayeti ca
analyzed: kṛtā me manasā buddhiḥ bhettavyaḥ yam mayā iti ca

original: 5.056.011a prahataṃ ca mayā tasya lāṅgūlena mahāgireḥ
analyzed: prahatam ca mayā tasya lāṅgūlena mahā gireḥ
śikharam sūrya saṃkāśam vyaśīryata sahasradhā

original: 5.056.012a vyavasāyaṃ ca me buddhvā sa hovāca mahāgiriḥ
analyzed: vyavasāyam ca me buddhvā sa ha uvāca mahā giriḥ
putra iti madhurām bāṇīm manaḥ prahlādayan iva

original: 5.056.013a pitṛvyaṃ cāpi māṃ viddhi sakhāyaṃ mātariśvanaḥ
analyzed: pitṛvyam ca api mām viddhi sakhāyam mātariśvanaḥ
mainākam iti vikhyātam nivasantam mahā udadhau
pakṣvavantaḥ purā putra babhūvuḥ parvata uttamāḥ
chandatas pṛthivīm ceruḥ bādhamānāḥ samantataḥ
śrutvā nagānām caritam mahā indraḥ pākaśāsanaḥ
ciccheda bhagavān pakṣān vajreṇa eṣām sahasraśas

original: 5.056.016a ahaṃ tu mokṣitas tasmāt tava pitrā mahātmanā
analyzed: aham tu mokṣitaḥ tasmāt tava pitrā mahātmanā
mārutena tadā vatsa prakṣiptaḥ smi mahā arṇave

original: 5.056.017a rāmasya ca mayā sāhye vartitavyam ariṃdama
analyzed: rāmasya ca mayā sāhye vartitavyam ariṃdama
rāmaḥ dharma bhṛtām śreṣṭhaḥ mahā indra sama vikramaḥ

original: 5.056.018a etac chrutvā mayā tasya mainākasya mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: etat śrutvā mayā tasya mainākasya mahātmanaḥ

original: 5.056.018c kāryam āvedya tu girer uddhataṃ ca mano mama
analyzed: kāryam āvedya tu gireḥ uddhatam ca manaḥ mama
tena ca aham anujñātaḥ mainākena mahātmanā

original: 5.056.019c uttamaṃ javam āsthāya śeṣam adhvānam āsthitaḥ
analyzed: uttamam javam āsthāya śeṣam adhvānam āsthitaḥ
tatas ham su ciram kālam vegena abhyagamam pathi

original: 5.056.020c tataḥ paśyāmy ahaṃ devīṃ surasāṃ nāgamātaram
analyzed: tatas paśyāmi aham devīm surasām nāgamātaram

original: 5.056.021a samudramadhye sā devī vacanaṃ mām abhāṣata
analyzed: samudra madhye sā devī vacanam mām abhāṣata

original: 5.056.021c mama bhakṣyaḥ pradiṣṭas tvam amārair harisattamam
analyzed: mama bhakṣyaḥ pradiṣṭaḥ tvam amāraiḥ hari sattamam

original: 5.056.021e tatas tvāṃ bhakṣayiṣyāmi vihitas tvaṃ cirasya me
analyzed: tatas tvām bhakṣayiṣyāmi vihitaḥ tvam cirasya me

original: 5.056.022a evam uktaḥ surasayā prāñjaliḥ praṇataḥ sthitaḥ
analyzed: evam uktaḥ surasayā prāñjaliḥ praṇataḥ sthitaḥ
vivarṇa vadanaḥ bhūtvā vākyam ca idam udīrayam
rāmaḥ dāśarathiḥ śrīmān praviṣṭaḥ daṇḍaka vanam

original: 5.056.023c lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā sītayā ca paraṃtapaḥ
analyzed: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā sītayā ca paraṃtapaḥ

original: 5.056.024a tasya sītā hṛtā bhāryā rāvaṇena durātmanā
analyzed: tasya sītā hṛtā bhāryā rāvaṇena durātmanā
tasyāḥ sakāśam dūtaḥ ham gamiṣye rāma śāsanāt
kartum arhasi rāmasya sāhyam viṣaya vāsini

original: 5.056.026a atha vā maithilīṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmaṃ cākliṣṭakāriṇam
analyzed: atha vā maithilīm dṛṣṭvā rāmam ca akliṣṭa kāriṇam

original: 5.056.026c āgamiṣyāmi te vaktraṃ satyaṃ pratiśṛṇoti me
analyzed: āgamiṣyāmi te vaktram satyam pratiśṛṇoti me

original: 5.056.027a evam uktā mayā sā tu surasā kāmarūpiṇī
analyzed: evam uktā mayā sā tu surasā kāmarūpiṇī

original: 5.056.027c abravīn nātivarteta kaś cid eṣa varo mama
analyzed: abravīt na ativarteta kaḥ cit eṣa varaḥ mama
evam uktaḥ surasayā daśa yojanam āyataḥ
tatas ṛdhaguṇa vistāraḥ babhūva aham kṣaṇena tu
mad pramāṇa anurūpam ca vyāditam tad mukham tayā

original: 5.056.029c tad dṛṣṭvā vyāditaṃ tv āsyaṃ hrasvaṃ hy akaravaṃ vapuḥ
analyzed: tat dṛṣṭvā vyāditam tu āsyam hrasvam hi akaravam vapuḥ
tasmin muhūrte ca punar babhūva aṅguṣṭha saṃmitaḥ

original: 5.056.030c abhipatyāśu tad vaktraṃ nirgato 'haṃ tataḥ kṣaṇāt
analyzed: abhipatya āśu tat vaktram nirgataḥ ham tatas kṣaṇāt

original: 5.056.031a abravīt surasā devī svena rūpeṇa māṃ punaḥ
analyzed: abravīt surasā devī svena rūpeṇa mām punar
artha siddhyai hari śreṣṭha gaccha saumya yathāsukham
samānaya ca vaidehīm rāghaveṇa mahātmanā

original: 5.056.032c sukhī bhava mahābāho prītāsmi tava vānara
analyzed: sukhī bhava mahā bāho prītā asmi tava vānara
tatas ham sādhu sādhvī iti sarva bhūtaiḥ praśaṃsitaḥ
tatas ntarikṣam vipulam plutaḥ ham garuḍaḥ yathā

original: 5.056.034a chāyā me nigṛhītā ca na ca paśyāmi kiṃ cana
analyzed: chāyā me nigṛhītā ca na ca paśyāmi kim cana

original: 5.056.034c so 'haṃ vigatavegas tu diśo daśa vilokayan
analyzed: saḥ ham vigata vegaḥ tu diśaḥ daśa vilokayan

original: 5.056.034e na kiṃ cit tatra paśyāmi yena me 'pahṛtā gatiḥ
analyzed: na kim cit tatra paśyāmi yena me pahṛtā gatiḥ

original: 5.056.035a tato me buddhir utpannā kiṃ nāma gamane mama
analyzed: tatas me buddhiḥ utpannā kim nāma gamane mama

original: 5.056.035c īdṛśo vighna utpanno rūpaṃ yatra na dṛśyate
analyzed: īdṛśaḥ vighnaḥ utpannaḥ rūpam yatra na dṛśyate

original: 5.056.036a adho bhāgena me dṛṣṭiḥ śocatā pātitā mayā
analyzed: adhas bhāgena me dṛṣṭiḥ śocatā pātitā mayā

original: 5.056.036c tato 'drākṣam ahaṃ bhīmāṃ rākṣasīṃ salile śayām
analyzed: tatas drākṣam aham bhīmām rākṣasīm salile śayām

original: 5.056.037a prahasya ca mahānādam ukto 'haṃ bhīmayā tayā
analyzed: prahasya ca mahā nādam uktaḥ ham bhīmayā tayā
avasthitam asaṃbhrāntam idam vākyam aśobhanam
kva asi gantā mahā kāya kṣudhitāyāḥ mama īpsitaḥ

original: 5.056.038c bhakṣaḥ prīṇaya me dehaṃ ciram āhāravarjitam
analyzed: bhakṣaḥ prīṇaya me deham ciram āhāra varjitam

original: 5.056.039a bāḍham ity eva tāṃ vāṇīṃ pratyagṛhṇām ahaṃ tataḥ
analyzed: bāḍham iti eva tām vāṇīm pratyagṛhṇām aham tatas

original: 5.056.039c āsya pramāṇād adhikaṃ tasyāḥ kāyam apūrayam
analyzed: ā asya pramāṇāt adhikam tasyāḥ kāyam apūrayam

original: 5.056.040a tasyāś cāsyaṃ mahad bhīmaṃ vardhate mama bhakṣaṇe
analyzed: tasyāḥ ca āsyam mahat bhīmam vardhate mama bhakṣaṇe

original: 5.056.040c na ca māṃ sā tu bubudhe mama vā vikṛtaṃ kṛtam
analyzed: na ca mām sā tu bubudhe mama vā vikṛtam kṛtam
tatas ham vipulam rūpam saṃkṣipya nimiṣa antarāt
tasyāḥ hṛdayam ādāya prapatāmi nabhastalam
sā visṛṣṭa bhujā bhīmā papāta lavaṇāmbhasi
mayā parvata saṃkāśā nikṛtta hṛdayā satī

original: 5.056.043a śṛṇomi khagatānāṃ ca siddhānāṃ cāraṇaiḥ saha
analyzed: śṛṇomi kha gatānām ca siddhānām cāraṇaiḥ saha

original: 5.056.043c rākṣasī siṃhikā bhīmā kṣipraṃ hanumatā hṛtā
analyzed: rākṣasī siṃhikā bhīmā kṣipram hanumatā hṛtā

original: 5.056.044a tāṃ hatvā punar evāhaṃ kṛtyam ātyayikaṃ smaran
analyzed: tām hatvā punar eva aham kṛtyam ātyayikam smaran

original: 5.056.044c gatvā ca mahad adhvānaṃ paśyāmi nagamaṇḍitam
analyzed: gatvā ca mahat adhvānam paśyāmi naga maṇḍitam

original: 5.056.044e dakṣiṇaṃ tīram udadher laṅkā yatra ca sā purī
analyzed: dakṣiṇam tīram udadheḥ laṅkā yatra ca sā purī

original: 5.056.045a astaṃ dinakare yāte rakṣasāṃ nilayaṃ purīm
analyzed: astam dinakare yāte rakṣasām nilayam purīm
praviṣṭaḥ ham a vijñātaḥ rakṣobhiḥ bhīma vikramaiḥ
tatra aham sarva rātram tu vicinvam janakātmajām
rāvaṇa antaḥpura gataḥ na ca apaśyam sumadhyamām

original: 5.056.047a tataḥ sītām apaśyaṃs tu rāvaṇasya niveśane
analyzed: tatas sītām apaśyān tu rāvaṇasya niveśane
śoka sāgaram āsādya na pāram upalakṣaye

original: 5.056.048a śocatā ca mayā dṛṣṭaṃ prākāreṇa samāvṛtam
analyzed: śocatā ca mayā dṛṣṭam prākāreṇa samāvṛtam
kāñcanena vikṛṣṭena gṛha upavanam uttamam
sa prākāram avaplutya paśyāmi bahu pādapam
aśoka vanikā madhye śiṃśapā pādapaḥ mahān

original: 5.056.050c tam āruhya ca paśyāmi kāñcanaṃ kadalī vanam
analyzed: tam āruhya ca paśyāmi kāñcanam kadalī vanam
adūrāt śiṃśapā vṛkṣāt paśyāmi vana varṇinīm
śyāmām kamala patra akṣīm upavāsa kṛśa ānanām
rākṣasībhiḥ virūpābhiḥ krūrābhiḥ abhisaṃvṛtām
māṃsa śoṇita bhakṣyābhiḥ vyāghrībhiḥ hariṇīm yathā

original: 5.056.053a tāṃ dṛṣṭvā tādṛśīṃ nārīṃ rāmapatnīm aninditām
analyzed: tām dṛṣṭvā tādṛśīm nārīm rāma patnīm aninditām
tatra eva śiṃśapā vṛkṣe paśyan aham avasthitaḥ
tatas halahalā śabdam kāñcī nūpura miśritam
śṛṇomi adhika gambhīram rāvaṇasya niveśane
tatas ham parama udvignaḥ sva rūpam pratyasaṃharam

original: 5.056.055c ahaṃ ca śiṃśapāvṛkṣe pakṣīva gahane sthitaḥ
analyzed: aham ca śiṃśapā vṛkṣe pakṣī iva gahane sthitaḥ

original: 5.056.056a tato rāvaṇadārāś ca rāvaṇaś ca mahābalaḥ
analyzed: tatas rāvaṇa dārāḥ ca rāvaṇaḥ ca mahā balaḥ

original: 5.056.056c taṃ deśaṃ samanuprāptā yatra sītābhavat sthitā
analyzed: tam deśam samanuprāptāḥ yatra sītā abhavat sthitā
tam dṛṣṭvā atha varārohā sītā rakṣaḥ gaṇa īśvaram

original: 5.056.057c saṃkucyorū stanau pīnau bāhubhyāṃ parirabhya ca
analyzed: saṃkucya ūrū stanau pīnau bāhubhyām parirabhya ca
tām uvāca daśagrīvaḥ sītām parama duḥkhitām

original: 5.056.058c avākśirāḥ prapatito bahu manyasva mām iti
analyzed: avākśirāḥ prapatitaḥ bahu manyasva mām iti

original: 5.056.059a yadi cet tvaṃ tu māṃ darpān nābhinandasi garvite
analyzed: yadi ced tvam tu mām darpāt na abhinandasi garvite
dvi māsa anantaram sīte pāsyāmi rudhiram tava

original: 5.056.060a etac chrutvā vacas tasya rāvaṇasya durātmanaḥ
analyzed: etat śrutvā vacaḥ tasya rāvaṇasya durātmanaḥ
uvāca parama kruddhā sītā vacanam uttamam
rākṣasa adhama rāmasya bhāryām amita tejasaḥ
ikṣvāku kula nāthasya snuṣām daśarathasya ca

original: 5.056.061e avācyaṃ vadato jihvā kathaṃ na patitā tava
analyzed: avācyam vadataḥ jihvā katham na patitā tava

original: 5.056.062a kiṃsvid vīryaṃ tavānārya yo māṃ bhartur asaṃnidhau
analyzed: kim svid vīryam tava anārya yaḥ mām bhartuḥ asaṃnidhau
apahṛtya āgataḥ pāpa tena adṛṣṭaḥ mahātmanā

original: 5.056.063a na tvaṃ rāmasya sadṛśo dāsye 'py asyā na yujyase
analyzed: na tvam rāmasya sadṛśaḥ dāsye pi asyāḥ na yujyase

original: 5.056.063c yajñīyaḥ satyavāk caiva raṇaślāghī ca rāghavaḥ
analyzed: yajñīyaḥ satya vāc ca eva raṇa ślāghī ca rāghavaḥ

original: 5.056.064a jānakyā paruṣaṃ vākyam evam ukto daśānanaḥ
analyzed: jānakyā paruṣam vākyam evam uktaḥ daśānanaḥ

original: 5.056.064c jajvāla sahasā kopāc citāstha iva pāvakaḥ
analyzed: jajvāla sahasā kopāt citā sthaḥ iva pāvakaḥ

original: 5.056.065a vivṛtya nayane krūre muṣṭim udyamya dakṣiṇam
analyzed: vivṛtya nayane krūre muṣṭim udyamya dakṣiṇam

original: 5.056.065c maithilīṃ hantum ārabdhaḥ strībhir hāhākṛtaṃ tadā
analyzed: maithilīm hantum ārabdhaḥ strībhiḥ hāhākṛtam tadā

original: 5.056.066a strīṇāṃ madhyāt samutpatya tasya bhāryā durātmanaḥ
analyzed: strīṇām madhyāt samutpatya tasya bhāryā durātmanaḥ

original: 5.056.066c varā mandodarī nāma tayā sa pratiṣedhitaḥ
analyzed: varā mandodarī nāma tayā sa pratiṣedhitaḥ

original: 5.056.067a uktaś ca madhurāṃ vāṇīṃ tayā sa madanārditaḥ
analyzed: uktaḥ ca madhurām vāṇīm tayā sa madana arditaḥ
sītayā tava kim kāryam mahā indra sama vikrama

original: 5.056.067e mayā saha ramasvādya madviśiṣṭā na jānakī
analyzed: mayā saha ramasva adya mad viśiṣṭā na jānakī
deva gandharva kanyābhiḥ yakṣa kanyābhiḥ eva ca

original: 5.056.068c sārdhaṃ prabho ramasveha sītayā kiṃ kariṣyasi
analyzed: sārdham prabhoḥ ramasva iha sītayā kim kariṣyasi

original: 5.056.069a tatas tābhiḥ sametābhir nārībhiḥ sa mahābalaḥ
analyzed: tatas tābhiḥ sametābhiḥ nārībhiḥ sa mahā balaḥ

original: 5.056.069c utthāpya sahasā nīto bhavanaṃ svaṃ niśācaraḥ
analyzed: utthāpya sahasā nītaḥ bhavanam svam niśācaraḥ
yāte tasmin daśagrīve rākṣasyaḥ vikṛta ānanāḥ

original: 5.056.070c sītāṃ nirbhartsayām āsur vākyaiḥ krūraiḥ sudāruṇaiḥ
analyzed: sītām nirbhartsayām āsuḥ vākyaiḥ krūraiḥ su dāruṇaiḥ

original: 5.056.071a tṛṇavad bhāṣitaṃ tāsāṃ gaṇayām āsa jānakī
analyzed: tṛṇa vat bhāṣitam tāsām gaṇayām āsa jānakī

original: 5.056.071c tarjitaṃ ca tadā tāsāṃ sītāṃ prāpya nirarthakam
analyzed: tarjitam ca tadā tāsām sītām prāpya nirarthakam
vṛthā garjita niśceṣṭāḥ rākṣasyaḥ piśita aśanāḥ
rāvaṇāya śaśaṃsuḥ tāḥ sītā vyavasitam mahat

original: 5.056.073a tatas tāḥ sahitāḥ sarvā vihatāśā nirudyamāḥ
analyzed: tatas tāḥ sahitāḥ sarvāḥ vihata āśāḥ nirudyamāḥ
parikṣipya samantāt tām nidrā vaśam upāgatāḥ

original: 5.056.074a tāsu caiva prasuptāsu sītā bhartṛhite ratā
analyzed: tāsu ca eva prasuptāsu sītā bhartṛ hite ratā
vilapya karuṇam dīnā praśuśoca su duḥkhitā

original: 5.056.075a tāṃ cāhaṃ tādṛśīṃ dṛṣṭvā sītāyā dāruṇāṃ daśām
analyzed: tām ca aham tādṛśīm dṛṣṭvā sītāyāḥ dāruṇām daśām

original: 5.056.075c cintayām āsa viśrānto na ca me nirvṛtaṃ manaḥ
analyzed: cintayām āsa viśrāntaḥ na ca me nirvṛtam manaḥ

original: 5.056.076a saṃbhāṣaṇārthe ca mayā jānakyāś cintito vidhiḥ
analyzed: saṃbhāṣaṇa arthe ca mayā jānakyāḥ cintitaḥ vidhiḥ
ikṣvāku kula vaṃśaḥ tu tatas mama puraskṛtaḥ
śrutvā tu gaditām vācam rājarṣi gaṇa pūjitām
pratyabhāṣata mām devī bāṣpaiḥ pihita locanā

original: 5.056.078a kas tvaṃ kena kathaṃ ceha prāpto vānarapuṃgava
analyzed: kaḥ tvam kena katham ca iha prāptaḥ vānara puṃgava

original: 5.056.078c kā ca rāmeṇa te prītis tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
analyzed: kā ca rāmeṇa te prītiḥ tat me śaṃsitum arhasi

original: 5.056.079a tasyās tadvacanaṃ śrutvā aham apy abruvaṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: tasyāḥ tat vacanam śrutvā aham api abruvam vacaḥ

original: 5.056.079c devi rāmasya bhartus te sahāyo bhīmavikramaḥ
analyzed: devi rāmasya bhartuḥ te sahāyaḥ bhīma vikramaḥ
sugrīvaḥ nāma vikrāntaḥ vānara indo mahā balaḥ

original: 5.056.080a tasya māṃ viddhi bhṛtyaṃ tvaṃ hanūmantam ihāgatam
analyzed: tasya mām viddhi bhṛtyam tvam hanūmantam iha āgatam
bhartrā aham prahitaḥ tubhyam rāmeṇa akliṣṭa karmaṇā

original: 5.056.081a idaṃ ca puruṣavyāghraḥ śrīmān dāśarathiḥ svayam
analyzed: idam ca puruṣa vyāghraḥ śrīmān dāśarathiḥ svayam
aṅgulīyam abhijñānam adāt tubhyam yaśasvini

original: 5.056.082a tad icchāmi tvayājñaptaṃ devi kiṃ karavāṇy aham
analyzed: tat icchāmi tvayā ājñaptam devi kim karavāṇi aham

original: 5.056.082c rāmalakṣmaṇayoḥ pārśvaṃ nayāmi tvāṃ kim uttaram
analyzed: rāma lakṣmaṇayoḥ pārśvam nayāmi tvām kim uttaram

original: 5.056.083a etac chrutvā viditvā ca sītā janakanandinī
analyzed: etat śrutvā viditvā ca sītā janakanandinī

original: 5.056.083c āha rāvaṇam utsādya rāghavo māṃ nayatv iti
analyzed: āha rāvaṇam utsādya rāghavaḥ mām nayatu iti

original: 5.056.084a praṇamya śirasā devīm aham āryām aninditām
analyzed: praṇamya śirasā devīm aham āryām aninditām
rāghavasya manaḥ hlādam abhijñānam ayāciṣam
evam uktā varārohā maṇi pravaram uttamam

original: 5.056.085c prāyacchat paramodvignā vācā māṃ saṃdideśa ha
analyzed: prāyacchat parama udvignā vācā mām saṃdideśa ha
tatas tasyai praṇamya aham rāja putryai samāhitaḥ
pradakṣiṇam parikrāmam iha abhyudgata mānasaḥ

original: 5.056.087a uttaraṃ punar evāha niścitya manasā tadā
analyzed: uttaram punar eva āha niścitya manasā tadā

original: 5.056.087c hanūman mama vṛttāntaṃ vaktum arhasi rāghave
analyzed: hanūman mama vṛttāntam vaktum arhasi rāghave

original: 5.056.088a yathā śrutvaiva nacirāt tāv ubhau rāmalakṣmaṇau
analyzed: yathā śrutvā eva nacirāt tau ubhau rāma lakṣmaṇau
sugrīva sahitau vīrau upeyātām tathā kuru

original: 5.056.089a yady anyathā bhaved etad dvau māsau jīvitaṃ mama
analyzed: yadi anyathā bhavet etat dvau māsau jīvitam mama

original: 5.056.089c na māṃ drakṣyati kākutstho mriye sāham anāthavat
analyzed: na mām drakṣyati kākutsthaḥ mriye sā aham anātha vat

original: 5.056.090a tac chrutvā karuṇaṃ vākyaṃ krodho mām abhyavartata
analyzed: tat śrutvā karuṇam vākyam krodhaḥ mām abhyavartata

original: 5.056.090c uttaraṃ ca mayā dṛṣṭaṃ kāryaśeṣam anantaram
analyzed: uttaram ca mayā dṛṣṭam kārya śeṣam anantaram
tatas vardhata me kāyaḥ tadā parvata saṃnibhaḥ

original: 5.056.091c yuddhakāṅkṣī vanaṃ tac ca vināśayitum ārabhe
analyzed: yuddha kāṅkṣī vanam tat ca vināśayitum ārabhe
tat bhagnam vana ṣaṇḍam tu bhrānta trasta mṛga dvijam
pratibuddhāḥ nirīkṣante rākṣasyaḥ vikṛta ānanāḥ

original: 5.056.093a māṃ ca dṛṣṭvā vane tasmin samāgamya tatas tataḥ
analyzed: mām ca dṛṣṭvā vane tasmin samāgamya tatas tatas
tāḥ samabhyāgatāḥ kṣipram rāvaṇāya ācacakṣire

original: 5.056.094a rājan vanam idaṃ durgaṃ tava bhagnaṃ durātmanā
analyzed: rājan vanam idam durgam tava bhagnam durātmanā

original: 5.056.094c vānareṇa hy avijñāya tava vīryaṃ mahābala
analyzed: vānareṇa hi a vijñāya tava vīryam mahā bala
durbuddheḥ tasya rāja indra tava vipriya kāriṇaḥ

original: 5.056.095c vadham ājñāpaya kṣipraṃ yathāsau vilayaṃ vrajet
analyzed: vadham ājñāpaya kṣipram yathā asau vilayam vrajet
tat śrutvā rākṣasa indreṇa visṛṣṭāḥ bhṛśa durjayāḥ
rākṣasāḥ kiṃkarāḥ nāma rāvaṇasya manonugāḥ
teṣām aśīti sāhasram śūla mudgara pāṇinām
mayā tasmin vana uddeśe parigheṇa niṣūditam

original: 5.056.098a teṣāṃ tu hataśeṣā ye te gatā laghuvikramāḥ
analyzed: teṣām tu hata śeṣāḥ ye te gatāḥ laghu vikramāḥ
nihatam ca mayā sainyam rāvaṇāya ācacakṣire

original: 5.056.099a tato me buddhir utpannā caityaprāsādam ākramam
analyzed: tatas me buddhiḥ utpannā caitya prāsādam ākramam

original: 5.056.100a tatrasthān rākṣasān hatvā śataṃ stambhena vai punaḥ
analyzed: tatrasthān rākṣasān hatvā śatam stambhena vai punar

original: 5.056.100c lalāma bhūto laṅkāyā mayā vidhvaṃsito ruṣā
analyzed: lalāma bhūtaḥ laṅkāyāḥ mayā vidhvaṃsitaḥ ruṣā
tatas prahastasya sutam jambumālinam ādiśat
tam aham bala saṃpannam rākṣasam raṇa kovidam
parigheṇa ati ghoreṇa sūdayāmi sahānugam

original: 5.056.103a tac chrutvā rākṣasendras tu mantriputrān mahābalān
analyzed: tat śrutvā rākṣasa indraḥ tu mantri putrān mahā balān
padāti bala saṃpannān preṣayām āsa rāvaṇaḥ
parigheṇa eva tān sarvān nayāmi yama sādanam
mantri putrān hatām śrutvā samare laghu vikramān
pañca senā agragām śūrān preṣayām āsa rāvaṇaḥ

original: 5.056.104e tān ahaṃ saha sainyān vai sarvān evābhyasūdayam
analyzed: tān aham saha sainyān vai sarvān eva abhyasūdayam

original: 5.056.105a tataḥ punar daśagrīvaḥ putram akṣaṃ mahābalam
analyzed: tatas punar daśagrīvaḥ putram akṣam mahā balam

original: 5.056.105c bahubhī rākasaiḥ sārdhaṃ preṣayām āsa saṃyuge
analyzed: bahubhiḥ rākasaiḥ sārdham preṣayām āsa saṃyuge

original: 5.056.106a taṃ tu mandodarī putraṃ kumāraṃ raṇapaṇḍitam
analyzed: tam tu mandodarī putram kumāram raṇa paṇḍitam

original: 5.056.106c sahasā khaṃ samutkrāntaṃ pādayoś ca gṛhītavān
analyzed: sahasā kham samutkrāntam pādayoḥ ca gṛhītavān
carma asinam śataguṇam bhrāmayitvā vyapeṣayam

original: 5.056.107a tam akṣam āgataṃ bhagnaṃ niśamya sa daśānanaḥ
analyzed: tam akṣam āgatam bhagnam niśamya sa daśānanaḥ

original: 5.056.107c tata indrajitaṃ nāma dvitīyaṃ rāvaṇaḥ sutam
analyzed: tatas indrajitam nāma dvitīyam rāvaṇaḥ sutam
vyādideśa su saṃkruddhaḥ balinam yuddha durmadam

original: 5.056.108a tasyāpy ahaṃ balaṃ sarvaṃ taṃ ca rākṣasapuṃgavam
analyzed: tasya api aham balam sarvam tam ca rākṣasa puṃgavam

original: 5.056.108c naṣṭaujasaṃ raṇe kṛtvā paraṃ harṣam upāgamam
analyzed: naṣṭa ojasam raṇe kṛtvā param harṣam upāgamam
mahatā hi mahā bāhuḥ pratyayena mahā balaḥ
preṣitaḥ rāvaṇena eṣa saha vīraiḥ mada utkaṭaiḥ

original: 5.056.110a brāhmeṇāstreṇa sa tu māṃ prabadhnāc cātivegataḥ
analyzed: brāhmeṇa astreṇa sa tu mām prabadhnāt ca ativegataḥ

original: 5.056.110c rajjūbhir abhibadhnanti tato māṃ tatra rākṣasāḥ
analyzed: rajjūbhiḥ abhibadhnanti tatas mām tatra rākṣasāḥ

original: 5.056.111a rāvaṇasya samīpaṃ ca gṛhītvā mām upānayan
analyzed: rāvaṇasya samīpam ca gṛhītvā mām upānayan
dṛṣṭvā saṃbhāṣitaḥ ca aham rāvaṇena durātmanā

original: 5.056.112a pṛṣṭaś ca laṅkāgamanaṃ rākṣasānāṃ ca tad vadham
analyzed: pṛṣṭaḥ ca laṅkā āgamanam rākṣasānām ca tat vadham

original: 5.056.112c tat sarvaṃ ca mayā tatra sītārtham iti jalpitam
analyzed: tat sarvam ca mayā tatra sītā artham iti jalpitam
asya aham darśana ākāṅkṣī prāptaḥ tvad bhavanam vibho
mārutasya aurasaḥ putraḥ vānaraḥ hanumān aham

original: 5.056.114a rāmadūtaṃ ca māṃ viddhi sugrīvasacivaṃ kapim
analyzed: rāma dūtam ca mām viddhi sugrīva sacivam kapim
saḥ ham dautyena rāmasya tvad samīpam iha āgataḥ

original: 5.056.115a śṛṇu cāpi samādeśaṃ yad ahaṃ prabravīmi te
analyzed: śṛṇu ca api samādeśam yat aham prabravīmi te

original: 5.056.115c rākṣaseśa harīśas tvāṃ vākyam āha samāhitam
analyzed: rākṣasa īśa hari īśaḥ tvām vākyam āha samāhitam
dharma artha kāma sahitam hitam pathyam iva aśanam
vasataḥ ṛṣyamūke me parvate vipula drume
rāghavaḥ raṇa vikrāntaḥ mitra tvam samupāgataḥ

original: 5.056.117a tena me kathitaṃ rājan bhāryā me rakṣasā hṛtā
analyzed: tena me kathitam rājan bhāryā me rakṣasā hṛtā

original: 5.056.117c tatra sāhāyyahetor me samayaṃ kartum arhasi
analyzed: tatra sāhāyya hetoḥ me samayam kartum arhasi
vālinā hṛta rājyena sugrīveṇa saha prabhuḥ
cakre gni sākṣikam sakyam rāghavaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ
tena vālinam utsādya śareṇa ekena saṃyuge
vānarāṇām mahā rājaḥ kṛtaḥ saṃplavatām prabhuḥ

original: 5.056.120a tasya sāhāyyam asmābhiḥ kāryaṃ sarvātmanā tv iha
analyzed: tasya sāhāyyam asmābhiḥ kāryam sarva ātmanā tu iha

original: 5.056.120c tena prasthāpitas tubhyaṃ samīpam iha dharmataḥ
analyzed: tena prasthāpitaḥ tubhyam samīpam iha dharmataḥ

original: 5.056.121a kṣipram ānīyatāṃ sītā dīyatāṃ rāghavasya ca
analyzed: kṣipram ānīyatām sītā dīyatām rāghavasya ca

original: 5.056.121c yāvan na harayo vīrā vidhamanti balaṃ tava
analyzed: yāvat na harayaḥ vīrāḥ vidhamanti balam tava

original: 5.056.122a vānarāṇāṃ prabhavo hi na kena viditaḥ purā
analyzed: vānarāṇām prabhavaḥ hi na kena viditaḥ purā

original: 5.056.122c devatānāṃ sakāśaṃ ca ye gacchanti nimantritāḥ
analyzed: devatānām sakāśam ca ye gacchanti nimantritāḥ

original: 5.056.123a iti vānararājas tvām āhety abhihito mayā
analyzed: iti vānara rājaḥ tvām āha iti abhihitaḥ mayā

original: 5.056.123c mām aikṣata tato ruṣṭaś cakṣuṣā pradahann iva
analyzed: mām aikṣata tatas ruṣṭaḥ cakṣuṣā pradahan iva
tena vadhyaḥ ham ājñaptaḥ rakṣasā raudra karmaṇā

original: 5.056.125a tato vibhīṣaṇo nāma tasya bhrātā mahāmatiḥ
analyzed: tatas vibhīṣaṇaḥ nāma tasya bhrātā mahāmatiḥ
tena yācitaḥ mama kāraṇāt

original: 5.056.126a dūtavadhyā na dṛṣṭā hi rājaśāstreṣu rākṣasa
analyzed: dūta vadhyā na dṛṣṭā hi rāja śāstreṣu rākṣasa
dūtena veditavyam ca yathārtham hita vādinā
su mahati aparādhe dūtasya atula vikramaḥ
virūpa karaṇam dṛṣṭam na vadhaḥ sti iha śāstrataḥ
vibhīṣaṇena evam uktaḥ rāvaṇaḥ saṃdideśa tān

original: 5.056.128c rākṣasān etad evādya lāṅgūlaṃ dahyatām iti
analyzed: rākṣasān etat eva adya lāṅgūlam dahyatām iti

original: 5.056.129a tatas tasya vacaḥ śrutvā mama pucchaṃ samantataḥ
analyzed: tatas tasya vacaḥ śrutvā mama puccham samantataḥ

original: 5.056.129c veṣṭitaṃ śaṇavalkaiś ca paṭaiḥ kārpāsakais tathā
analyzed: veṣṭitam śaṇa valkaiḥ ca paṭaiḥ kārpāsakaiḥ tathā
rākṣasāḥ siddha saṃnāhāḥ tatas te caṇḍa vikramāḥ

original: 5.056.130c tad ādīpyanta me pucchaṃ hanantaḥ kāṣṭhamuṣṭibhiḥ
analyzed: tat ādīpyanta me puccham hanantaḥ kāṣṭha muṣṭibhiḥ

original: 5.056.131a baddhasya bahubhiḥ pāśair yantritasya ca rākṣasaiḥ
analyzed: baddhasya bahubhiḥ pāśaiḥ yantritasya ca rākṣasaiḥ

original: 5.056.131c na me pīḍā bhavet kā cid didṛkṣor nagarīṃ divā
analyzed: na me pīḍā bhavet kā cit didṛkṣoḥ nagarīm divā

original: 5.056.132a tatas te rākṣasāḥ śūrā baddhaṃ mām agnisaṃvṛtam
analyzed: tatas te rākṣasāḥ śūrāḥ baddham mām agni saṃvṛtam
aghoṣayan rājamārge nagara dvāram āgatāḥ

original: 5.056.133a tato 'haṃ sumahad rūpaṃ saṃkṣipya punar ātmanaḥ
analyzed: tatas ham su mahat rūpam saṃkṣipya punar ātmanaḥ

original: 5.056.133c vimocayitvā taṃ bandhaṃ prakṛtiṣṭhaḥ sthitaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: vimocayitvā tam bandham prakṛtiṣṭhaḥ sthitaḥ punar

original: 5.056.134a āyasaṃ parighaṃ gṛhya tāni rakṣāṃsy asūdayam
analyzed: āyasam parigham gṛhya tāni rakṣāṃsi asūdayam
tatas tat nagara dvāram vegena āplutavān aham

original: 5.056.135a pucchena ca pradīptena tāṃ purīṃ sāṭṭagopurām
analyzed: pucchena ca pradīptena tām purīm sa aṭṭa gopurām

original: 5.056.135c dahāmy aham asaṃbhrānto yugāntāgnir iva prajāḥ
analyzed: dahāmi aham asaṃbhrāntaḥ yugānta agniḥ iva prajāḥ

original: 5.056.136a dagdhvā laṅkāṃ punaś caiva śaṅkā mām abhyavartata
analyzed: dagdhvā laṅkām punar ca eva śaṅkā mām abhyavartata

original: 5.056.136c dahatā ca mayā laṅkāṃ daghdā sītā na saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: dahatā ca mayā laṅkām daghdā sītā na saṃśayaḥ
atha aham vācam aśrauṣam cāraṇānām śubha akṣarām
jānakī na ca dagdhā iti vismaya udanta bhāṣiṇām

original: 5.056.138a tato me buddhir utpannā śrutvā tām adbhutāṃ giram
analyzed: tatas me buddhiḥ utpannā śrutvā tām adbhutām giram

original: 5.056.138c punar dṛṣṭā ca vaidehī visṛṣṭaś ca tayā punaḥ
analyzed: punar dṛṣṭā ca vaidehī visṛṣṭaḥ ca tayā punar
rāghavasya prabhāvena bhavatām ca eva tejasā

original: 5.056.139c sugrīvasya ca kāryārthaṃ mayā sarvam anuṣṭhitam
analyzed: sugrīvasya ca kārya artham mayā sarvam anuṣṭhitam

original: 5.056.140a etat sarvaṃ mayā tatra yathāvad upapāditam
analyzed: etat sarvam mayā tatra yathāvat upapāditam

original: 5.056.140c atra yan na kṛtaṃ śeṣaṃ tat sarvaṃ kriyatām iti
analyzed: atra yat na kṛtam śeṣam tat sarvam kriyatām iti

original: 5.057.001a etad ākhyānaṃ tat sarvaṃ hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
analyzed: etat ākhyānam tat sarvam hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
bhūyas samupacakrāma vacanam vaktum uttaram
saphalaḥ rāghava udyogaḥ sugrīvasya ca saṃbhramaḥ

original: 5.057.002c śīlam āsādya sītāyā mama ca plavanaṃ mahat
analyzed: śīlam āsādya sītāyāḥ mama ca plavanam mahat
āryāyāḥ sadṛśam śīlam sītāyāḥ plavaga ṛṣabhāḥ

original: 5.057.003c tapasā dhārayel lokān kruddhā vā nirdahed api
analyzed: tapasā dhārayet lokān kruddhā vā nirdahet api
sarvathā atipravṛddhaḥ sau rāvaṇaḥ rākṣasa adhipaḥ

original: 5.057.004c yasya tāṃ spṛśato gātraṃ tapasā na vināśitam
analyzed: yasya tām spṛśataḥ gātram tapasā na vināśitam

original: 5.057.005a na tad agniśikhā kuryāt saṃspṛṣṭā pāṇinā satī
analyzed: na tat agni śikhā kuryāt saṃspṛṣṭā pāṇinā satī
janakasya ātmajā kuryāt utkrodha kaluṣīkṛtā
aśoka vanikā madhye rāvaṇasya durātmanaḥ
adhastāt śiṃśapā vṛkṣe sādhvī karuṇam āsthitā
rākṣasībhiḥ parivṛtā śoka saṃtāpa karśitā
megha lekhā parivṛtā candra lekhā iva niṣprabhā
a cintayantī vaidehī rāvaṇam bala darpitam

original: 5.057.008c pativratā ca suśroṇī avaṣṭabdhā ca jānakī
analyzed: pativratā ca suśroṇī avaṣṭabdhā ca jānakī

original: 5.057.009a anuraktā hi vaidehī rāmaṃ sarvātmanā śubhā
analyzed: anuraktā hi vaidehī rāmam sarva ātmanā śubhā
an anya cittā rāme ca paulomī iva puraṃdare
tat eka vāsaḥ saṃvītā rajaḥ dhvastā tathā eva ca
śoka saṃtāpa dīna aṅgī sītā bhartṛ hite ratā

original: 5.057.011a sā mayā rākṣasī madhye tarjyamānā muhur muhuḥ
analyzed: sā mayā rākṣasī madhye tarjyamānā muhur muhur

original: 5.057.011c rākṣasībhir virūpābhir dṛṣṭā hi pramadā vane
analyzed: rākṣasībhiḥ virūpābhiḥ dṛṣṭāḥ hi pramadāḥ vane
eka veṇī dharā dīnā bhartṛ cintā parāyaṇā
adhas śayyā vivarṇa aṅgī padminī iva hima āgame
rāvaṇāt vinivṛtta arthā martavya kṛta niścayā
katham cit mṛgaśāvākṣī viśvāsam upapāditā

original: 5.057.014a tataḥ saṃbhāṣitā caiva sarvam arthaṃ ca darśitā
analyzed: tatas saṃbhāṣitā ca eva sarvam artham ca darśitā
rāma sugrīva sakhyam ca śrutvā prītim upāgatā
niyataḥ samudācāraḥ bhaktiḥ bhartari ca uttamā

original: 5.057.016a yan na hanti daśagrīvaṃ sa mahātmā daśānanaḥ
analyzed: yat na hanti daśagrīvam sa mahātmā daśānanaḥ

original: 5.057.016c nimittamātraṃ rāmas tu vadhe tasya bhaviṣyati
analyzed: nimitta mātram rāmaḥ tu vadhe tasya bhaviṣyati
evam āste mahābhāgā sītā śoka parāyaṇā

original: 5.057.017c yad atra pratikartavyaṃ tat sarvam upapādyatām
analyzed: yat atra pratikartavyam tat sarvam upapādyatām
tasya tat vacanam śrutvā vāli sūnuḥ abhāṣata
jāmbavat pramukhān sarvān anujñāpya mahā kapīn

original: 5.058.002a asminn evaṃgate kārye bhavatāṃ ca nivedite
analyzed: asmin evaṃgate kārye bhavatām ca nivedite

original: 5.058.002c nyāyyaṃ sma saha vaidehyā draṣṭuṃ tau pārthivātmajau
analyzed: nyāyyam sma saha vaidehyā draṣṭum tau pārthiva ātmajau
aham ekaḥ pi paryāptaḥ sarākṣasa gaṇām purīm

original: 5.058.003c tāṃ laṅkāṃ tarasā hantuṃ rāvaṇaṃ ca mahābalam
analyzed: tām laṅkām tarasā hantum rāvaṇam ca mahā balam

original: 5.058.004a kiṃ punaḥ sahito vīrair balavadbhiḥ kṛtātmabhiḥ
analyzed: kim punar sahitaḥ vīraiḥ balavadbhiḥ kṛtātmabhiḥ
kṛtāstraiḥ plavagaiḥ śaktaiḥ bhavadbhiḥ vijaya eṣibhiḥ

original: 5.058.005a ahaṃ tu rāvaṇaṃ yuddhe sasainyaṃ sapuraḥsaram
analyzed: aham tu rāvaṇam yuddhe sa sainyam sa puraḥsaram
sa putram vidhamiṣyāmi sahodara yutam yudhi

original: 5.058.006a brāhmam aindraṃ ca raudraṃ ca vāyavyaṃ vāruṇaṃ tathā
analyzed: brāhmam aindram ca raudram ca vāyavyam vāruṇam tathā
yadi śakrajitaḥ strāṇi durnirīkṣyāṇi saṃyuge
tāni aham vidhamiṣyāmi nihaniṣyāmi rākṣasān

original: 5.058.007a bhavatām abhyanujñāto vikramo me ruṇaddhi tam
analyzed: bhavatām abhyanujñātaḥ vikramaḥ me ruṇaddhi tam
mayā atulā visṛṣṭā hi śaila vṛṣṭiḥ nirantarā

original: 5.058.008c devān api raṇe hanyāt kiṃ punas tān niśācarān
analyzed: devān api raṇe hanyāt kim punar tān niśācarān

original: 5.058.009a sāgaro 'py atiyād velāṃ mandaraḥ pracaled api
analyzed: sāgaraḥ pi atiyāt velām mandaraḥ pracalet api
na jāmbavantam samare kampayet ari vāhinī
sarva rākṣasa saṃghānām rākṣasāḥ ye ca pūrvakāḥ

original: 5.058.010c alam eko vināśāya vīro vāyusutaḥ kapiḥ
analyzed: alam ekaḥ vināśāya vīraḥ vāyu sutaḥ kapiḥ
panasasya ūru vegena nīlasya ca mahātmanaḥ

original: 5.058.011c mandaro 'py avaśīryeta kiṃ punar yudhi rākṣasāḥ
analyzed: mandaraḥ pi avaśīryeta kim punar yudhi rākṣasāḥ
sa deva asura yuddheṣu gandharva uraga pakṣiṣu
maindasya pratiyoddhāram śaṃsata dvividasya vā
aśvi putrau mahā vegau etau plavaga sattamau
pitāmaha vara utsekāt paramam darpam āsthitau
aśvinoḥ mānana artham hi sarva loka pitāmahaḥ
sarva avadhya tvam atulam anayoḥ dattavān purā

original: 5.058.015a varotsekena mattau ca pramathya mahatīṃ camūm
analyzed: vara utsekena mattau ca pramathya mahatīm camūm
surāṇām amṛtam vīrau pītavantau plavaṃgamau
etau eva hi saṃkruddhau sa vāji ratha kuñjarām

original: 5.058.016c laṅkāṃ nāśayituṃ śaktau sarve tiṣṭhantu vānarāḥ
analyzed: laṅkām nāśayitum śaktau sarve tiṣṭhantu vānarāḥ

original: 5.058.017a ayuktaṃ tu vinā devīṃ dṛṣṭabadbhiḥ plavaṃgamāḥ
analyzed: ayuktam tu vinā devīm dṛṣṭa badbhiḥ plavaṃgamāḥ
samīpam gantum asmābhiḥ rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ

original: 5.058.018a dṛṣṭā devī na cānītā iti tatra nivedanam
analyzed: dṛṣṭā devī na ca ānītā iti tatra nivedanam
ayuktam iva paśyāmi bhavadbhiḥ khyāta vikramaiḥ

original: 5.058.019a na hi vaḥ plavate kaś cin nāpi kaś cit parākrame
analyzed: na hi vaḥ plavate kaḥ cit na api kaḥ cit parākrame
tulyaḥ sa amara daityeṣu lokeṣu hari sattamāḥ
teṣu evam hata vīreṣu rākṣaseṣu hanumatā

original: 5.058.020c kim anyad atra kartavyaṃ gṛhītvā yāma jānakīm
analyzed: kim anyat atra kartavyam gṛhītvā yāma jānakīm
tam evam kṛta saṃkalpam jāmbavān hari sattamaḥ
uvāca parama prītaḥ vākyam arthavat artha vid

original: 5.058.022a na tāvad eṣā matir akṣamā no;
analyzed: na tāvat eṣā matiḥ akṣamā no
yathā bhavān paśyati rāja putra
yathā tu rāmasya matiḥ niviṣṭā
tathā bhavān paśyatu kārya siddhim
tatas jāmbavataḥ vākyam agṛhṇanta vanaukasaḥ
aṅgada pramukhāḥ vīrāḥ hanūmān ca mahā kapiḥ
prītimantaḥ tatas sarve vāyuputra puraḥsarāḥ
mahendra agram parityajya pupluvuḥ plavaga ṛṣabhāḥ
meru mandara saṃkāśāḥ mattāḥ iva mahā gajāḥ
chādayantaḥ iva ākāśam mahā kāyāḥ mahā balāḥ
sabhājyamānam bhūtaiḥ tam ātmavantam mahā balam
hanūmantam mahā vegam vahantaḥ iva dṛṣṭibhiḥ

original: 5.059.005a rāghave cārthanirvṛttiṃ bhartuś ca paramaṃ yaśaḥ
analyzed: rāghave ca artha nirvṛttim bhartuḥ ca paramam yaśaḥ
samādhāya samṛddha arthāḥ karma siddhibhiḥ unnatāḥ
priya ākhyāna unmukhāḥ sarve sarve yuddha abhinandinaḥ
sarve rāma pratīkāre niścita arthāḥ manasvinaḥ

original: 5.059.007a plavamānāḥ kham āplutya tatas te kānanaukṣakaḥ
analyzed: plavamānāḥ kham āplutya tatas te kānanaukṣakaḥ
nandana upamam āseduḥ vanam druma latā yutam
yat tat madhuvanam nāma sugrīvasya abhirakṣitam
adhṛṣyam sarva bhūtānām sarva bhūta manoharam

original: 5.059.009a yad rakṣati mahāvīryaḥ sadā dadhimukhaḥ kapiḥ
analyzed: yat rakṣati mahā vīryaḥ sadā dadhimukhaḥ kapiḥ
mātulaḥ kapi mukhyasya sugrīvasya mahātmanaḥ

original: 5.059.010a te tad vanam upāgamya babhūvuḥ paramotkaṭāḥ
analyzed: te tat vanam upāgamya babhūvuḥ parama utkaṭāḥ
vānarāḥ vānara indrasya manaḥ kāntatamam mahat

original: 5.059.011a tatas te vānarā hṛṣṭā dṛṣṭvā madhuvanaṃ mahat
analyzed: tatas te vānarāḥ hṛṣṭāḥ dṛṣṭvā madhuvanam mahat
kumāram abhyayācanta madhūni madhu piṅgalāḥ

original: 5.059.012a tataḥ kumāras tān vṛddhāñ jāmbavatpramukhān kapīn
analyzed: tatas kumāraḥ tān vṛddhām jāmbavat pramukhān kapīn
anumānya dadau teṣām nisargam madhu bhakṣaṇe
tatas ca anumatāḥ sarve saṃprahṛṣṭāḥ vanaukasaḥ

original: 5.059.013c muditāś ca tatas te ca pranṛtyanti tatas tataḥ
analyzed: muditāḥ ca tatas te ca pranṛtyanti tatas tatas

original: 5.059.014a gāyanti ke cit praṇamanti ke cin;
analyzed: gāyanti ke cit praṇamanti ke cit

original: nṛtyanti ke cit prahasanti ke cit
analyzed: nṛtyanti ke cit prahasanti ke cit

original: 5.059.014c patanti ke cid vicaranti ke cit;
analyzed: patanti ke cit vicaranti ke cit

original: plavanti ke cit pralapanti ke cit
analyzed: plavanti ke cit pralapanti ke cit
parasparam ke cit upāśrayante
parasparam ke cit atibruvante
drumāt drumam ke cit abhiplavante
kṣitau naga agrāt nipatanti ke cit
mahī talāt ke cit udīrṇa vegā
mahā druma agrāṇi abhisaṃpatante
gāyantam anyaḥ prahasan upaiti
hasantam anyaḥ prahasan upaiti
rudantam anyaḥ prarudan upaiti
nudantam anyaḥ praṇudan upaiti
samākulam tat kapi sainyam āsīt
madhu prapāna utkaṭa sattva ceṣṭam

original: 5.059.017e na cātra kaś cin na babhūva matto;
analyzed: na ca atra kaḥ cit na babhūva

original: na cātra kaś cin na babhūva tṛpto
analyzed: na ca atra kaḥ cit na babhūva tṛptaḥ
tatas vanam tat paribhakṣyamāṇam
drumān ca vidhvaṃsita patra puṣpān
samīkṣya kopāt dadhivaktra nāmā
nivārayām āsa kapiḥ kapīn tān
sa taiḥ pravṛddhaiḥ paribhartsyamānaḥ
vanasya goptā hari vīra vṛddhaḥ
cakāra bhūyas matim ugra tejāḥ
vanasya rakṣām prati vānarebhyaḥ
uvāca kān cit paruṣāṇi dhṛṣṭam
asaktam anyān ca talaiḥ jaghāna
sametya kaiḥ cit kalaham cakāra
tathā eva sāmnā upajagāma kān cit
sa taiḥ madāt ca a prativārya vegaiḥ
balāt ca tena a prativāryamāṇaiḥ
pradharṣitaḥ tyakta bhayaiḥ sametya
prakṛṣyate ca api an avekṣya doṣam
nakhaiḥ tudantaḥ daśanaiḥ daśantaḥ
talaiḥ ca pādaiḥ ca samāpnuvantaḥ
madāt kapim tam kapayaḥ samagrāḥ
mahā vanam nirviṣayam ca cakruḥ
tān uvāca hari śreṣṭhaḥ hanūmān vānara ṛṣabhaḥ
avyagra manasaḥ yūyam madhu sevata vānarāḥ
śrutvā hanumataḥ vākyam harīṇām pravaraḥ ṅgadaḥ
pratyuvāca prasanna ātmā pibantu harayaḥ madhu
avaśyam kṛta kāryasya vākyam hanumataḥ mayā

original: 5.060.003c akāryam api kartavyaṃ kim aṅga punar īdṛśam
analyzed: akāryam api kartavyam kim aṅga punar īdṛśam
andagasya mukhāt śrutvā vacanam vānara ṛṣabhāḥ

original: 5.060.004c sādhu sādhv iti saṃhṛṣṭā vānarāḥ pratyapūjayan
analyzed: sādhu sādhu iti saṃhṛṣṭāḥ vānarāḥ pratyapūjayan
pūjayitvā aṅgadam sarve vānarāḥ vānara ṛṣabham

original: 5.060.005c jagmur madhuvanaṃ yatra nadīvega iva drutam
analyzed: jagmuḥ madhuvanam yatra nadī vegaḥ iva drutam

original: 5.060.006a te prahṛṣṭā madhuvanaṃ pālān ākramya vīryataḥ
analyzed: te prahṛṣṭāḥ madhuvanam pālān ākramya vīryataḥ

original: 5.060.006c atisargāc ca paṭavo dṛṣṭvā śrutvā ca maithilīm
analyzed: atisargāt ca paṭavaḥ dṛṣṭvā śrutvā ca maithilīm

original: 5.060.007a utpatya ca tataḥ sarve vanapālān samāgatāḥ
analyzed: utpatya ca tatas sarve vanapālān samāgatāḥ

original: 5.060.007c tāḍayanti sma śataśaḥ saktān madhuvane tadā
analyzed: tāḍayanti sma śataśas saktān madhuvane tadā
madhūni droṇa mātrāṇi bahubhiḥ parigṛhya te

original: 5.060.008c ghnanti sma sahitāḥ sarve bhakṣayanti tathāpare
analyzed: ghnanti sma sahitāḥ sarve bhakṣayanti tathā apare
ke cit pītvā apavidhyanti madhūni madhu piṅgalāḥ

original: 5.060.009c madhūcciṣṭena ke cic ca jaghnur anyonyam utkaṭāḥ
analyzed: madhūcciṣṭena ke cit ca jaghnuḥ anyonyam utkaṭāḥ
apare vṛkṣa mūleṣu śākhām gṛhya vyavasthitaḥ

original: 5.060.010c atyarthaṃ ca madaglānāḥ parṇāny āstīrya śerate
analyzed: atyartham ca mada glānāḥ parṇāni āstīrya śerate
unmatta bhūtāḥ plavagāḥ madhu mattāḥ ca hṛṣṭa vat

original: 5.060.011c kṣipanty api tathānyonyaṃ skhalanty api tathāpare
analyzed: kṣipanti api tathā anyonyam skhalanti api tathā apare

original: 5.060.012a ke cit kṣveḍān prakurvanti ke cit kūjanti hṛṣṭavat
analyzed: ke cit kṣveḍān prakurvanti ke cit kūjanti hṛṣṭa vat

original: 5.060.012c harayo madhunā mattāḥ ke cit suptā mahītale
analyzed: harayaḥ madhunā mattāḥ ke cit suptāḥ mahī tale

original: 5.060.013a ye 'py atra madhupālāḥ syuḥ preṣyā dadhimukhasya tu
analyzed: ye pi atra madhupālāḥ syuḥ preṣyāḥ dadhimukhasya tu

original: 5.060.013c te 'pi tair vānarair bhīmaiḥ pratiṣiddhā diśo gatāḥ
analyzed: te pi taiḥ vānaraiḥ bhīmaiḥ pratiṣiddhāḥ diśaḥ gatāḥ

original: 5.060.014a jānubhiś ca prakṛṣṭāś ca devamārgaṃ ca darśitāḥ
analyzed: jānubhiḥ ca prakṛṣṭāḥ ca devamārgam ca darśitāḥ
abruvan parama udvignāḥ gatvā dadhimukham vacaḥ
hanūmatā datta varaiḥ hatam madhuvanam balāt

original: 5.060.015c vayaṃ ca jānubhiḥ kṛṣṭā devamārgaṃ ca darśitāḥ
analyzed: vayam ca jānubhiḥ kṛṣṭāḥ devamārgam ca darśitāḥ

original: 5.060.016a tato dadhimukhaḥ kruddho vanapas tatra vānaraḥ
analyzed: tatas dadhimukhaḥ kruddhaḥ vanapaḥ tatra vānaraḥ

original: 5.060.016c hataṃ madhuvanaṃ śrutvā sāntvayām āsa tān harīn
analyzed: hatam madhuvanam śrutvā sāntvayām āsa tān harīn
eta agacchata gacchāmaḥ vānarān ati darpitān
balena āvārayiṣyāmaḥ madhu bhakṣayataḥ vayam
śrutvā dadhimukhasya idam vacanam vānara ṛṣabhāḥ

original: 5.060.018c punar vīrā madhuvanaṃ tenaiva sahitā yayuḥ
analyzed: punar vīrāḥ madhuvanam tena eva sahitāḥ yayuḥ
madhye ca eṣām dadhimukhaḥ pragṛhya su mahā tarum

original: 5.060.019c samabhyadhāvad vegenā te ca sarve plavaṃgamāḥ
analyzed: samabhyadhāvat vegena ā te ca sarve plavaṃgamāḥ

original: 5.060.020a te śilāḥ pādapāṃś cāpi pāṣāṇāṃś cāpi vānarāḥ
analyzed: te śilāḥ pādapān ca api pāṣāṇān ca api vānarāḥ
gṛhītvā abhyāgaman kruddhāḥ yatra te kapi kuñjarāḥ

original: 5.060.021a te svāmivacanaṃ vīrā hṛdayeṣv avasajya tat
analyzed: te svāmi vacanam vīrāḥ hṛdayeṣu avasajya tat
tvarayā hi abhyadhāvanta sāla tāla śilā āyudhāḥ

original: 5.060.022a vṛkṣasthāṃś ca talasthāṃś ca vānarān baladarpitān
analyzed: vṛkṣa sthān ca tala sthān ca vānarān bala darpitān

original: 5.060.022c abhyakrāmanta te vīrāḥ pālās tatra sahasraśaḥ
analyzed: abhyakrāmanta te vīrāḥ pālāḥ tatra sahasraśas
atha dṛṣṭvā dadhimukham kruddham vānara puṃgavāḥ
abhyadhāvanta vegena hanūmat pramukhāḥ tadā
tam sa vṛkṣam mahā bāhum āpatantam mahā balam
āryakam prāharat tatra bāhubhyām kupitaḥ ṅgadaḥ

original: 5.060.025a madāndhaś a na vedainam āryako 'yaṃ mameti saḥ
analyzed: mada andhaḥ na veda enam āryakaḥ yam mama iti saḥ
athā enam niṣpipeṣa āśu vegavat vasudhā tale
sa bhagna bāhuḥ vimukhaḥ vihvalaḥ śoṇita ukṣitaḥ
mumoha sahasā vīraḥ muhūrtam kapi kuñjaraḥ

original: 5.060.027a sa kathaṃ cid vimuktas tair vānarair vānararṣabhaḥ
analyzed: sa katham cit vimuktaḥ taiḥ vānaraiḥ vānara ṛṣabhaḥ
uvāca ekāntam āgamya bhṛtyān tān samupāgatān

original: 5.060.028a ete tiṣṭhantu gacchāmo bhartā no yatra vānaraḥ
analyzed: ete tiṣṭhantu gacchāmaḥ bhartā naḥ yatra vānaraḥ
sugrīvaḥ vipula grīvaḥ saha rāmeṇa tiṣṭhati
sarvam ca eva aṅgade doṣam śrāvayiṣyāmi pārthiva
amarṣī vacanam śrutvā ghātayiṣyati vānarān

original: 5.060.030a iṣṭaṃ madhuvanaṃ hy etat sugrīvasya mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: iṣṭam madhuvanam hi etat sugrīvasya mahātmanaḥ
pitṛpaitāmaham divyam devaiḥ api durāsadam

original: 5.060.031a sa vānarān imān sarvān madhulubdhān gatāyuṣaḥ
analyzed: sa vānarān imān sarvān madhu lubdhān gata āyuṣaḥ
ghātayiṣyati daṇḍena sugrīvaḥ sa suhṛd janān

original: 5.060.032a vadhyā hy ete durātmāno nṛpājñā paribhāvinaḥ
analyzed: vadhyāḥ hi ete durātmānaḥ nṛpa ājñā paribhāvinaḥ
amarṣa prabhavaḥ roṣaḥ saphalaḥ naḥ bhaviṣyati
evam uktvā dadhimukhaḥ vanapālān mahā balaḥ
jagāma sahasā utpatya vanapālaiḥ samanvitaḥ
nimeṣa antara mātreṇa sa hi prāptaḥ vana ālayaḥ
sahasrāṃśu sutaḥ dhīmān sugrīvaḥ yatra vānaraḥ

original: 5.060.035a rāmaṃ ca lakṣmaṇaṃ caiva dṛṣṭvā sugrīvam eva ca
analyzed: rāmam ca lakṣmaṇam ca eva dṛṣṭvā sugrīvam eva ca
sama pratiṣṭhām jagatīm ākāśāt nipapāta ha

original: 5.060.036a sa nipatya mahāvīryaḥ sarvais taiḥ parivāritaḥ
analyzed: sa nipatya mahā vīryaḥ sarvaiḥ taiḥ parivāritaḥ
hariḥ dadhimukhaḥ pālaiḥ pālānām parama īśvaraḥ

original: 5.060.037a sa dīnavadano bhūtvā kṛtvā śirasi cāñjalim
analyzed: sa dīna vadanaḥ bhūtvā kṛtvā śirasi ca añjalim
sugrīvasya śubhau mūrdhnā caraṇau pratyapīḍayat
tatas mūrdhnā nipatitam vānaram vānara ṛṣabhaḥ
dṛṣṭvā eva udvigna hṛdayaḥ vākyam etat uvāca ha

original: 5.061.002a uttiṣṭhottiṣṭha kasmāt tvaṃ pādayoḥ patito mama
analyzed: uttiṣṭha uttiṣṭha kasmāt tvam pādayoḥ patitaḥ mama

original: 5.061.002c abhayaṃ te bhaved vīra satyam evābhidhīyatām
analyzed: abhayam te bhavet vīra satyam eva abhidhīyatām

original: 5.061.003a sa tu viśvāsitas tena sugrīveṇa mahātmanā
analyzed: sa tu viśvāsitaḥ tena sugrīveṇa mahātmanā
utthāya ca mahā prājñaḥ vākyam dadhimukhaḥ bravīt

original: 5.061.004a naivarkṣarajasā rājan na tvayā nāpi vālinā
analyzed: na eva ṛkṣarajasā rājan na tvayā na api vālinā

original: 5.061.004c vanaṃ nisṛṣṭapūrvaṃ hi bhakṣitaṃ tat tu vānaraiḥ
analyzed: vanam nisṛṣṭa pūrvam hi bhakṣitam tat tu vānaraiḥ
ebhiḥ pradharṣitāḥ ca eva vāritāḥ vana rakṣibhiḥ
madhūni a cintayitvā imān bhakṣayanti pibanti ca
śiṣṭam atra apavidhyanti bhakṣayanti tathā apare

original: 5.061.006c nivāryamāṇās te sarve bhruvau vai darśayanti hi
analyzed: nivāryamāṇāḥ te sarve bhruvau vai darśayanti hi

original: 5.061.007a ime hi saṃrabdhatarās tathā taiḥ saṃpradharṣitāḥ
analyzed: ime hi saṃrabdhatarāḥ tathā taiḥ saṃpradharṣitāḥ
vārayantaḥ vanāt tasmāt kruddhaiḥ vānara puṃgavaiḥ

original: 5.061.008a tatas tair bahubhir vīrair vānarair vānararṣabhāḥ
analyzed: tatas taiḥ bahubhiḥ vīraiḥ vānaraiḥ vānara ṛṣabhāḥ
saṃrakta nayanaiḥ krodhāt harayaḥ saṃpracālitāḥ

original: 5.061.009a pāṇibhir nihatāḥ ke cit ke cij jānubhir āhatāḥ
analyzed: pāṇibhiḥ nihatāḥ ke cit ke cit jānubhiḥ āhatāḥ

original: 5.061.009c prakṛṣṭāś ca yathākāmaṃ devamārgaṃ ca darśitāḥ
analyzed: prakṛṣṭāḥ ca yathākāmam devamārgam ca darśitāḥ

original: 5.061.010a evam ete hatāḥ śūrās tvayi tiṣṭhati bhartari
analyzed: evam ete hatāḥ śūrāḥ tvayi tiṣṭhati bhartari

original: 5.061.010c kṛtsnaṃ madhuvanaṃ caiva prakāmaṃ taiḥ prabhakṣyate
analyzed: kṛtsnam madhuvanam ca eva prakāmam taiḥ prabhakṣyate
evam vijñāpyamānam tu sugrīvam vānara ṛṣabham
apṛcchat tam mahā prājñaḥ lakṣmaṇaḥ para vīra hā

original: 5.061.012a kim ayaṃ vānaro rājan vanapaḥ pratyupasthitaḥ
analyzed: kim ayam vānaraḥ rājan vanapaḥ pratyupasthitaḥ

original: 5.061.012c kaṃ cārtham abhinirdiśya duḥkhito vākyam abravīt
analyzed: kam ca artham abhinirdiśya duḥkhitaḥ vākyam abravīt

original: 5.061.013a evam uktas tu sugrīvo lakṣmaṇena mahātmanā
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu sugrīvaḥ lakṣmaṇena mahātmanā
lakṣmaṇam pratyuvāca idam vākyam vākya viśāradaḥ

original: 5.061.014a ārya lakṣmaṇa saṃprāha vīro dadhimukhaḥ kapiḥ
analyzed: ārya lakṣmaṇa saṃprāha vīraḥ dadhimukhaḥ kapiḥ
aṅgada pramukhaiḥ vīraiḥ bhakṣitam madhu vānaraiḥ
na eṣām akṛta kṛtyānām īdṛśaḥ syāt upakramaḥ

original: 5.061.015c vanaṃ yathābhipannaṃ taiḥ sādhitaṃ karma vānaraiḥ
analyzed: vanam yathā abhipannam taiḥ sādhitam karma vānaraiḥ

original: 5.061.016a dṛṣṭā devī na saṃdeho na cānyena hanūmatā
analyzed: dṛṣṭā devī na saṃdehaḥ na ca anyena hanūmatā

original: 5.061.016c na hy anyaḥ sādhane hetuḥ karmaṇo 'sya hanūmataḥ
analyzed: na hi anyaḥ sādhane hetuḥ karmaṇaḥ hanūmataḥ
kārya siddhiḥ hanumati matiḥ ca hari puṃgava

original: 5.061.017c vyavasāyaś ca vīryaṃ ca śrutaṃ cāpi pratiṣṭhitam
analyzed: vyavasāyaḥ ca vīryam ca śrutam ca api pratiṣṭhitam

original: 5.061.018a jāmbavān yatra netā syād aṅgadasya baleśvaraḥ
analyzed: jāmbavān yatra netā syāt aṅgadasya bala īśvaraḥ

original: 5.061.018c hanūmāṃś cāpy adhiṣṭhātā na tasya gatir anyathā
analyzed: hanūmān ca api adhiṣṭhātā na tasya gatiḥ anyathā
aṅgada pramukhaiḥ vīraiḥ hatam madhuvanam kila
vicintya dakṣiṇām āśām āgataiḥ hari puṃgavaiḥ

original: 5.061.020a āgataiś ca praviṣṭaṃ tad yathā madhuvanaṃ hi taiḥ
analyzed: āgataiḥ ca praviṣṭam tat yathā madhuvanam hi taiḥ

original: 5.061.020c dharṣitaṃ ca vanaṃ kṛtsnam upayuktaṃ ca vānaraiḥ
analyzed: dharṣitam ca vanam kṛtsnam upayuktam ca vānaraiḥ

original: 5.061.020e vāritāḥ sahitāḥ pālās tathā jānubhir āhatāḥ
analyzed: vāritāḥ sahitāḥ pālāḥ tathā jānubhiḥ āhatāḥ

original: 5.061.021a etadartham ayaṃ prāpto vaktuṃ madhuravāg iha
analyzed: etad artham ayam prāptaḥ vaktum madhura vāc iha
nāmnā dadhimukhaḥ nāma hariḥ prakhyāta vikramaḥ

original: 5.061.022a dṛṣṭā sītā mahābāho saumitre paśya tattvataḥ
analyzed: dṛṣṭā sītā mahā bāho saumitre paśya tattvataḥ

original: 5.061.022c abhigamya yathā sarve pibanti madhu vānarāḥ
analyzed: abhigamya yathā sarve pibanti madhu vānarāḥ

original: 5.061.023a na cāpy adṛṣṭvā vaidehīṃ viśrutāḥ puruṣarṣabha
analyzed: na ca api a dṛṣṭvā vaidehīm viśrutāḥ puruṣa ṛṣabha

original: 5.061.023c vanaṃ dātta varaṃ divyaṃ dharṣayeyur vanaukasaḥ
analyzed: vanam dātta varam divyam dharṣayeyuḥ vanaukasaḥ
tatas prahṛṣṭaḥ dharma ātmā lakṣmaṇaḥ saha rāghavaḥ
śrutvā karṇa sukhām vāṇīm sugrīva vadanāt cyutām

original: 5.061.025a prāhṛṣyata bhṛśaṃ rāmo lakṣmaṇaś ca mahāyaśāḥ
analyzed: prāhṛṣyata bhṛśam rāmaḥ lakṣmaṇaḥ ca mahā yaśāḥ

original: 5.061.025c śrutvā dadhimukhasyedaṃ sugrīvas tu prahṛṣya ca
analyzed: śrutvā dadhimukhasya idam sugrīvaḥ tu prahṛṣya ca
vana pālam punar vākyam sugrīvaḥ pratyabhāṣata

original: 5.061.026a prīto 'smi saumya yad bhuktaṃ vanaṃ taiḥ kṛtakarmabhiḥ
analyzed: prītaḥ smi saumya yat bhuktam vanam taiḥ kṛta karmabhiḥ
marṣitam marṣaṇīyam ca ceṣṭitam kṛta karmaṇām
icchāmi śīghram hanumat pradhānān
śākhāmṛgān tān mṛga rāja darpān
draṣṭum kṛtārthān saha rāghavābhyām
śrotum ca sītā adhigame prayatnam

original: 5.062.001a sugrīveṇaivam uktas tu hṛṣṭo dadhimukhaḥ kapiḥ
analyzed: sugrīveṇa evam uktaḥ tu hṛṣṭaḥ dadhimukhaḥ kapiḥ
rāghavam lakṣmaṇam ca eva sugrīvam ca abhyavādayat

original: 5.062.002a sa praṇamya ca sugrīvaṃ rāghavau ca mahābalau
analyzed: sa praṇamya ca sugrīvam rāghavau ca mahā balau

original: 5.062.002c vānaraiḥ sahitaiḥ śūrair divam evotpapāta ha
analyzed: vānaraiḥ sahitaiḥ śūraiḥ divam evā utpapāta ha

original: 5.062.003a sa yathaivāgataḥ pūrvaṃ tathaiva tvarito gataḥ
analyzed: sa yathā eva āgataḥ pūrvam tathā eva tvaritaḥ gataḥ

original: 5.062.003c nipatya gaganād bhūmau tad vanaṃ praviveśa ha
analyzed: nipatya gaganāt bhūmau tat vanam praviveśa ha
sa praviṣṭaḥ madhuvanam dadarśa hari yūthapān
vimadān uddhatān sarvān mehamānān madhūdakam

original: 5.062.005a sa tān upāgamad vīro baddhvā karapuṭāñjalim
analyzed: sa tān upāgamat vīraḥ baddhvā kara puṭa añjalim

original: 5.062.005c uvāca vacanaṃ ślakṣṇam idaṃ hṛṣṭavad aṅgadam
analyzed: uvāca vacanam ślakṣṇam idam hṛṣṭa vat aṅgadam

original: 5.062.006a saumya roṣo na kartavyo yad ebhir abhivāritaḥ
analyzed: saumya roṣaḥ na kartavyaḥ yat ebhiḥ abhivāritaḥ
ajñānāt rakṣibhiḥ krodhāt bhavantaḥ pratiṣedhitāḥ

original: 5.062.007a yuvarājas tvam īśaś ca vanasyāsya mahābala
analyzed: yuvarājaḥ tvam īśaḥ ca vanasya asya mahā bala

original: 5.062.007c maurkhyāt pūrvaṃ kṛto doṣas tad bhavān kṣantum arhati
analyzed: maurkhyāt pūrvam kṛtaḥ doṣaḥ tat bhavān kṣantum arhati

original: 5.062.008a yathaiva hi pitā te 'bhūt pūrvaṃ harigaṇeśvaraḥ
analyzed: yathā eva hi pitā te bhūt pūrvam hari gaṇa īśvaraḥ

original: 5.062.008c tathā tvam api sugrīvo nānyas tu harisattama
analyzed: tathā tvam api sugrīvaḥ nā anyaḥ tu hari sattama

original: 5.062.009a ākhyātaṃ hi mayā gatvā pitṛvyasya tavānagha
analyzed: ākhyātam hi mayā gatvā pitṛvyasya tava anagha
iha upayānam sarveṣām eteṣām vana cāriṇām
sa tvad āgamanam śrutvā saha ebhiḥ hari yūthapaiḥ

original: 5.062.010c prahṛṣṭo na tu ruṣṭo 'sau vanaṃ śrutvā pradharṣitam
analyzed: prahṛṣṭaḥ na tu ruṣṭaḥ sau vanam śrutvā pradharṣitam

original: 5.062.011a prahṛṣṭo māṃ pitṛvyas te sugrīvo vānareśvaraḥ
analyzed: prahṛṣṭaḥ mām pitṛvyaḥ te sugrīvaḥ vānara īśvaraḥ

original: 5.062.011c śīghraṃ preṣaya sarvāṃs tān iti hovāca pārthivaḥ
analyzed: śīghram preṣaya sarvān tān iti ha uvāca pārthivaḥ
śrutvā dadhimukhasya etat vacanam ślakṣṇam aṅgadaḥ
abravīt tān hari śreṣṭhaḥ vākyam vākya viśāradaḥ
śaṅke śrutaḥ yam vṛttāntaḥ rāmeṇa hari yūthapāḥ

original: 5.062.013c tat kṣamaṃ neha naḥ sthātuṃ kṛte kārye paraṃtapāḥ
analyzed: tat kṣamam na iha naḥ sthātum kṛte kārye paraṃtapāḥ
pītvā madhu yathākāmam viśrāntāḥ vana cāriṇaḥ

original: 5.062.014c kiṃ śeṣaṃ gamanaṃ tatra sugrīvo yatra me guruḥ
analyzed: kim śeṣam gamanam tatra sugrīvaḥ yatra me guruḥ

original: 5.062.015a sarve yathā māṃ vakṣyanti sametya hariyūthapāḥ
analyzed: sarve yathā mām vakṣyanti sametya hari yūthapāḥ

original: 5.062.015c tathāsmi kartā kartavye bhavadbhiḥ paravān aham
analyzed: tathā asmi kartā kartavye bhavadbhiḥ paravān aham
na ājñāpayitum īśaḥ ham yuvarājaḥ smi yadi api
ayuktam kṛta karmāṇaḥ yūyam dharṣayitum mayā

original: 5.062.017a bruvataś cāṅgadaś caivaṃ śrutvā vacanam avyayam
analyzed: bruvataḥ ca aṅgadaḥ ca evam śrutvā vacanam avyayam
prahṛṣṭa manasaḥ vākyam idam ūcuḥ vanaukasaḥ

original: 5.062.018a evaṃ vakṣyati ko rājan prabhuḥ san vānararṣabha
analyzed: evam vakṣyati kaḥ rājan prabhuḥ san vānara ṛṣabha
aiśvarya mada mattaḥ hi sarvaḥ ham iti manyate

original: 5.062.019a tava cedaṃ susadṛśaṃ vākyaṃ nānyasya kasya cit
analyzed: tava ca idam su sadṛśam vākyam na anyasya kasya cid
saṃnatiḥ hi tava ākhyāti bhaviṣyat śubha bhāgya tām

original: 5.062.020a sarve vayam api prāptās tatra gantuṃ kṛtakṣaṇāḥ
analyzed: sarve vayam api prāptāḥ tatra gantum kṛtakṣaṇāḥ

original: 5.062.020c sa yatra harivīrāṇāṃ sugrīvaḥ patir avyayaḥ
analyzed: sa yatra hari vīrāṇām sugrīvaḥ patiḥ avyayaḥ

original: 5.062.021a tvayā hy anuktair haribhir naiva śakyaṃ padāt padam
analyzed: tvayā hi anuktaiḥ haribhiḥ nā eva śakyam padāt padam

original: 5.062.021c kva cid gantuṃ hariśreṣṭha brūmaḥ satyam idaṃ tu te
analyzed: kva cit gantum hari śreṣṭha brūmaḥ satyam idam tu te

original: 5.062.022a evaṃ tu vadatāṃ teṣām aṅgadaḥ pratyabhāṣata
analyzed: evam tu vadatām teṣām aṅgadaḥ pratyabhāṣata

original: 5.062.022c bāḍhaṃ gacchāma ity uktvā utpapāta mahītalāt
analyzed: bāḍham gacchāmaḥ iti uktvā utpapāta mahī talāt
utpatantam anūtpetuḥ sarve te hari yūthapāḥ
kṛtvā ākāśam nirākāśam yajña utkṣiptāḥ iva analāḥ
te mbaram sahasā utpatya vegavantaḥ plavaṃgamāḥ
vinadantaḥ mahā nādam ghanāḥ vāta īritāḥ yathā
aṅgade hi an anuprāpte sugrīvaḥ vānara adhipaḥ
uvāca śoka upahatam rāmam kamala locanam

original: 5.062.026a samāśvasihi bhadraṃ te dṛṣṭā devī na saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: samāśvasihi bhadram te dṛṣṭā devī na saṃśayaḥ

original: 5.062.026c nāgantum iha śakyaṃ tair atīte samaye hi naḥ
analyzed: na āgantum iha śakyam taiḥ atīte samaye hi naḥ

original: 5.062.027a na matsakāśam āgacchet kṛtye hi vinipātite
analyzed: na mad sakāśam āgacchet kṛtye hi vinipātite
yuvarājaḥ mahā bāhuḥ plavatām pravaraḥ ṅgadaḥ

original: 5.062.028a yady apy akṛtakṛtyānām īdṛśaḥ syād upakramaḥ
analyzed: yadi api akṛta kṛtyānām īdṛśaḥ syāt upakramaḥ
bhavet tu dīna vadanaḥ bhrānta vipluta mānasaḥ
pitṛpaitāmaham ca etat pūrvakaiḥ abhirakṣitam

original: 5.062.029c na me madhuvanaṃ hanyād ahṛṣṭaḥ plavageśvaraḥ
analyzed: na me madhuvanam hanyāt a hṛṣṭaḥ plavaga īśvaraḥ
kausalyā su prajāḥ rāma samāśvasihi suvrata

original: 5.062.030c dṛṣṭā devī na saṃdeho na cānyena hanūmatā
analyzed: dṛṣṭā devī na saṃdehaḥ na ca anyena hanūmatā

original: 5.062.030e na hy anyaḥ karmaṇo hetuḥ sādhane tadvidho bhavet
analyzed: na hi anyaḥ karmaṇaḥ hetuḥ sādhane tadvidhaḥ bhavet

original: 5.062.031a hanūmati hi siddhiś ca matiś ca matisattama
analyzed: hanūmati hi siddhiḥ ca matiḥ ca mati sattama

original: 5.062.031c vyavasāyaś ca vīryaṃ ca sūrye teja iva dhruvam
analyzed: vyavasāyaḥ ca vīryam ca sūrye tejaḥ iva dhruvam

original: 5.062.032a jāmbavān yatra netā syād aṅgadaś ca baleśvaraḥ
analyzed: jāmbavān yatra netā syāt aṅgadaḥ ca bala īśvaraḥ

original: 5.062.032c hanūmāṃś cāpy adhiṣṭhātā na tasya gatir anyathā
analyzed: hanūmān ca api adhiṣṭhātā na tasya gatiḥ anyathā

original: 5.062.033a mā bhūś cintā samāyuktaḥ saṃpraty amitavikrama
analyzed: mā bhūḥ cintā samāyuktaḥ saṃprati amita vikrama

original: 5.062.034a tataḥ kila kilā śabdaṃ śuśrāvāsannam ambare
analyzed: tatas kila kilā śabdam śuśrāva āsannam ambare
hanūmat karma dṛptānām nardatām kānanaukasām
kiṣkindhām upayātānām siddhim kathayatām iva

original: 5.062.035a tataḥ śrutvā ninādaṃ taṃ kapīnāṃ kapisattamaḥ
analyzed: tatas śrutvā ninādam tam kapīnām kapi sattamaḥ
āyata āñcita lāṅgūlaḥ saḥ bhavat dhṛṣṭa mānasaḥ
ājagmuḥ te pi harayaḥ rāma darśana kāṅkṣiṇaḥ

original: 5.062.036c aṅgadaṃ purataḥ kṛtvā hanūmantaṃ ca vānaram
analyzed: aṅgadam puratas kṛtvā hanūmantam ca vānaram
te ṅgada pramukhāḥ vīrāḥ prahṛṣṭāḥ ca mudā anvitāḥ
nipetuḥ hari rājasya samīpe rāghavasya ca

original: 5.062.038a hanūmāṃś ca mahābahuḥ praṇamya śirasā tataḥ
analyzed: hanūmān ca mahā bahuḥ praṇamya śirasā tatas
niyatām akṣatām devīm rāghavāya nyavedayat
niścita artham tatas tasmin sugrīvam pavanātmaje
lakṣmaṇaḥ prītimān prītam bahu mānāt avaikṣata
prītyā ca ramamāṇaḥ rāghavaḥ para vīra hā
bahu mānena mahatā hanūmantam avaikṣata

original: 5.063.001a tataḥ prasravaṇaṃ śailaṃ te gatvā citrakānanam
analyzed: tatas prasravaṇam śailam te gatvā citra kānanam

original: 5.063.001c praṇamya śirasā rāmaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahābalam
analyzed: praṇamya śirasā rāmam lakṣmaṇam ca mahā balam
yuvarājam puraskṛtya sugrīvam abhivādya ca
pravṛttam atha sītāyāḥ pravaktum upacakramuḥ
rāvaṇa antaḥpure rodham rākṣasībhiḥ ca tarjanam

original: 5.063.003c rāme samanurāgaṃ ca yaś cāpi samayaḥ kṛtaḥ
analyzed: rāme samanurāgam ca yaḥ ca api samayaḥ kṛtaḥ

original: 5.063.004a etad ākhyānti te sarve harayo rāma saṃnidhau
analyzed: etat ākhyānti te sarve harayaḥ rāma saṃnidhau

original: 5.063.004c vaidehīm akṣatāṃ śrutvā rāmas tūttaram abravīt
analyzed: vaidehīm akṣatām śrutvā rāmaḥ tu uttaram abravīt

original: 5.063.005a kva sītā vartate devī kathaṃ ca mayi vartate
analyzed: kva sītā vartate devī katham ca mayi vartate

original: 5.063.005c etan me sarvam ākhyāta vaidehīṃ prati vānarāḥ
analyzed: etat me sarvam ākhyāta vaidehīm prati vānarāḥ
rāmasya gaditam harayaḥ rāma saṃnidhau
codayanti hanūmantam sītā vṛttānta kovidam

original: 5.063.007a śrutvā tu vacanaṃ teṣāṃ hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
analyzed: śrutvā tu vacanam teṣām hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ

original: 5.063.007c uvāca vākyaṃ vākyajñaḥ sītāyā darśanaṃ yathā
analyzed: uvāca vākyam vākya jñaḥ sītāyāḥ darśanam yathā
samudram laṅghayitvā aham śata yojanam āyatam
agaccham jānakīm sītām mārgamāṇaḥ didṛkṣayā
tatra laṅkā iti nagarī rāvaṇasya durātmanaḥ
dakṣiṇasya samudrasya tīre vasati dakṣiṇe

original: 5.063.010a tatra dṛṣṭā mayā sītā rāvaṇāntaḥpure satī
analyzed: tatra dṛṣṭā mayā sītā rāvaṇa antaḥpure satī

original: 5.063.010c saṃnyasya tvayi jīvantī rāmā rāma manoratham
analyzed: saṃnyasya tvayi jīvantī rāmā rāma manoratham

original: 5.063.011a dṛṣṭā me rākṣasī madhye tarjyamānā muhur muhuḥ
analyzed: dṛṣṭā me rākṣasī madhye tarjyamānā muhur muhur
rākṣasībhiḥ virūpābhiḥ rakṣitā pramadā vane
duḥkham āpadyate devī tava aduḥkha ucitā satī
rāvaṇa antaḥpure ruddhvā rākṣasībhiḥ su rakṣitā
eka veṇī dharā dīnā tvayi cintā parāyaṇā
adhas śayyā vivarṇa aṅgī padminī iva hima āgame
rāvaṇāt vinivṛtta arthā martavya kṛta niścayā

original: 5.063.014c devī kathaṃ cit kākutstha tvanmanā mārgitā mayā
analyzed: devī katham cit kākutstha tvad manāḥ mārgitā mayā
ikṣvāku vaṃśa vikhyātim śanais kīrtayata anagha
sa mayā nara śārdūla viśvāsam upapāditā

original: 5.063.016a tataḥ saṃbhāṣitā devī sarvam arthaṃ ca darśitā
analyzed: tatas saṃbhāṣitā devī sarvam artham ca darśitā
rāma sugrīva sakhyam ca śrutvā prītim upāgatā

original: 5.063.017a niyataḥ samudācāro bhaktiś cāsyās tathā tvayi
analyzed: niyataḥ samudācāraḥ bhaktiḥ ca asyāḥ tathā tvayi
evam mayā mahābhāgā dṛṣṭā janakanandiniḥ
ugreṇa tapasā yuktā tvad bhaktyā puruṣa ṛṣabha

original: 5.063.018a abhijñānaṃ ca me dattaṃ yathāvṛttaṃ tavāntike
analyzed: abhijñānam ca me dattam yathāvṛttam tava antike
citrakūṭe mahā prājña vāyasam prati rāghava

original: 5.063.019a vijñāpyaś ca nara vyāghro rāmo vāyusuta tvayā
analyzed: vijñāpyaḥ ca nara vyāghraḥ rāmaḥ vāyu suta tvayā

original: 5.063.019c akhileneha yad dṛṣṭam iti mām āha jānakī
analyzed: akhilena iha yat dṛṣṭam iti mām āha jānakī
idam ca asmai pradātavyam yatnāt su parirakṣitam
bruvatā vacanāni evam sugrīvasya upaśṛṇvataḥ

original: 5.063.021a eṣa cūḍāmaṇiḥ śrīmān mayā te yatnarakṣitaḥ
analyzed: eṣa cūḍāmaṇiḥ śrīmān mayā te yatna rakṣitaḥ
manaḥśilāyāḥ tikalaḥ tam smarasva iti ca abravīt

original: 5.063.022a eṣa niryātitaḥ śrīmān mayā te vārisaṃbhavaḥ
analyzed: eṣa niryātitaḥ śrīmān mayā te vāri saṃbhavaḥ

original: 5.063.022c etaṃ dṛṣṭvā pramodiṣye vyasane tvām ivānagha
analyzed: etam dṛṣṭvā pramodiṣye vyasane tvām iva anagha
jīvitam dhārayiṣyāmi māsam daśaratha ātmaja

original: 5.063.023c ūrdhvaṃ māsān na jīveyaṃ rakṣasāṃ vaśam āgatā
analyzed: ūrdhvam māsāt na jīveyam rakṣasām vaśam āgatā

original: 5.063.024a iti mām abravīt sītā kṛśāṅgī dharma cāriṇī
analyzed: iti mām abravīt sītā kṛśāṅgī dharma cāriṇī
rāvaṇa antaḥpure ruddhā mṛgī iva utphulla locanā

original: 5.063.025a etad eva mayākhyātaṃ sarvaṃ rāghava yad yathā
analyzed: etat eva mayā ākhyātam sarvam rāghava yat yathā
sarvathā sāgara jale saṃtāraḥ pravidhīyatām
tau jāta āśvāsau rāja putrau viditvā
tat ca abhijñānam rāghavāya pradāya
devyā ca ākhyātam sarvam eva ānupūrvyāt
vācā saṃpūrṇam vāyuputraḥ śaśaṃsa
evam uktaḥ hanumatā rāmaḥ daśaratha ātmajaḥ

original: 5.064.001c taṃ maṇiṃ hṛdaye kṛtvā praruroda salakṣmaṇaḥ
analyzed: tam maṇim hṛdaye kṛtvā praruroda sa lakṣmaṇaḥ

original: 5.064.002a taṃ tu dṛṣṭvā maṇiśreṣṭhaṃ rāghavaḥ śokakarśitaḥ
analyzed: tam tu dṛṣṭvā maṇi śreṣṭham rāghavaḥ śoka karśitaḥ
netrābhyām aśru pūrṇābhyām sugrīvam idam abravīt

original: 5.064.003a yathaiva dhenuḥ sravati snehād vatsasya vatsalā
analyzed: yathā eva dhenuḥ sravati snehāt vatsasya vatsalā
tathā mama api hṛdayam maṇi ratnasya darśanāt

original: 5.064.004a maṇiratnam idaṃ dattaṃ vaidehyāḥ śvaśureṇa me
analyzed: maṇi ratnam idam dattam vaidehyāḥ śvaśureṇa me

original: 5.064.004c vadhūkāle yathā baddham adhikaṃ mūrdhni śobhate
analyzed: vadhū kāle yathā baddham adhikam mūrdhni śobhate
ayam hi jala saṃbhūtaḥ maṇiḥ pravara pūjitaḥ
yajñe parama tuṣṭena dattaḥ śakreṇa dhīmatā

original: 5.064.006a imaṃ dṛṣṭvā maṇiśreṣṭhaṃ tathā tātasya darśanam
analyzed: imam dṛṣṭvā maṇi śreṣṭham tathā tātasya darśanam

original: 5.064.006c adyāsmy avagataḥ saumya vaidehasya tathā vibhoḥ
analyzed: adyā asmi avagataḥ saumya vaidehasya tathā vibhoḥ

original: 5.064.007a ayaṃ hi śobhate tasyāḥ priyāyā mūrdhni me maṇiḥ
analyzed: ayam hi śobhate tasyāḥ priyāyāḥ mūrdhni me maṇiḥ

original: 5.064.007c adyāsya darśanenāhaṃ prāptāṃ tām iva cintaye
analyzed: adya asya darśanena aham prāptām tām iva cintaye

original: 5.064.008a kim āha sītā vaidehī brūhi saumya punaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: kim āha sītā vaidehī brūhi saumya punar punar
parāsum iva toyena siñcantī vākya vāriṇā

original: 5.064.009a itas tu kiṃ duḥkhataraṃ yad imaṃ vārisaṃbhavam
analyzed: itas tu kim duḥkhataram yat imam vāri saṃbhavam

original: 5.064.009c maṇiṃ paśyāmi saumitre vaidehīm āgataṃ vinā
analyzed: maṇim paśyāmi saumitre vaidehīm āgatam vinā

original: 5.064.010a ciraṃ jīvati vaidehī yadi māsaṃ dhariṣyati
analyzed: ciram jīvati vaidehī yadi māsam dhariṣyati

original: 5.064.010c kṣaṇaṃ saumya na jīveyaṃ vinā tām asitekṣaṇām
analyzed: kṣaṇam saumya na jīveyam vinā tām asita īkṣaṇām

original: 5.064.011a naya mām api taṃ deśaṃ yatra dṛṣṭā mama priyā
analyzed: naya mām api tam deśam yatra dṛṣṭā mama priyā

original: 5.064.011c na tiṣṭheyaṃ kṣaṇam api pravṛttim upalabhya ca
analyzed: na tiṣṭheyam kṣaṇam api pravṛttim upalabhya ca

original: 5.064.012a kathaṃ sā mama suśroṇi bhīru bhīruḥ satī tadā
analyzed: katham sā mama suśroṇi bhīru bhīruḥ satī tadā
bhaya āvahānām ghorāṇām madhye tiṣṭhati rakṣasām
śāradaḥ timira unmukhaḥ nūnam candraḥ iva ambudaiḥ

original: 5.064.013c āvṛtaṃ vadanaṃ tasyā na virājati rākṣasaiḥ
analyzed: āvṛtam vadanam tasyāḥ na virājati rākṣasaiḥ

original: 5.064.014a kim āha sītā hanumaṃs tattvataḥ kathayasva me
analyzed: kim āha sītā hanumant tattvataḥ kathayasva me
etena khalu jīviṣye bheṣajena āturaḥ yathā

original: 5.064.015a madhurā madhurālāpā kim āha mama bhāminī
analyzed: madhurā madhura ālāpā kim āha mama bhāminī
mad vihīnā varārohā hanuman kathayasva me

original: 5.064.015e duḥkhād duḥkhataraṃ prāpya kathaṃ jīvati jānakī
analyzed: duḥkhāt duḥkhataram prāpya katham jīvati jānakī

original: 5.065.001a evam uktas tu hanumān rāghaveṇa mahātmanā
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu hanumān rāghaveṇa mahātmanā
sītāyāḥ bhāṣitam sarvam nyavedayata rāghave
idam uktavatī devī jānakī puruṣa ṛṣabha
pūrva vṛttam abhijñānam citrakūṭe yathā tatham

original: 5.065.003a sukhasuptā tvayā sārdhaṃ jānakī pūrvam utthitā
analyzed: sukha suptā tvayā sārdham jānakī pūrvam utthitā
vāyasaḥ sahasā utpatya virarāda stanāntare

original: 5.065.004a paryāyeṇa ca suptas tvaṃ devyaṅke bharatāgraja
analyzed: paryāyeṇa ca suptaḥ tvam devī aṅke bharatāgraja

original: 5.065.004c punaś ca kila pakṣī sa devyā janayati vyathām
analyzed: punar ca kila pakṣī sa devyāḥ janayati vyathām

original: 5.065.005a tataḥ punar upāgamya virarāda bhṛśaṃ kila
analyzed: tatas punar upāgamya virarāda bhṛśam kila

original: 5.065.005c tatas tvaṃ bodhitas tasyāḥ śoṇitena samukṣitaḥ
analyzed: tatas tvam bodhitaḥ tasyāḥ śoṇitena samukṣitaḥ
vāyasena ca tena eva satatam bādhyamānayā

original: 5.065.006c bodhitaḥ kila devyās tvaṃ sukhasuptaḥ paraṃtapa
analyzed: bodhitaḥ kila devyāḥ tvam sukha suptaḥ paraṃtapa

original: 5.065.007a tāṃ tu dṛṣṭvā mahābāho rāditāṃ ca stanāntare
analyzed: tām tu dṛṣṭvā mahā bāho rāditām ca stanāntare
āśīviṣaḥ iva kruddhaḥ niḥśvasan abhyabhāṣathāḥ

original: 5.065.008a nakhāgraiḥ kena te bhīru dāritaṃ tu stanāntaram
analyzed: nakha agraiḥ kena te bhīru dāritam tu stanāntaram
kaḥ krīḍati sa roṣeṇa pañcavaktreṇa bhoginā
nirīkṣamāṇaḥ sahasā vāyasam samavaikṣatāḥ

original: 5.065.009c nakhaiḥ sarudhirais tīkṣṇair mām evābhimukhaṃ sthitam
analyzed: nakhaiḥ sa rudhiraiḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ mām eva abhimukham sthitam

original: 5.065.010a sutaḥ kila sa śakrasya vāyasaḥ patatāṃ varaḥ
analyzed: sutaḥ kila sa śakrasya vāyasaḥ patatām varaḥ
dharā antara caraḥ śīghram pavanasya gatau samaḥ
tatas tasmin mahā bāho kopa saṃvartita īkṣaṇaḥ

original: 5.065.011c vāyase tvaṃ kṛtvāḥ krūrāṃ matiṃ matimatāṃ vara
analyzed: vāyase tvam kṛtvāḥ krūrām matim matimatām vara

original: 5.065.012a sa darbhaṃ saṃstarād gṛhya brahmāstreṇa nyayojayaḥ
analyzed: sa darbham saṃstarāt gṛhya brahmāstreṇa nyayojayaḥ

original: 5.065.012c sa dīpta iva kālāgnir jajvālābhimukhaḥ khagam
analyzed: sa dīptaḥ iva kālāgniḥ jajvāla abhimukhaḥ khagam

original: 5.065.013a sa tvaṃ pradīptaṃ cikṣepa darbhaṃ taṃ vāyasaṃ prati
analyzed: sa tvam pradīptam cikṣepa darbham tam vāyasam prati

original: 5.065.013c tatas tu vāyasaṃ dīptaḥ sa darbho 'nujagāma ha
analyzed: tatas tu vāyasam dīptaḥ sa darbhaḥ nujagāma ha

original: 5.065.014a sa pitrā ca parityaktaḥ suraiḥ sarvair maharṣibhiḥ
analyzed: sa pitrā ca parityaktaḥ suraiḥ sarvaiḥ mahā ṛṣibhiḥ
trīn lokān saṃparikramya trātāram na adhigacchati

original: 5.065.015a taṃ tvaṃ nipatitaṃ bhūmau śaraṇyaḥ śaraṇāgatam
analyzed: tam tvam nipatitam bhūmau śaraṇyaḥ śaraṇa āgatam
vadha arham api kākutstha kṛpayā paripālayaḥ

original: 5.065.016a mogham astraṃ na śakyaṃ tu kartum ity eva rāghava
analyzed: mogham astram na śakyam tu kartum iti eva rāghava

original: 5.065.016c tatas tasyākṣikākasya hinasti sma sa dakṣiṇam
