analyzed: tatas tasya akṣikākasya hinasti sma sa dakṣiṇam

original: 5.065.017a rāma tvāṃ sa namaskṛtvā rājño daśarathasya ca
analyzed: rāma tvām sa namaskṛtvā rājñaḥ daśarathasya ca

original: 5.065.017c visṛṣṭas tu tadā kākaḥ pratipede kham ālayam
analyzed: visṛṣṭaḥ tu tadā kākaḥ pratipede kham ālayam

original: 5.065.018a evam astravidāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ sattvavāñ śīlavān api
analyzed: evam astra vidām śreṣṭhaḥ sattvavān śīlavān api

original: 5.065.018c kimartham astraṃ rakṣaḥsu na yojayasi rāghava
analyzed: kimartham astram rakṣaḥsu na yojayasi rāghava

original: 5.065.019a na nāgā nāpi gandharvā nāsurā na marudgaṇāḥ
analyzed: na nāgāḥ na api gandharvāḥ na asurāḥ na marut gaṇāḥ

original: 5.065.019c tava rāma mukhe sthātuṃ śaktāḥ pratisamādhitum
analyzed: tava rāma mukhe sthātum śaktāḥ

original: 5.065.020a tava vīryavataḥ kaccin mayi yady asti saṃbhramaḥ
analyzed: tava vīryavataḥ kaccit mayi yadi asti saṃbhramaḥ

original: 5.065.020c kṣipraṃ suniśitair bāṇair hanyatāṃ yudhi rāvaṇaḥ
analyzed: kṣipram su niśitaiḥ bāṇaiḥ hanyatām yudhi rāvaṇaḥ

original: 5.065.021a bhrātur ādeśam ādāya lakṣmaṇo vā paraṃtapaḥ
analyzed: bhrātuḥ ādeśam ādāya lakṣmaṇaḥ vā paraṃtapaḥ

original: 5.065.021c sa kimarthaṃ naravaro na māṃ rakṣati rāghavaḥ
analyzed: sa kimartham nara varaḥ na mām rakṣati rāghavaḥ
śaktau tau puruṣa vyāghrau vāyu agni sama tejasau

original: 5.065.022c surāṇām api durdharṣau kimarthaṃ mām upekṣataḥ
analyzed: surāṇām api durdharṣau kimartham mām upekṣataḥ

original: 5.065.023a mamaiva duṣkṛtaṃ kiṃ cin mahad asti na saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: mama eva duṣkṛtam kim cit mahat asti na saṃśayaḥ

original: 5.065.023c samarthau sahitau yan māṃ nāpekṣete paraṃtapau
analyzed: samarthau sahitau yat mām na apekṣete paraṃtapau
vaidehyāḥ vacanam śrutvā karuṇam sa aśru bhāṣitam

original: 5.065.024c punar apy aham āryāṃ tām idaṃ vacanam abruvam
analyzed: punar api aham āryām tām idam vacanam abruvam

original: 5.065.025a tvacchokavimukho rāmo devi satyena te śape
analyzed: tvad śoka vimukhaḥ rāmaḥ devi satyena te śape
rāme duḥkha abhibhūte ca lakṣmaṇaḥ paritapyate

original: 5.065.026a kathaṃ cid bhavatī dṛṣṭā na kālaḥ pariśocitum
analyzed: katham cit bhavatī dṛṣṭā na kālaḥ pariśocitum

original: 5.065.026c imaṃ muhūrtaṃ duḥkhānām antaṃ drakṣyasi bhāmini
analyzed: imam muhūrtam duḥkhānām antam drakṣyasi bhāmini
tau ubhau nara śārdūlau rāja putrau ariṃdamau
tvad darśana kṛta utsāhau laṅkām bhasmīkariṣyataḥ

original: 5.065.028a hatvā ca samare raudraṃ rāvaṇaṃ saha bāndhavam
analyzed: hatvā ca samare raudram rāvaṇam saha bāndhavam

original: 5.065.028c rāghavas tvāṃ mahābāhuḥ svāṃ purīṃ nayate dhruvam
analyzed: rāghavaḥ tvām mahā bāhuḥ svām purīm nayate dhruvam

original: 5.065.029a yat tu rāmo vijānīyād abhijñānam anindite
analyzed: yat tu rāmaḥ vijānīyāt abhijñānam anindite
prīti saṃjananam tasya pradātum tat tvam arhasi
sā abhivīkṣya diśaḥ sarvāḥ veṇī udgrathanam uttamam

original: 5.065.030c muktvā vastrād dadau mahyaṃ maṇim etaṃ mahābala
analyzed: muktvā vastrāt dadau mahyam maṇim etam mahā bala

original: 5.065.031a pratigṛhya maṇiṃ divyaṃ tava heto raghūttama
analyzed: pratigṛhya maṇim divyam tava hetoḥ raghu uttama
śirasā saṃpraṇamya enām aham āgamane tvare
gamane ca kṛta utsāham avekṣya varavarṇinī

original: 5.065.032c vivardhamānaṃ ca hi mām uvāca janakātmajā
analyzed: vivardhamānam ca hi mām uvāca janakātmajā
aśru pūrṇa mukhī dīnā bāṣpa saṃdigdha bhāṣiṇī
hanuman siṃha saṃkāśau tau ubhau rāma lakṣmaṇau

original: 5.065.033c sugrīvaṃ ca sahāmātyaṃ sarvān brūyā anāmayam
analyzed: sugrīvam ca saha amātyam sarvān brūyāḥ anāmayam

original: 5.065.034a yathā ca sa mahābāhur māṃ tārayati rāghavaḥ
analyzed: yathā ca sa mahā bāhuḥ mām tārayati rāghavaḥ
asmāt duḥkha ambu saṃrodhāt tat samādhātum arhasi
imam ca tīvram mama śoka vegam
rakṣobhiḥ ebhiḥ paribhartsanam ca
brūyāḥ tu rāmasya gataḥ samīpam
śivaḥ ca te dhvāstu hari pravīra
etat tava āryā nṛpa rāja siṃha
sītā vacaḥ prāha viṣāda pūrvam

original: 5.065.036c etac ca buddhvā gaditaṃ mayā tvaṃ;
analyzed: etat ca buddhvā gaditam mayā tvam
śraddhatsva sītām kuśalām samagrām

original: 5.066.001a athāham uttaraṃ devyā punar uktaḥ sasaṃbhramam
analyzed: atha aham uttaram devyā punar uktaḥ sa saṃbhramam

original: 5.066.001c tava snehān naravyāghra sauhāryād anumānya ca
analyzed: tava snehāt nara vyāghra sauhāryāt anumānya ca

original: 5.066.002a evaṃ bahuvidhaṃ vācyo rāmo dāśarathis tvayā
analyzed: evam bahuvidham vācyaḥ rāmaḥ dāśarathiḥ tvayā

original: 5.066.002c yathā mām āpnuyāc chīghraṃ hatvā rāvaṇam āhave
analyzed: yathā mām āpnuyāt śīghram hatvā rāvaṇam āhave

original: 5.066.003a yadi vā manyase vīra vasaikāham ariṃdama
analyzed: yadi vā manyase vīra vasa ekāham ariṃdama

original: 5.066.003c kasmiṃś cit saṃvṛte deśe viśrāntaḥ śvo gamiṣyasi
analyzed: kasmin cit saṃvṛte deśe viśrāntaḥ śvas gamiṣyasi

original: 5.066.004a mama cāpy alpabhāgyāyāḥ sāmnidhyāt tava vānara
analyzed: mama ca api alpabhāgyāyāḥ sāmnidhyāt tava vānara
asya śoka vipākasya muhūrtam syāt vimokṣaṇam

original: 5.066.005a gate hi tvayi vikrānte punarāgamanāya vai
analyzed: gate hi tvayi vikrānte punarāgamanāya vai

original: 5.066.005c prāṇānām api saṃdeho mama syān nātra saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: prāṇānām api saṃdehaḥ mama syāt na atra saṃśayaḥ
tava adarśana jaḥ śokaḥ bhūyas mām paritāpayet
duḥkhāt duḥkha parābhūtām durgatām duḥkha bhāginīm
ayam tu vīra saṃdehaḥ tiṣṭhati iva mama agratas
su mahān tvad sahāyeṣu hari ṛkṣeṣu asaṃśayaḥ

original: 5.066.008a kathaṃ nu khalu duṣpāraṃ tariṣyanti mahodadhim
analyzed: katham nu khalu duṣpāram tariṣyanti mahā udadhim
tāni hari ṛkṣa sainyāni tau vā nara vara ātmajau
trayāṇām eva bhūtānām sāgarasya asya laṅghane

original: 5.066.009c śaktiḥ syād vainateyasya vāyor vā tava vānagha
analyzed: śaktiḥ syāt vainateyasya vāyoḥ vā tava vā anagha
tat asmin kārya niyoge vīra evam duratikrame

original: 5.066.010c kiṃ paśyasi samādhānaṃ brūhi kāryavidāṃ vara
analyzed: kim paśyasi samādhānam brūhi kārya vidām vara

original: 5.066.011a kāmam asya tvam evaikaḥ kāryasya parisādhane
analyzed: kāmam asya tvam eva ekaḥ kāryasya parisādhane
paryāptaḥ para vīra ghna yaśasyaḥ te bala udayaḥ

original: 5.066.012a balaiḥ samagrair yadi māṃ hatvā rāvaṇam āhave
analyzed: balaiḥ samagraiḥ yadi mām hatvā rāvaṇam āhave

original: 5.066.012c vijayī svāṃ purīṃ rāmo nayet tat syād yaśaskaram
analyzed: vijayī svām purīm rāmaḥ nayet tat syāt yaśaskaram

original: 5.066.013a yathāhaṃ tasya vīrasya vanād upadhinā hṛtā
analyzed: yathā aham tasya vīrasya vanāt upadhinā hṛtā

original: 5.066.013c rakṣasā tad bhayād eva tathā nārhati rāghavaḥ
analyzed: rakṣasā tat bhayāt eva tathā nā arhati rāghavaḥ

original: 5.066.014a balais tu saṃkulāṃ kṛtvā laṅkāṃ parabalārdanaḥ
analyzed: balaiḥ tu saṃkulām kṛtvā laṅkām para bala ardanaḥ

original: 5.066.014c māṃ nayed yadi kākutsthas tat tasya sadṛśaṃ bhavet
analyzed: mām nayet yadi kākutsthaḥ tat tasya sadṛśam bhavet

original: 5.066.015a tad yathā tasya vikrāntam anurūpaṃ mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: tat yathā tasya vikrāntam anurūpam mahātmanaḥ
bhavati āhava śūrasya tathā tvam upapādaya
tat artha upahitam vākyam praśritam hetu saṃhitam

original: 5.066.016c niśamyāhaṃ tataḥ śeṣaṃ vākyam uttaram abruvam
analyzed: niśamya aham tatas śeṣam vākyam uttaram abruvam
devi hari ṛkṣa sainyānām īśvaraḥ plavatām varaḥ
sugrīvaḥ sattva saṃpannaḥ tava arthe kṛta niścayaḥ
tasya vikrama saṃpannāḥ sattvavantaḥ mahā balāḥ
manaḥ saṃkalpa saṃpātāḥ nideśe harayaḥ sthitāḥ

original: 5.066.019a yeṣāṃ nopari nādhastān na tiryak sajjate gatiḥ
analyzed: yeṣām na upari na adhastāt na tiryak sajjate gatiḥ

original: 5.066.019c na ca karmasu sīdanti mahatsv amitatejasaḥ
analyzed: na ca karmasu sīdanti mahatsu amita tejasaḥ
asakṛt taiḥ mahābhāgaiḥ vānaraiḥ bala saṃyutaiḥ
pradakṣiṇīkṛtā bhūmiḥ vāyu mārga anusāribhiḥ

original: 5.066.021a madviśiṣṭāś ca tulyāś ca santi tatra vanaukasaḥ
analyzed: mad viśiṣṭāḥ ca tulyāḥ ca santi tatra vanaukasaḥ

original: 5.066.021c mattaḥ pratyavaraḥ kaś cin nāsti sugrīvasaṃnidhau
analyzed: mattaḥ pratyavaraḥ kaḥ cit nā asti sugrīva saṃnidhau

original: 5.066.022a ahaṃ tāvad iha prāptaḥ kiṃ punas te mahābalāḥ
analyzed: aham tāvat iha prāptaḥ kim punar te mahā balāḥ

original: 5.066.022c na hi prakṛṣṭāḥ preṣyante preṣyante hītare janāḥ
analyzed: na hi prakṛṣṭāḥ preṣyante preṣyante hi itare janāḥ

original: 5.066.023a tad alaṃ paritāpena devi manyur vyapaitu te
analyzed: tat alam paritāpena devi manyuḥ vyapaitu te
eka utpātena te laṅkām eṣyanti hari yūthapāḥ

original: 5.066.024a mama pṛṣṭhagatau tau ca candrasūryāv ivoditau
analyzed: mama pṛṣṭha gatau tau ca candra sūryau iva uditau
tvad sakāśam mahābhāge nṛ siṃhau āgamiṣyataḥ
ari ghnam siṃha saṃkāśam kṣipram drakṣyasi rāghavam

original: 5.066.025c lakṣmaṇaṃ ca dhanuṣpāṇiṃ laṅkā dvāram upasthitam
analyzed: lakṣmaṇam ca dhanuṣpāṇim laṅkā dvāram upasthitam
nakha daṃṣṭra āyudhān vīrān siṃha śārdūla vikramān
vānarān vānara indra ābhān kṣipram drakṣyasi saṃgatān
nikāśānām laṅkā malaya sānuṣu
nardatām kapi mukhyānām acirāt śoṣyase svanam
nivṛtta vana vāsam ca tvayā sārdham ariṃdamam
abhiṣiktam ayodhyāyām kṣipram drakṣyasi rāghavam
tatas mayā vāgbhiḥ adīna bhāṣiṇī
śivābhiḥ iṣṭābhiḥ abhiprasāditā
jagāma śāntim mama maithila ātmajā
tava api śokena tathā abhipīḍitā
